dialogs.situation: I am prepared to help my family financially whenever they need it

turns.text: I am prepared to help my family financially whenever they need it
That is really great.  You don't find too many people willing to help others financially.  Do you have a really good job?

dialogs.situation: I am excited about losing weight. I can feel new areas that are thinner, which excites me

turns.text: (Sorry yes daycares do have a way to log in- ask them so you can ensure she is safe) I am losing weight again and it's been hard with my stress, age and after surgery. I love feeling the new areas I am thin!
I will look into that thank you so much thats kind of you! Any special diet or fitness online you are following? I know you can do this.

dialogs.situation: looking after my cats

turns.text: i believe i am a really caring person, because i always take care of cats and feed them and lately they are more and more close to me
That is so kind of you, I also a have a soft heart for animals.  I happen to be a dog person, but I do have a cat that was my ex boyfriends.

dialogs.situation: I have been watching my 12 year old son play Fortnite.  His level of skill simply amazes me.  I have a hard time even believing that a human can do things that fast.

turns.text: Recently, I've been watching my son play a game called Fortnite. It blows my mind how good he is at such a fast game.
I have heard about that game.  I heard there was one guy that makes about $500,000 a month playing it on the streaming service Twitch.  Maybe your son should give it a try.

dialogs.situation: I was confident that I was going to win that prize

turns.text: I was confident that I was going to win that prize
What prize was it, or what was the competition, rather? I'm interested to know, but don't want to pry, if you don't feel like saying.

dialogs.situation: I did really well this past semester, so Im hoping my GPA will be at 4.0

turns.text: I aced all my classes this semester, so Im hoping and thinking my GPA will be a 4.0
That's what I like to hear! What changes did you make this semester to achieve your possible 4.0?

dialogs.situation: When my girlfriend kept me waiting on our date.

turns.text: There was this one time my girlfriend and I had plans to meet a Longhorn steakhouse for a date.. She ended up keeping me waiting inside 30 extra minutes! I was pretty frustrated.
I can only imagine having to wait at the table alone, wondering if she'd show up. At least, it sounds like, she finally arrived.  Did she specify a reason for being so late?

dialogs.situation: My cat just died. I don't know what I will do without him.

turns.text: My cat just died. I have had her for like 20 years.
Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. My cat is getting old, she's 15. I'm scared she'll pass soon too

dialogs.situation: I have all my ingredients for my dinner party and now I am getting ready to prepare a feast!

turns.text: I have all my ingredients for my dinner party and now I am getting ready to prepare a feast!
You're much braver than me. I would never host a dinner party.. don't feel like I'm good at planning, and don't feel like I'm interesting enough to talk to a bunch of different people.

dialogs.situation: I can't believe someone hit my car and took off! Some people have no morals.

turns.text: I can't believe someone hit my car and took off! Some people have no morals.
uh I've heard way too many people experience that. Why don't people just not hit you in the first place, if they don't want to take responsibility?

dialogs.situation: Someone broke my window with a soccer ball.

turns.text: Someone broke my window with a soccer ball. I made angry. I couldn't find who it was
Oh no! I hate that happened and I bet it was scary because it looked like someone broke in. But now you have a repair bill. Sorry that happened to you.

dialogs.situation: I was expecting my favorite show would get renewed. I just heard it was cancelled. I am so upset. Now I have nothing to watch.

turns.text: I was hoping my favorite show would get renewed. I just found out it was cancelled. I'm so upset.
Yeah i've been through that feeling before, I had a show that was going to get cancelled but thankfully it got saved by another company. What show was yours?

dialogs.situation: I spent this entire summer thinking I was going to lose weight, that I was going to be good on my diet and workout. I did neither. I stayed inside, played video games, ate horribly, and got grumpy ate everybody who reminded me of my promise. Now winter is coming and it's going to be even harder to motivate myself.

turns.text: I spent this entire summer thinking I was going to lose weight, that I was going to be good on my diet and workout. I did neither. I stayed inside, played video games, ate horribly, and got grumpy ate everybody who reminded me of my promise. Now winter is coming and it's going to be even harder to motivate myself.
Oh no, I'm sorry that sounds awful disappointing. If it's any consolation I think it's easier to diet than to work out. THe old phrase "can't outrun the fork."

dialogs.situation: I work as a self-employed transcriptionist. I told my client I'd have work done this week, but my university classes also started this week... and things kind of got away from me, and they won't be done. I'm worried he's going to just tell me he'll have someone else do them, and I'll lose his business.

turns.text: I work as a self-employed transcriptionist. I told my client I'd have work done this week, but my university classes also started this week... and things kind of got away from me, and they won't be done. I'm worried he's going to just tell me he'll have someone else do them, and I'll lose his business.
Yeah well you only have so much time to work with. Time management is one of the most important skills you can learn.

dialogs.situation: I had a good day at work, now i'm kicking back and watching TV for the rest of the day.

turns.text: I had a good day at work, now i'm kicking back and watching TV for the rest of the day.
Good for you. You deserve to take some time for yourself. Anything special on that you want to watch?

dialogs.situation: I was devastated my pet gerbil died recently. I loved him so much. I don't know what I will do without him.

turns.text: I was devastated when my pet gerbil Gary passed away recently. I loved Gary so much!
Oh.. i am so sorry to hear that my friend.. I understand your feelings. Have you thought about getting a new pet?

dialogs.situation: I once was in a car with my friend who was really high and I was pretty scared. I thought that he would drive really badly but he didn't, but it was still worrying.

turns.text: I was once a little scared that I was gonna die since I was in the passenger seat with someone who was very high driving the car. I didn't know a whole lot about drugs at the time.
I'm glad you made it out alive. I wonder what drugs they were on. Some drugs actually make you more careful.

dialogs.situation: When my grandmother passed away, I was so heartbroken, I was not old enough to be prepared for it

turns.text: When my grandmother passed away, I was so heartbroken, I was not old enough to be prepared for it
I don't think we are ready at any age to lose someone we love. I am so sorry about your Grandmother.

dialogs.situation: I was skipping rocks with my son the other day. That's something my grandfather used to do with me. It made me think back on the times I had with him.

turns.text: I took my son to the lake the other day, and we ended up skipping rocks. I don't know why people skip rocks; it's not really fun or anything, but we did it. It reminded me of my grandfather and I when I was a kid, and we'd do the same thing.
haha..yeah it is kid of pointless but it is a little fun as a kid. im sure your son will remember

dialogs.situation: A few months ago I broke my wrists. I had so much family support, it made me very happy.

turns.text: A few months ago I broke my wrist. I had so much family support, it made me very happy.
It's always nice to have people around you that care about you. They make hard times much easier.

dialogs.situation: I won a 10k race on the weekend

turns.text: I won a 10k race on the weekend
Oh amazing! How long were you training for, and how many people did you beat?

dialogs.situation: Before I met my girlfriend and friends I was very alone, that was not a fun time

turns.text: Before I met my girlfriend and friends I was very alone, that was not a fun time
Glad to hear your life took a turn. It's always weird, and even sometimes funny, to look back on your life to see where you came from, and how different and sometimes worse things were

dialogs.situation: One day,e and a friend wanted to go get some snacks att the store. Problem was, it was  a 2 mle way. We did rock, paper,scissors for would pay. So, I just had to trust when he got there he would pay.

turns.text: Yeah, some times those things do happen, and you0\=i just have to have trust you know>
For sure. Trust is a key driver in having a good relationship with anyone. If you can't trust people then you will feel like you are alone a lot.

dialogs.situation: I'm being induced on Monday because I'll be at 41 weeks pregnant by then.  This is my first baby and I'm so scared! Labor seems impossible!

turns.text: I'm being induced on Monday because I'll be at 41 weeks pregnant by then. This is my first baby and I'm so scared! Labor seems impossible!
You got this girl! I was induced when I had my daughter a year ago! I was scared too but honestly don't remember much.

dialogs.situation: proud. I can get fit in 3 months. Takes discipline

turns.text: I can get fit in 3 months. Takes discipline
Unfortunately, I have very little discipline. I'm probably too addicted to carbs to get fit very quickly.

dialogs.situation: My dog always barks when I am on the phone.

turns.text: My dog always barks when I am on the phone.
That is irritating, huh.  It is like a kid that can't stand not having the attention for a minute so they act up.  Haha

dialogs.situation: I called someone by the wrong name earlier today. I met them a long time ago and I guess it didn't stick properly in my brain.

turns.text: I called someone by the wrong name earlier today. I didn't really know them and hadn't seen them in ages.
I hate when that happens. I bet you meant well but you're left looking like a crazy person! I hope they understood.

dialogs.situation: I got maried at 18. I have been married for 12 years and never once strayed or became unfaithful.

turns.text: I got married very young at 18. This year we celebrated our 12 year anniversary.
Wow. That is very interesting. These days, many people get married later in life. Congratulations!

dialogs.situation: Last year when the hurricane came, we spent weeks gathering supplies and boarding up the house.

turns.text: Last year when the hurricane came, we spent weeks gathering supplies and boarding up the house.
That's sounds like a very smart and effective safety precaution. Was it enough to adequately defend your family?

dialogs.situation: I want to visit my friend who lives in a large city an hour away, but I've never driven in such a large city.

turns.text: I want to visit my friend who lives an hour away in a big city, but I'm a bit nervous about driving in such a busy city.
I don't blame you. It can be scary...the more people there are- the worse they drive. Be careful!

dialogs.situation: My brother is starting his first semester at the college I wanted to go to but could never get into. I am very happy for him. He was scared to accept the offer at first because he thought he'd hurt my feelings. I told him that was crazy!

turns.text: My brother is starting his first semester at the college I wanted to go to but could never get into. I am very happy for him. He was scared to accept the offer at first because he thought he'd hurt my feelings. I told him that was crazy!

That is so great that he was able to go.  I had the same problem as you, but I started at community college when I was 26 and finished at a 4 year college when I was 32.  It is never too late for you to go.

dialogs.situation: One day my daughter came home and told me a much older boy tripped her as she was going off the bus. He did it on purpose, and this made me very, very upset. She was only 10, he was a teenager.

turns.text: One day my 10 year old daughter came home crying after she got off the bus. A teenage boy purposely tripped her as she was getting off and she got hurt. Needless to say, I was very, very upset!
That is terrible.  I don't know why teenage boys can be so mean.  What did you end up doing?

dialogs.situation: i was so angry when i found out my girlfriend kissed a friend of mine. i felt like punching the wall

turns.text: i was so angry when i found out my girlfriend kissed a friend of mine
Oh, that's awful. What did you do? I would've dumped her and beat that dude's face in.

dialogs.situation: I am depressed most of the time

turns.text: I am depressed most of the time. Im going to therapy and taking meds. I feel like im broken
Oh I'm sorry that you are going through that. Have you discussed changing your medication up with your doctor?

dialogs.situation: Waiting for the marks back on my math test. I studied quite hard.

turns.text: I'm feeling good about my math test.
That's always a good feeling.  If you don't feel confident going in, you're in trouble!

dialogs.situation: I just found out I got into medical school.  I have worked so hard for years just to be able to get accepted

turns.text: I just found out I was accepted into medical school!  I have been working hard for this chance to become a surgeon
Congratulations. What a wonderful achievement. If I could do it all over again, this is what I'd want to do too.

dialogs.situation: My husband was able to get his promotion at work and I felt so glad for him. He had been working so hard every day to get recognized there.

turns.text: My husband has been putting in so many extra hours at work
I am sure hes doing it to take care of you guys and I am sure you are pampering him too for doing it.

dialogs.situation: I failed my Calculus exam despite having studied all nights. It was heartbreaking for me

turns.text: It was pretty shocking for me to learn that I have failed my Calculus exam when I had studied so hard for it
Ahhh.  Math.  I have certainly been there before.  I am so sorry!  Is there any way to retake it?

dialogs.situation: I remember when I bought my first car, it feels just like yesterday.

turns.text: I can't believe that I was 18 when I bought my first car. I remember being in the dealership and they handed me the keys.
That's crazy, I couldn't imagine buying a car at 18. What kind of job did you have that you were able to do that?

dialogs.situation: I am worried about not being ready for the party on Friday

turns.text: I am worried about not being ready for the party on Friday

You're hosting a party? or attending one? Either way, social gatherings can always be a lot of pressure, so that's why I usually avoid them, unfortunately. What are some of your worries, if you don't mind me asking?

dialogs.situation: My brother landed a 900 on his skateboard like Tony Hawk.

turns.text: Last week, my brother landed a 900 on his skateboard like Tony Hawk at a skating competition.
Oh wow, that sounds like it might be cool but I don't know what that looks like, what is the 900?

dialogs.situation: I tried tea for the first time and it tasted much better than I expected.

turns.text: I had never had tea thinking it was going to be awful but I recently had some and liked it a lot.
I am sure that was quite a delightful experience, especially since you were not expecting to enjoy it. Was it regular tea or flavored?

dialogs.situation: I am going to Busch Gardens next week with my family!

turns.text: I am very much looking forward to going to Busch Gardens next week with my family!
Ive been to Busch Gardens before.  They have some really cool Roller coasters.  I hope you have a great time.

dialogs.situation: when i spilled a drink all over my lap and it looked like a peed on myself.

turns.text: I spilled a drink all over my lap and had to go out in public like that, talk about wanting to hide in a cave.
Oh no!! I hope it wasn't coffee! Yes that is pretty embarrassing. People probably thought you peed your pants.

dialogs.situation: I was at a baseball game and this guy heckled a kid an i got into a argument with im

turns.text: i was at a rangers game and this guy attacked a kid over the shirt he was wearing
That sounds like an uncomfortable situation. What ended up happening? I kind of avoid large crowds and sports events because of this, since there's usually alcohol involved.

dialogs.situation: My in-laws just suddenly showed up yesterday and said they were staying for the week.  I had no warning at all but I guess they were trying to make it fun, ha ha.

turns.text: My in-laws just suddenly showed up yesterday and said they were staying for the week. I had no warning at all but I guess they were trying to make it fun, ha ha.
Oh no! I would have a heart attack! Are you able to take time away from life so unexpectedly to spend time with them?

dialogs.situation: I crapped my pants at wallmart once. I couldn't find the bathroom and well you know...

turns.text: I crapped my pants at wallmart once. I couldn't find the bathroom and well you know...
Oh no!  I've had that happen before. Not at Walmart but at a dentist office. Did you make a dash out of there?

dialogs.situation: One day I went to make a sandwich, mold was covering the entire loaf of bread

turns.text: I went to make a sandwich one day and the entire laof of bread was covered in mold!
ewww! that's gross. I actually made a toast for my son yesterday and when i was about to give it to him i noticed a little bit of mold on the side. i almost threw up

dialogs.situation: I trust in my brothers, they very rarely let me down

turns.text: I trust in my brothers, they very rarely let me down
It is good to have people you can count on. If you can't trust your family, who can you trust? :)

dialogs.situation: I had a very nice walk with my dog. It did not pull on the leash at all and I feel very relaxed.

turns.text: Just go back from walking the dog, he was a perfect angel on the leash
I didn't think that was possible for a dog on a walk! What kind of dog do you have?

dialogs.situation: I threw up on the bus yesterday. I was so mortified.

turns.text: I threw up all over the bus yesterday.
That sounds terrible! I'm sorry that happened to you. I hope everything is okay now. Do you know what caused it?

dialogs.situation: Everytime I see the Animal Rescue commercials I get so emotional and want to cry.

turns.text: I just saw a commercial about the Rescue Animals. Everytime I see it it makes me so sad.
oh no. feeling empathy towards them just shows you're normal. There's a lot of people in your boat

dialogs.situation: My neighbor killed his wife, a year ago. I would sleep during that period of time. I was shocked and afraid.

turns.text: My neighbor killed his wife, a year ago. I would sleep during that period of time. I was shocked and afraid.
Oh my god, that is terrible. Has it affected you knowing you slept through that kind of event right next door?

dialogs.situation: I get annoyed when adults don't seem to be able to clean up after themselves -- especially at work! Who do they think will clean up after them?!

turns.text: So when adults don't clean up after themselves in a business environment -- what is that ?! Why do they think a "mommy" will come along to clean up after them?!

LOL! This is perfect timing because I had the " You are an adult not a child" conversation with my girlfriend not too long ago. I had left popsicle wrapper on the night stand and it got sticky. I argued if you are willing to date someone who likes to eat Popsicles in bed, then you have to deal with the consequences.

dialogs.situation: My stepdaughter graduated from college and got a great job in San Francisco.

turns.text: My stepdaughter graduated from college in May and got a job in San Francisco making 3 times more than I have ever made.
Oh wow, she's doing great. I know it probably feels a bit bad that she's making so much more than you, but hopefully you can find  away to be proud of her.

dialogs.situation: My husband got a promotion!

turns.text: My husband got a promotion, it's going to be great for our family!
Ooh, awesome! I bet everyone's excited! I hope the future holds many more wonderful things for you!

dialogs.situation: ended up getting a pizza from Costco. I'm so hungry.

turns.text: ended up getting a pizza from Costco. I'm so hungry
Oh man, Costco pizza is great, and so cheap, too. It may not be the best, but for the price and quantity, you can't really beat it. Do you like shopping at Costco often?

dialogs.situation: Super sad today. It's the weekend pretty much and I have a hard time with loneliness on the weekends especially. I would prefer to skip over them during this time in my life.

turns.text: Super sad today. It's the weekend pretty much and I have a hard time with loneliness on the weekends especially.
I am sorry. Maybe not focus as friday-sunday as the weekend, but as any other day. And do things you would normally do on other days.

dialogs.situation: I am hopeful about moving out of this town.

turns.text: I am very hopeful and excited about moving away from a very rough city and moving to a farm.
Yes!!! I hate the city and prefer the rural areas. Are you going to get farm animals?

dialogs.situation: I'm going to eat sushi for the first time this weekend, but I am a little nervous.

turns.text: I'm going to eat sushi for the first time this coming weekend.
Yum! Sushi is so good, I'm sure you'll enjoy it! I like the eel roll and spicy tuna roll.

dialogs.situation: My mom came over to visit last week. She was very helpful around the house. She really took care of all of my needs.

turns.text: My mom stayed with me for a few days last week. She was very helpful around the house taking care of all of my needs.
I hope I will still be helping my kids when they are grown up. I like to feel they will always need me.

dialogs.situation: My niece just won a medal in a race with her track and field team.  She was the fastest in the whole race and set a new record for her school.

turns.text: My niece won a medal in a race at the track and field competition!!
Congratulations, she must be a quick one, I was always the slow one at the back of the pack.

dialogs.situation: When I see old pics of my late grandma I feel sad and kind of guilty I wasn't at her funeral.

turns.text: I feel sad and kind of guilty when I see old pics of my late Grandma.
I'm sorry. That must be difficult. I am glad you have pictures to hold on to though.

dialogs.situation: I am so thrilled I will be closing on my first house next month for me and my family.

turns.text: I will officially be a first time home owner next month.
How exciting!!!  I bet you are thinking already about  how you want to decorate it and fix up the lawn, etc..

dialogs.situation: I am really not liking Mondays.

turns.text: I am really not liking Mondays.
Yeah, they're sometimes hard starts to the week. Did anything bad happen to you this monday, or was it just slow-moving? Hopefully things pick up for you.

dialogs.situation: I don't like people kiss their dogs on the mouth. I find that disgusting.

turns.text: I don't like people kiss their dogs on the mouth. I find that disgusting.
i totally agree with you! they lick their private parts and eat stuff from the floor, why would you wanna kiss them

dialogs.situation: waiting for a package to arrive

turns.text: after all these years i tracked down a rare baseball signed by babe ruth, it arrives tomorrow!!
Wow! I don't know much about baseball, but I know Babe Ruth. New York Yankees, wasn't he? The house that Ruth built.

dialogs.situation: I've been reminiscing recently about the good old days, when I was a kid and didn't have to worry about bills and expenses.

turns.text: I've been reminiscing recently about the good old days, when I was a kid and didn't have to worry about bills and expenses.
Ah, I know what you mean! And remember *yearning* to be older?! (And of course the adults in *our* lives were shaking their heads, thinking the way we are now ;-))

dialogs.situation: I am sue I will get a promotion at work.

turns.text: I am sue I will get a promotion at work.
That is great to hear!  Part of being successful is being confident, and you sure sound confident!

dialogs.situation: Once I had a difficult pregnancy. After the baby was born and both he and I were healthy and safe, I was so grateful.

turns.text: When I was pregnant with my second child, I had a really difficult pregnancy. My midwife wasn't sure either of us would make it.
Oh no!  It seems as though everything turned our OK, right?  I am sure you were strong!

dialogs.situation: I am home all alone today.  Everyone is gone on vacation including my close friends.

turns.text: I am all alone as well.  Everyone is gone for their summer vacations.
That sucks.  It's the same for me, only it's because we recently moved and I don't know anyone outside of work yet.

dialogs.situation: My wife went out of the country for 2 months, leaving me alone with the dogs.  We had just moved so I didn't really know anyone at the time.

turns.text: My wife just went out of town for school for 2 months.  I don't really know anyone here, so I don't know what I'm going to do while she's gone.
It is an excellent opportunity, to know other people and places, to open up to the possibility, I assure you that it will go to you very well

dialogs.situation: My ex boyfriend and I were together for 4 years.  I was faithful to him the whole four years

turns.text: I was totally committed to him in every way I could be.   HOwever he ended up cheating on me
That kind of cold disregard for someone you're supposed to love is totally alien to me, the guilt would destroy me.

dialogs.situation: I walked around the mall for 2 hours with my fly down.

turns.text: I walked around the mall for 2 hours with my fly down.

Haha.. I'm sorry, that made me laugh a little bit. I do that sometimes too, and have no idea how I can forget so many times. I think at least if it happens, almost no one can really tell or notice, if that helps.

dialogs.situation: i woke up from a dream missing my brother. i wish i could see him.

turns.text: i had a dream that i was with my brother hanging out having a great time. when i woke up i was so bummed it was only a dream.
Lol, happens to me all the time. I love those types of dreams and it sucks when they end.

dialogs.situation: My co-worker got a promotion that I was pushing for her to get. I am so happy for her! She really does deserve it.

turns.text: My co-worker got a promotion that I was pushing for her to get. I am so happy for her! She really does deserve it.
That is awesome. I bet she worked really hard to get that promotion. Good for her.

dialogs.situation: I had a lot of feelings when I found pictures of my dog who has passed.

turns.text: I had a lot of feelings when I found pictures of my dog who has passed.
It's always difficult losing a pet.  I'm sure you had a flood of positive memories and sadness than they're gone

dialogs.situation: I found a picture of my daughter and me from when I took her to a waterfall a long time ago. It brought tears to my eyes.

turns.text: I found a picture of my daughter and me from when I took her to a waterfall a long time ago. It brought tears to my eyes.
Oh I bet that was amazing! I have a memory of going to a waterfall with my parents when I was young and it's a nice thing to think back on. Does your daughter remember it?

dialogs.situation: My ex and I broke up because he decided that he would no longer be willing to leave his job from overwork, like 70 plus hours a week.

turns.text: My ex and I broke up because he decided that he would no longer be willing to leave his job from overwork, like 70 plus hours a week.
I am sorry. Breakups are the worst. Did he just not want to give up overtime or he worked 70hours always?

dialogs.situation: This weekend the family is going to go swimming at the lake, might rent a boat, looking forward to it.

turns.text: I'm gonna take the family out to the lake this weekend, we might rent a boat.
That sounds like a great way to spend the weekend.  What type of boat are you thinking about renting?

dialogs.situation: I had a job interview yesterday and it went great, so I'm expecting for them to call soon.  I look forward to working for that company, since it seem really nice.

turns.text: I had a job interview yesterday and it went great, so I'm expecting for them to call soon.
I'm in the same boat. I'm so happy to hear that and I hope you get the job!

dialogs.situation: I've been quite upset with my daughter's school as they've really let her down. To make a long story short. Since she's now the only surviving 8th grade strings student (violin), they've lumped her in with the regular band this year rather than let her play with the 7th grade strings class.

turns.text: I've been quite upset with my daughter's school as they've really let her down. To make a long story short. Since she's now the only surviving 8th grade strings student (violin), they've lumped her in with the regular band this year rather than let her play with the 7th grade strings class.
I would be upset too! Why would they do that? did you try talking to teachers or principal?

dialogs.situation: My neighbor in my duplex is still up at this hour doing some kind of sanding and sawing!  I asked him to stop and he won't!

turns.text: My neighbor in my duplex is still up at this hour doing some kind of sanding and sawing! I asked him to stop and he won't!
That is very disrespectful, especially since he is not in a stand-alone home.  Can you tell your landlord about it?

dialogs.situation: The sun is shining and the world looks good today

turns.text: It's going to be a great day today. he sun is shining here.
Im jealous! That must have put you in a good mood. Its cloudy and rainy over this way.

dialogs.situation: I wish I was Elon Musk.

turns.text: I wish I was Elon Musk.
I've heard his net worth is like $20.9 billion dollars!!  I wish I was him too - LOL!

dialogs.situation: My friend just recently moved to California--I have always wanted to live there

turns.text: My friend just recently moved to California...It makes me sad because I have always wanted to live there.
Oh thats good for your friend, but it sounds like you really would like to live there! I can imagine feeling jealous

dialogs.situation: My girlfriend moved in this weekend.  I was really happy that she moved in but also super happy that the move is finally over.

turns.text: I really hate moving. My girlfriend just moved in last weekend. Im really happy she moved in but Im also SUPER happy that the move is finally over.
Moving is the worst.  All those boxes.  ugh. i hope i dont have to do it for awhile

dialogs.situation: I love what I do because it's about both inspiring and empowering people to be their best and to excell at their jobs.

turns.text: I love what I do because it's about both inspiring and empowering people to be their best and to excel at their jobs.
It's awesome to have a job where you feel rewarded through what you do. What do you do?

dialogs.situation: I won a $2 lottery ticket.

turns.text: On a whim, I decided to buy a $1 lottery ticket, and to my surprise, I won $2 from that ticket. It was a small win, but I was very happy about it.
I can see why you'd be happy about it, I mean you doubled up even with it being a small amount! Where did you buy it?

dialogs.situation: I was incredibly sad to hear of Anthony Bourdin's passing. It just seems so unfair that such a wonderful man who gave so much pleasure to a huge number of people should be so unhappy.

turns.text: When I heard Anthony Bourdin had taken his own life, I was so shocked and upset. He gave so much pleasure to a lot of people, yet was miserable in his own life.
I think we never really know what is going on inside people's mind. Celebrities like Anthony and Robin Williams seems to live a good life, but in reality, they are suffering.

dialogs.situation: I took my kid's phone away as punishment for getting on the phone late at night. She found the phone and was watching YouTube. She needs to start preparing to get up early for school.

turns.text: My child needs to start going to bed early to prep for school. Last night, I caught her sneaking her phone and watching tv at 12am.
Oh man, sounds like most kids. She's gonna hate it at first, but getting to bed early will help with her future.

dialogs.situation: A while ago i was walking to college and j-crossed the street, to my shock I got a ticket.

turns.text: Back when I was in college, I crossed a street in wrong place and got a ticket.
I hate to hear that. I hate tickets. There are so many other things I would rather spend my money on.

dialogs.situation: My 12 year old lab just passed away.  He was my buddy and I am really upset about losing him.

turns.text: My 12 year old lab just passed away. He was my buddy and I am really upset about losing him.
That is so sad. Dogs become part of the family so when something like that happens it is like losing a family member

dialogs.situation: I am faithful to my wife, but it's thought

turns.text: I am faithful to my wife, but it's thought.
Cheating on her? I am in a relationship and not married, and I have the thought too

dialogs.situation: i really hate seeing people throw trash on the street like if it was a natural thing to do

turns.text: i cannot stand seeing people throw trash on the streets
this is what you need to do, get out of your car and go give them a beat down that they need

dialogs.situation: I'm predicting a very warm summer this year.

turns.text: I'm anticipating a very warm summer here in Dallas.
Texas does that to us! It helps we live in a place where air conditioning is the norm. Or do you like spending time out in the heat?

dialogs.situation: as I walk through my house, the rooms are empty, There is no one there for me

turns.text: as I walk through my house, the rooms are empty, There is no one there for me
I'm so sorry you feel that way. Maybe you should talk to someone you trust. A family member or a friend.

dialogs.situation: When I lost my parents, when they both passed away within a year of each other.

turns.text: It was beyond difficult for me when I lost my parents.

Yes, death is always a tough thing to deal with especially when they are close like parents. But that life and every single person on this planet will have to deal with that at some point in life. It is just the nature of life.

dialogs.situation: My first day of work begins on Monday and I feel like I am ready.

turns.text: I will begin my first day of work on Monday and I think I'm ready for it.
that's good, the first week is always the hardest, but it get's easier and funnier as time goes by

dialogs.situation: Waiting for my test back from my math teacher. I think I scored well.

turns.text: I'm nervous about this test I did.
Don't be nervous. I am sure you did alright. It is normal to think that but most of the time it is all in the head.

dialogs.situation: Looking back at my old self I'm actually livid at how stupid and lazy I was.  I'd probably beat the crap out of that guy, he was such a deadbeat

turns.text: I love who I am now.  But I'm livid at my older self, that guy was a deadbeat and I'd probably beat the crap out of him haha
Im glad you made changes for the positive in your life.  You cant go back into the past, but you can keep moving forward

dialogs.situation: I cooked my wife dinner because I love her

turns.text: My wife came home to an entire table of food I cooked.  I like to show her that I love her.
So many people don't take the time anymore. It's so nice to hear you did that for her!

dialogs.situation: I just found out the small company I work for is going out of business.  I cried all day Friday when I found out because I love working for them.

turns.text: I just found out the small company I work for is going out of business. I cried all day Friday when I found out because I love working for them
I am so sorry to hear this. I am sure you will find another job, but it doesn't make it any less painful.

dialogs.situation: I am going on vacation to Hawaii next week.  I cant wait to go.  Ive already started packing

turns.text: I am so excited! I am going to Hawaii next week

That really is something to get excited about! I've never been outside of the country, so I'm jealous of people that get the chance to. I hope you're able to get everything out of the trip that you want to

dialogs.situation: I bought a lottery ticket today and hope to win big

turns.text: hi
What is it that you would like to share with me? I am very interested to hear about it!

dialogs.situation: I am going through a breakup, we were together for five years I am heartbroken

turns.text: I am going through a breakup, we were together for five years I am heartbroken
I'm so sorry to hear that. I was together with my wife for 7 years when she left me so I know your pain.

dialogs.situation: My girlfriends dog isnt getting potty training.  One week she will be great.  The next week the only place she doesnt go to the bathroom is outside.

turns.text: I watch my girlfriends dog every once in a while and she just isnt getting potty training.  She is a little over 5 months old and some weeks she does a great job and the next week she'll go to the bathroom everywhere but outside.

That's super frustrating! I've only ever had outside pets so I can't really offer advice, but it's one of those things where your anger is all misplaced because you know you can't really be upset with the dog since it doesn't know any better.

dialogs.situation: My mother is getting very old, and isn't in great health. I don't know if she has much longer to live.

turns.text: My mother is getting very old. And she really isn't in great health these days...
That is unfortunate, my own mother was ill for several years, she is getting older as well. Do you get to see her often?

dialogs.situation: I told my friend my deepest secret

turns.text: I'm going through a lot right now. i usually don't like talking about it but i felt like i really need to talk it out. Yesterday my friend called me and i just started talking about everything. it felt good
Well, it is good you have a friend that is so close to you that you feel comfortable sharing with them.

dialogs.situation: I love being able to be home for my kids

turns.text: I love being able to be home for my kids
That is wonderful!  How many kids do you have?  That's a tough job but so rewarding!

dialogs.situation: I always find it crazy to hear how many people eat out so much. Like we eat out once or twice a month maybe. I can't imagine spending so much on food.

turns.text: Do you know anyone who spends a ton on eating out every week? It's crazy to me how much they spend.
I know that when just the 4 people in my family do go out, it runs us about $65.  So we do it very rarely, it wastes a lot of money.

dialogs.situation: i went out with a couple friends to a local bar and we were having a great time. then my friend said he was going to step out and do some drugs and i knew my friend for years and i told him no just stay and party with us but he declined and i started yelling at him and he punched me. i felt like he chose the drugs over our friendship

turns.text: so a couple weeks ago i went out partying with some friends and while we were drinking my friend went out to do drugs to feel better but since i was his bestfriend i didnt like to see him throw his life away like that and mentioned that we were already drinking he didnt need to get higher but he refused so i started yelling to chill out and he shoved me to the ground. i felt he chose the drugs over friends
I can see why you feel that way. Sometimes addicts aren't in full control of their decisions, though.

dialogs.situation: I lost my favorite bracelet... but after looking for a few hours I found it

turns.text: I lost my favorite bracelet... but after looking for a few hours I found it
Glad to hear you found it I know your heart was racing to find it especially if it was your favorite.

dialogs.situation: I thought i saw a ghost outside my window, I had my heart in the mouth

turns.text: Last week, i thought i saw a ghost outside my window!!
no way!!! I hope you left the house!! I would, and probably would never come back

dialogs.situation: I can not believe I forgot my Anniversary.

turns.text: My wife is angry and I don't know what to say. My anniversary was yesterday and I had no clue!
Argh! That's tough! Have you been able to come from a place of authentic apology? It can be easy to be defensive in those situations, which of course only makes it worse!

dialogs.situation: My friend just came over yesterday and talked about how he met a super great girl and is going on a date with her sometime soon. Although I'm super happy for him, I can't help but wish I could be in a relationship myself.

turns.text: I can't help but feel bad, since my friend has met a really good girl for him and I'm happy for him, but I wish I was in a good relationship too you know?
I totally understand. But I guess as a friend you also have to be happy for him and one day you will get your happiness too

dialogs.situation: When my kid didn't get off of the bus yesterday

turns.text: Yesterday was the first day of school for my kids.  It was also the first day of pre-k for my 4 year old.  He was supposed to ride the bus home, but when the bus got here, he wasn't on it!
Oh no!! Haha. The first days of school can be so hectic! But soon the routine will set in again and all will be good. :)

dialogs.situation: I was very shocked that they had a bunch of deli turkey on clearance with so many people shopping today! I can usually find it once a week but this is the second time! Jackpot!

turns.text: I was very shocked that they had a bunch of deli turkey on clearance with so many people shopping today!
Isn't that the best feeling when something you really want is actually on deep discount, and you are just in the right place at the right time!

dialogs.situation: I saw a homeless lady

turns.text: I saw a homeless lady and i felt so bad for her because it was so hot outside so went to five guys and bought her some food and cold drinks
that's extremely sweet of you! you're a nice person. my wife and i made some blessing bags and we give them everytime we see homeless people

dialogs.situation: With all the climate change happening in the word, I don't know what's going to happen where I live, specially since i live near the coast

turns.text: With all the climate change happening in the word, I don't know what's going to happen where I live, specially since i live near the coast
It's very scary! I live near the coast too! I don't know if my home will still be here in 50 years.

dialogs.situation: My son just took his first steps to start walking.

turns.text: My son just started to take his first steps.
Wow! That's amazing. I remember when mine started. It's off to the races soon!

dialogs.situation: im worried about an upcoming test

turns.text: im worried about an upcoming test
What is the test on? Have you prepared for it? I bet you will do better than you think!

dialogs.situation: I saw a blind man play guitar very well and was very impressed

turns.text: Hey! I saw a blind man play a guitar once. Was so surreal and I was so impressed
wow. I would be too. I love guitar, it's my favorite musical instrument. I wonder if he was born blind

dialogs.situation: I am hoping to get approved for promotion. I went to church to pray about it.

turns.text: I went to church and everything this week. Maybe I will be blessed in my career!
I hope that does good things for you. They say if you believe in something enough it comes true.

dialogs.situation: I was looking through my old school yearbooks. It had been awhile since I saw them. It really brought back a lot of memories.

turns.text: I was looking through my old school yearbooks. It had been awhile since I saw them. It really brought back a lot of memories
Ah, I certainly know the feeling of bringing back old memories. It's fun to go back and remember the people you shared all those classes with, isn't it?

dialogs.situation: I went out of town the other day and went out drinking with some friends. Now I have a partner back home but this woman kept hitting on me and she was HOT. I was so close to cheating but thought about my wife at home.

turns.text: I was so close to breaking my wifes heart- have you ever broken someones heart?
yes I have and its not fun at all, why would you have to break your wifes?

dialogs.situation: I got a call about a job offer back in late May this year. I wasn't sure if I wanted to try and interview for it it since seemed like just another in a long list of jobs I'd applied to. But in the end I decided that it was better than being unemployed, so I went for it. I won over the recruiter in the phone interview, and was hired the same day!

turns.text: I had been unemployed for a long time until earlier this year. I originally wasn't sure if I was going to even interview for the position I did, but I'm glad I decided to. I got a call in late may from a merchandising company. I went back and forth in my mind after being rejected from many interviews over the past couple years. In the end I went for it, the interviewer liked what I had to say, and I was hired the same day! I've been working there ever since.
Congratulations!  That's awesome.  Sometimes it's scary to risk rejection, but it sounds like it totally paid off in this case.

dialogs.situation: My girlfriend moved in this past weekend.  We have a ton of boxes to unpack but I am hopeful we will get it done in the next couple weeks

turns.text: My girlfriend moved in over the weekend.  We have a ton of boxes to unpack but I am thinking it should be something that can be done in the next couple weeks.
Thats nice to hear. Hopefully it makes you two happy. I would just unpack the necessities first and move from there.

dialogs.situation: I was supposed to go on a trip with my friend, but I got sick.

turns.text: I was supposed to go on a trip with my friend, but I got sick.
Oh no! That's no fun. So you're cancelling it completely or will you wait until you feel better?

dialogs.situation: My son placed third in his jiu-jitsu competition.  He surprised me with how well he did.

turns.text: My son placed third in his jiu-jitsu competition. He surprised me with how well he did
That sounds awesome. It's important for kids to know self defense and also to be active so all boxes are checked.

dialogs.situation: I had to go to the car dealer once to purchase a new vehicle. I always hate going there because I'm not good at haggling. I always feel like I'm going to get ripped off and it makes me nervous.

turns.text: I had to go to the car dealer to buy a new vehicle several years ago. I always get so nervous when I have to talk to the dealers.
I totally understand the anxiety. You never know if they are baiting you or actually giving you a good deal. Did you get a new car?

dialogs.situation: I went on a hike in the mountains of LA by myself at night.

turns.text: That reminds me of the time I went to LA for vacation with my family. I wanted to meet people so I went hiking in the mountains but it soon became dark.
Hiking is probably a tough environment to meet people! LA is real nice, but I hear the people there aren't/

dialogs.situation: My little brother baseball team won the whole tournament!

turns.text: My little brothers team were the campions, I couldnt believe it
Good for him. What sport do they play and was it any of that state level competitions?

dialogs.situation: I used to play football in high school

turns.text: In High School I loved to play sports. Football was my favorite
ah I was never much of a sports guy, but I do work out a lot. do you still play?

dialogs.situation: Sometimes I feel bad for other students as they cannot afford college while my parents are paying my tuition in full.

turns.text: My parents were able to pay for me to attend college, however I feel bad for those who were not lucky enough to be born into those circumstances
Don't feel bad for the opportunity that you have. Life is not set out on an even keel so we all must make the best of our lot.

dialogs.situation: My mother was just recently diagnosed with cancer. I am just so sad and upset right now

turns.text: My mother was just recently diagnosed with cancer.
Oh god that is horrible! Look in too Bitter apricot and also Chlorella if she does radiation..both have research done on them to help a LOT with cancer.

dialogs.situation: I long for the good old days, when I was carefree and happy. The sun always shone, I had cash in my pocket and plenty of time for the things I love to do.

turns.text: Years ago I used to have such a good time. I had money to spend, time to do the things I love. How I long for those times again!
I know exactly how you feel, I've been slipping back into paycheck to paycheck living recently. It was so much better when I had the money to pay for everything.

dialogs.situation: i couldnt stand it when my neighbor was using power tools at 8 am on a saturday

turns.text: i couldnt stand it when my neighbor was using power tools at 8 am on a saturday
Wow, that's super annoying! I understand wanting to get things done early, but that's not very respectful to neighbors.

dialogs.situation: My wife just confessed that she cheated, im irritated at her behaviour

turns.text: My wife just confessed that she cheated, im irritated at her behaviour. Totally dissapointed
I'm sorry to hear about that.  I hope you both can find a way to work things out with each other.

dialogs.situation: I'm starting a new job next week, and I am super nervous.

turns.text: I'm starting a new job next week, and while I am excited, I am also very nervous!
Congratulations!  Don't be too nervous!  You must have done something right to get the job in the first place!

dialogs.situation: I have been traveling solo. The last week has been hard because I havent really met anyone. I miss home.

turns.text: So I have been traveling around by myself.  It has been getting to me this week. I miss my friends.
What sorts of places have you been going? Alone time is always great but then sometimes it gets to be too much so I understand.

dialogs.situation: I hear a Christmas song on the radio and it reminds me of my relatives back home.

turns.text: Every Christmas song I hear on the radio for some reason reminds me of my extended family back home and the good times we had when I was younger.
That's really cool that you have those awesome memories. Do you ever go baack and see your family?

dialogs.situation: My husband will be away on a bachelor's trip and  I will be alone.

turns.text: My husband will be away on a trip for the weekend and it will be so quiet without him here.
Aww i'm sorry. Maybe enjoy a glass of wine and watch some girly shows. My husband is in the military and gone a lot so I feel for you.

dialogs.situation: I am so stressed out due to work load. And I have no one to come home and receive an emotional support from

turns.text: My work life makes me so stressed out due to work load. And I have no one to come home and receive emotional support from. Being lonely is the worst
I'm so sorry you are going through this.  Maybe it would be a good thing to get a therapist so that you have someone that can help you through it.

dialogs.situation: I met a girl in college and really liked her. We became friends but I was always annoyed she dated questionable men.

turns.text: I became friends with a girl in college. I was jealous of the men she dated, especially as she told me she would have dated me if we weren't friends.
Thats unfortunate. Sometimes, people don't know how to make a move and are waiting for you to make a move.

dialogs.situation: When I met my girlfriend she had a 5 year old son. I think of him as my very own son these days and love him dearly!

turns.text: When I met my girlfriend she had a 5 year old son. We have been together for years now and I consider him as my own child.
That is so sweet.  I really commend people who treat kids like their own, it's so important for a kid to grow up feeling like they have a lot of people in their corner.  I have a stepdaughter myself.

dialogs.situation: I can't wait for the new Super Smash Brothers game to be released, it seems like a lot of fun.

turns.text: I can't wait for the new Super Smash Brothers game to be released, it seems like a lot of fun.
Heck yeah! I loved that game on the n64, we used to play it all the time in college!

dialogs.situation: I've got a lot of haters so I'm ready to knock out a jealous little punk who tries crossing me at all times.

turns.text: I live the life of my dreams.  As a result I've got a lot of haters so I'm always ready to knock out a jealous little punk who tries crossing me at all times
its sad but true, people dont want to see others doing well! got to be ready to protect what is yours!

dialogs.situation: I blamed my oldest son for losing my headphones, but it turns out it was my fault.

turns.text: I blamed my oldest son for losing my headphones but I found out later I was the one that lost them.
Was he using it or something? Why did you think it was him, and how did you find out it was you?

dialogs.situation: I just found out that I will get to travel abroad for work and it really took me off guard (in a good way).

turns.text: I found out that I will need to travel abroad at my work, and it really took me off guard.
Wow, that would be shocking if you weren't expecting it.  Did they tell you when you were hired that there was a possibility?  Where might you be going?

dialogs.situation: MY dauhter is growing up too fast. She is going to leave me soon.

turns.text: Do you have kids? My daughter will be 14 soon. I don't want her to grow up.
None that I know of!  I feel you.. if I ever had a daughter I'd be overprotective and stressing

dialogs.situation: When I first started working and was waiting for the first paycheck to come in I was so anxious. I had never made money before and I just kept checking the mail every morning in case it showed up early.

turns.text: I remember getting my first job and just working so hard for that first week cause it was retail
Those were the days right. I loved those paychecks no bills.... can we go back to that?

dialogs.situation: My friend is getting a new truck that I kind of wanted. Its making me feel envious

turns.text: My friend is getting a new truck that I kind of wanted. Its making me feel envious
Right, sometimes I feel the same way when I feel like I should have something, but then I realize I would get bored from it after a while like everything

dialogs.situation: I was one of three people in the running for a promotion at my job. I ended up not getting the job and a person with less experience got it.

turns.text: I recently tried to get a manager's job in my company, two others and myself were the last three in the running for the job.
Very nice, congrats on making it that far. I actually was in the same situation about a week ago.  How do you feel you match up to the others?

dialogs.situation: everytime i order something  i really want it makes my anxiety go through the roof

turns.text: I remember ordering tattoo machines , then was given the the date of delivery it was going to take 5 weeks that put my anxiety through the roof
Being helpless when waiting for things is the worst feeling. There's nothing you can do but you need to do something!

dialogs.situation: I had to kick my 18 year old son out of house.    He has been gone almost a month now.

turns.text: He kept doing drugs, and taking things that didnt belong to him.  It broke my heart but I didnt know what else to do.
It's awful! I know so many families are dealing with similar situation. Sometimes we don't know how to help someone close to us. Heart breaking...

dialogs.situation: I am ready for school to go back.

turns.text: I am reay for school to go back.
Me too! These kids in this house are driving me crazy.  They need to get back on a schedule.

dialogs.situation: I saved the tickets to the first concert I ever went to. I still have them

turns.text: I saved the tickets from my first concert
its funny what one saves , i saved a mickey mouse that was given to me while i was in the hospital things like 20 years old lol

dialogs.situation: I am so mad, my landlord is selling the house so I have to move.

turns.text: I am so mad, my landlord is selling the house so I have to move.
that is bad news. my mother is going through the same thing unfortunately. landlord became widowd and now is moving with her daughter in anothe state so will be selling the house

dialogs.situation: I was shocked when Nintendo announced Ridley for super smash bros, I had been wanting that for years

turns.text: I was shocked when Nintendo announced Ridley for super smash bros, I had been wanting that for years
Yeah that was awesome! I feel like they have a less than stellar track record when it comes to fan service.

dialogs.situation: I'm not very close with my family. I sometimes feel bad about it

turns.text: I'm not very close with my family.
I understand that, I am not either with some of my family! We are not always born in too families that are like us,

dialogs.situation: Man I woke up feeling great today.  And I'm just thankful for my mental and physical health in general.  I'm the best I've been in a while

turns.text: Woke up feeling awesome.  I'm thankful for my mental and physical health in general. Know some friends who aren't as lucky
I'm glad you're feeling well, it's always important to make your health a priority, without our health we have nothing!

dialogs.situation: I found some orphaned kittens on my stoop. Their mother had been hit by a car. I took them in, bottle fed them round the clock, and then found them wonderful homes when they were old enough,

turns.text: I found some baby kittens in my yard, their mother was dead. I nursed them to health and found homes for them.
That's heartbreaking, but you're amazing for doing that. Cats are my favorite and I've rescued many animals. It's a lot of work.

dialogs.situation: I took out the garbage yesterday. The bag exploded as I took it to the street. It was so gross.

turns.text: I took the garbage to the road last night and the bag burst. Got nasty stuff all over my shirt.
Ugh, that's the worst!  Bright side - at least you weren't far from home that you were able to clean everything up, right?

dialogs.situation: Causing a shop's display to come crashing down.

turns.text: I just came home after totally embarrassing myself. My coat got stuck on a shop's product-display and the whole thing came crashing down!
Well, it will get better. Life happens all the time. We have to just accept it and move on.

dialogs.situation: Recently I lost my dog. I thought he was gone forever. Then I got a visit from a stranger who had my dog with them. I was ecstatic this person had brought me my dog!

turns.text: I was so sad last summer when my dog ran away. I thought I would never see him again.
Man, that is so sad.  I don't know what I would do if my dog ran away!  Did you ever find him?

dialogs.situation: the best day ever was watching my son graduate school

turns.text: it was the best feeling ever watching my son graduate school
I bet it was! I have two kids but they're pretty young. I'm looking forward to seeing them achieve the same thing.

dialogs.situation: I'm 47 years old and have been taking psychotropic meds for well over 30 years. I'm having more and more trouble with them working properly.

turns.text: I'm 47 years old and have been taking psychotropic meds for well over 30 years. I'm having more and more trouble with them working properly. It's happening a lot now. I'm at my wits end
Oh I'm sorry you are going through that. Have you tried to go back to your doctor and discuss making some changes?
The guy standing in line next to me at starbucks this morning smelled really bad.
Oh man. Was it body odor like he hasn't showered or something on him like smoke or animal stink?

dialogs.situation: my friend stole my laptop as a prank and gave it back by the end of the day

turns.text: oh god today! my friend stole my laptop as a prank and gave it back to me late at night
Wow!  That's a horrible prank!  I would be crying!  What did you do when your friend gave it back?

dialogs.situation: I accidentally sent an email to a coworker saying that I was frustrated with her attitude. I wanted to dig myself in a hole.

turns.text: Unfortunately, I accidentally sent an email to a coworker essentially complaining about her attitude. I really wanted to dig myself in a hole and never come out.
Arghhhhhhhhh! I soooo feel for you and have been there. Have y'all had the chance to talk about it? (Or do you even want to?)

dialogs.situation: I was with my uncle the other day and he wanted to watch a Discovery TV show I wasn't familiar with so I said okay. It was Dirty Jobs. It was so gross, you couldn't pay me enough to do those jobs!

turns.text: I was with my uncle the other day and he wanted to watch a Discovery TV show I wasn't familiar with so I said okay. It was Dirty Jobs. It was so gross, you couldn't pay me enough to do those jobs!
Haha!  I know exactly what you are talking about!  I love that show and yes, it is quite gross!  You must have felt quite disgusted!

dialogs.situation: I was devastated when I had to put my chihuahua to sleep not to long back.  She had congestive heart failure.  She was my constant companion and I loved her so much!

turns.text: I was devastated when I recently had to my chihuahua Riley to sleep.  She had Congestive Heart Failure.
at least Riley passed in their sleep. Hopefully they didn't suffer. i'm sorry you lost a loved one.

dialogs.situation: don't know how we gonna pay rent

turns.text: i'm so stressed. we are struggling financially and i don't even know how are we going to pay rent this month
I know how you feel, financial problems are rough. I know you'll figure out a way to make it.

dialogs.situation: I was annoyed with people at the store that reach around me.

turns.text: When I was at the store today someone always tries to cut me off and step around me so they are in my personal space and even hitting/shoving me to reach items. Versus asking me.
Yeah, I hate that. Sometimes people will leave their carts right in the middle, blocking everyone while they walk off grabbing what they need. So annoying.

dialogs.situation: I've recently started playing dirt rally. It was hard at first, but now that I am getting better I am having more fun than ever!

turns.text: I had been losing pretty bad on this video game Dirt Rally. But recently, with some extra practice, I'm starting to hit the leader boards!
Awesome! I've never been able to sit that long, so getting really good at video games is hard for me

dialogs.situation: I was so mad when I forgot to pay my credit card. I felt dumb

turns.text: I was mad when I missed my credit card bill. I felt dumb
Oh no! I've done that before.  Did you call them and ask for a grace period so you didn't build fines?  We all make mistakes like that so don't beat yourself up.

dialogs.situation: I got laid off from my job a couple of months ago. Every week starts off the same. I look for jobs, apply for jobs and yet I'm still unemployed. I try to stay optimistic though that something will come along soon.

turns.text: I recently was laid off from my job. I haven't found anything yet, but I'm trying to stay positive that I will soon.
Oh darn, that sucks.  Keeping a positive attitude is the way to go! I'm sure something is out there for you.

dialogs.situation: My best friend has been very overweight his whole life. Just yesterday he decided to sign up to the gym. I can't believe it, and I'm very happy for him.

turns.text: My good friend has been overweight his whole life. Just yesterday he signed up for a gym membership!
I think thats a positive thing. Motivation is the key. Do you think he'll follow through and actually attend the gym ?

dialogs.situation: I walked through my old neighborhood

turns.text: I walked through my old neighborhood this past weekend. All sorts of memories came flooding back.
I love when that happens!  I did the same thing not too long ago when I was in the area I grew up in.

dialogs.situation: We are wanting to get a new vehicle this year. We are trying to get bills paid off so we can afford the payments. I hope it happens.

turns.text: We are wanting to get a new vehicle this next year. We are trying to pay off bills to make it happen.
I know how it is to try to pay off bills. What kind of vehicle do you want to get?

dialogs.situation: I hate wasps so much. They always seem to get into my apartment somehow and I turned into a little girl!

turns.text: I hate wasps so much. They always seem to get into my apartment somehow and I turned into a little girl!
Oh wow, I bet that's scary. Maybe there's something you could look into to help prevent that happening, that does not sound fun!

dialogs.situation: Earlier today I was organizing some old boxes and I found pictures of me and my friends during our high school years.  That made me remember the old times.

turns.text: This morning I was organizing some old boxes and I found pictures of me and my friends during our high school years
I've done this before! It can be very nostalgic to see old friends that you haven't seen in awhile. Did it bring back any particular memories?

dialogs.situation: I was shocked to get a letter in the mail today.

turns.text: I got a nice letter in the mail today, when's the last time you got an actual letter?
Like years. I use emails a lot but I don't feel the need to use actual paper letters. It's 2018!

dialogs.situation: I was sad to see Lebron go to the Lakers

turns.text: I was sad to see Lebron go to the Lakers
That sucks to hear. I don't know too much about basketball, to be honest. Was it really a big deal?

dialogs.situation: I sent an email to a family member I hadn't spoken to in a long time, I really didn't know what they'd say or how they handle it. Waiting for a response made me quite nervous.

turns.text: I wrote an email to a family member I haven't spoken to in a long time and I wasn't sure how they'd take everything I said in it.
Oh wow! That is a brave thing to do! Your letter must have been a little intense if you are worried how they will take it. How did it work out?

dialogs.situation: My dog went number 2 in the house in the middle of the night and ate some of it.  The next morning it threw up everything and it was the worst smelling thing I think I have ever smelled.

turns.text: My dog went number 2 in the middle of the night inside.  The next morning she threw up everything...it was the worst smelling pile of stuff I've ever smelled.
Oh man, i'm about to eat dinner over here! lol that's pretty gross. My cat pukes up stuff all the time so i can kind of relate.

dialogs.situation: My son got brought home by the police last week for spray painting an abandoned building. I was furious with him!

turns.text: My son got brought home by the police last week for spray painting an abandoned building. I was furious with him!
You must've been really disappointed in him. Did you talk to him and find out why he did it?

dialogs.situation: An old friend wanted to get together. It would have been fun, but he is a guy and I knew it would bother my husband so I didn't meet him.

turns.text: An old friend wanted to get together. IT was a guy, and he was someone I was involved with. I knew it would bother my husband so I didn't meet with him.
That's the best decision. I know mine wouldn't either. If he is a good guy, he will understand.

dialogs.situation: years ago i was stuck in a cycle of addiction and could not take care of my family and responsibilities.

turns.text: a few years back i was addicted to drugs and alcohol... i could not take care of my responsibilities...
I'm glad you're feeling better. I'm sorry you went through that, I hear that addition is tough and often starts after having a major surgical operation.

dialogs.situation: I actualy made a list when I went grocery shopping today. I forgot nothing!

turns.text: I went grocery shopping like I usually do today, but I did something different.
Oh, that's curious... By different, what do you mean? Did you buy different stuff, or go to a different store, or what?

dialogs.situation: I made a new friend recently who is into rock climbing. She asked me to go, and I was so nervous but she coached me through it. I ended up having fun!

turns.text: I felt comfortable and at ease with a new friend, she took the time to help me learn and be comfortable doing something new.
that's really nice - it's always amazing to have friends who you feel comfortable around. What was the new thing your friend made you do?

dialogs.situation: I was just walking out of Taco bell. The bottom fell out of my bag and my wonderful taco bell covered the ground.

turns.text: I can't believe the bottom of the bag ripped and my wonderful taco's covered the ground. I'm sure my face was bright red with anger.
NOT THE TACOS!!!! Seriously, I can understand how frustrating that is. Especially when you have the taste for something.....then gone!

dialogs.situation: A school friend of mine got detention for a week after he was caught with a note that had some swear words in it. I was the one that passed it to him..

turns.text: A school friend of mine got detention for a week after he was caught with a note that had some swear words in it. I was the one that passed it to him..
Oh no, did he place the blame on you, or did he just accept it and take the blame for you?

dialogs.situation: I am having my first baby; a boy.  I hear all these different labor stories that aren't exactly reassuring!

turns.text: I am having my first baby; a boy. I hear all these different labor stories that aren't exactly reassuring!
Congratulations! If it helps at all, my wife and I have two young boys and both of her deliveries with very smooth! She said it wasn't as bad as she expected.

dialogs.situation: I am ordering a chocolate cake tomorrow. I want to eat the whole thing!

turns.text: I am gonna eat some chocolate cake!
Yum!!!!! I literally just watched a recipe on how to make a vegan chocolate cake so I'm craving one!  With tons of icing!

dialogs.situation: I just found out my parents are paying my sister's mortgage. They are pretty hefty payments and they can't really help me out whenever I'm in need. I've learned to be self sufficient.

turns.text: I hate to bring this up because of how it makes me look. I just found out my parents have been paying my sister's mortgage. Great for her but I get nothing in my times of need.
I get where you're coming from, my mom supports both of my sisters. It can make you feel less important. hopefully you are getting along though?

dialogs.situation: I am so happy all of my kids will be in school this year. Some peace and quiet finally

turns.text: all of my kids will be in school this year
That is exciting! You'll have some free mommy time or be able to go to work while they are in school.

dialogs.situation: My girlfriend and I have been together for four years. This is my first real relationship and I feel like she is the only person I want to be with.

turns.text: I've been with my girlfriend for years and we are celebrating our anniversary soon. I feel like I need to marry her because she's the one for me.
Congratulations!  Do you want to marry her though?  Don't jump into a marriage because it's what people expect. If you're happy as you are, just be happy!

dialogs.situation: I have my final math test tomorrow. I am so nervous.

turns.text: I have my final math test tomorrow. I've never been so nervous!
Oh yeah, I can relate.  I always get uneasy before a big test.  And I always end up cramming and studying the last minute.

dialogs.situation: I was recently promoted to manager at work.  I can't thank my supervisor enough.

turns.text: I was recently rewarded at work for my loyalty and dedication to the company.
That's what I'm talking about! That sounds so nice. I'm a little jealous. Sounds like you deserve it, though.

dialogs.situation: I applied for a promotion at my job but didnt receive it.

turns.text: I applied for a promotion at my job but didnt receive it.".
Its always disappointing to not achieve something you were hoping for but it could also mean that a better position is in store for you.

dialogs.situation: My friend had encouraged me to apply for teaching jobs. I went on several and didn't get hired. She went on one and got hired right away.

turns.text: My friend was telling me about teaching jobs to apply for. I didn't get hired, but she got one right off the bat!
It sounds like you're happy for her, which is commendable given you didn't get hired. Were you very disappointed?

dialogs.situation: Saw my brother graduate college last month! Felt so happy for him finally achieving what he's worked hard for. Hope he gets a job soon, though.

turns.text: Saw my brother graduate college last month! Felt so happy for him finally achieving what he's worked hard for. Hope he gets a job soon, though
That's awesome, the exact opposite is true for me. My little brother is just about to start his first year of college next month!

dialogs.situation: I've been pretty agitated about the slow internet speeds. I think it's the weather?

turns.text: I've been pretty pissed off about the slow internet speeds lately. I think it's the weather?
Who knows.. I've dealt with slow internet all my life. Wish I could finally get a decent ISP.

dialogs.situation: I came home from work to discover that my cat had knocked down the TV. He's never done that before, but it was brand new!

turns.text: I came home from work to discover that my cat had knocked down the TV
Oh no!  Cats can be devious things when we are not home - and sometimes when we are.  Did it break the TV?

dialogs.situation: Its my birthday tomorrow and my husband put together a huge party for me. I'm so excited about it that I may not be able to sleep tonight!

turns.text: Its my birthday tomorrow and my husband put together a huge party for me. I'm so excited about it that I may not be able to sleep tonight!

Your husband sounds awesome. That's interesting that you're the type of person that actually likes birthday parties. Most people I know would be too embarrassed or self-conscious to enjoy them, and they'd feel uncomfortable. Especially me. But for you, I'm glad you can get into them.

dialogs.situation: Life can be really not a happy place. It pains me that so many don't love or care and hurt others.

turns.text: Life can be really not a happy place.
Sadly, I agree with you.  As I get older, it seems like that more and more.  What happened that made you feel that way?

dialogs.situation: My son said mama for the first time today... I couldn't believe it

turns.text: My son said mama for the first time today... I couldn't believe it
Aww, I can remember the first time my son said daddy. I thought my heart was going to explode.

dialogs.situation: We just celebrated our 22nd anniversary.  My husband gave me a card with two tickets for a cruise this coming spring.

turns.text: My husband and I just celebrated our 22nd wedding anniversary.  I cannot believe we've made it this far, so far.
Congratulations!  Marriages take work but it is totally worth it when you have a good partner.  Did you do anything special for the anniversary?

dialogs.situation: My son did amazing in school this year! He made the honor roll for both semesters!

turns.text: I am so impressed with my son and how well he did in school this year.
That's good to hear he's doing so well. Did you have a lot of input?

dialogs.situation: When we lived in an apartment, we had a lady with a dog above us.  She would always let the dog out on her deck.  One day it peed and it poured down onto our deck, our grill, and everything!

turns.text: When we lived in an apartment, we had a lady with a dog above us.
That's one thing I don't miss is having someone stay above me did they dog make lot's of noise?

dialogs.situation: next week I find out if i got the promotion at my job. I have my fingers crossed.

turns.text: next week I find out if i got the promotion at my job. I have my fingers crossed.
Nice! I hope you get it, I'll cross my fingers for you also! Do you think you got a good chance?

dialogs.situation: I love looking after my grandma!  She is 94 and it makes me feel good to help her in any way I can!

turns.text: I love looking after my grandma! She is 94 and it makes me feel good to help her in any way I can!
That is absolutely wonderful! What a great grandchild you are. Not everyone wants to care for elderly relatives.

dialogs.situation: I lost my girlfriend to suicide. I wish I could have done something to stop it from happening.

turns.text: A few years ago I lost someone dear to me tragically. It broke my heart and left me feeling like I should have been able to stop it.
I am so sorry to hear about that. It is very hard to lose a loved one but treasure the memories of that person, especially the good memories.

dialogs.situation: My little brother failed his french class and had to spend three weeks in summer school. It hurt my heart seeing him have to go to school while all his friends were having fun.

turns.text: My little brother failed his French class and had to spend three weeks in summer school.
Oh no, that's not good! He's not the only one that's not great at French. Most of my family spoke French as a second language when I was growing up and I still never picked it up!

dialogs.situation: My friend is moving away. I am pretty sad about it

turns.text: My friend is moving away soon. I am pretty sad about it
That's sad to hear - it's hard to find a true good friend.  How far away are they moving?

dialogs.situation: My friend said he might be able to help me move

turns.text: My friend said he might be able to help me move
It's always great to have friends that are willing to help out when you need them the most.

dialogs.situation: I used to watch the original Sailor Moon when I was younger, and when the reboot started, I got to share it with my daughters.

turns.text: I used to watch Sailor Moon as a kid, and when they made a reboot, I got to share that with my daughters.
Sailor Moon~!  That was the best show!  I've shared it with my kids, too.  And the laugh at the picture of me dressed up as Sailor Jupiter from loooooong ago!

dialogs.situation: I am sad that they closed my favorite restaurant.

turns.text: I am sad that they closed my favorite restaurant.
That feeling is not alien to me. Had been through it in the past. It is truly frustrating looking for new favorite restaurant

dialogs.situation: I worked at a soup kitchen to help the less fortunate. I really enjoy helping those who can't help themselves.
