turns.text: I work at a soup kitchen and there was this man who comes in every week. I think talking to me is the only contact he ever gets.
People who take the time to help others are truely angels on Earth. Thank you for doing what you do.

dialogs.situation: When I buy fresh kicks at the mall I feel ready to take on the world.

turns.text: Nothing like a fresh pair of Air Nikes to make me feel ready to take on the world
Man I have recently been getting into shoes, I dont have nearly as many as some of my buddies,  need to step my game up.

dialogs.situation: My 15 year old dog just died.  He was my buddy and I am all broken up because of his passing.

turns.text: My 15 year old dog just died.  He was my buddy and I am all broken up because of his passing.
Man that is really hard.  I can relate however b/c my sweet Riley(dog) just had to be put to sleep due to congestive heart failure

dialogs.situation: I got a makeover and bought fashionable clothes.

turns.text: I got a makeover and bought fashionable clothes for the date
Oh that sound like a lot of fun!! Hope your date ended up being worth all that work.

dialogs.situation: When I was a kid I wanted to be popular, so I was envious of the popular kids

turns.text: When I was in elementary school I was envious of the kids who were popular!
Yeah as a child it's hard to see other kids with a bunch of friends when you don't have that many.

dialogs.situation: When is was little my dog got hit by a tractor. The vet told us it would be best to put the dog down. I threw a fit and told my mom not to do it. She listened and the dog lived another ten or twelve years no complications.

turns.text: When I was about 5 I saw my dog get run over by a tractor. The vet said we should think about putting him down because it could have brain damage. I threw a fit in the clinic when he said that.
That's crazy, I can't believe your dog survived. Did you end up putting him down?

dialogs.situation: My Grandma just passed away.  Its been a brutally tough time.

turns.text: My Grandma just passed away. Its been a brutally tough time.
oh my god i'm so sorry. i've only got one grandparent left and it's tough to even imagine not having her

dialogs.situation: upcoming events scare me to death

turns.text: i am just so scared of what is going to happen in the future, i need to make money, have a house, own a car, and other materialistic good because  i am a person of the 21st century and i cannot afford any of this so i need to get a job, but all these jobs are paying me next to nothing despite my masters degree in computer science, what to do?

Yikes, that's a tough one and I can definitely feel your pain on the job market. I think either network your way to a higher pay job (depends on connections) or possibly go back to school to a doctorate or certain specialist degrees.

dialogs.situation: I just went past a fish market, and the smell was overwhelming.

turns.text: Some markets have to be avoided, that is if you valued your sense of smell.
I know what you mean. Wednesdays there's this market I like to go to, but lately it just has so much rotten food

dialogs.situation: I went to the movies and peed in my pants.

turns.text: I went to the movies and peed in my pants.

I'm sorry.. my first gut reaction was to laugh a little. I really don't mean to make fun of you. That's terrible! Was it because you didn't want to miss a part of the movie, so you tried to hold it in as long as possible?

dialogs.situation: workign when we had to change job locations

turns.text: I work from home now, but the last few years, I worked at a daycare.  It doesn't seem like much but my kids went for free and I loved everyone there! I should have quit so many times but I stayed
I can see why it was hard to quit!  Do you like your job now?

dialogs.situation: I am so mad at my cat right now. She has been urinating in the house everyday.

turns.text: I am so mad at my cat right now. She has been urinating in the house everyday.
Oh no, I've never had a cat because my husband and brother are allergic. Is she trying to mark her terriorty?

dialogs.situation: I have been training for this track meet next week to qualify for the 2020 olympic trials. 15 years of hard work and determination, waking up every morning with one goal.

turns.text: Have you ever worked so hard, years for one moment that define the rest of your life?
I sort of have. I worked like crazy to get a work visa for the US, so I could be with the person I wanted to spend my life with. It paid off, so I can kind of understand what you're saying.

dialogs.situation: I just found out that I'm pregnant. Its exciting but also scary because I lost my last baby at 18 weeks along. I'm just really trying to have faith that it'll turn out well.

turns.text: I just found out that I'm pregnant. Its exciting but also scary because I lost my last baby at 18 weeks along. I'm just really trying to have faith that it'll turn out well.
Congratulations!  I'm sure everything is going to turn out well.  You probably have to see your doctor more than usual to make sure everything is okay.

dialogs.situation: My daughter got into an Ivy league school after high school. I am so happy for her!

turns.text: My daughter got into an Ivy league school after high school. I am so happy for her!
You must be so happy and proud! Is she going to have to move far away to go?

dialogs.situation: Although I'm poor and not where I want to be, at least I have a roof over my head, and food.

turns.text: Although I'm not doing very well financially, and I'm not where I want to be right now... At least I have a roof over my head and food to eat.
That is a great attitude to have.  I know it is hard to go through periods of struggle.  Do you have hope that things will get better soon?

dialogs.situation: I know many people are already suffering for climate change but I believe if politicians take the right measures now, we can still save the planet.

turns.text: I know many people are already suffering for climate change but I believe if politicians take the right measures now, we can still save the planet
I could not agree more with you. but it seems like a lot of politicians either don't care or are not putting enough resources into combating climate change.

dialogs.situation: I have a new neighbor who is very friendly. My kids sometimes go over to her house to play.

turns.text: My kids will sometimes go and play at my new neighbors house.
That must be fun for them.  Our neighbor hood only has older people so my kids stay around the house.

dialogs.situation: I took the kids to visit the residents at the Veterans Home. We made some special treats to take to them.

turns.text: I took the kids to visit the residents at the Veterans Home. We made some special treats to take to them.
Wow, I am sure the Veterans loved it! What kind of treats did you and the kids bring to them?

dialogs.situation: I had an interview at a job I was excited about, but they never responded after the interview so I don't think I got it.

turns.text: I applied to a few jobs, and I was interviewed for the one I was most interested in. I haven't heard back from them though, so I don't think I got the jobl
Stay positive, you never know. Maybe send them a polite email saying thank you for the interview and things you liked about the company.

dialogs.situation: My nephews came over a few days ago and it reminded me of my good childhood days.

turns.text: My nephews came over a few days ago and it reminded me of my good childhood days.
Nice, I'm sure you are a great uncle! It's fun to be youthful sometimes and relive childhood memories!

dialogs.situation: I am going out of town to the casino this weekend and can not wait for a little fun

turns.text: So I am headed out of town this weekend.  Going to try my luck at the casino!  I cannot wait
I love going to the casino! My favorite game of all time is blackjack. What are you thinking about playing?

dialogs.situation: I had a difficult job interview. I need a new job as I am unemployed.

turns.text: I had a difficult job interview this week.
don't think about it, what is done is done, just anticipate that they will call you back, the universe have it's way of helping if we believe

dialogs.situation: Next month my wife and I are taking our first vacation together. We have been saving a long time for this.

turns.text: Next month my wife and I will take our first vacation since we got married.
that is awesome i will never forget the first time me and my wife went on vacation, where do you have planned to go?

dialogs.situation: I'm in school right now and unable to pay for much since most of my money goes towards bills and that's it. My girlfriend is out of school and working, and so when we do go out, she has to pay a lot of the time. I feel bad for making her do that, but I don't have much of a choice.

turns.text: I'm in school right now and unable to pay for much since most of my money goes towards bills and that's it. My girlfriend is out of school and working, and so when we do go out, she has to pay a lot of the time. I feel bad for making her do that, but I don't have much of a choice
Aw, you shouldn't feel bad!  At some point you'll have more cash and do the treating.  There's a lot of give and take in relationships.

dialogs.situation: When I went to see Niagara Falls for first time, I couldn't believe how big it was.  Mind blowing to see in person

turns.text: Ever been to Niagara Falls? I just went and it blew my mind on the size of it!
I haven't been.  I would really love to go, and it's good to hear such a good review from someone.

dialogs.situation: About to take my driver's license test in a few days. Been practicing for a while now. I know I'm about to smash it

turns.text: About to take my driver's license test in a few days. Been practicing for a while now. I know I'm about to smash it
Good to hear you're confident! I'm sure you'll do well if you've been studying.

dialogs.situation: When I interviewed for the job I have now, I didn't hear back from them with a solid response for a month.  I kept having to check with them to make sure I hadn't been forgotten.

turns.text: When I interviewed for the job I have now, they didn't give me a solid answer for like a month after the interview.
That's a long time to kind of hang in limbo. I am sorry you had to endure that for a month.

dialogs.situation: I really trusted this girl that I was dating and I shouldn't have. She was so nice that I couldn't help but trust her for the whole time.

turns.text: I really felt confident that I could trust and love this girl that I used to date.
You always hope that is the case. Sounds like it didn't turn out well. I'm sorry.

dialogs.situation: My co-worker helped me with my part of the project which otherwise i would not have met the deadline without his help

turns.text: I had a deadline coming for my part on the project. Without my co-worker's help, i would not have finished it on time. Very thankful to him
Its always great when u have good co-workers you work with.  Im glad you got it done on time!  What kind of project is it may I ask?

dialogs.situation: my cat just recently died and I am very shaken up about it.

turns.text: my cat just recently died and I am very shaken up about it.
Oh, I am so sorry! I am an animal lover, too. We have two dogs now, but used to have cats, too. We did have to say goodbyes to some of our pets over years. It's heart breaking...

dialogs.situation: My mother has always been sentimental. She thinks I don't want to keep anything but I'm just not as sentimental as she is. It hurts her feelings.

turns.text: I feel slightly bad. I think I hurt my mom's feelings last week because she told me about a necklace I got rid of when I was a kid. She's a packrat and I'm really, really not.
Awww... reminds me of the show hoarders when the family members argue over silly things like that.  What was the necklace all about did you make it or something?

dialogs.situation: My dad worked his ass off at a job he didn't enjoy, doing back breaking work. Always amazed that he was able to do that as long as he did.

turns.text: My dad always worked his ass off at a job he didn't like in order to support us, doing a lot of back breaking work as a caretaker. He even had a second job at Wal-mart for a while. I have no idea how he managed to do that sort of thing.
When you have responsibilities that you really care about, you do what you have to. I commend him. ITs hard raising a family,

dialogs.situation: When I did not win a bonus at work, I was a little sad. I guess I expected to do better.

turns.text: I was upset when I did not get a bonus at work. I just thought that I would get it
That's the worst.. expectations can make and break us. I hope the next time around you get it!

dialogs.situation: I built a bunker in my yard in case we get a bad tornado. I have enough food to last a year!

turns.text: I have a bunker in my back yard with a ton of food in case of a natural disaster.
That sounds delightful. I have a tornado approaching now and would like it if you lived near me.

dialogs.situation: when i spilled water all over myself at school and looked like i peed my pants

turns.text: I spilled water all over myself at school and it looked like a peed on myself! ugh
Oh geez! That would suck! I hope it wasn't a cold day? Could you drive home and get new clothes?

dialogs.situation: when my dad bought me a car

turns.text: My dad bought me my first car, and I wont ever forget how happy I was.
I know that feeling but I crashed my car my dad bought for me like 1 year later. But that feeling of happiness was awesome!

dialogs.situation: School is about to start and we have everything we need.

turns.text: School is about to start. We are ready.
Ugh I remember those days! All the shopping, making sure to look good for the first day! good times

dialogs.situation: Last semester I made an A in every class I took. I have never done that before. I worked really hard for that.

turns.text: I made in A in all of my classes last semester. I have never done that before. I am really happy with myself.
Congratulations! That is great, definitely will help your gpa.  Plan on doing the same this semester?

dialogs.situation: I wanted to go out but needed someone to watch my kids. No one had ever babysat before. I let my sister watch them because I knew she would do a good job.

turns.text: I wanted to go out but I couldn't take my small kids. I hadn't ever had a babysitter but I knew my sister would take good care of them.
I'm sure it was scary to leave your kids for the time but at least it was their aunt and not a stranger!

dialogs.situation: When my grandmother passed away I destroyed.

turns.text: I was very sad when my grandmother passed away.
I am so sorry to hear that!  Don't worry.  I know it is hard but every day will get better.

dialogs.situation: I stepped in some dog poop while taking a walk the other day, ugh.

turns.text: I stepped in some dog poop while taking a walk the other day, ugh.
Ewww. I hate it when dog owners don't pick up after their pets. We always carried a poop bag with us for when our pooch "went".

dialogs.situation: The other day I was riding my bike and totally wiped out when I was turning the corner. Admittedly, I had a couple beers before I decided to go for a ride. I felt like an absolute dork.

turns.text: I fell off my bike the other day in front of a bunch of people. It was kind of humiliating.

Oh no! I'm so sorry!  I would feel the same way but you just have to think...who cares what others think!  If they can't have compassion for an accident then something is wrong with them.  Did you get hurt?

dialogs.situation: I was cleaning out the refrigerator and I found a bowl of something that went bad.

turns.text: I cleaned the refridgerator out the other day and I found something that had gone very very bad.
Oh that's never a good situation. It happens to the best of us though. I need to clean my fridge

dialogs.situation: My nephew is playing football this year.  He's all grown up :D

turns.text: My nephew starts fooball this year!
oh really? that's very coincidental because my son also started football this year are you happy?

dialogs.situation: Recently my dog got out of the yard and ran to the neighbors and ran all around their house upsetting their dogs! It was quite annoying but eventually he came to me after I called to him for a bit.

turns.text: Recently my dog got out of the yard and ran to the neighbors and ran all around their house upsetting their dogs! It was quite annoying but eventually he came to me after I called to him for a bit.
Oh man, I hate it when my dog starts barking at the neighbor dogs too. I'd be so mad at him for getting out though.

dialogs.situation: I'm long-distance with my girlfriend right now, where she lives almost 1,000 miles away. I live on the east coast, she lives in the midwest. She has a good job, and I'll just be graduating college, so she's established. She's determined that I need to move to her, but I don't feel great about the idea.

turns.text: I'm long-distance with my girlfriend right now, where she lives almost 1,000 miles away. I live on the east coast, she lives in the midwest. She has a good job, and I'll just be graduating college, so she's established. She's determined that I need to move to her, but I don't feel great about the idea.
That is a pretty big decision to make. Did she spring this up on you or was this something you knew she'd eventually want?

dialogs.situation: I am excited for the new super smash bros game coming out for the switch soon

turns.text: I am excited for the new super smash bros game coming out for the switch soon
That will be a ton of fun to play!  I rememeber when the first one came out, what a blast.  Now I have to go get a switch!

dialogs.situation: I forgot about my friends birthday last week. I felt bad

turns.text: I forgot about my friends birthday last week. I felt bad about it
Oh no! Do you forget birthdays a lot? I do sometimes. Always good to set reminds on your google calender etc

dialogs.situation: I left my apartment to my friend last weekend. I will be away in another country for 2 months.

turns.text: I am away in another country for 2 months and I left my apartment with my friend.
Wow, that must be scary to have to trust someone else with all of your stuff. What took you out of the country?

dialogs.situation: I was watching my kids soccer game recently. I was amazed at how good the players are. All the hard practice has paid off.

turns.text: I was watching my kids soccer game last weekend. I was floored at how much they have improved. They are passing and challenging so much better.
That's pretty cool to hear. When I have kids, I hope they're the same, and can get into sports, since it offers so much. Good for you for getting them into sports

dialogs.situation: I was recently on a mule ride in the Grand Canyon of Arizona!  I really had to put a lot of faith in the mule though, because there were a bunch of sheer drops on the trail!

turns.text: I was recently on a mule ride in the Grand Canyon of Arizona! I really had to put a lot of faith in the mule though, because there were a bunch of sheer drops on the trail!
That sounds like a lot of fun! Is it hard to ride a mule? I've always heard they are stubborn.

dialogs.situation: My friend works 2 jobs to support her 3 kids.

turns.text: My friend works 2 jobs to support her 3 kids
thats a strong woman , i know of people that dont work at all a refuse to pay child support , in my eyes they are not men

dialogs.situation: I am back to work tomorrow. I am happy to go back to work.

turns.text: I am back to work tomorrow. I am happy to go back to work after a good vacation.
That's great! I don't know too many people who look forward to that. You must love your job

dialogs.situation: I live very far away from my family and I miss them dearly. I feel so alone sometimes.

turns.text: I live very far away from my family and I miss them dearly. I feel so alone sometimes.
Aw, I know that must be hard having to take care of yourself so far from loved ones that you can depend on.

dialogs.situation: I'm moving into a new apartment soon and am really excited about it. But at the same time, I'm hoping and praying my neighbors will be nice and quiet. The current upstairs ones are not!

turns.text: I'm moving into a new apartment soon. I do hope that the neighbors are nice and quiet.

That's always both an exciting time and a nerve-wracking time. I'm in college and I had to move the past two years in a row. This year, I decided I kinda had enough and would just stay put, even though the apartment was just so-so. Do you like it well enough even if the neighbors may give you trouble?

dialogs.situation: I have to bake 10 cakes by tomorrow.  I am ready to do it though.

turns.text: I have to bake 10 cakes by tomorrow.
Oh WOW!  That is a lot of cakes!!  Will you be able to get it all done?

dialogs.situation: I'm hoping I can reach diamond next season in overwatch. I've been practicing a ridiculous amount

turns.text: I've spent at least an hour a day on overwatch for the past 3 months. Altogether I have roughly 90 hours this season
Wow! I enjoy watching Overwatch on Twitch occasionally. Would you say that's your favorite game?

dialogs.situation: Somebody said something about me that was not true.

turns.text: Somebody said something about me that was not true
Please don't care about those people. Try to be true to yourself. World will recognize you one day.

dialogs.situation: Whenever I go to a bar and a guy offers to buy me a drink I say no because I have a bf

turns.text: When I go to a bar with my girlfriends and a guy offers to buy me a drink, I always decline because I have a boyfriend. I wouldn't want to lead anyone on and have them spend money on me!
Girl, take that drink and don't be ashamed. At least you wouldn't have to pay for the drink!

dialogs.situation: I lost my job and was in danger of losing my home to foreclosure. My family loaned me money and saved me from that.

turns.text: I lost my job and was in danger of losing my home to foreclosure. My family loaned me money and saved me from that.
Well ... I put myself in your place and I admire you because it is something very emotionally tense

dialogs.situation: I went to watch the Annabelle movie in the theatres. It was so scary and i was kicking myself for going alone at night

turns.text: I went to watch the Annabelle movie in the theatres. It was a terrifying experience
Wasn't that out a long time ago? It must've been super scary if you still remember it.

dialogs.situation: The older I get, the more relaxed and just a simple happy and calm feeling I have. It is nice to just enjoy being alive.

turns.text: The older I get, the more relaxed and just a simple happy and calm feeling I have. It is nice to just enjoy being alive.
I agree. The sound of birdsong, a gentle breeze on a summer's day, the purring of your tabby-cat. You can't beat that, can you?

dialogs.situation: I was happy for my dad. He got to retire

turns.text: I was happy for my dad. He got to retire
That's very sweet to even reach that age and to retire! I hope he gets to do fun things now?

dialogs.situation: I really like going out to eat, but it might be bad for my health

turns.text: I really like going out to eat, but it might be bad for my health
Well, I think that all depends on where you're eating and how much you eat. Do you think you're eating anywhere unhealthy?

dialogs.situation: People need to stop letting their dogs poop in my yard!

turns.text: People need to stop letting their dogs poop in my yard! They aren't even respectful enough to clean it up!
that is ridiculous! that's annoying when people don't clean up after their dogs! I love going to the local park with my son and there is dog poop in the grassy areas

dialogs.situation: I was very nostalgic once when I visited the mountains. The trip was with some friends and the nature was good.

turns.text: Hi friend, have you ever been to the mountains?
LOVE the mountains. Mainly in the New Mexico / Colorado area -- but also to the Alps. How about you?

dialogs.situation: I've felt excited when I found out I had won a place on a prestigious creative writing course, taught by someone who I knew could help me in ways that I would I not be able to through self-study alone.

turns.text: I've felt excited when I found out I had won a place on a prestigious creative writing course, taught by someone who I knew could help me in ways that I would I not be able to through self-study alone.
You are so lucky to be talented enough to achieve such an honor. Was it as wonderful as you had imagined it would be?

dialogs.situation: My landlord has not fixed a leaky tap in my apartment even though I've asked 4 times.

turns.text: My landlord has not fixed a leaky tap in my apartment even though I've asked 4 times.
That's not good.  Can't you withhold if they refuse to fix the leak?  I would be really mad!

dialogs.situation: I have a big interview coming up. I am feeling pretty good about doing well.

turns.text: I have a big interview tomorrow. Im feeling pretty good about it.
that's exciting! I hope everything will go good. just be you and i'm sure they will love you

dialogs.situation: My dogs keep attacking my poor ducks. I don't know what to do.

turns.text: My dogs keep attacking my poor ducks. I don't know what to do
I don't know what you can do. A duck is just a toy that taste good to a dog.

dialogs.situation: Iy gets on my nerves to work with people who don't pull their weight,

turns.text: I'd rather work alone that in a group or with a partner.
I absolutely feel the same way. It is a rare trait, but there are few people who do better on tasks on their own than as group task.

dialogs.situation: I left my phone at my friend's place. It's unlocked, and I hope she doesn't go through it.

turns.text: I left my phone at my friend's place. It's unlocked, and I hope she doesn't go through it.
Oh no! Hopefully it's a friend you trust and she won't embarrass you if she ends up going through it and finding something bad.

dialogs.situation: When I lost my job.

turns.text: I recently lost my job, and am having trouble finding another one.
I feel your pain, that happened to me a few years ago, I ended up having to settle on a job I didn't like just to make ends meet.

dialogs.situation: I'm helping my grandmother clean her house next week, I love helping her

turns.text: my grandmother is so sweet, I love helping her :)
it's nice to have someone who can help you always, i'm pretty sure she loves having you by her side always

dialogs.situation: I was married to my wife for thirty years, and even though she has passed I can't bring myself to date anyone else.

turns.text: I was married to my wife for thirty years, and even though she has passed I can't bring myself to date anyone else.
After being married for that long, I really don't blame you. Do you want to move on and find someone else?

dialogs.situation: My cat seems to like my new girlfriend more than me, he sleeps with her on her side of the bed now.

turns.text: I think my cat likes my new girlfriend more than he likes me now.
I've had that happen before. My cat is definitely more my wife's cat now. Does he still cuddle up with you?

dialogs.situation: I decided to clean out my drawers today and found my old toys from when I was younger. They brought back happy memories.

turns.text: I decided to clean out my drawers today and found my old toys from when I was younger. They brought back happy memories.
These nostalgic emotions are unique and very pleasant to have. I sometimes rewind them in my mind just to escape from my anxiety

dialogs.situation: I feel alone whenever i think about my dad.. He passed away last year.

turns.text: i feel alone whenever i think about my dad, he passed away last year

I'm so sorry.  You have my deepest condolences. Its hard to not feel isolation with the death of someone you are close to.  I can tell you it does get better and you are not alone.  He lives on in you.

dialogs.situation: I am anxious about this upcoming season for the Eagles, who knows what will happen

turns.text: I am anxious about this upcoming season for the Eagles, who knows what will happen
Oh Football! Dosen't preason start this week? My husband likes the Los Angles Chargers but they arent very good!

dialogs.situation: I have been saving up money so if anything happens I am prepared. It's nice to be able to do that for once.

turns.text: I have been able to save up money lately and it makes me feel very relieved.
I know. Sometimes it's hard to have some left over after bills. What are you saving for?

dialogs.situation: I am so annoyed by my brother, He borrowed my lucky pencil when he knew I had an important test today

turns.text: I am so annoyed with my brother...ugh sometimes I wish I was an only child.
I would think that being an only child would be somewhat boring and lonely.   HOw bad can it be with your brother?

dialogs.situation: I have been in vacation in Mexico for one week now. I am buying gifts for my family before coming back.

turns.text: I have been in vacation in Mexico for one week now. I am buying gifts for my family before coming back.
Wow, lucky you.  I hope you are enjoying your time there.  They will be appreciative of the gifts.

dialogs.situation: A co-worker stole my lunch I believe.  I ended up having to skip a meal

turns.text: A co-worker stole my lunch
I've never understood that, it's not like they can't afford to eat since they have a job! Do you know which coworker it was?

dialogs.situation: I got really drunk on my birthday this year, and couldn't remember what I did. It was very awkward meeting my friends the next day

turns.text: I got really drunk on my birthday this year, and couldn't remember what I did. It was very awkward meeting my friends the next day
Oh no, I've had that happen before, it is the worst. I hope it wasn't too bad for you!

dialogs.situation: I think about my mother and I getting really sad. She has been dead for 15 years now.

turns.text: I really do miss my mother. She has been dead for about 15 years now.
I'm very sorry for your loss. Thinking about and remember all of your good memories with her may help.

dialogs.situation: I am so happy for my dad. He finally paid off his student debt loans after all these years. I can see a change in his demeanor and I feel so ecstatic for him!

turns.text: I am so happy for my dad. He finally paid off his student debt loans after all these years. I can see a change in his demeanor and I feel so ecstatic for him!
I bet that is so relieving! It sucks how much debt you need to take on in order to go to school these days!

dialogs.situation: I stubbed my toe on the side of my bed this morning. It's still hurting.

turns.text: I stubbed my toe on the side of my bed this morning, it's still hurting!
i hate when that happens! I stub my toes all the time i'm surprised i didn't break none of them yet

dialogs.situation: We live in a hurricane area. When one was coming, we had plenty of water and other supplies

turns.text: We live in an area that gets hurricanes. When one was coming, we got flashlights, batteries and everything you need.
its always good to be prepared. I live in an area that gets hurricanes too.  I've even got a generator.

dialogs.situation: I gave up dieting a long time ago, and I'm far happier and losing weight slowly.

turns.text: I gave up dieting a long time ago, and I'm far happier and losing weight slowly
I can understand that! I actually attempted a diet about a month ago, and it was miserable. What made you give it up?

dialogs.situation: The NES Classic makes me remember playing them originally.

turns.text: Playing with the new NES remake has me remembering all these games I had forgotten.
That it is cool. There was an old game that I loved Crash Bandicoot. Recently, they did a remaster of this game.

dialogs.situation: My grandmother passed away two weeks in 2005.   She had given me all of her Christmas decorations a few years before that.  Her death made me appreciate that even more than ever

turns.text: My most treasured item is her ornament that she had for her cat Barney.   That cat was her world.
I had a cat named Barney too! We was a one-eyed grey tabby. What kind of ornament is it?

dialogs.situation: I invested in cryptocurrency last year but the market is looking pretty bad.

turns.text: I invested some of my money in the crypto market last year. The market looks terrible right now and I'm afraid I'll lose my money!
Oh that's awful! I invested 6,000 in January and I'm down to $150 now. I sold off a lot to pay bills but if I wait for it to go back up I can maybe recover 1,500.

dialogs.situation: I can't get my money under control and I am angry with mysef.

turns.text: I can't get my money under control and I am so angry with myself.
Do you have a lot of debt?  I'm sure you will figure it out and get back on your feet.

dialogs.situation: I really wish I was tall like my brother.

turns.text: I really wish I was tall like my brother.
You are wonderful just the way you are! Be happy that you are alive and healthy and beautiful! I am sure your brother wishes he could have something of yours too.

dialogs.situation: Just got ditched by my friend for the third time this week, when trying to make plans. Wish people weren't so flaky these days. Why does it feel like I'm putting in more effort to hang out with people than vice versa?

turns.text: Just got ditched by my friend for the third time this week, when trying to make plans. Wish people weren't so flaky these days. Why does it feel like I'm putting in more effort to hang out with people than vice versa?

Its definitely not fair. It seems almost as if people do not TRY to create a friendship or are playing both ends of the candle to see which bargain (plans) per friends are better, and then make a choice

dialogs.situation: I have just got the news about my grandmother. She is not gonna be improving and will be dying.

turns.text: My grandmother is sick and in the hospital.
Oh I am so sorry to hear that. :( I hope that she will be alright. Is it serious?

dialogs.situation: My girlfriend has a new yoga instructor. The guy is in such good shape and I feel uncomfortable about my girlfriend going to his classes.

turns.text: My girlfriend has a new yoga instructor names Mark. He is such good shape, I feel a bit weird about her going to his classes.
Don't worry bout that.  She has to have some sort of fantasy in her life.  Don't you have any ever?

dialogs.situation: I was pretty emotional leaving my hometown 10 years ago. We moved across country to a completely different area.

turns.text: A while back I moved from Chicago to Dallas, I was pretty sad to leave. It was my hometown!
Big change! both big cities though right? I've always wanted to see that shiny bean thing in chicago.

dialogs.situation: I was sad when I had to put my dog down last month.

turns.text: I was sad when I had to put my dog down last month
Oh no, I'm so so sorry. I've always had at least one pet throughout my life, and they're truly part of the family.

dialogs.situation: I know it's August. but I can't wait for Halloween. It is so close!

turns.text: I know it's August, but Halloween is so close I can feel it.
I'm right with you!  I love chillier fall weather and pumpkin harvest festivals! Not to mention pumpkin spice lattes! Is Halloween your favorite holiday?

dialogs.situation: I interviewed for a job. I thought it went great.

turns.text: I interviewed for a new job last week. I felt like it went great! Really excited to hear from them.
That's so great! I hope you get the job - assuming it's one you really want.

dialogs.situation: My husband is in the Military and goes away from long periods of time. I've never though about cheating.

turns.text: My husband goes away for months at a time due to being in the Military.
Oh god..I don't know how you military wives do it. I just can't imagine

dialogs.situation: I couldn't believe how big my friend's baby had gotten since the last time I had seen her!

turns.text: My friend's baby has grown so much since the last time I had seen her!
It's crazy how quickly kiddos grow! Even in a few weeks time! Do you see your friend and her baby often?

dialogs.situation: My dog just died. I'm in shock.

turns.text: I've had my dog for 15 years and he just died. I don't know what I will do without him.

This happened to us last spring. Our dog was 8 years old. It can be a very emotional time but it gets better over time. Have you thought about creating a memorial for him? Maybe a photo collage to hang.

dialogs.situation: I think most days now I get sentimental.  Our daughters are growing up and things strike me on a daily basis that life is changing.

turns.text: Our daughters are growing up so fast on us. They are now 18 and almost 16.  I think you blink and the years just fly by.
Yes i agree.  I have 3 boys and they are in their twenties. I don't know where the years went.

dialogs.situation: I was outside relaxing watching the kids play in the pool.

turns.text: I was enjoying the morning watching the kids play in the pool.
That sounds like such a fun, peaceful morning. So jealous you have a pool, it's been scorching outside!

dialogs.situation: After my wife left me, i've been trying to better myself and have a prosperous future. I'm looking to make positive changes and am optimistic about the future.

turns.text: When my wife left me, i felt worthless and like giving up on life to be honest, I've since started making some positive changes and and more optimistic
I can't even imagine how devastating that would be. I think you must be really strong to be able to move forward.

dialogs.situation: I can't believe Jeff got the promotion. It should have been me!

turns.text: I'm going to be really upset if I get passed over for another promotion. I've paid my dues.
That is so hard, to feel like you've been looked over. Have you been able to have conversations with leadership as to why that might be the case?

dialogs.situation: When a strange, or even one I know, female flirts with my husband.

turns.text: When we went grocery shopping the other night some girl starting talking to my husband, giggling, and all that. He tried to be polite, but, she just wouldn't sto[p and I got so mad.
I don't blame you!  I would've been furious if some girl was talking to my husband that way.  Ridulous how awful some people are.

dialogs.situation: My father passed away 2 1/2 years ago. We didn't know he had a life-threatening illness and it really traumatized our family. The unexpected loss was so agonizing and painful for us.

turns.text: My father passed away about 2 years ago. It was so very difficult for me and very unexpected. We didn't know he had a life-threatening illness and weren't prepared in any way for his sudden departure from us.
I'm very sorry to hear that.  Losing anyone close to you, especially a parent would be very hard.  Are you close to other members of your family and were you able to help each other through it?

dialogs.situation: At a meditation retreat I felt better than ever

turns.text: I was at a meditation retreat last year for 10 days and I can say that I experienced a better feeling there than I could ever remembe
I've always liked the idea of meditation, but I feel like it'd be hard. My mind is always racing!

dialogs.situation: I have had a crush on a girl that I knew since high school. I was bummed when I found out she now has a boyfriend. I thought maybe we could have dated but it is too late now.

turns.text: For the last couple years I had a crush on a girl I knew from high school. I saw her recently with her boyfriend.
That must have felt sort of defeating.  There is still hope if there isn't a ring on her finger!

dialogs.situation: My cousin invited me to go white water rafting with him.

turns.text: My took me white water rafting with him last week. When we got to the river I started having second thoughts.
I've done that before. Getting over that initial fear is really hard. But it's fun once you do!

dialogs.situation: I had to give a speech in front of a lot of people. I practiced for two weeks until I had it down perfect.

turns.text: Last month I had to give a speech in front of a lot of people. I was nervous when I first found out.
Oh I'm so socially awkward and anxious I'd never be able to give a speech. How did it turn out?

dialogs.situation: How can I trust again when I have ben cheated on thrice?

turns.text: How can I trust again when I have ben cheated on thrice
Sounds like you may be choosing the same kind of person each time. There are good ones. If you give up now you may lose the chance to find the person who is right for you.

dialogs.situation: I'm going on my first cruise!

turns.text: Tomorrow, I'm going on my first cruise!
Wow, that sounds really fun! I've never been on a cruise! How long will it be for?

dialogs.situation: When I had my child, I felt like doing nothing but protecting her.

turns.text: Having a child changed my life. I never imagined I could be so protective of something.
I have heard the same thing from my friends who have kids!  They say it's like a force takes over as soon as the baby is born

dialogs.situation: I took my finals exam last week. I am optimistic about the results but we shall see.

turns.text: I took my finals exam last week. I am optimistic about the results but we shall see.
At this point all you can do is hope for the best. Hopefully if you worked hard it will turn out good.

dialogs.situation: I finally won on a scratch ticket that I bought at a gas station. It's not much, but it made me happy!

turns.text: I buy scratch tickets pretty often from a gas station near by, but I never really win anything more than a buck or two. Well, I won $500 yesterday!
Congratulations. That is very good luck you had. To be honest, i am not really interested in those scratch tickets as i think they are just waste of my hard earned money

dialogs.situation: I am so sad.  My husband needs a lung transplant.

turns.text: I am so sad lately.  My husband needs a lung transplant and he is only 40 years old.
Oh wow. I'm so sorry to hear that. Was this an all the sudden thing or has he been in poor health?

dialogs.situation: I had just bought a new dress. I wore it for Easter and I felt so pretty the whole day, which just made me feel great about myself.

turns.text: I was wearing a new dress for the holidays and it just made me feel good about myself, it looked nice and it put me in a good mood.
That's wonderful. There's nothing like a bit of retail therapy to cheer you up. Now you

dialogs.situation: Having nightmares when I was little was scary

turns.text: I had some trippy nightmares as a kid, now I don't really have dreams
Oh man, I did too.  I still do every once in a while but only when I'm having trouble sleeping.  Does one stand out from the rest that you remember vividly?

dialogs.situation: Having more work than I can handle

turns.text: I got canned from my job and I'm feeling pretty good these days because I have more work than I can handle without needing to go to an office everyday
Are you really able to work from home? Finding a gig is so difficult, I'm glad that it is working for you.

dialogs.situation: I went to a new school my sophomore year. I was just leary about the whole thing

turns.text: I was scared and worried when it came to going to a new high school my sophomore year. I was not sure how it would go
Yeah, I think most people feel that way, but it's still a valid feeling. How did it end up?

dialogs.situation: I saw a creepy looking clown walking down the street. I was so scared. I went home and hid underneath my bed.

turns.text: I was walking down the street and I saw a really creepy clown smiling at me. I got so scared.
Oh man.  Now I am having images of the movie "It" in my head.  What did you do?

dialogs.situation: I am very faithful to my employer.

turns.text: My employer provides me with lots of training and support so I have become very faithful to them.
It's always good to have a boss you can get along with.  It makes work a lot less stressful.

dialogs.situation: I accidentally left the lights on in my car and killed the battery, was super awful.

turns.text: I left the light on in my car the other day and it killed the battery
That happens to me all the time because I drive a large van with a lot of extras.  It is such a pain!

dialogs.situation: i felt really great when i went to the beach with my friends the other day.. it gave me a warm sensation in my heart

turns.text: I went to the beach other day.. such an awesome feeling standing there
Yeah, I love going to the beach as well! You must have felt so happy there in that moment!

dialogs.situation: I have been jobless for 6 months now. Next week, I have five interviews. I hope to be hire in one of those positions.

turns.text: I have been jobless for 6 months now. Next week, I have five interviews. I hope to be hire in one of those positions
i hope that you will get the job that is going to be what is best for you. stay positive.

dialogs.situation: When i worked as a machinist, i was the only person on my shift that could program a certain lathe that had 6 axis. It was when i was at the top of my abillitys.

turns.text: Have you ever rode on a roller coaster?
Yes when I was young I did all the time, but I think after I turned 18 I got this weird fear of being so high up in the air. What about you?

dialogs.situation: I have my soccer game tomorrow. I am so pumped that I can't sleep.

turns.text: I have my soccer game tomorrow and I am so pumped that I can't sleep.
Oh cool!  Do you play in the game or get to be the cooler part of the team, the waterboy?

dialogs.situation: I finally got around to watching the Black Panther movie.  It was a real let down for me I I don't get what all the hype was about.

turns.text: I finally got around to watching the Black Panther movie. It was a real let down for me I I don't get what all the hype was about.

I still have yet to see it. I hate how hype affects things. I wish you could always get to things before they become really pumped up.I bet if you watch again sometime later, you'll find it a little better.

dialogs.situation: I'm hoping to move soon (buy a home), and I am feeling a lot of anticipation regarding moving.

turns.text: I plan to buy a home soon, and will be moving.  I'm really anticipating having to pack everything up and what a new house will feel like.
Oh now that's exciting! I moved two years ago and it was a very weird process. I was happy to have a new home but anxious at the same time.

dialogs.situation: I just moved to a new city for work recently.  I don't know anybody here and am just stuck by myself at home.

turns.text: I just moved to a new city for work recently. I don't know anybody here and am just stuck by myself at home.
I think you should get out and explore.  I'm in a similar situation--moved to South Texas with zero connections/family to jumpstart my business...and I've met some pretty amazing people

dialogs.situation: I cry every time I think of my grandmother.

turns.text: I cry every time I think of my grandmother.
I'm sorry to hear that. Why do you think that is? Is it a painful or happy memory?

dialogs.situation: i loved taking care of my sisters pet

turns.text: i loved taking care of my sisters pet
Aw, that's sweet. What kind of pet is it? Did you wish you could steal it so it could be yours instead?

dialogs.situation: I ordered a vacuum from a company online on a warehouse deal..and even though it was inspected..the power button didn't work unless you held it IN! Dealing with the CS took awhile and was a pain!

turns.text: I ordered a vacuum from a company online on a warehouse deal..and even though it was inspected..the power button didn't work unless you held it IN!
That's annoying. So, does it still work and it's just hard to use, or does it just do nothing in general? Deals are always tricky like that, as sometimes they're too good to be true.

dialogs.situation: I caught my husband getting a phone number from another girl.

turns.text: I am not sure how to address to my husband about how I feel about him getting a phone number from another girl.
I would be downright furious. Start by smacking him across the face randomly at dinner. That should be a good segway into the conversation.

dialogs.situation: I'm a little unsure if I should take a higher position with better pay due to the added stress of the job.

turns.text: I was offered a higher paying position at my job, but I'm not sure if I'll accept it due to the added stress.
If I were you I would accept it because no amount of stress could stop me from making more money.

dialogs.situation: I am so excited for this semester. I got all of the classes I wanted.

turns.text: I got all the classes I wanted this semester
Oh that could be tough sometimes. I'm glad you were able to get all the ones you wanted.

dialogs.situation: My computer software is being used in a lab

turns.text: I was just informed that my computer software is now being used in a school :)
No way! Congrats!!! I bet you feel really excited.  How long had you been developing it?

dialogs.situation: My favorite football team lost their preseason game I talked so much smack before the game for them to loose I feel so ashamed lol.

turns.text: My favorite football team lost their preseason game and I talked so much smack to everyone saying they was going to win.
that's why i don't watch sports lol we always make fun of our uncle because he talks a lot of smack and die hard Redskins fan

dialogs.situation: When my old roommate got herself a boyfriend, I didn't realize how I really felt about her until she started spending more time with him.

turns.text: My old roommate got a boyfriend, and obviously, she started spending a lot more time with him than at our apartment.
That happened my freshman year with my best friend. It really sucks at first, but eventually you get used to it.

dialogs.situation: My son gets really nervous whenever I have to buzz his hair. It doesn't hurt but he still acts like it's the worst thing ever. I felt bad because I got kind of upset with him when I had to buzz it last week.

turns.text: I felt a little bad the other day because I got upset with my son. He always panics when I have to buzz his hair and I was so frustrated.
Dealing with kids can be like that. Is there something about doing his hair that he is scared of?

dialogs.situation: I knew I was going to pass my history final. I had paid attention all year

turns.text: I just knew I was going to pass my history test. I had listened and studied all year
Awesome! History is HARD! I always had a hard time remembering the dates and times especially.

dialogs.situation: I found out that my son got a B in one of his classes at the end of last year. I thought I had a truly exemplary, world-changing student on my hands. Now I know he's just...above average.

turns.text: Speaking of kids in school, I just found out my son got a B in his world history class at the end of the previous school year. I can't believe it.
That's great!!  History is so important I think and so few kids really grasp it well.  Congrats to him for a job well done!

dialogs.situation: I'm happy with my life at the moment. I have a wife, kids and a dog who I love very much.

turns.text: These days I feel like I got it all. I'm not rich by any means but I am enriched by a loving wife, children and a dog.
I think I have a problem with jealousy because it's starting all over again. What sort of dog do you have?

dialogs.situation: I got fired from my job once. I had to ask my parents for help paying rent that month. It was a humiliating and shaming experience.

turns.text: I lost my job and had to ask my parents for money. I was so ashamed to ask for help.
i'm pretty sure they were more than happy to help you because they are your parents in the end.

dialogs.situation: Getting woken up in the middle of the night was scary as heck

turns.text: I got woken up by my roommate and I swear his voice is the last thing you want to hear in the middle of the night, sent the fear of God through my veins
That's kind of odd. I probably would have tried to take a swing just out of pure instinct. What was the reason they wanted to wake you up?

dialogs.situation: my neighbour is olay

turns.text: my neighbour is playing loud music and im trying to sleep
I hope you don't have work in the morning. Whenever I can't sleep easily I just give up trying and do something else.

dialogs.situation: I felt scared when I had to go to the doctor to have a lump checked out on my side. I thought it was going to be for the worse.

turns.text: I was scared when I had to go to the doctor for a lump on my side. I was really expecting the worst.
Omg. I know exactly how you feel. I had a lump on my back but got it removed. Turned out to be just fatty tissue. Size of a tennis ball !

dialogs.situation: I am going to my friend's big party tomorrow night. I can't wait for it to come. I'm so excitied!

turns.text: I'm so excitied about going to my friend's big party tomorrow night! I really can't wait!
Parties are so much fun! Are you celebrating anything special, or is the party just a get together?

dialogs.situation: My high heel broke in the cement the other morning and I had to wear them all day at work. Not a good day!

turns.text: My high heel broke in the cement the other morning and I had to wear them all day at work. Not a good day!
Sounds like something on a movie! What a work day right, my god. Bring extras next time? lol

dialogs.situation: I am wishing the Yankees will win the World Series.

turns.text: I am wishing the Yankees will win the World Series.
Yankees fan, huh? I should pit you against my brother. He loves the Red Sox. I bet you guys would argue for a while.

dialogs.situation: My grandma sent a lot of food to me through my mom. She's still making sure I get good food to eat.

turns.text: My grandma sent a lot of food to me through my mom. She's still making sure I get good food to eat.
Some habits die hard.  My mom's always trying to send me food still.. I'm a grown man.

dialogs.situation: I found the mug my grandfather used to use all the time. It was hidden in a box in the attic. Really brought back memories.

turns.text: I found the mug my grandfather used to use every day.
Oh that is wonderful I know that means a lot to you. It has great sentimental value I am sure.

dialogs.situation: I never really watch romantic movies but the life as we know it really surprised me

turns.text: I don't like watching romantic movies but my wife really wanted to watch "life as we know it" last night and i actually liked it
That is awesome! I dont think anyone should feel ashamed of what they look like in a bathing suit. We all have imperfections!

dialogs.situation: my ex girlfriend started talking to me out the blue again , im not sure to trust her again

turns.text: My ex girlfriend messaged me yesterday out the blue, i still do love her im just afraid of trying this all over again
I would try again, if you love her you might regret not giving it another try if she moves on.

dialogs.situation: I got a very good grade on my final exam, Looking forward to going shopping.

turns.text: I got a very good grade on my final exam, I am looking forward to go shopping.
Congratulations! I fail to see the relevance between having a good grade and shopping however. Are you being rewarded for your grades?

dialogs.situation: the way people act towards our country is disgraceful

turns.text: its a shame the way some people act towards the U.S
I agree. I wish all the countries would get along. No need to be mean to each other.

dialogs.situation: I have this knife that I carry everyday. My dad gave it to me before he died.

turns.text: I have this knife that I carry everyday. My dad gave it to me before he died.
Oh that's really nice to have something you can remember him by. It must be very special to you.

dialogs.situation: I went to the skating rink all by myself today because my friends ditched me. I was so sad.

turns.text: I went to the skating rink all by myself today because my friends ditched me.
That's disappointing. I'm glad that you didn't let that stop you, and that you still went out and had a good time!

dialogs.situation: I was worried about driving home tonight. A lot of people were swerving

turns.text: I was worried driving home tonight. People were swerving all over
Uhoh. be careful, there are some bad drivers out there.  Especially with people playing on their phones while driving

dialogs.situation: My grandfather gave me a lamp as a gift, and he attached a cut out of a spider to the inside of the shade.  It looked like a gigantic spider!  I screamed bloody murder.

turns.text: When we moved, my grandfather gave me a lamp as a gift.  He attached a cut out of a spider to the inside of the shade.
Haha! That definitely must have scared many people that did not know what it was. That must be hilarious to watch!

dialogs.situation: Spent an hour making this pizza. Now waiting for it to bake.

turns.text: Spent an hour making this pizza. Now waiting for it to bake
Boy, what I would do for a slice o that right now. What kind of pizza is it?

dialogs.situation: I am a bit worried about taking my SAT test. I am afraid I will not do good. I never get the math questions right.

turns.text: I'm a bit worried because my SATs are coming up and I feel unprepared. I am scared I will mess up bad.
Don't worry too much about it, worrying can actually make you preform worse. You can always retake the test!

dialogs.situation: I went to six flags last year and got on a roller coaster for the first time. And when it stated I was ok but as went on I was scared to death.

turns.text: Have you ever been to Six flags?
I have been to Six Flags as a matter of fact.  I cant say that I enjoyed it much, as I hate to ride rides.  WHat about you?

dialogs.situation: I have a bunch of flies in my room and I cannot seem to get rid of them. It's driving me nuts!

turns.text: Well I am having a fly issue. I have sticky fly paper (although I hate killing anything) and I clean and no matter what I keep getting flies that bat themselves at me all day.
Sticky paper is so gross. have you every used cloves? You can put the in your windows to keep flies out.

dialogs.situation: I have just started taking care of my grandmother.

turns.text: I have just started taking care of my grandmother.
That's very admirable of you. It feels like no one takes care of family anymore.

dialogs.situation: I went to a vacation and was able to ride in the water with the dolphins.

turns.text: Have you ever swam with the dolphins?
No, but we are going on a cruise to Cozumel next Spring Break and I think that would be so much fun. Have you ever been?

dialogs.situation: I've been anxious because I think my new landlords don't approve of dogs in the house I'm renting and I have a dog!

turns.text: I've been anxious because I think my new landlords don't approve of dogs in the house I'm renting and I have a dog!
Oh no that is awful! It is against the law where I live to ban animals from the house. So legally I am allowed to have a pet even if the contract says no pets allowed.

dialogs.situation: Getting ready for vacation

turns.text: Just bought some luggage bags.  Getting ready!

I just got done traveling myself! There's no better feeling than the anticipating of traveling. I love airports, especially, because of all the people-watching and the general atmosphere. I hope your trip goes smoothly!

dialogs.situation: I was watching videos of Aretha Franklin on television and it made me think back to when my mother would listen to her albums when I was young.

turns.text: I was watching Aretha Franklin videos this weekend and it made me think about being young and my mom listening to her albums.
Aww, my mom used to listen to her too? Did she sing along and dance like mine did too? Used to love that when I was little.

dialogs.situation: I stole $20 from my friend recently. I keep meaning to slyly pay them back, but I keep backing out.

turns.text: I recently stole money from a friend
That's terrible, I hope you apologized, or at least returned it and it was stolen for a good reason.

dialogs.situation: i had to leave my kids with my grandma ,my hubby and I went to Bahamas for the summer holiday

turns.text: had to leave my kids with my grandma ,my hubby and I went to Bahamas for the summer holiday
That sounds like fun. Sometimes its good to get away without the kids. I'm sure they are having  a blast at grandma's house.

dialogs.situation: I'm pretty stoked for the release of my EP.  I'm sitting on 7 songs and refining the song structure.  But I feel like a lot of people will dig it

turns.text: I'm stoked for my EP release.  Still working on it but I'm 7 songs deep and feel like a lot of people will vibe with it
Oh sweet, I can't even  imagine the excitement you must have. I hope everything works out for you!

dialogs.situation: I've been doing music for years, but still haven't had the success like some people who've just started less than 3 years ago.

turns.text: I've been making music for over a decade, but still hasn't had success like some who've only been doing it for a year or two
Making music is a hard business to break into. The only way to make it is to keep practicing and to get a little lucky.

dialogs.situation: I am having my first child in a couple of months and I am anxious about it.

turns.text: I am having my first child and I am anxious about it.
that is awesome i would feel the same way , i want to be a father one day i am really happy for you

dialogs.situation: I was up for promotion this year. I lost out to another coworker. I really though I had it.

turns.text: I was up for promotion this year. I lost out to another coworker. I really thought I had it.
Oh no, I'm sorry man. Hopefully next time. Were you at least able to reach out and see what you could improve upon?

dialogs.situation: I spent some time today going through old photos.  Reminds me of when my kids were so much younger.

turns.text: I don't know if you are like us, but we have printed photos in a big tub that desperately need to be sorted.  So I tried to do that today but I didn't get very far.
I have the same tub sitting in the attic. I have no idea what to do with all the photos! Are you creating collages or albums?

dialogs.situation: In the airplane, last week, I was borred by someone knocking repeatedly and aggressively on the toilet door.

turns.text: In the airplane, last week, I was borred by someone knocking repeatedly and aggressively on the toilet door.
what...? you were in the toilet? and they were trying to get in? whut? i am so confused, why would they do that?

dialogs.situation: The other night my boyfriend and I watched the film "within" on Netflix and i was pretty scared trying to fall asleep afterwards

turns.text: Have you seen the film "within" on netflix? The other night my boyfriend and i watched it and I had trouble sleeping afterwards, it was pretty creepy!
No I haven't actually, I recently just canceled my netflix service! I have been thinking about resubscribing though.

dialogs.situation: I auditioned for a play this weekend. I am supposed to hear back soon if I made it. I am optimistic about it.

turns.text: I auditioned for a play over the weekend.
I'm afraid of public speaking or performing in crowds, so that takes courage! How did it go?

dialogs.situation: when my friend wanted to move into my house that i have up for sale.

turns.text: My friend asked to move into my home that I am selling and live there for free until she can find a place.
Yikes, that's a tough place to be in. She's very forward for asking something like that too.

dialogs.situation: Laying in my hammock near the beach watching the ocean. Having a drink.

turns.text: It's so nice to just relax by the beach,.
I'm right there with you!  That is the best thing in the world! Are you there now?  I'm talking to my husband about moving to the beach permanently.

dialogs.situation: In the past, I was jobless for 14 months. So now, I am putting a lot of money in my savings in case this happened again.

turns.text: In the past, I was jobless for 14 months. So now, I am putting a lot of money in my savings in case this happened again.
Sounds like a real example of learning from the past. sorry you had to go through that. are you better now?

dialogs.situation: I've been long distance with my girlfriend for about 6 years, mainly because I've been in university for a while. But I graduate this spring, and I'm going to propose to her after the ceremony. She's been patient this entire time, and hopefully it will all pay off.

turns.text: I've been long distance with my girlfriend for about 6 years, mainly because I've been in university for a while. But I graduate this spring, and I'm going to propose to her after the ceremony. She's been patient this entire time, and hopefully it will all pay off.
She sounds like a great girl. I am sure it will you sound like a happy couple.

dialogs.situation: Well, this isn't going to make me sound like the manliest individual ever, but I think I need to tell it to someone. A few weeks ago, I was driving home from work. It was late. i was tired. So I wasn't my usual self.

turns.text: Well, this isn't going to make me sound like the manliest individual ever, but I think I need to tell it to someone. A few weeks ago, I was driving home from work. It was late. i was tired. So I wasn't my usual self. I was singing along to some song when all of a sudden I glanced up and saw two eyes looking back at me, and at the time I didn't know whos eyes they were so I was scared to death. I slammed on my breaks, in the middle of the road, jumped out, and was ready to run... I mean fight whoever was in my back seat. Long story short, I saw my own reflection in the mirror.
THAT IS TERRIFYING. Until the end of your story.. then I laughed so hard I cried. But that is so relatable. I've been terrified of my own shadow more than once.

dialogs.situation: There was a huge spider in my room last night! When I smacked it with a shoe, thousands of babies started running everywhere.

turns.text: There was a huge spider in my room last night! It was so terrifying!
I hate spiders. There is nothing worse than waking up and seeing one above you on the ceiling as you are laying in bed.

dialogs.situation: I got home and all of my friends were waiting for me to have a birthday party i did not know about!

turns.text: So i just got home and all of my friends were there for a birthday party i have no clue! can you imagine my reaction?
Yeah, of course I can! That sounds heartless. Maybe that shows you who your friends truly are, and you should maybe look elsewhere... Could be a wake-up call.

dialogs.situation: I have always wanted a pair of Jordans. I hate seeing people wearing them.

turns.text: U despise people who wear Jordans. Ive never had a pair.
I've never had a pair either - but I don't despise them. Why do you feel so strongly?

dialogs.situation: My friend got a new job and I wish I had it too.

turns.text: My friend got a new job and I wish I had it too.
Good for you friend! I'm sure you'll find something soon. What field of work do you want to be in?

dialogs.situation: I needed lunch money for school because I had bought extra things during lunch. I wasn't supposed to do that. I stole money out of my dad's wallet to cover my negative account balance at school.

turns.text: I bought extra items during school lunch in high school. I have a negative balance on my account.
Ouch, hopefully its not by much. I remember when i was in high school i had a similar situation. They're usually pretty lenient on it.

dialogs.situation: When my dad passed away, I felt alone. I had no one to talk to it seemed

turns.text: I felt alone when my dad passed away. I just felt I had no one to turn to
I am so sorry to hear that. Dealing with the loss of a loved one is always difficult but feeling alone in the grief must be so much worse. I hope that you are feeling less alone now.

dialogs.situation: I'm an aspiring actor and I have yet to land any large roles. I've been grinding for two years now.

turns.text: I'm an aspiring actor and I have yet to land any large roles. I feel like I've been doing well and I've been at this for at least two years now.

That profession takes a lot of courage and a unique set of skills and personality. That's pretty cool that you took that route--sometimes I think about the "what if" of if I took that route. Pretty sure most people have that fantasy, but only the people brave enough actually go on the path to do it, like you

dialogs.situation: My dog of 10 years recently passed away. I felt so down.

turns.text: My dog of 10 years recently passed away.

I truly do feel bad that you have to endure that. My girlfriend and I were just talking about how horrible she's going to feel when she loses her Havanese pup at some point in the distant future, since she's so close to her. I hope you can grieve the loss of your great friend in a healthy way.

dialogs.situation: I was driving to work yesterday and a driver beside opened their door at a stop light and threw up everywhere. It was so nasty I almost threw up.

turns.text: So I was driving to work yesterday and the driver next to me opened their door and threw up everywhere.
I do hope they stopped the car at least ! That sounds disgusting, but its better than throwing up in the car right ?

dialogs.situation: I haven't had fries in over a year. Finally got some today.

turns.text: I haven't had fries in over a year. Finally got some today.
Oh! I hear you, I love them but I get sick when I eat them. Did you do okay?

dialogs.situation: There was a lay off recently at my company. I am so scared that I could be part of the next one.

turns.text: There was a lay off recently at my company. I am so scared that I could be part of the next one.
I am sorry to hear about all the layoffs.  I will pray for you at Church for you to keep your job.  What do you do for work?

dialogs.situation: For some reason, when I hear the song "Walking In Memphis" I picture happy moments of my childhood in Hong Kong watching "Sesame Street" with my mom, picnics on the beach, and stuffed animals; my parents must have played that song a lot back then

turns.text: When I hear the song "Walking In Memphis" I'm whisked back to vivid memories of watching "Sesame Street" with my mom in our Hong Kong apartment, fun picnics on the beach, and stuffed animals in my room...guessing they must have played that song a lot back then
That is such a beautiful memory to have. I love that we forever have moments like this... How cool Hong Kong!

dialogs.situation: MY friend used my car all day today and didnt even put any gas in it. She left trash in it too

turns.text: I let my friend borrow my car today
That was so nice of you.  What did they need to use it for?  Were you able to live without it?

dialogs.situation: My dog passed away last month. I am so sad about it.

turns.text: My dog passed away last month.
Oh man I am so sorry! I have lost many this year too. I hope he had a long life

dialogs.situation: I saw someone eat a five pound burger during some crazy challenge earlier today. It was a girl, too! Sometimes people do some wild things to completely turn around your expectations of them.

turns.text: I saw someone eat a five pound burger during some crazy challenge earlier today. It was a girl, too! Sometimes people do some wild things to completely turn around your expectations of them.
Wow, that's amazing! Shows that we can't judge a book by it's cover. We automatically think it would take a large man to do something like that!

dialogs.situation: I was going in to watch a certain movie recently that I was expecting to be pretty bad but turned out to be really good.

turns.text: I expected the new incredibles to be pretty bad but to my pleasure it came out good.
I also saw it and felt like it was pretty good. Much better than the My Little Pony Movie. That was TORTURE.

dialogs.situation: I go out with one of my friend. This friend is so cheap that he doesn't to pay for anything. He even once embarrassed me in a bar.

turns.text: I go out with one of my friend. This friend is so cheap that he doesn't to pay for anything. He even once embarrassed me in a bar.
That sounds frustrating, especially if they are inconsiderate and drain you of your funds. They sound kind of entitled.

dialogs.situation: Sometime I envy my coworkers because some of them have a better career than me.

turns.text: Sometime I envy my coworkers because some of them have a better career than me.
Yeah, I sometimes do that as well. But, as long as the bills are getting paid, I guess you can't complain.

dialogs.situation: My son always unplugs my phone while Im a sleep and lets the battery die. I am sick of it.

turns.text: I wake up to a dead cell phone every single morning.
Oh that's the worst, I try to remember to charge but it's hard to remember every time.

dialogs.situation: My 13 year old made dinner tonight. It was great.

turns.text: My daughter made a nice dinner tonight and she is only 13
Sounds like she's going to be on "Master Chef" in a couple of years. What did she make?

dialogs.situation: I have faith that one day things will all work out.

turns.text: I have faith that one day things will all work out
I bet they will.  That's the way to look at things.  With some optimism!

dialogs.situation: I was blown away when my six year old nephew solved the Navier-Stokes existence and smoothness problem. He will be getting the million dollar prize for it, which I hope he doesn't blow on cocaine and beef jerky.

turns.text: Honestly? I have a pretty special nephew. He just solved the Navier-Stokes existence and smoothness Millenium Prize problem.
Holy moses, he must be as smart as me. I solved that thing in five minutes last week. Child's play.

dialogs.situation: My cats are tearing up my basement! They've been so bad lately and just ripping up valuable furniture. They are acting like little demons.

turns.text: My cats for the most part are angels, but they've absolutely destroyed a very nice sofa bed my grandmother left me when she passed.
Oh no! I take they still got their claws. mine is the same way but there is one piece of furniture he just insists on ruining.

dialogs.situation: I can't wait for school to start. Just a couple more days

turns.text: Just a couple more days and they are outta here
You sound like me a few weeks ago with my relatives, since they have a bunch of kids under the age of 10. Sorry to hear you're going through the same stress.

dialogs.situation: I inherited my grandfather's rifle.

turns.text: I inherited my grandfather's rifle.
That is awesome!  I would love to get something like that from a relative!  Does it have any sentimental value?

dialogs.situation: I was expecting so much more from the movie but it sucked! Never again am I having my expectations so high for a movie..

turns.text: I was expecting so much more from the movie but it sucked! Never again am I having my expectations so high for a movie..
It's awful when you spend money on tickets and popcorn and it's a bad time. Did they put all of the best moments in the trailer?

dialogs.situation: Is it okay that I give my neighbor my house key to keep for me so that i do not lose mine

turns.text: I give my neighbor my house key so that i do not lose it. Can you do that as well?
No I don't know my neighbor that well but my best friend lives close so she has my spare key

dialogs.situation: Can't wait for my vacation to Las Vegas tomorrow

turns.text: In the other hand, I am excited to go to Vegas tomorrow
Wow ! that sound's really awesome. I wish I could have gone there. But surely not for work !

dialogs.situation: My cousin got married recently on a tight budget. She had been talking about how she was going to DIY everything, and I was excited to see how it would go. It ended up being really great, it was such a stylish wedding and she didn't spend a fortune.

turns.text: My cousin got married on a budget recently. I was wondering how it would turn out and it ended up being very stylish and nice looking.
I think that's the way to go when it comes to a wedding. Use the money for your future as a couple, not for one day. But to each their own, so you were impressed?

dialogs.situation: My long term boyfriend and I broke up recently. I'm so lost right now.

turns.text: My long term boyfriend and I broke up recently. I'm so lost right now.
when that happened to me i watched a lot of movies , for some reason the sad movies made me cry, but just be strong and patient one day you realize you can do better or find someone new

dialogs.situation: I am so happy it is almost August.

turns.text: I am so happy it is almost August.
Me too but it is still one more month of heat coming but it also means September is on the way.

dialogs.situation: Whenever I see homeless people, I am so thankful for where I am in life. That could easily have been me, they just got the bad roll of the die.

turns.text: Whenever I see homeless people, I am so thankful for where I am in life. That could easily have been me, they just got the bad roll of the die.
It's such a terrible situation. You just never know what circumstances have brought someone to where they are.

dialogs.situation: I really do not like when I order a hamburger with no ketchup and they still put it on.

turns.text: I really do not like when I order a hamburger with no ketchup and they still put it on.
That's the worst. I have that happen all the time but with onions.  Its the only thing they have to do so get it right!

dialogs.situation: I'm pleased with the amount of work I've done today.

turns.text: I'm pleased with how much work I've gotten done today.
Good for you! It's always so satisfying to look back and see how much you've achieved.

dialogs.situation: I watched the first Spiderman with Tobey Mcguire yesterday. Such a flashback to the past.

turns.text: I watched the first Spiderman with Tobey Mcguire yesterday. Such a flashback to the past.
I used to have the DVD but I sold all of the to upgrade to Bluray. I havent seen that in forever

dialogs.situation: We're going roller coaster riding this weekend

turns.text: Tomorrow might just be scary.  Not sure if I should go or not.
Where are you going? I would say if your gut is telling you that it is not good then I would suggest listening to it

dialogs.situation: I heard a music artist recently that brought me back to my childhood.

turns.text: I recently heard a music artist for the first time in a long time that brought me back to my childhood.
Awww, what fun.  That must have been so nostalgic for you!  I wish I was back in childhood again sometimes.

dialogs.situation: I do not like being around bats.

turns.text: I do not like being around bats.
Why's that? Did you specifically have a bad experience with them, or just assume they're terrible no matter what?

dialogs.situation: Someone left their trash in the bed of my truck.

turns.text: Someone left their trash in the bed of my truck.
Oh man, that kind of thing would make me furious. Do you have any idea who it might have been?
