dialogs.situation: I feel disgusted when I see or smell any form of thing with bad odour.

turns.text: I feel disgusted when I see or smell any form of thing with bad odour.
Same, I can never go into public bathrooms for this exact reason. It is amazing how bad it smells in one of those!

dialogs.situation: I've known my best friend since I was 4 years old.  When he joined the Air Force he moved out of state and I was really upset when he left.

turns.text: I've known my best friend since I was 4 years old.  He joined the Air Force after high school and moved out of state and I was really upset when he left.
Oh it's always sad when someone you care about leaves. Can you at least keep in contact with him?

dialogs.situation: I went for a walk yesterday and stepped in some dog poop.

turns.text: I went for a walk yesterday and stepped in some dog poop, gross.
Lol! The real question is...was the poop fresh or old? I hate that shit, no pun intended

dialogs.situation: I was outside playing with my dogs today and felt wonderful enjoying the nice day!

turns.text: I was outside playing with my dogs today and felt wonderful enjoying the nice day!
That sounds so nice! I love to be with my dog outside too, even if just watching him play.

dialogs.situation: My daughter was running through the house like usual the other day. She tripped on my laptop cord and pulled it off the table and the screen cracked. I was upset.

turns.text: So, i may be in the market for a new laptop or a repair at least, thanks to a little mishap.
Oh no! What happened to your laptop? if you get a new one which one are you looking at?

dialogs.situation: i am pretty comfy right now in my bed.

turns.text: i am pretty comfy right now in my bed. i feel very relaxed.
Bed is always a source of comfort for me. Especially, after work when I feel so drained and stressed out

dialogs.situation: I borrowed a friend's hammer and broke the head off.

turns.text: I borrowed a friend's hammer and broke the head off
It is always a bummer when you borrow something and it breaks right away. You feel responsible and have to replace it.

dialogs.situation: I went to pick up my car from the mechanic and found a huge scratch on the side!  They are saying they didn't do it!  I am so mad right now!

turns.text: I went to pick up my car from the mechanic and found a huge scratch on the side! They are saying they didn't do it! I am so mad right now!
Oh my gosh. I am not surprised they denied any wrong doing. I think that is typical of mechanics. What do you plan to do about it?

dialogs.situation: I can't wait until Halloween. I love scaring the little kids who come to my house, muhahah!

turns.text: I can't wait until Halloween. I love scaring the little kids who come to my house, muhahah!
Ha! I've always loved the more festive Dia de los Muertos approach to the day rather than scare or gore! What's your favorite Halloween film?

dialogs.situation: I robbed my grand parents once because of my addiction to drugs. They didn't notice but I feel bad about it.

turns.text: I robbed my grand parents once because of my addiction to drugs. They didn't notice but I feel bad about it.
Now that is something I would imagine is hard to deal with. I hope you are in a better place.

dialogs.situation: waiting for my favorite video game to come out

turns.text: the other day i saw a preview of my favorite game remake , resident evil two i was super hyped just remembering the old game
Oh yeah? I was a little too young to be playing that game when it came out. My stepdad had the first one though.

dialogs.situation: My son enters kindergarten soon, I plan to get caught up on my scrapbooking! Years behind I am!

turns.text: My son starts kindergarten next week, I am a stay at home mom. I want to get caught up on scrapbooking my pictures of him!
I bet you're both excited and nervous about it! I have two kids of my own and one will be starting in about a year while the other is going to fourth grade.

dialogs.situation: I recently lost my job adn i feel horrible.

turns.text: I lsot my job the other day and am pretty lost myself.

I hate sayings, but the one that goes, "Tough times don't last, but tough people do," really applies. Life is long. You have plenty of time to change your fortune, and you seem self aware enough to do it. I hope you can work your way back up.

dialogs.situation: I really liked being able to coach my daughters softball team.

turns.text: I really liked being able to coach my daughters softball team
Nice, softball is fun. I used to play baseball but always had fun playing softball in gym class

dialogs.situation: We're waiting to see what size my husband's bonus will be.  It's the first year he'll get one.  We're hoping it's enough for a new roof.

turns.text: We're waiting to see what size my husband's bonus will be.  This is the first year he's eligible for anything bigger than a Starbucks gift card lol
I hope it's a lot more than just a gift card but at least Starbucks should be a lot of money because it's so expensive there!

dialogs.situation: My new neighbors are actually nice. I've never had nic neighbors.

turns.text: 5 years in my apartment and I have always gotten terrible neighbors.
Does that still happen? I can relate...it was a relief to go on vacation and get away from them.

dialogs.situation: I took my son to his first swimming pool. He loved it so much. I don't really go much because i hate the water, but seeing his joy made me forget all about my hatred for the water.

turns.text: I will start off saying I hate the water! I can't stand being in it; however, that changed last week when I took my son to his first pool. His joy erased all my hatred for water.
Aw. Children will make us do things we NEVER thought we would (or could) do!

dialogs.situation: I accidentally gave my dog something he was allergic too and he broke into hives. I felt terrible about it.

turns.text: I accidentally gave my dog something he was allergic too and he broke into hives.
Oh no, that is really sad. You should research your dog's allergies so that it does not happen with other foods.

dialogs.situation: My cat has to be put down next week. She has been very sick for a month and not improving.

turns.text: My cat has to be put down next week.
Oh no!  I'm so sorry, we just went through that with our pup.  It's a hard choice to have to make.

dialogs.situation: I just bought plane tickets to Las Vegas for this fall.  I have never been and I am very happy about it

turns.text: So I just bought plane tickets and book a hotel.  I am going to Vegas for the first time this fall!
im so excited for you, my friend has gone twice he said a lot of people are passed out drunk on the street , and even taco bell sells alcohol very weird place

dialogs.situation: My cat decided to scratch my face as I was trying to give him a bath. Obviously he wasn't too fond of it

turns.text: My cat decided to scratch my face as I was trying to give him a bath
Oh, I've been there! I looked like a person who cut when I used to give a lot of cat baths! Did you clean it right away? (cat scratch fever)

dialogs.situation: I find myself with being over ran with anxiety that it is hard to concentrate and stay focused

turns.text: Sometimes I feel like I have so much going on that I feel overwhelmed and over ran with anxiety that it makes it hard to stay focused on everything
I totally understand.  Life can sometimes seem overwhelming.  I have learned to stop, take a deep breath, and do one thing at a time.

dialogs.situation: I found my cat the other day. She had been missing for 3 days. I found her on the side of the road, guts in the gutter

turns.text: My cat went missing 3 days ago. I found her.

That must have been a little bit of a roller coaster. That's kind of why I'm not wild about cats, is because they're so independent, and the outside cats can just go hang out somewhere for days and not have a care in the world about you. But I guess that suits some people.

dialogs.situation: I had coached my pitchers all year, i just knew they would dominate the seires.

turns.text: I worked hard coaching my pitchers all year, only to get smacked in the playoffs
That's a real bummer. I am sure they benefited from your coaching even if they didn't win in the playoffs.

dialogs.situation: the first tornado in oklahoma

turns.text: I moved to tornado alley a few years ago. I'm not used to large tornadoes so I was pretty scared when it started storming.
Oh man, I can't even imagine. I lived in Kansas for a while and we had a storm that did a lot of damage. Took out the power all day and stuff. Nature can be so devastating sometimes.

dialogs.situation: Going camping next weekend. I haven't hung out with my friends in so long.

turns.text: Going camping next weekend. I haven't hung out with my friends in so long.
That sounds like so much fun.  I hope you have a good, relaxing time.  Where are you going?

dialogs.situation: Days like today remind me of my childhood at the beach. We would go there every summer.

turns.text: It was so warm out today, it reminded me of summer vacations from my childhood.
I love it when I something takes you back to yesterday. It's just so nostalgic and that can be a great feeling.

dialogs.situation: I feel happy when I am outside in nature.

turns.text: I feel happy when I am outside in nature

That's wonderful!  I do too.  I don't take it for granted because I've been battling Lupus for 13 years and in bed a lot.  Its an amazing world we have! What is on of your favorite things to do outside?

dialogs.situation: My brother is in the Navy.

turns.text: My brother is in the Navy.
How long has he been in the Navy?  I have a bonus son (my son's best friend) who has been in the Navy for about a year now.

dialogs.situation: I am so sad, my mother recently passed away from a heart attack

turns.text: I am very sad, my mother recently passed away from a heart attack
Oh no. I'm so sorry. I totally understand how you feel. Mine passed away a few years ago, It's very difficult

dialogs.situation: I worry about my parents in their old age.

turns.text: My parents are getting old and I'm worried about them.
Oh no. Have you made plans on what you're going to do to take care of them?

dialogs.situation: I am expecting a friend that I haven't seen in years to come over tomorrow. I'm a bit nervous about seeing him and how much may have changed since the last time.

turns.text: I'm expecting a friend who I haven't seen in years to come over tomorrow. I'm a bit nervous about seeing him as I'm not really sure how much may have changed since the last time I saw him.
It's exciting that you will be able to reconnect with an old friend. I understand that you're nervous, though!

dialogs.situation: I do miss the 2000's

turns.text: I do miss the last decade.I was adolescent and had a lot of fun.
I have the same feeling but for the last 90s and early 2000's. Being an adult is no fun.

dialogs.situation: i hope i can get things worked out and get pregnant by the end of the year

turns.text: i hope i can get things worked out and get pregnant by the end of the year
That can be a lot of work.  We are trying to go through that now too, so i know how you are feeling

dialogs.situation: Someone cut me off in traffic the other day.

turns.text: Someone cut me off in traffic the other day.
That is awful.  Why do people risk their lives and the lives of others just to get a tiny bit ahead in traffic to where there going.  Ridiculous.  I'm glad you weren't hit.

dialogs.situation: I was at Target the other day with my daughter and I saw that they are selling Teddy Ruxpin that I used to have from the 80's!  Man, that brought back some great memories!

turns.text: I was at Target the other day with my daughter and I saw that they are selling Teddy Ruxpin that I used to have from the 80's! Man, that brought back some great memories!
Oh wow!  I remember the commercials too!  He looked like the coolest toy out there!  Did your daughter like it?

dialogs.situation: I was ashamed once when I recieved a report card when I was young and I performed poorly. My parents trusted me to do well and I did not do well and slacked off.

turns.text: "I was ashamed once when I recieved a report card when I was young and I performed poorly. My parents trusted me to do well and I did not do well and slacked off.".
I think most people have been there.  Its tough disappointing your parents and even worse when you know you could have done something about it.

dialogs.situation: I went to my moms funeral yesterday.

turns.text: I went to my moms funeral yesterday, but surprisingly I wasn't sad at all. I was at peace because she accomplished a lot during her time here on earth.
I'm so sorry to hear about your mom. It's good that you're at peace with it, though.

dialogs.situation: I am going to do so great this semester now that all of the kids are in school

turns.text: I am working parent who also goes to school. It can be tough
I can imagine so! I bet you are one tired person when you hit the bed at night!

dialogs.situation: I got a friend request on facebook last week from this person that I knew I recognized but couldnt remember exactly where I had met them. After thinking and looking at older photos of the person on their page I realized it was a good friend I met on a cruise some 15 years ago that I enjoyed spending the short time with. I cant believe he remembered my name.

turns.text: I got a friend request on facebook last week from this person that I knew I recognized but couldnt remember exactly where I had met them. After thinking and looking at older photos of the person on their page I realized it was a good friend I met on a cruise some 15 years ago that I enjoyed spending the short time with. I cant believe he remembered my name.
That is so crazy.  I love how Facebook reconnects people from so long ago.  Do you have any plans to meet up some time?

dialogs.situation: I kept thinking I had left the front door unlocked whilst I was on vacation

turns.text: I kept thinking I had left the front door unlocked whilst I was on vacation!
That is a terrible feeling. I saw a movie where a family actually left their kid at home. That would be the worst.

dialogs.situation: This parrot can hold full conversations. Only problem is it keeps calling its owner fat while he's eating.

turns.text: This parrot can hold full conversations. Only problem is it keeps calling its owner fat while he's eating
I'm sorry, that made me laugh. Never really seen a parrot speak that well before. Thought it as just something you see in movies. Does it say anything else fun?

dialogs.situation: I was furious when the distracted driver swerved in front of me, causing me to slam my brakes. I wasn't surprised when I saw the lady yakking on her cell phone.

turns.text: I experienced road rage the other day. I woman carelessly swerved in front of me, causing me to slam on my brakes.
Road rage is a problem I deal with too.  I have adult add and tend to be impulsive and am horrible at socializing.  I'm glad your alright and I don't blame you for getting stressed out by that.

dialogs.situation: I am hoping that while my son is in a youth challenge program that it will help him become a better person and help him open his eyes before it is to late

turns.text: My son went into a youth challenge program. I am hoping that this will help him become better person and give him the discipline that he needs.
Ahh, is he a troublemaker right now? Most of the time, it's the friends they hang out with. Young people are easily influenced by the people around them.

dialogs.situation: The Ryder Cup golf tournament is coming up in September and I can't wait. I've been watching this tournament since I was a kid and love the format.

turns.text: I'm getting really psyched about the upcoming Ryder Cup golf tournament. I've been watching it since I was a kid.
I'm fascinated by how people can watch golf, I always found it really boring, but if you enjoy it then great!

dialogs.situation: I've got a wonderful family and can do the things I enjoy. I don't think I can ask for more in life.

turns.text: I've got a wonderful family and can do the things I enjoy. I don't think I can ask for more in life.

That is so great to hear.  Nice to hear someone being happy with the important things in life and not always wanting more.  Its easy to miss things happening all around you if you are never happy with them.

dialogs.situation: I once had a dream where I was young again and my younger sibling was a baby and my parents were both smiling. It felt so real and pure, that I woke up crying. It sucks knowing you'll never have that again.

turns.text: You ever have a dream that feels way too real? The other day I had a dream where I was a kid again and I was with my family and everything was peaceful and happy.
Yes all the time! That sounds like a nice dream. Do you still have a close relationship with your family?

dialogs.situation: I am visiting my kid that is in college today. I will be going to the area very soon!

turns.text: I am visiting my college kid soon!

That's a special moment. To hopefully see your kids doing better than you and all that jazz. I'm in college but my parents live only a couple hours away, so I just visit them instead, since them coming to me wouldnt be anything too special. But congratulations to you and your kid

dialogs.situation: I was super grossed out when I left some noodles in the sink last night and today there were maggots. Welcome to summer.

turns.text: I was super grossed out when I left some noodles in the sink last night and today there were maggots. I about vomited. Fly summer :/ trying everything!
I had to buy a fruit fly trap this summer as well.  But as soon as I set it up they stopped flying around.

dialogs.situation: My kids will bring their dirty dishes in and put them in the sink without washing them off. We don't have a dishwasher and I have to end up scrubbing those by hand. It drives me nuts.

turns.text: My kids are so bad about bringing their dirty dishes to the sink and not rinsing them off.
Aw man, kids can be SO lazy and don't like to do what they're supposed to. Have you tried a rewards system to get them to do what they have to, or are they too old for that?

dialogs.situation: One time I went to a restaurant to eat by myself. I felt sad and lonely

turns.text: I have no friends. One time I went into a restaurant and ate by myself. Everyone laughed
i feel the same one and lately it seems to be getting worse. i've never been brave enough to go eat alone.

dialogs.situation: My parents didn't save enough for retirement, and now that they're retirement age, they're struggling a little. I'm still in college and am not able to really help them. I'm worried about how they'll survive financially, and I feel guilty about not being able to offer much.

turns.text: My parents didn't save enough for retirement, and now that they're retirement age, they're struggling a little. I'm still in college and am not able to really help them. I'm worried about how they'll survive financially, and I feel guilty about not being able to offer much.
There is always social security and part time jobs, that seems to be the norm these days. A lot of old people do not have enough saved

dialogs.situation: Once during a snowstorm I had to go to the airport. My taxi driver decided that driving on the highway in the middle of nowhere late at night was the perfect time to tell me all about how he would kill a man.

turns.text: Once during a snowstorm I had to go to the airport. My taxi driver decided that driving on the highway in the middle of nowhere late at night was the perfect time to tell me all about how he would kill a man
That sounds super scary, could he tell that your were scared or nervous? How did you escape that situation?

dialogs.situation: seeing my son grow up so fast isnt easy

turns.text: seeing my son grow so fast isnt easy
I don't have any kids, but I can only imagine.  It even seems like I'm growing old fast.

dialogs.situation: My coworkers and I were each tasked with individual projects and whoever performed the best would get a promotion. My coworker killed it and got the promotion. I really wish I was as good as her.

turns.text: My boss tasked my coworkers and I each with an individual project and whoever did the best would get a promotion. My coworker blew us all out of the water with her project. I only wish I had her skill...
Wow. I'd just use that as motivated to get better. I'm sure you can get to her level or exceed it with some deligence.

dialogs.situation: My oldest daughter is graduating high school this spring.  I have so many dreams for her, I'm having a hard time containing myself.

turns.text: My oldest daughter is graduating high school this spring.
Congratulations on that. That is a great life milestone for her. Is she planning on getting into a college?

dialogs.situation: The first time that I ever tried weed was so scary at first. I was in Amsterdam and I was offered a hit from a bong and I was really hesitant, but it was a great time after that.

turns.text: Ever tried weed? I did over in Amsterdam and man I was so nervous to try it!
I tried it when I was a student. It wasn't my cup of tea. How did you find it?

dialogs.situation: My friend at work just got promoted at work. I thought that I would be too but it wasnt the case. I was not too thrilled to learn he was and I wasnt.

turns.text: That promotion I was telling you about at work, well I did not get it. The worst part is that my friend did. Its hard for me to be happy for him.
Oh man. I am sorry. Your time will come. That is a very hard situation! One of those hard ones in life.

dialogs.situation: I needed a pen and a stranger gave me a nice silver one

turns.text: I didn't have a pen while returning a rental car to an unattended location
Hm, that sounds interesting. I'm not really familiar with this kind of situation, since I've never had to rent a car. What exactly happened, or what did that mean?

dialogs.situation: This weekend my friends and I are heading to the casino. I'm wanting to hit the jackpot and come home with more money than I started!

turns.text: This weekend, my friends and I are heading out to the casino. I'm gonna try to bring home more money than I left with this time!
That sounds like so much fun. I've actually never been to a casino but would love to.

dialogs.situation: Moving my grandmother to an assisted living facility from her independent life has been such a transition for the whole family. Seniors can be stubborn and its been stressful to help her feel at home there and not hate it. Yesterday after visiting her however, she actually is looking more happy to be there finally.

turns.text: Moving my grandmother to an assisted living facility from her independent life has been such a transition for the whole family. Seniors can be stubborn and its been stressful to help her feel at home there and not hate it. Yesterday after visiting her however, she actually is looking more happy to be there finally.
Thats good to hear. Being independent  all your life and then being cared for all the time can be a hard transition

dialogs.situation: I just repaired my computer's motherboard. I really want it to last a bit longer!

turns.text: My computer's motherboard wasn't running properly so I did a little quick fix. I'd really like it to keep running for another month or two until I can afford a new one.
Oh no!  That is always terrible when technology stops working well.  What did you do to fix it?

dialogs.situation: I have done all my paper work for my exam tomorrow, now i can relax until tomorrow.

turns.text: I have done all my paper work for my exam tomorrow, now i can relax until tomorrow.
That's amazing. It's good to give your head a rest so that you will recall all the items easily when you are at the exam center

dialogs.situation: This time of year takes me back to when I was a kid. I always looked forward to football with my dad

turns.text: This time of year takes me back to when I was a kid. I always looked forward to football with my dad

I always wished I could do that with my dad. But he had a stroke in his 40s, and was never in good enough health to do it with me. That and I was kind of shy and introverted, so I never made friends to do it with, either. It stinks to miss the memories, but I'm glad to hear you got to have them

dialogs.situation: i made it to work early and was able to get ready before people started coming in

turns.text: i made it to work early and was able to get ready before people started coming in
That is always a wonderful feeling to be prepared and ready to go.  Are you a morning person?

dialogs.situation: Last year in the spring, we got record rainfall and my basement got flooded. Many of my childhood things and photo albums were destroyed.

turns.text: Last year during the spring, our area got record rainfall. My basement ended up getting flooded and destroying many of my childhood things and keepsakes.
That's the worst! Because now you'll be freaking out trying to think of the things you may not even remember whether or not could have been there. That must be an anxious feeling.

dialogs.situation: I'm about to move this weekend to a new city.  I have everything packed and ready to go and have already cleaned the new house.

turns.text: I'm about to move this weekend to a new city. I have everything packed and ready to go and have already cleaned the new house.
Well that's exciting! A fresh start is always fun. What inspired you to make such a big change?

dialogs.situation: where is the love

turns.text: this world is just cruel isn't it? i mean where is the love, do we really hate eachother that much?
i agree. everyone seems to be out for themself and do not care to help other or take others into consideration

dialogs.situation: I stole candy from the store when I was a kid. I still think about it till this day.

turns.text: I stole candy from the store when I was a kid. I still think of it to this day.
I did that too!  I remember it was a package of Big League Chew.  My mom took me back to the store and made me talk to the manager.  Did you have to do that as well?

dialogs.situation: I am moving to new appartment. The new neighborhood is so nice. I am so happy that I found this appartment.

turns.text: I am moving to new appartment. The new neighborhood is so nice. I am so happy that I found this appartment.
That is great, congratulations on the new place.  Is it somewhere you have wanted to move for a while now?

dialogs.situation: I was to having a conversation with a co-worker when they asked me out on date. I refused letting them know I was married.

turns.text: Since this incident the have not spoken to me since.
I have not seen the message about the incident but I do hope that person will speak to you.

dialogs.situation: I completely ate the last cupcake even though I know my husband will want one when he gets home. I feel terrible but it was so good.

turns.text: I completely ate the last cupcake even though I know my husband will want one when he gets home. Should I go get some more?

Oh, I know how that goes. My husband loves sweets, but if it is just sitting there and no one is eating it It will get eaten right then. Getting another would depend on how much he likes sweets and needs them. lol

dialogs.situation: When another person of the opposite sex was trying to convince me to cheat on my spouse

turns.text: A coworker of the opposite sex was recently hitting on me and trying to get me to cheat on my partner.
Oh, that little rat! That was not nice of him. What did you do?

dialogs.situation: I decided to do some cleaning. Was trying to get rid of some old stuff and I could not find it in me to throw some of the stuff away

turns.text: I decided to do some deep cleaning. I was going to get rid of some stuff and could not bring myself to throw it away
I have a problem getting rid of things too. Sometimes you just have to throw it away, or donate it.

dialogs.situation: My girlfriend is fostering 3 cats. She's such a sweetheart.

turns.text: My girlfriend is fostering 3 cats. She's such a sweetheart.
That's perfection. I rescue animals as well.and have many more cats then that lol. It is very needed to help cats

dialogs.situation: I was eating some food at a restaurant when I found a hair in it. I didn't NOT want to eat any more!

turns.text: I was eating some food at a restaurant when I found a hair in it. I didn't NOT want to eat any more!
I know how you feel that would gross me out too.  Makes me feel like whoever prepared my food was not very clean.

dialogs.situation: I look out for all my students, if they are struggling, I take however much time they need to understand.

turns.text: I am an English Tutor for Chinese students, when they struggle with a topic, I always take extra time to help them along and make sure they understand
That is very inspiring, I'm glad you take the extra time. Do you like doing what you do?

dialogs.situation: My nephew dropped his ice cream on the ground and started crying. His older brother gave him his ice cream.

turns.text: My 2 nephews were eating ice cream and the younger one dropped his in the dirt. The older one gave his own ice cream to the younger one.
Awwww.  That is so sweet.  It is nice to see when young people are actually being nice to each other!

dialogs.situation: when i took my daughter to get her shots, i made sure she had her doll.

turns.text: The other day my baby had to get some of her shots.
I hate shots for babies. Why do they have to get so many?!?!?!

dialogs.situation: My 6 year old son is making very good progress in learning how to swim.

turns.text: My 6 year old son is making very good progress in learning how to swim.
Good for him! That's a very valuable skill to have, good on you for teaching him so early.

dialogs.situation: My cousin just got out of a 7 year relationship. Turns out she was cheating for the last 3 years.

turns.text: My cousin just got out of a 7 year relationship. Turns out she was cheating for the last 3 years.
That's terrible. Wh don't people just leave insteading of hurting their partner. I don't get it.

dialogs.situation: I was driving through flood waters and my car stalled out.

turns.text: I was driving through flood waters and my car stalled out.
Holy cow. I hate when that happens. It happens a lot here since I live near the ocean. How did it end up?

dialogs.situation: I'm SO afraid of my neighbors new pit bull ! Every morning our neighbor lets out the dog - he immediately heads towards MY driveway to get MY newspaper, runs off and tears it to shreds !

turns.text: I'm SO afraid of my neighbors new pit bull ! Every morning our neighbor lets out the dog - he immediately heads towards MY driveway to get MY newspaper, runs off and tears it to shreds !
Oh wow, letting the dog roam free even when it's so new to the neighborhood? That seems like recipe for disaster. Your poor newspaper..

dialogs.situation: I applied for a job online. I didn't get approved.

turns.text: I applied for a job online and I didn't get approved.
Oh no, Im so sorry! They probably already filled the position and it didnt have to do with you personally!

dialogs.situation: Once someone I thought loved me left me for another man.

turns.text: The love of my life left me for a better man.
Oh no! Hey, I wouldn't say a better man. I'm sure you are just fine for someone else. She didn't deserve you.

dialogs.situation: Really don't want to start my new job in a week. It's at a fast food place and I don't know if I'll be able to keep up with demand.

turns.text: Really don't want to start my new job in a week. It's at a fast food place and I don't know if I'll be able to keep up with demand
Those jobs are hard. You can always try it and see if you like it. I recommend a temp agency they often have nice desk jobs. Some even offer work from home jobs.

dialogs.situation: I was so thankful that my friend came to pick me up when my car broke down. She took me out to lunch while we waited for a tow truck.

turns.text: I was so thankful that my friend came to pick me up when my car broke down yesterday!
I absolutely hate car trouble! It is the worst!  Thankful for friends that can help out in times like that - did you get it fixed?

dialogs.situation: Sitting next to my baby brother who's two-years-old, and he's just ripping farts. Really wish I didn't have to stay with my parents during the summer while college is out.

turns.text: Sitting next to my baby brother who's two-years-old, and he's just ripping farts. Really wish I didn't have to stay with my parents during the summer while college is out
Wap you must be disgusted with the farting. were you mad? or are you used to this kind of situations?

dialogs.situation: my best friend friend helped me through some rough spots with my marriage and job. I am gland he was there for me

turns.text: my best friend friend helped me through some rough spots with my marriage and job. I am gland he was there for me
Thats really nice you have a friend like that.That's hard to come by. I hope everything is better for you now.

dialogs.situation: I applied to a very interesting fellowship last year at the NNSA. I had applied the year before that and had an interview and wasn't given the position. This time I thought for sure I was going to get it but I didn't even get an interview. I was so sad.

turns.text: Have you ever been really disappointed?
Of course! I'm human! ;-) Beyond the disappointments, I think it's how we respond that defines us, you know?

dialogs.situation: I used to be sooooo territorial with my boyfriend (now husband of many years) when we were dating. Thankfully, I outgrew that as I grew more into myself.

turns.text: I used to be soooooo territorial of my boyfriend (now husband of decades!) when were dating.
I'm like that too, so I can totally relate. Were you able to talk to him about how you felt?

dialogs.situation: I'm not sure if it comes with age, but I have to make sure that I have my children make sure that I have my clothes and shoes on right.  One time, I left home with two different shoes on.  One of them black and the other blue.

turns.text: I swear as I get older I need to take my time in getting dress. I'm afraid I'm going to be on one of those Walmart meme.  I've left home and before you know it I realize I have something on wrong.
Oh no! I always like to pick out what I'm wearing the night before. Maybe that would help?

dialogs.situation: At work today. I was not feeling that great so my coworker had to pick up the slack.

turns.text: Today as soon as I got to work I got sick. I have a new coworker that stepped in and helped me out. Her works looks good but I'm nervous.
Well, I hope you are feeling better. What makes you so nervous? Are you worried your superiors will look down on you leaving early?

dialogs.situation: Tomorrow is my birthday! I am so stoked!

turns.text: Tomorrow is my birthday party. I am so stoked!
Wow, how exciting!!  It's been a long time since I've had a birthday party - are you going anywhere special?

dialogs.situation: There are a couple barn cats that live on my property. One of them always tries to get inside. He always brings dead mice to the front door and leaves them there. It's very gross!

turns.text: There are a couple barn cats that live on my property. One likes to bring dead mice to my front door!
I think it's so weird that cats do that. It's like they are bringing us trophies or something!

dialogs.situation: I don't have a car anymore but I am content with that. Everything I need is within walking distance so whatever.

turns.text: I don't have a car anymore but I am content with that. Everything I need is within walking distance so whatever.
Well that's good to hear. Some people's lives depend on their vehicles and it would be a lot worse on them.

dialogs.situation: My heart sank when I heard my favorite teacher from elementary school passed away.

turns.text: My heart sank when I heard about my favorite teacher from elementary school passing away.
Ohhhh, that's so sad. I remember (long ago) when that happened to me. Did he/she live a good long life?

dialogs.situation: I'm jealous of my co-worker, who seems to be in such good shape and able to have the willpower and patience to work out so much, and eat a healthy diet, while doing the same workload as me. I would love to look like he does, but I just don't have the patience. I wonder what his secret to success would be, if I asked.

turns.text: I'm jealous of my co-worker, who seems to be in such good shape and able to have the willpower and patience to work out so much, and eat a healthy diet, while doing the same workload as me. I would love to look like he does, but I just don't have the patience. I wonder what his secret to success would be, if I asked
Maybe you can change that jealous energy into positive energy! Do some research into fitness and start a new journey.

dialogs.situation: My husband and I both work for ourselves, so as the end of the month approaches, we can sometimes feel a little worried about bringing in the funds we need.

turns.text: My husband and I both work for ourselves -- a blessing and a curse at times, since it can be tough to determine a "regular" income.
I bet it's tough. A regular income is nice but the freedom you get from working for yourselfs is better.

dialogs.situation: when i was going through a divorce, money was tight, my mom stepped in and helped with attorney fees, was so helpful.

turns.text: I went through a divorce last year, which caught me off guard financially, luckily my mom was able to help with some of the costs.
That would be rough.  Hopefully youre in a better spot now!  Thats awesome you had family to help you out too!

dialogs.situation: When we were kids, my older sister pretended to abandon me at the mall because I was being a brat.  I never did that again!

turns.text: When we were kids, my older sister pretended to abandon me at the mall because I was being a brat.
Oh no, I had a older cousin who did that to me as well. Hopefully she was just giving you tough love or discipline.

dialogs.situation: I eat while I am asleep and I can't control it.

turns.text: I eat while I am asleep and I can't control it, but I am humiliated by it.

I'm so sorry.  I have dealt with a lot of sleep problems and night panic attacks so I know how hard it can be dealing with things like that. I have a friend who does the same thing. Don't be humiliated.  You can't control it.

dialogs.situation: One time my brother was playing music really loud while I was trying to study. It made it hard for me to focus

turns.text: I was trying to study for a test one night and my brother was listening to loud music
Did you ask him to turn it down?  Or did you just go flip the circuit breaker to the house?

dialogs.situation: I have a meeting with my boss in a couple of hours. I have no idea what it's about, so I'm kind of nervous.

turns.text: I have a meeting with my boss in a few hours...
The way you wrote that makes it seem like you're anticipating something bad... Do you mind if I ask what you're expecting to happen?

dialogs.situation: I watched my kitten kill a roach the other day and eat it. It was so disgusting.

turns.text: My kitten caught a cockroach in my kitchen last night. She then proceeded to try and eat it in front of me which was disgusting.
Yuck! At least the cockroach isn't in your kitchen anymore! My cats like to catch mice and bring them to the front door.

dialogs.situation: My grandma passed away earlier this year. We used to always get together as a family and play cards on sundays. This sunday is the first time we're doing it again without her. It will feel weird, but nice to be with family again.

turns.text: My grandma passed away earlier this year. We used to always get together as a family and play cards on sundays. This sunday is the first time we're doing it again without her. It will feel weird, but nice to be with family again
Aww, that's so sad. I'm sure she would have wanted ya'll to keep having fun times together.

dialogs.situation: I used to be super scared of horror movies, but once I started watching them with other people, I got okay with it

turns.text: I used to be super scared of horror movies, but once I started watching them with other people, I got okay with it
I don't like gory movies but scary ones I do. I used to be the same way as you, though.

dialogs.situation: My cat taught himself how to use a human toilet. I don't know how, but it was pretty cool. I was in awe that he just figured it out without my intervention.

turns.text: So this one time I walked in on my cat using the toilet by himself. He just taught himself to do it, I had no idea how or why but it was pretty cool.
lol that remind me of a movie i saw with robert deniro , thats absolutly bizzare by the way but cool at the same time

dialogs.situation: I left my home to my neighbor to take care of, when I had to suddenly visit my mom in Canada

turns.text: I left my home to my neighbor to take care of, when I had to suddenly visit my mom in Canada
I'm glad you had someone to take care of it while you were away. Was you mother alright?

dialogs.situation: being alive

turns.text: being alive is so much stress and anxiety, why does it have to be like this? why can't we just all express our individual selves, instead we are forced to work so that we can eat
It's not fair, eh. Having to suppress those feelings day in and day out is significantly harder than the mundane work itself. At least it's comforting know that most everyone feels the same?

dialogs.situation: I really enjoy going out and skating with my kids in the evening. Its the most fun part of my day.

turns.text: I try to skateboard with my kids everyday. They love it, and it makes me feel young again.
Wow, very cool. The last time i tried to skateboard i almost broke my tailbone. props to you though!

dialogs.situation: I remained with my girl after a long distance relationship

turns.text: I remained with my girl after a long distance relationship
That's great. I never did a long distance one. But my brother did, and it was about 400 miles.

dialogs.situation: I'm looking forward to going home and relaxing on the couch.

turns.text: I'm looking forward to going home and relaxing on the couch.
Sounds wonderful!  Nothing better than putting your feet up at the end of the day.  Think you might watch some tv?

dialogs.situation: I am hoping I will get promoted at my job soon enough, that would be great

turns.text: I am hoping I will get promoted at my job soon enough, that would be great
I am sure you deserve it for all the hard work you do. I will send in my recommendation.

dialogs.situation: I was at the store and I tried on a dress, and it didn't look good. I saw someone else wearing it, looking great, and it made me feel pretty insecure and sad. ]

turns.text: I felt bad the other day- I tried on a dress at the store and it looked awful, but I saw another girl trying it on as well and she looked great.
Oh I hate when that happens. I'm sorry you felt that way. Did you not buy the dress?

dialogs.situation: I am trying to stop drinking soda and I have prayed and asked God to help me with this. The problem is that I am addicted to soda so I am finding it hard to quit. This causes feelings of guilt.

turns.text: I am trying to quit drinking soda and I have prayed to God and asked Him to help me. The problem is I am addicted to soda and Its very hard to quit. When I do manage to skip a day, the lack of caffeine causes horrible headaches.
I know exactly how you feel. I have a crazy addiction to soda.  I don't think I can quit!

dialogs.situation: My buddy broke up with his girlfriend for a guy.

turns.text: My buddy broke up with his girlfriend for a guy.
how do you feel about it ? honestly if someone is respectful to me i dont care who they like , thats the way my dad raised me

dialogs.situation: I'm getting married in two months. I'm pretty excited for this big moment.

turns.text: I'm getting married in two months. I'm so excited, but admittedly a little nervous too. I think about it all the time.
I am so happy for you! I have been married for ten years and it is the most rewarding thing ever. But you should be nervous because in two months you have to share everything.

dialogs.situation: I found a dead racoon in my shed. I must have been there for a few weeks

turns.text: I went into my shed to clean it and i found a dead raccoon
Oh gosh. That's awful... sorry you had to experience that. What did you do after finding it?

dialogs.situation: I need to go to the grocery store but it is storming outside. Not sure if I should go or not.

turns.text: I need to go to the grocery store but it is storming outside. Not sure if I should go or not.
Hopefully it will stop soon. That's the worst having to get creative with the little food you have on hand.

dialogs.situation: I was so ecstatic to see my daughter graduate from VPK.

turns.text: I cried so hard seeing my baby girl walk across the stage at her VPK graduation.
That must of been a proud moment for you as a father.  She's all grown up and out in the real world now

dialogs.situation: My daughter is expecting her third child. She already has two boys. A girl would be nice.

turns.text: I am about to become a grandma for the third time. My daughter has two boys already and I'm thinking pink...
Congratulations, that is so exciting!!!  I know we should only hope for healthy but I'll keep my fingers crossed for pink :-)

dialogs.situation: I cheated on a test at school. I really feel like I should come clean about it to my professor.

turns.text: I was taking an important test in one of my classes the other day... I'm ashamed to say that I cheated.
I've cheated on occasion. It's never right but it's easy. At least you're ashamed of it.

dialogs.situation: My husband ordered pizza tonight at work.

turns.text: My husband has to work all night. He ordered pizza. I am kind of wishing I had some pizza right now.
Mmm, pizza sounds good. What's keeping you from ordering pizza yourself? Why let him have all the fun?

dialogs.situation: I love Masterchef, but Masterchef Jr is my favorite. Those kids are really good.

turns.text: Do you watch Masterchef?
I have a few times, my mom is really into cooking shows, so I watched them a lot growing up, and still catch a few now and then.

dialogs.situation: My dog crapped on my rug yesterday. I was so irked.

turns.text: My dog took a crap on my new rug yesterday.
I know how you feel! I don't have carpet in my living room for that reason- Sometimes they have accidents. I hate poo accidents especially!

dialogs.situation: Getting cleared after having 7 surgeries I felt so relived and relaxed.

turns.text: I had a bunch of surgeries this year. I"ve never felt more relaxed then when I found out I was clear and they were over with.
That had to be rough, and glad to hear you're better. Do you have any follow-up appointments to go to?

dialogs.situation: My cat sat on my bag right after she came out of her litter box

turns.text: My cat sat on my bag right after she came out of her litter box, gross

I'm sorry, but that made me laugh a little bit. I've never been able to get into the idea of cats as pets just because they're so independent and determined to do whatever the want. Doesn't seem like they can listen to any direction you try to give them.

dialogs.situation: My mother died yesterday it was just so sudden. I am just a mess right now and can't believe it's happening.

turns.text: My mother died last night my friend. I am pretty out of it right now.
oh im so sorry, please don't worry, i know it's tough but i learned that death is only a beginning not the end

dialogs.situation: I feel happy to know that God has got my back and I don't have to worry about anything.

turns.text: I feel happy to know that God has got my back and I don't have to worry about anything.
I am right there with you!  God is good and wow, He's been with me through so much hardship.  I'm so happy you feel the same way.

dialogs.situation: I saw a man with a gun in his car last week. It definitely scared me

turns.text: I saw a man who had a gun in his car last weekend. It scared me
I know what you mean.  My dad carries a gun in his car, so I won't let him drive my kids anywhere.  What did you do?

dialogs.situation: So I saw a guy at the gas station yesterday and he was over 40..listening to nasty rap and of course he got out to use the free air pump then just THREW it on the ground.

turns.text: So I saw a guy at the gas station yesterday and he was over 40..listening to nasty rap and of course he got out to use the free air pump then just THREW it on the ground. They constantly have to replace it and it's the only free one in the area.
Oh, that sound alful! Some people have zero respect for others belonging and even less for things we all need to share.

dialogs.situation: I have applied for a new credit card with Chase. I am hopeful that it will be approved

turns.text: I am awaiting the decision for the new credit card with Chase that I have applied couple of days ago. I really need it
I have a Chase credit card. They really aren't that great, but I do hope you get approved. Why do you need it?

dialogs.situation: My daughter has been sick, but it looks like she is finally getting better. She had a bad bacterial infection from daycare.

turns.text: My daughter has been sick for months but she is finally starting to get better!
Glad to hear it. I hate hearing about children having tragic childhoods and not being able to just simply be a kid. But at least she'll have a good perspective and appreciate life more.

dialogs.situation: This old lady ran a stop sign the other day and almost hit me when I was in the crosswalk on my bike. I wish people would pay attention to pedestrians.

turns.text: The other day I was riding my bike and this woman ran a stop sign, nearly hitting me. Thank goodness I was paying attention and was able to stop in time.
Oh my goodness, I've almost gotten hit while on a bike before and it's terrifying. I'm so glad you're alright!

dialogs.situation: Thinking about how bad people's lives are in this world makes me very thankful for having a supporting family growing up.

turns.text: Every day I stop and think about how some people have very hard lives and it makes me both sad and also thankful that I had a caring and supportive family growing up.
It's nice to hear someone thinking about others. Many people who luck out don't care what happens to others or are grateful for their lot in life.

dialogs.situation: I had to wait all day to pick my dog up from the vet, even though we had an appointment.

turns.text: My dog had to go to the vet and it took all day. We even had an appointment.
Oh, that's the biggest pain.  I feel like when you pay good money for care for your pet...they should at least be on time.

dialogs.situation: I came home to find my leftovers had been eaten. I was perturbed to say the least.

turns.text: I came home today and someone had eaten my leftovers. I was so irritated!
I hate when that happens!  I look forward to those all day you know!  Did you find out who the culprit was?

dialogs.situation: I've got a pet hamster that hasn't been doing well. I'm scared that he might not live much longer.

turns.text: I have an adorable hamster that doesn't look like he's doing well. He is on the old side for hamsters, and I'm worried he won't live much longer.
Oh no, I am sorry to hear that. I hope that he gets to feeling better. How old is he?

dialogs.situation: I can't wait for the movie Mile 22 to come out. I love seeing UFC fighters in movies!

turns.text: I can't wait for the movie Mile 22 to come out. I love seeing UFC fighters in movies!
I have not seen any UFC movies. I guess I should watch one to give them a chance.

dialogs.situation: I used to read stories. One day I read a story when I was alone. It was a horror story. I just scared a lot and I stopped reading.

turns.text: I read a horror story last night.
Which one?  Was it good?  I've read a decent amount of those, but I'm always looking for more.

dialogs.situation: i recently burned my hair with my hair drier and it looks so bad, i wonder what people think when they see me with my hair like that

turns.text: i burned my hair with my hair drier i am so embarrased to go out in public
I am sorry to hear that, my wife has done the same thing. She wore a hat for almost a month when she left the house.

dialogs.situation: I never thought I would feel such love having kids.

turns.text: I never knew I would feel this much love having kids.
Definately! I have one daughter and twins on the way... I foresee love overload. How many do you have?

dialogs.situation: I was disgusted to find out my best friend's husband cheated on her.  I feel bad for her.

turns.text: I was disgusted to find out my best friend's husband cheated on her. I feel bad for her.
That is so, so sad. Are they going to separate or is there a chance that he can change his ways and earn her trust again?

dialogs.situation: I feel happy to just stay in and watch a movie at home on a Saturday night. I have no desire to go out and party like most people I know do.

turns.text: I feel happy to just stay in and watch a movie at home on a Saturday night. I have no desire to go out and party like most people I know do.
I understand that feeling. It wouldn't make sense for us all to want to do the same things, especially if you've partied before already.

dialogs.situation: I finally purchased the house of my dreams.

turns.text: I finally purchased the house of my dreams. We barley finished moving in yesterday.
Wow , i bet it was a long day of moving, but i can imagine the joy you must feel inside you, congratulations !!!!

dialogs.situation: I was playing with football with my two nephews, just throwing the ball around, and I threw the ball too high and hard for my younger nephew. It sailed past him and nailed the neighbor's car behind him, and left a dent in the door. I felt so stupid having to go up to their house and tell them what happened...

turns.text: I was playing with football with my two nephews, just throwing the ball around, and I threw the ball too high and hard for my younger nephew. It sailed past him and nailed the neighbor's car behind him, and left a dent in the door. I felt so stupid having to go up to their house and tell them what happened..
Oh no!  My gut feels sick for you having to go through that.  It happens to all of us but its so painful and awkward.  How did the neighbors take it?

dialogs.situation: I miss when my kids were little. They loved to hang out with me. Now they are teenagers and think I am weird.

turns.text: I miss when my kids were younger. They wanted to spend a lot of time with me. Now they are too old for that stuff.
Well, kids eventually grow and become independent. Maybe you can try and go fishing with them or something? Or a family picnic?

dialogs.situation: I was really happy the other day when I found out I have enough pages in my passport.

turns.text: I had to cross the border once with very few pages in my passport once.
i do that all the time. i live on the mexican border. what border did you cross?

dialogs.situation: My sister recently paid off her house. I felt so envious of her as I've been trying to pay mine down.

turns.text: My sister recently paid off her house. I felt so envious of her as I've been trying to pay mine down.
That will be *such* a wonderful feeling when you do. I know it's hard when you see someone reach the "finish line" first -- are you able to turn that envy into inspiration?

dialogs.situation: once I was in a drive-by shooting

turns.text: once I was in a drive-by shooting
Oh dang that sounds really scary. I'm assuming that since you're still here that you are okay?

dialogs.situation: I didn't get a chance to make dinner for my date, so I got her McDonalds.

turns.text: I didn't get a chance to make dinner for my date, so I got her McDonalds
Oops.  That's doesn't have to be a bad thing.  No one can resist fries from McDonalds.  How did she react?

dialogs.situation: I had a tire low on air but, a co-worker of mine had an air compressor in his car he let me use.

turns.text: I had a tire low on air but, a co-worker of mine had an air compressor in his car he let me use
That is good that he had an air compressor. Low tires seem to be the story of my life. I seem to always have to be airing up a tire.

dialogs.situation: I interned for a Physical Education class for 3rd graders. I was stunned by how intelligent 3rd graders are!

turns.text: I interned for a Physical Education class for third graders. I haven't been a third grader for a long time, so I was surprised how intelligent they are! They go through a lot of stuff, too.
That sounds awesome.  I barely remember 3rd grade.  I think we just played games and had fun.

dialogs.situation: A years ago I had to put my cat down. Actually she was my mom's cat I inherited when my mom died. I'd known the cat for her entire life, and for half of mine.

turns.text: I had to put my cat down a few years ago, she was old and in kidney failure.
I am so sorry to hear that. I'm sure she was very happy while she was alive with you guys.

dialogs.situation: My dog got sick last week and was vomiting alot. She vomited in the living room and it stuck so bad I almost vomited trying to clean it up.

turns.text: Have you ever had a dog that got sick and vomited in the house?
Omg my current dog does that sometimes. She pukes up bile if she doesn't eat, so I always have to make sure she is eating her food.

dialogs.situation: what i saw online today

turns.text: i was just like the usual, working on my website, and then i saw a disgusting advert which was about society
Dont put too much weight into those advertisements. Sometimes they are just there to get a rise out of you.

dialogs.situation: I survived a home invasion once years ago. Several burglars broke in and were prowling around the house. I hide under the bed and had to stay super quiet until I was sure they were gone!

turns.text: I lived through a home invasion. Several masked burglars broke into my house and totally ransacked it. I was home at the time. I hide under the bed during the whole ordeal.
Oh my goodness, that sounds absolutely terrifying. Do you think they would've hurt you if they found you?

dialogs.situation: I am feeling happy I have money saved up. I almost never have had a time in life where I have been able to save any money.

turns.text: I am feeling happy I have money saved up.
that's great! Sometimes it's kind of hard to save up money but it's good to have something saved up when things get bad

dialogs.situation: I'm happy with my health right now. I'm at a healthy weight, I have no aches or pain, and I'm still pretty young. I think young people take for granted their ability to not feel physical pain.

turns.text: I'm happy with my health right now. I'm at a healthy weight, I have no aches or pain, and I'm still pretty young. I think young people take for granted their ability to not feel physical pain
It's great to hear that you're in such good shape! I need to work on that myself.

dialogs.situation: I was so proud of my 15 year old daughter. She was determined to work this summer, even with us telling her no one would hire her unless she was 16. She persevered and we were wrong -- she was hired at the first job she interviewed for!

turns.text: I am definitely a proud parent of our 15 year old -- she was determined to work this summer, and even with us saying no one would hire her until 16 -- she found a job!
Well, that's impressive! I can see why you are proud. Sounds like a hard working young lady!

dialogs.situation: My friend showed me a text this guy sent her that shes been talking to. They were talking about where they live in comparison to eachother. The text said "Yeah, and your fat" and I thought wow how rude! But after that he corrected the auto correct saying he meant to say "Yeah, and your far."

turns.text: My friend showed me a text this guy sent her that shes been talking to. They were talking about where they live in comparison to eachother. The text said "Yeah, and your fat" and I thought wow how rude! But after that he corrected the auto correct saying he meant to say "Yeah, and your far. He must have felt so bad lol
Omg I was about to say that is so mean and rude and I would be so embarrassed but I know it was a honest mistake I dislike the auto correct.

dialogs.situation: I have an important job interview and i am nervous about it.

turns.text: I have an important job interview and i am nervous about it.
Oh! What is it for? Just remember to think of all your good qualities and the interviewers :)

dialogs.situation: Somehow I had a fruit fly infestation in my apartment the other day. I think it's because I had some old vegetables I didn't throw away. It was gross.

turns.text: A bunch of fruit flies appeared in my apartment out of nowhere the other day. I think it's because of some old veggies in my fridge. Totally gross.

Oh man, those things are awful and reproduce like crazy.  We left our house for a week and came back to tons of them everywhere! The best trick is putting a little apple cider vinegar in a jar, a drop of dish soap on top of that and cover it with cling wrap and put holes in it.  They will gravitate toward it and you'll catch a bunch! Just keep changing it every few days.

dialogs.situation: My mom made a chocolate cake the other day and it reminded me of one I had at my 8th birthday party.

turns.text: My mom made a chocolate cake the other day and it reminded me of the one I had at my 8th birthday party.
Aw, good on her. I bet she knew exactly how it would make you feel, too. Things people do personally themselves always have the better result.

dialogs.situation: I tried escargot this summer on a cruise. I don't know why but I will never have it again

turns.text: I had excargot over the summer on a cruise

The snails? Yikes. Well, I've always thought it probably gets a worse rap than it actually should, and probably doesn't taste that bad. Half of why I think it's probably gross is simply because they made it seem gross in old cartoons. So, how did it taste?

dialogs.situation: At a office party, I tried to invite a female coworker for a drink. She rejected me in front of everybody. I felt bad.

turns.text: At a office party, I tried to invite a female coworker for a drink. She rejected me in front of everybody. I felt bad.

Ah, that's rough. That was a very bold move on your part. But sometimes fortune favors the bold, as they say. I think you'll be happy later on not having to wonder "what if." Still though, she could have maybe been more discrete about things.

dialogs.situation: Last week I was at the park with my kid and got distracted by my phone.  I looked up and my daughter was gone!  My stomach dropped and became really scared.  Luckily I found her in the tube slide.

turns.text: Last week I was at the park with my kid and got distracted by my phone. I looked up and my daughter was gone! My stomach dropped and became really scared. Luckily I found her in the tube slide.
oh god that's worse than thinking you lost your phone for a second, i am aware of the feeling, how are you feeling now

dialogs.situation: This past Friday night our refrigerator stopped working! We had to go all weekend without it, which lead to having to throw out a lot of food and some strong odors! It was Monday before we were able to get it repaired.

turns.text: This past Friday night our refrigerator stopped cooling! We had to go the weekend without it, and of course had to deal with some unpleasant smells and throw away a large amount of food! It wasn't a fun weekend for us!
Oh no, I hate when that happens. I can sympathize with you because thats happen to me twice! Its okay in the winter time and you can sort of keep your food fresh but not during the summer

dialogs.situation: I am pissed off at Trump

turns.text: I am so pissed off at Trump, he is the worst president ever.
Why do you feel that way?  Has he enacted any policies that directly affect you or anyone you know?  For the record - I'm not too fond of him either, just curious more than anything.

dialogs.situation: I have to take a foreign language for college this semester. I'm not really looking forward to it because I feel like I'm going to embarrass myself trying to speak the language in front of everyone when we have to talk

turns.text: I have to take a foreign language for college this semester. I'm not really looking forward to it because I feel like I'm going to embarrass myself trying to speak the language in front of everyone when we have to talk
That would be tough. I think I was one of the last one's not required to take foreign language.

dialogs.situation: A while back I decided to move from Florida to California and wanted to drive. I have driven West to East, but never the other way. I knew I could do it though - just take my time and enjoy the trip!

turns.text: A while ago I drove from Florida to Northern California. It's a long trip, but I knew I could do it just fine.
That is a long trip.  Did you do it all in one go or did you take breaks?

dialogs.situation: When I got back from vacation, most of my garden was dead. My dad promised me he would water it!

turns.text: When I got back from vacation, most of my garden was dead. My roommate promised me she would water it!
I will go out on a limb and say she didn't hold up her end, hope you get your garden back bright and beautiful

dialogs.situation: I am nervous about my upcoming job interview, it has been awhile

turns.text: I am nervous about my upcoming job interview, it has been awhile
I don't blame you. I am always nervous at interviews. Don't worry, I'm sure you will do great!

dialogs.situation: I really have nothing to complain about. I have a roof over my head, a good job, and a wonderful family. Life is good!

turns.text: I can't complain about anything right now. I have a roof over my head, a decent job, and a wonderful family.
i am also blessed. we don't have fancy things or a ton of money but we have each other and our health.

dialogs.situation: My son was in advanced placement and honors class in high school. Once he graduated, he was accepted at a very good college and is going to be an Aerospace Engineer. I really astonished at how well he does, and admire his intelligence and hard work.

turns.text: My son was in advance placement and honors during high school. He went to a prestigious college after, going for as an Aerospace Engineer. He never ceases to astonish me with his intelligence and admire me with how hard he works to pursue his dreams.
Wow!  It sounds like your kid is quite smart and gifted!  You must be really proud of him!

dialogs.situation: One time I had to give a presentation in order to get my master's degree. It was very stressful but I passed and was able to graduate

turns.text: I had to do a research project and present it to my professors to graduate. Thankfully I passed!
You must have worked hard for that! I'm sure it's great and you'll pass with a flying color!

dialogs.situation: The start of school is soon!

turns.text: The start of school is soon, I'm ready to get back to work!
I feel you! Summer is great and all but I miss my classmates and the work I'm studying.

dialogs.situation: I ate 10 pizzas all by myself yesterday. I felt so sick with myself.

turns.text: I ate 10 pizzas all by myself last night.
I don't know if that is a good thing or a bad thing, but either way it is EPIC.

dialogs.situation: There's usually too much catfishing on Facebook and Tinder.  So I was amazed when I met my date and she turned out to be actually better looking in person.

turns.text: With all the catfishing going on these days I was shocked when my Tinder date turned out to be better looking in person.
I feel like since the show, catfishing has decreased a little bit. It's easy to determine when someone is using fake pictures.

dialogs.situation: got the wrong order

turns.text: i ordered the tshirt i always wanted from my favorite band. but they sent the wrong size
oh god that's annoying, the same thing happned to me for my iphone case, they got me the smaller one isntead of the normal big size one, so annoyed

dialogs.situation: I was scared to drive for the first time.

turns.text: I was very anxious to start driving at 16.
I know that feeling. It's nerve racking trying to incorporate everything you learned at the DMV in real time.

dialogs.situation: i am moving out of this country soon and i'm worried about my university

turns.text: i am moving out of this country soon and i'm worried about my university, because i'll have a lot of exams to do and not gonna lie i'm stressed out.
don't be! i know this is overused but trust me, it's not as hard as everyone else makes it to be, if you focus and aim for your goals, you will get it! i know you can do it!

dialogs.situation: My friend had a long hospital stay, and I spent a lot of time there with them.

turns.text: A friend of mine had an pretty serious illness and had to be in the hospital for quite a while. I spent as much time as I could there with him to keep his spirits up.
Oh that sucks, I hate seeing friends and family injured or sick. That's very nice of you though that you stayed there with him, youre a good friend.

dialogs.situation: I just moved to a new city. i am looking forward to having a new start.

turns.text: I just moved to a new city. i am looking forward to having a new start.
Congratulations! It's not easy moving to a new place, but it's great fun getting to know your new home!

dialogs.situation: i knew id pass the test

turns.text: i studied so i knew the test would be a breeze. ive never studied so much in  my life
Well done to you. Not everyone has that type of focus. What where you studying for?

dialogs.situation: I was at the store and saw some old games and started to think about when i was a kid

turns.text: i was at walmart and saw all the old board games from my childhood
That's always fun, to see those random memories crop up when you least expect. What kind of board games were they?

dialogs.situation: I applied for a job as manager at the store I was working at. When I interviewed they really liked my answers.

turns.text: I was applying for a manager position at the store I worked at. I felt really sure about the interview.
I can relate. You just have to be yourself.  Do you know if you got the job?

dialogs.situation: I had a cat who lived to be 19 years old.   She was one of the best things to happen to me.  I still feel her loss

turns.text: I still feel the loss of my 19 year old cat Lexi.  She was my first pet as an adult.

oh man. was just talking to someone about that type of thing. i had a pet dog who was hit by a car back when I was in jr high. i have friends who have recently lost their lifelong pets and i know they're still reeling to some extent.

dialogs.situation: I felt nervous about a meeting at work where i had to do a presentation.

turns.text: I am so glad i finished my meeting at work. i was so worked up about it.
I bet it was way easier and less of a pain that you anticipated it would be. Are you ready for the rest of your work week now?

dialogs.situation: Someone parked in my spot at work that doesn't even work in the building, so I had to walk a long way to work today.

turns.text: I went to work today and someone parked in my designated spot. Turns out they didn't even work there. I was so p'd off.
That would really annoy me! Did you end up taking any action against them? I know some companies will tow a vehicle that does that.

dialogs.situation: One of my coworkers tried hitting on me. I declined the passes.

turns.text: One of my coworkers tried to flirt with me. I told him no because I am happily married.
It's good that your standing up for your marriage like that. A lot of people aren't that committed.

dialogs.situation: I'm on a diet but I ate burger king for lunch I feel so  ashamed I cheated.

turns.text: I suppose to be on a committed diet but I kind of cheated today.
Well, I can understand that. It's very hard to be on a very strict diet, without a break here and now!

dialogs.situation: I am sure i will pass my calc test coming up

turns.text: I am sure i will pass my calc test coming up next month
I'm glad that I don't have to deal with any of that for a few more weeks of summer vacation.

dialogs.situation: I watched the UFC fights last night with friends.  It had been some time since we last hung out.

turns.text: Great UFC fights last night.  An even better night because I was hanging out with friends
Friends and UFC sounds like a great night!  I missed the fight.  Were there any good knock outs?

dialogs.situation: I have been studying very hard for my MongoDB exams I'm ready to go take the exams

turns.text: Wish me luck!
Hello my friend! I will gladly wish you all the luck in the world, if you would only tell me what I am wishing it for!

dialogs.situation: I was in awe of the driving ability of my old aunt, she's old but she still has it!

turns.text: I was in awe at the driving ability of my aunt, she's old but she still has it!
Right on! That's cool to hear. Everyone likes to rag on older people driving. Glad to hear she's the exception. What kind of car does she drive?

dialogs.situation: I gifted a new laptop to my dad. I feel satisfied and glad now.

turns.text: I bought a new laptop with my first salary.
That's quite an investment. It must have made you feel good to be buying it with your own money.

dialogs.situation: I once called the wrong person dad.

turns.text: Once when I was a kid i hugged this man I thought was my dad and looked up to realize it was a random.
Haha, that's funny you mention that. I seen the same thing happen to a girl when I was at the grocery story one time.

dialogs.situation: I used to be nervous if someone tried to confront me or start a fight...but since I've taken up boxing mma and wrestling I really don't fear anybody

turns.text: I used to get nervous and anxious whenever someone would try to start a fight or argument with me...now I don't ever back down, and it helps I've been boxing and wrestling for 5 years
I am glad to hear that. It can take a lot for some people to be confident like that. I am glad you got over your issues with it.

dialogs.situation: This weekend, a guy totally drunk has hit very badly my car.

turns.text: This weekend, a guy totally drunk has hit very badly my car.
Are you saying that a drunk guy hit your car, and that it is very bad? If so, that really sucks and I am sorry. Did he have insurance?

dialogs.situation: When i was studying for my math finals. Spent a couple days studying for it and felt confident when taking the tets.

turns.text: Studied for my math finals for days, felt very confident on the day of the test.
That's awesome! Yeah I definitely find the more I study, the better I do. Funny how that works!

dialogs.situation: When bad things happen I get too emotional. I think more than other do. Sometimes I think I am crazy.

turns.text: When bad things happen I get too emotional. I think more than other do. Sometimes I think I am crazy.
I'm sorry to hear that...sometime you just have stop and take a deep breathe so you don't get overwhelmed.

dialogs.situation: My roommate ate all of my food today. I didn't have any lunch.

turns.text: My roommates took my food I had labeled with my name in the fridge today.
That was a crappy thing to do. Better get a handle on it now or it could become a big problem.

dialogs.situation: When my friends have computer troubles they come to me. I always have a way to fix up their computers. always ready and willing to help anyone though.

turns.text: I am pretty much the IT guy among my friends. Always ready to fix computers for them.
I consider myself somewhat knowledgable about them too, it's very fulfilling being able to help other people with their problems sometimes.

dialogs.situation: I got to work the other day all excited to work with my friend.  Turns out he got moved somewhere else at the last minute.

turns.text: My friend was scheduled to work with me the other day and I was really excited.
I bet, its always nice to get a chance to work with someone you really like.  Where do you work?

dialogs.situation: Someone I know was nasty to me again after trying to build trust. It really just crushed me because it's again another chance they took advantage of.

turns.text: Someone I know was nasty to me again after trying to build trust.
Oh man doesn't that just make you want to take a car and run right..... Just kidding.. but yeah that would make my blood boil

dialogs.situation: I've been in a long term committed marriage for over 34 years.

turns.text: I've been married to the same person for over 34 years
Wow. That's a long time. Longer than I've been alive! Congrats on your successful marriage. Got any tips?

dialogs.situation: I'm not perfect but I'm always confident that no matter what I do, the only person who knows what's best for me is ME and no one else.  For that I'm grateful and always know I'm the man

turns.text: I am confident in my own judgment.  Because I am not just a man---I am THE MAN like that 50 cent song...I'm not perfect but I'm always confident that no matter what I do, the only person who knows what's best for me is ME and no one else
Do you trust other people at all?  It seems like it would be hard to trust someone if you think only you can know what is best for you.

dialogs.situation: A kid I helped pay tuition fees got a job with Google and just bought me a car

turns.text: The father had no money to pay his fees so I helped him now he bought me a car
Wow, how did he get so much money if he didn't have money to pay his fees, and what were the fees for?

dialogs.situation: I always like to eat at my favorite restaurant a few times a week and encourage others to in the hopes it can stay afloat.

turns.text: I always like to eat at my favorite restaurant a few times a week and encourage others to in the hopes it can stay afloat.
Its good that you like it so much. Why are you worried that it will close?

dialogs.situation: Yesterday, I took a flight. During the flight, I went to toilet and came just after me. She kept knocking on the door repeatedly, aggressively and multiple times.

turns.text: Yesterday, I took a flight. During the flight, I went to toilet and a woman came just after me. She kept knocking on the door repeatedly, aggressively and multiple times.
Haha.  Makes it hard to take care of business, and you'd think she'd get the hint from the locked door!  I would have sat longer "just because."

dialogs.situation: Cant wait for halloween to get here

turns.text: i love halloween cant wait
I'm not too sure about it really, but the candy's good! What is it you like about it?

dialogs.situation: I just moved across country and i feel a bit unsure if this was the right move for me.

turns.text: I just made a huge move across the country , and I don't know if it was the right choice.
Oh thats scary. I've been there. Just give it some time to feel right. Home is where ever you want it to be.
