dialogs.situation: I am sad that someone I know chooses to not take ahold of their life and have a better one. They continue to just destroy it and it's very hard to see when so many would kill to have their life.

turns.text: I am sad that someone I know chooses to not take ahold of their life and have a better one.
Well, it is almost the fact of life that irresponsible people will not last much and regret will be only consequence for them

dialogs.situation: We just lost everything in our basement in a flood.  We had torrential rain all week long..

turns.text: We just lost everything in our basement in a flood. We had torrential rain all week long..
Oh goodness! That is terrible to hear! Have you contacted someone to help clean it up? That can easily cause mold.

dialogs.situation: I found 5 packs of gluten free cookies on clearance at my grocery store yesterday. I am a simple person, stuff like being able to have a bunch of cookies that are good for me and so cheap excites me!

turns.text: I found 5 packs of gluten free cookies on clearance at my grocery store yesterday.
Wow, that doesn't happen very often. Well done. Those things are normally quite expensive, aren't they?

dialogs.situation: Fair rides make me nervous.

turns.text: Do you like fair rides? I can't take them myself.
I don't like them at all. I've seen too many videos on the internet where people get injured or they break easily

dialogs.situation: Last week I had to put my dog to sleep.  It was so sad.  I had her for 15 years

turns.text: Last week I had to put my dog to sleep.  It was really sad because I had him for 16 years.
Oh no. I am so sorry. That is so hard. My daughters cat got run over like a week after we had him. :( What was your dog's name?

dialogs.situation: My best friend just got a new car.  Here I am driving the same car for 10 years.  Ugh.

turns.text: My best friend just got a new car. Here I am driving the same car for 10 years.
I feel you. I need a new one asap. POS falling apart. Cost me lots for a repair recently

dialogs.situation: My mother passed away a while back. I still use all of her favorite cooking pots when I cook. Its a great reminder.

turns.text: I still use all of my mothers cooking pots. She passed away a few years ago. Its a great reminder of her.
That is so wonderful that you have something of hers.  I'm so sorry you lost her.  That is so difficult.  Did she love cooking?

dialogs.situation: I remember being really upset when we had to move away from my very first best friend when I was 10

turns.text: I remember being really upset when we had to move away from my very first best friend when I was 10"
That happened to me too when I was in elementary school. I lost all my friends and had to make new ones, which sucks.

dialogs.situation: I used my skills to pick the winning numbers in the lottery today.  I feel pretty good about myself.

turns.text: I used my skills to pick the winning numbers in the lottery today. I feel pretty good about myself.
I don't doubt that you're feeling good about yourself! Are you getting the lump sum of monthly payments?

dialogs.situation: I went to a restaurant and after I got the bill I realized that I did not have my wallet on me! The manager was yelling at me demanding me to pay before I left.

turns.text: I went to a restaurant and after I got the bill I realized that I did not have my wallet on me! The manager was yelling at me demanding me to pay before I left.
Oh no, how did you make things right with the manager. I am sure he is just wanting to get paid.

dialogs.situation: I was riding the train today, and some guy just had an open wound, practically gushing blood. He didn't seem to really mind and everyone else seemed to just be unphased by it. I guess that's city life for you.

turns.text: I was riding the train today, and some guy just had an open wound, practically gushing blood. He didn't seem to really mind and everyone else seemed to just be unphased by it. I guess that's city life for you.
I see that more in the country I guess. That would be horrifying. But maybe he is just immune to pain?

dialogs.situation: I think that even when you feel down, its a great opportunity to go deeper into yourself.

turns.text: I feel very strange for not feeling any remorse about anything really.
Maybe you haven't done anything terribly wrong that anyone would feel remorseful about. Do you think that's it?

dialogs.situation: I cried all night when I found out Trump won the election.

turns.text: I cried all night when I found out Trump won the election.
Why he is so much better then the other option. I mean they were all crazy but I can't imagine a regime under Clinton.

dialogs.situation: Even though I'm a christian and I serve God to the best of my abilities, lately I have kind of been in a rut. At revival last week, the first few nights, people were praising God and giving Him worship and just getting caught up in the Spirit, but I couldn't for whatever reason. It really bothered me. I prayed about it, and on the last night, I was finally able to open up and praise and worship too.

turns.text: Even though I'm a christian and I serve God to the best of my abilities, I have been in a rut lately. Last week, during revival, for the first few nights, everyone was praising and participating in worship and just really feeling the Spirit, but I couldn't for whatever reason, and it made me feel bad.
Oh, I know what you mean. I have felt that way. Best thing to do is pray about it and don't be hard on yourself.

dialogs.situation: my husband works out of state

turns.text: So I have been worried about my hubs working out of state so much. But he is always calling and texting me while he's gone.
Well that's a good sign. He knows you probably miss him and he wants you to know he's thinking aboutcha.

dialogs.situation: I overdrafted my bank account.

turns.text: I accidentally overdrafted my bank account and now don't have enough money to pay the fee or my bills. I'm scared of what could happen
I have been there, my friend. But, the good news is, if you aren't typically late for your bills, the utilities companies will often cut you a break.

dialogs.situation: Going up to Pikes Peak in a few weeks for the first time since moving to colorado. Over 14k feet of awesomeness.

turns.text: I'm getting to see Pikes Peak for the first time since moving to Colorado.
oh very cool. I have never been to Colorado. I keep saying i want to go but never do. Maybe for GABF in a couple years. Who knows.

dialogs.situation: My son's preschool was so awesome! I could always count on them to watch him extra when I needed it.

turns.text: My son went to the best preschool. When I needed him to stay late, they always had space for him.
That's good to hear that you care for your son so much. I am sure he will be quite an intelligent child going to the best of the best.

dialogs.situation: I left my old job to better myself and I have my old supervisor to thank for that and for influencing me to branch out.

turns.text: I got a new job and it is so great and I have my old supervisor to thank she's the best.
Why you need to thank her? Is she the one that helped you to find the new job?

dialogs.situation: My wife surprised me with football tickets. I cannot wait to go this season!

turns.text: I was so happy when my wife surprised me with preseason football tickets.
Now that's quite a gift! Are you going to take her to any games as a thank you?

dialogs.situation: In a way I'm scared to show love or get close in a relationship.  I mistook pity and infatuation for love and ended up being miserable.  Am I gonna let that happen again? Hell no

turns.text: I'm scared to show love or get close in a relationship. I once mistook pity and infatuation for love and ended up being miserable. Am I gonna let that happen again? Hell no
Oh that's terrible. I wouldn't shut it all out though, you could miss out on someone great.

dialogs.situation: I can't show my face in the bank ever again.

turns.text: I can't show my face in the bank ever again!
Oh my goodness, what happened? Did they find out you owe money to the local crime families? Those bank employees need to mind their own business, am I right!?

dialogs.situation: Once in JR High, this kid kept throwing apples at birds until he hit one.  He broke a bird's wing, and a teacher and I took care of it until it was better.

turns.text: In JR High, there was this kid who was always throwing apples at birds in the air.
That is horrible! Why would he do something like that??? Did you do anything to stop him?

dialogs.situation: I recently moved over 650 miles away from my hometown and all of my family. I moved here for my husbands work. I have faith that the decision we made was a good one and that he has our best interest at heart. I hope I can believe him when he says this will be good for us and our child.

turns.text: I was scared to move so far away from where i grew up and everything I knew but I've been presently surprised by where I am now. I really love it here.

I think i would like to move eventually, but for now i'm barely learning how to be independent, i started abusing drugs at age 14, now 15 years later im barely starting to "grow up" almost a year sober now. hopefully within the next few years I can experience that!

dialogs.situation: When I went into labor with my youngest child, while I was at the hospital, the baby's heartbeat dropped and they told me that had to take me for an emergency C-Section. It was one of the scariest days of my life. She is a happy and healthy three year old now.

turns.text: When I was in labor with my third child, they were monitoring me regularly in the hospital. The nurse came in and made a face and then called the doctor. In the 2 minutes it took for him to get to my room, my heart dropped and I started to panic. He told me that the baby's heart rate had dropped and they had to preform an emergency C-section right then.
Wow that's really scary! Labor is a really terrifying thing, especially when something like that happens. Did everything turn out okay?

dialogs.situation: When my dog passed I was very emotional

turns.text: I was extremely emotional when my dog passed away
Aww man sorry for your loss, those are the worst, its like losing your best friend. I hope he passed away peacefully and happy.

dialogs.situation: One time during kindergarten, I really needed to go to the restroom. The teacher did not let me so I soiled myself

turns.text: One time during Kindergarten, I peed myself because the teacher did not let me go to the restroom
Oh, well that's awful on a little person! I never liked it when a teacher did that when a child needed to go to the bathroom!

dialogs.situation: My husband was out of town getting our new puppy this weekend and my son stayed overnight with his grandparents. It was just my infant daughter and I for a couple days. I actually kind of felt alone because she goes to bed so early and I had nobody to hang out with or talk to.

turns.text: I always think I want some "me" time, but this weekend my husband and our toddler son were both gone and I actually kind of felt bored and sad!
Yeah it really isn't for everyone, i like my alone time but only for a while. Afterwards i feel alone and wanting to talk to someone.

dialogs.situation: My cats ripped up my brand new couch! I know they're just animals who might know any better but it was a gift from family!

turns.text: Oh boy I am livid! I just got this new couch from my family and my cats have already shredded an entire side of it.
Oh no, that's such an awful thing for them to do. Do your cats often ruin things in the household?

dialogs.situation: I snuck some candy out of my daughter's snack stash.

turns.text: I snuck some candy out of my daughter's snack stash. I feel bad because I had been trying to diet.
I understand that feeling. I've had trouble letting go of those kind of cravings too. Has your diet been going well otherwise?

dialogs.situation: I can't wait for the new season of this is us. That is the best drama out there.

turns.text: I can't wait for the new season of this is us
I've never watched it but i've heard it's really good. Maybe I should give it a try

dialogs.situation: I had a job interview yesterday that I thought went really well, but it didn't. They just emailed me back and told me that I didn't get the job.

turns.text: I had a job interview yesterday that I thought went really well, but it didn't. They just emailed me back and told me that I didn't get the job.
Oh man, I'm sorry to hear that! It doesn't necessarily mean it went bad, though. Maybe they just had a more qualified candidate?

dialogs.situation: The birth of my first child was an amazing thing.  Seeing that little boy being brought into the world left me with such a feeling of happiness and wonder.

turns.text: Watching my first child being born changed my life forever.
I bet! I can't imagine what that must be like to see a bran new life.

dialogs.situation: I can't wait for the final season of game of thrones. IT is the best show ever

turns.text: Games of Thrones is ending. Its Bittersweet
Would you believe I have never seen one episode of that show? How sad that it's ending before I even got to watch it!

dialogs.situation: I can't believe I am still going to court. My ex is the worst.

turns.text: I am still goin to court for child support.

That must be incredibly annoying to have to deal with. To constantly have to battle for what you feel is justified support, and to always be worrying about it in the back of your head. You have to be really resilient to go through that.

dialogs.situation: I feel bad when i lie to my parents, even though I am an adult now

turns.text: I feel bad when i lie to my parents, even though I am an adult now
Yeah, same thing.  They've done so much for me that I just feel bad doing things against them.

dialogs.situation: A time when I felt excited was when I was waiting for Black Friday to purchase a new surround sound system.

turns.text: What did you buy for Black Friday?
I stayed at home - I hate trying to fight over that 50% off pack of pencils at Staples. What did you do?

dialogs.situation: I just put in an application to get a police dog who failed his training.  I know the process to get one is difficult, but I'm crossing my fingers

turns.text: I just put in an application to adopt a police dog who failed his training.
I didn't even realize they let you adopt dogs that failed the training, how did it fail do you know?

dialogs.situation: I can't believe I never knew how well my husband can drawl.

turns.text: I can't believe my husband hid a talent her had from me for 15 years.
That sounds interesting.. What was it? And how did you find out? And why did he hide it! If you don't mind me asking, of course...

dialogs.situation: Working as a nurse, there are many times when I have been worried about my patients. Sometimes when a patient is just starting to get seriously ill, there are not any obvious signs, but my intuition is almost always correct.

turns.text: Intuition can be a key tool to a seasoned nurse.
I suppose, but research and concrete knowledge is more beneficial as it is a very hands on and physical occupation, especially when the health of others are in their hands.

dialogs.situation: I am so happy my ex and I had a clean break. We are still friends.

turns.text: My ex and I broke up but it was nice and clean.
That is great when that can happen but it doesn't always if one or both love a lot! I hope you remain friends.

dialogs.situation: I pirated a few games that I'm really enjoying and feel guilty for not supporting the developers.

turns.text: I pirated a few games recently and I'm enjoying the hell out of them. I sort of feel guilty for not supporting the developers though.
Yeah... that's a tough one. I've pirated stuff before. Kind of how it goes as a poor college student. Maybe when you get older you can pay for things appropriately.

dialogs.situation: When I found out that my ex-wife cheated on me

turns.text: Two years ago, I discovered that my now ex-wife was cheating on me with someone she worked with. When I first discovered it, i was angry and hurt.
I bet you were, I did that to my husband when I was young. I thought it was the solution to relief from abuse.

dialogs.situation: Im trying to get some work done and my dog just wants to play!  I love him to death but he needs to be independent at times too!

turns.text: I'm trying to get some work done and my dog just wants to play!  I love him to death but he needs to learn to be independent at times too!
Pets are great, but they can be a bit needy for attention at times. It is great, but not when you are busy and trying to get things done.

dialogs.situation: I missed the payment for my utility bill but I'm optimistic about the situation. Hopefully they don't cut my electr

turns.text: I missed the payment for my utility bill but I'm optimistic about the situation. Hopefully they don't cut my electr
Ah, so you're in the same boat as me? I can understand how that goes. Electricity is so necessary nowadays, too.

dialogs.situation: At work, my coworker are suprised how confident I am in beeing able to achieve difficult taks.

turns.text: At work, my coworker are suprised how confident I am in being able to achieve difficult taks.
That's great! It's important to have confidence in yourself and your abilities at work to be successful. It's a good example to set for your coworkers too!

dialogs.situation: I used to be ashamed that I was fat.  So I worked out and got ripped and feel better about myself

turns.text: When I was a kid I was fat and ashamed about it.  So I worked out and got ripped and now I feel better about myself
That is nice. You must have a nice body and I am glad that you feel better about yourself.

dialogs.situation: I finished my first 60 mile running week this Sunday.  It felt really great to just sit around doing nothing after a long week of exercise.

turns.text: This week, I ran 60 miles in total.  After I finished up my long run on Sunday I just sat around for the rest of the day.
i don't blame you for siting around all day. 60 miles, I do't think i walk that in year

dialogs.situation: I submitted a form to receive notifications for my banking app. I don't know why but the waiting got me feeling antsy..

turns.text: I submitted a form to receive notifications for my banking app. I don't know why but the waiting got me feeling antsy.."
It's always a pain waiting to hear back from a bank.  I always think something's gonna go wrong.

dialogs.situation: I went to the circus one time. I saw some elephants and also played some games.

turns.text: Have you been to a circus?
I have.  It was a long time ago.  I had a lot of fun watching it with my daughter but I always feel sad for the animals, until I found out that the circus I went to helps injured animals have a home.

dialogs.situation: Anytime I see a mall, I get nostalgic about all the times going there to play in the arcade.  Good Ole' Days.

turns.text: Whenever I drive past malls, I always get nostalgic about all the times going there as a kid to play in the arcade.
I can relate. I wish I still enjoyed them as much as I did way back then. Now I'm either out of place of it's a ghost town.

dialogs.situation: We recently had some really bad storms. I really thought it was going to hail on my brand new car,

turns.text: Bought a new car a few months back. Couple nights ago we had a big storm roll through. I thought for sure it was going to hail all over my new car.

oh man. i hate that. we've had some pretty nasty storms come through Austin in the last few months and luckily i've managed to be in some random parking garage out shopping or eating when they've rolled through.

dialogs.situation: I am nervous about going to law school soon

turns.text: I will be starting Law School in January.
That's seriously impressive. Sounds like a lot of work, though. Hope it all works out. Are you nervous?

dialogs.situation: I am going zip-lining in Colorado in a week.  There is only one problem  I am really scared of heights!

turns.text: I am going zip-lining in Colorado in a week. There is only one problem I am really scared of heights!
wow .. so am i .. i could not imagine doing that. its great that you are going to do it though

dialogs.situation: My manager is wasting my time with stuff that is not related with work. I can not make progress in my work.

turns.text: My manager is wasting my time with stuff that is not related with work. I can not make progress in my work.
I just cannot understand why people won't do their job properly, I had to cut my lunch break in order to do more work

dialogs.situation: I have anxiety so I get terrible panick attacks sometimes.

turns.text: I have bad panic attacks about death after experiencing so much of it the past year
I am so sorry to hear that. I assume lots of folks close to you have entered eternity lately?

dialogs.situation: I would still take a bullet for my ex and her family.  Even though she blocked me on Facebook.  Call me a sucker but that girl was my first love and she gave me so much I wouldn't be here today if it wasn't for her

turns.text: I'd still take a bullet for my ex and her family. Even though she blocked me on Facebook. Call me a sucker but that girl was my first love and she gave me so much I wouldn't be here today if it wasn't for her

Definitely not a sucker! If she helped you a lot and you wouldn't be here without her, then YES! Why did she block you? Were you bad to her? Sounds familiar to what has happened between me and a few...I was there for them but had enough and I have had to cuit them out too-

dialogs.situation: The first time I donated blood, I instantly regretted signing up. I was so nervous of the big needle, but when I finally donated it was totally nothing.

turns.text: So the first time I ever went to donate blood, after I signed up I instantly regretted it. I was soo worried about that big needle, and when it finally came time? It wasn't even a big deal, it was soo easy.
Everything is harder until we do it. And am proud of you for donating blood. It is one of the good habit of this human race i would say.

dialogs.situation: Every time I was the Phantom Menace, I get so mad. What was George Lucas thinking?!

turns.text: I'm so made at George Lucas. How could he think something like the Phantom Menace would be a good idea for a movie!
it made him a ton of money so i think thats all that mattered to him at that point cause i agree it was crap.

dialogs.situation: I tripped over my foot and landed face first in front of a group of hot jocks. I am so embarrassed!

turns.text: I tripped over my foot and landed face first in front of a group of hot jocks. I am so embarrassed!

that must have been so painful, don't get embarrassed it happens to everyone, people fart in public transports, people fall and rip their jeans, people cry over stupid things, it's a totally normal thing

dialogs.situation: One of my roommates left without cleaning his room and the school charged me and the other two roommates 100$

turns.text: One of my roommates left without cleaning his room and the school charged me and my roommates 100$ each
That's extremely frustrating! What were they expecting you to do? It's not your fault your roommate left it trashed.

dialogs.situation: I was singing in the shower.

turns.text: This morning I woke up and I was in such a good mood that I just started singing in the shower.
That's awesome!  I wish I could wake up that way every morning.  Did something specific make you feel that way?

dialogs.situation: I cheated on my math test yesterday. Felt kinda bad about it.

turns.text: I cheated on my math test today.
While I understand the motives behind your deception, I must caution that it may catch up with you one day. How did you do it?

dialogs.situation: I took out the trash and the dumpster just smells vile. It made me almost throw up it was so gross this time.

turns.text: So usually I like taking out the trash because it makes you seem useful but it's really easy. Today though I almost threw up, the dumpster was absolutely vile and I have no idea why.
I know what you mean.  Its an easy chore, but sometimes that smell is gross.  Its that sweet smell. yuck

dialogs.situation: I just moved to a new city for work. I do not know anyone that lives here.

turns.text: I just moved to a new city for work. I do not know anyone that lives here.
You should put yourself out there and meet some new people.  Just start exploring the city and you are bound to meet others!

dialogs.situation: While I didn't know him personally, I was quite distressed to hear of the passing of Anthony Bourdain. That a man with such talent who has given so much joy to so many people, should feel he has to take his life is just soul-destroying.

turns.text: I was quite distressed to hear of the passing of Anthony Bourdain. That someone who has given so much joy to a huge number of people should take his own life is just awful.
I know!  I was just watching his show on Netflix!  So sad, especially since he had a little girl he is leaving behind.

dialogs.situation: I was looking through my old snapchats at videos of my son.  It's fun, but at the same time it is tough to watch.

turns.text: I like the feature on snapchat that shows you videos you took a year or two ago.
Yeah, that feature is pretty nifty. Makes it so you don't have to keep hardcopy photo albums anymore!

dialogs.situation: I was so sad when my pet hamster died recently. We were best friends and I miss him so much. I cry every day and think about all the good times we had together.

turns.text: I was so sad when my hamster died recently due to a heart attack. Maybe I shouldn't have fed him so many cheetos. I cry every day thinking about him.
Oh I am so sorry. It's OK, it probably wasn't the cheetos that got him - rodents just don't have a long lifespan. I hope you feel better.

dialogs.situation: Whenever my son is going to stay with his grandparents overnight I get really excited for a short break. As soon as he's gone I almost feel lost and bored! It's always nice when he comes back home and we snuggle and I can just play toys with him. Him being home with me makes everything right in the world.

turns.text: Being a mom is such a struggle sometimes. On the one hand I really enjoy the break I get when my son stays with his grandparents. On the other I always feel a bit off kilter when he's not home with me.
I totally understand what you mean. Peace and quiet is nice but I bet you miss your son when he is gone?

dialogs.situation: I took my boots off after a long day of working outside and MAN, the smell!

turns.text: I worked all day in the sun and didn't put socks on before putting my boots on. Boy did I regret that later in the day when I took them off!
Oh man, did you put your socks on after you put your boots on? That must of been awkward getting your socks dirty.

dialogs.situation: We went with our friends to a local lagoon. There are huge cliffs to jump off of. They dared me to jump off of the highest one.

turns.text: We went to the lagoon a few weeks ago. My friends dared me to jump off of the highest cliff into the water.
Oh wow.  Terrifying.  All I think of is Johnny Erricson Tada, who broke her neck in that situation. Did you do it?

dialogs.situation: I always make sure I have plenty of food when going on long trips

turns.text: I always like making sure I am ready for anything! I always pack a ton of food when I am on long car rides.
I used to do the same thing when I went on long trips.  I would also bring extra things like blankets if it was winter.

dialogs.situation: My son is going back to college for his Junior year and we have saved to make sure we have all his financial needs ready.

turns.text: My son is in college and about to return for his Junior year. We have made sure to put back ample saving to take care of his financial needs.
Oh, wow, I wish my parents had done that! It would have saved me from the mountain of debt I have now

dialogs.situation: waiting at the dmv

turns.text: I had to get my license renewed and I had to wait over an hour at the DMV.
The DMV really should be better by now. Did you get a chance to do anything during the wait?

dialogs.situation: Two of my co-workers got into a huge fight in a meeting.  I was so ashamed by their abnormal behavior.

turns.text: Two co-workers got into a verbal sparring match during a meeting.  It was so shameful, ugh.
That's not something that should be done in a meeting. If they're going to argue it should be done in private.

dialogs.situation: I just celebrated 25 years at my job.

turns.text: I just celebrated 25 years at my job.

I mean did they reward your 25 years of service at your job by giving you a present or throwing you a party. It's pretty common for workers when they reach such a milestone to be recognized in such a way.

dialogs.situation: My roommate cooked some foul smelling meat in our apartment. I almost puked.

turns.text: My roommate cooked some really foul smelling meat last night, I had to leave or I was going to puke.
Ugh my neighbors do that sometimes. It's the worst! I think some things should not be allowed to be cooked unless you live alone.

dialogs.situation: taking a new cbd oil

turns.text: i have been taking cbd oil for sometime and it works wonders , recently they started selling locally but im not sure i want to try it just yet
I've actually heard a little bit about CBD oil from my sister, but I never did any research myself or try it out.

dialogs.situation: My coworker went into labor, and we somehow all brought a baby into the world

turns.text: My coworker went into labor, and we somehow all brought a baby into the world

That's awesome! And crazy... And scary... and awesome all at once! You must kinda feel accomplished though, huh? Good to hear that everyone is happy and healthy. Kind of weird how you all will have that special, unique bond for the rest of your lives, now.

dialogs.situation: Over the years I've figured out the best way to love and myself is to work at some new skill everyday and become the best at it until haters become fans

turns.text: I've learned that to be the best version of myself means working at a skill striving to be the the best at it until haters become fans
I absolutely agree with that mind set! Pick something you're passionate about and do it with passion!

dialogs.situation: So I was coming home last night.. kinda late.  It was really dark and then a duck scared me to death.

turns.text: So I was coming home last night kinda late and It was really dark outside my house..
There are some apps that allow a friend to follow your progress as you home. Will that make you feel safer?

dialogs.situation: I'm working on being happier on a day to day basis.

turns.text: I'm trying to overcome some depressive episodes that I've been having.
I'm sorry you're having trouble :(  Is there anyone you can talk to about it?

dialogs.situation: I found the baby book I made for my daughter when she was born. She's 21 now. It was nice to read all those things about her as a baby.

turns.text: I recently found the baby book I made for my baby when she was born... she just turned 21.
Congratulations on the good raising of the kid! I bet you were just flooded with all kinds of memories.

dialogs.situation: My younger sister is constantly going to concert after concert, travelling across the country. It's not that I want to go to so many concerts--I just wish I had all the money she has to be able to afford it!

turns.text: My little sister has been going all across the country this summer, spending lots of time on money on pop concert after pop concert.
Interesting. How do you feel about it? Do you find it fun and interesting, or wish she were more responsible with her money?

dialogs.situation: My younger brother got an amazing job.

turns.text: I can't believe my younger brother makes more money than i do.
Well, at least you dont have to worry about him begin ok in life. He can take care of himself, now. You can give him tips on making better choices with his money

dialogs.situation: When I first found out "Fight Club" was originally a short story I was surprised at how intricate and creative of a plot the directors were able to weave out into a movie.

turns.text: I was surprised at how creative and fleshed out the "Fight Club" characters were on screen...especially after finding out the script was originally a vague short story.
Oh man, Fight Club is a great movie! I just recently saw it myself and was really surprised too.

dialogs.situation: I am so tired of my friends flaking on plans. They are so unreliable

turns.text: My friends are always flaking on me

That's terrible. Sometimes it's hard to know who your real friends are, and it takes repeated attempts to hang out with them, only to have them bail on you, to realize that you're not valued by them. I say cut your ties sooner rather than later. Life's too short.

dialogs.situation: Going out today to learn a new route for my job and hoping I don't get lost.

turns.text: Going out today to learn a new route for my job and I'm hoping that I don't get lost.
Are you able to learn the route first before you have to take it for your job or are they kind of just throwing you into it?

dialogs.situation: I have been faithful to my long time girlfriend. I would never cheat on her

turns.text: I have a girlfriend, and I would never cheat on her
That is an amazing thing. Being cheated on is one of the worst things that can happen when ones enters a bond like a relationship.

dialogs.situation: I'm going to drive a truck. Never driven a car that big before.

turns.text: I'm going to drive a truck. Never driven a car that big before.

I'm sorry, but I don't envy you... I've always just driven a little sedan. I'm an alright driver, but if I had to drive something bigger, I'd be nervous, too. Too easy for me to make mistakes. I kind of dread the day where I'll have to drive a big Uhaul truck. I hope things go well for you, though.

dialogs.situation: I was in need of money and my friend agreed to lend me the amount I needed

turns.text: I had an emergency and needed cash. I am glad that that my friend agreed to lend me
I've been in the same predicament. My lease was coming up and I needed a deposit for a new apartment and my friend was able to help me out.

dialogs.situation: I am so proud of my husband.  He just got a huge promotion at his work this week.

turns.text: I am so proud of my husband.  He just got a huge promotion at his work this week!
Wow getting a promotion is always an awesome thing. You guys must be so happy! Will you guys be celebrating this success?

dialogs.situation: My friend just purchased a new BMW after getting a large bonus!  I want his cor so bad it hurts!

turns.text: My friend just purchased a new BMW after getting a large bonus! I want his cor so bad it hurts!
That was some bonus. If you go to I think South carolina, they have a factory somewhere there and they are cheaper I think

dialogs.situation: My really good vaccuum cleaner broke last week! I was so bummed, but then my brother in law offered to fix it for me and I am so happy he did.

turns.text: My really good vaccuum cleaner broke last week! I was so bummed, but then my brother in law offered to fix it for me and I am so happy he did.
Oh! Mine broke too this past weekend but I got a new one as it was just a cheap dirt devil. I am glad yours is fixed!

dialogs.situation: I really like my friend's Chanel bag, but I would never spend that much money on an accessory

turns.text: I really like my friend's Chanel bag, but I would never spend that much money on an accessory
Maybe she will let you borrow it. Or maybe if she gets a new one she will give it to you.

dialogs.situation: I went into my final exams feeling great. With my emotion of feeling great i did the same for my exams.

turns.text: So i love feeling great when i walk into exams because i actually studied.
I know how that goes.  It can be hard to stay on track at the end of the semester.

dialogs.situation: Yesterday I felt like I am really an alright human being.

turns.text: Sometimes I feel like I am really an alright person.
What I do is to write all the good things I did within the week, I think you should do the same

dialogs.situation: My best friend from highschool and I pulled out our old year books the other day.  We had so much fun telling stories about all of the stupid things we did back then.

turns.text: My best friend from high school and I pulled out our old year books the other day.
Thats awesome! I was actually looking for mine the other day.  Were you looking up anyone in particular or just for fun?

dialogs.situation: I was trusting of my roommate and found out she was going through my stuff. I set a trap to figure it out.

turns.text: I lived with this girl once and I trusted her. Found out I never should have.
Oh, sorry to hear that man. Yeah girls are hard to trust these days. What's up with that?

dialogs.situation: I was watching professional bowling the other day. I was amazed at how good the players are. They make getting strikes look so easy!

turns.text: I was recently watching professional bowling and I was struck by how good the players are. They make getting strikes look so easy!
I know! Then you get to the bowling alley, try to do what they do, end up getting 3 gutter balls in a row, and fall flat on your butt to boot!

dialogs.situation: im envious of my friends who are at the park right now while im stuck inside

turns.text: im envious of my friends who are at the park right now while im stuck inside
Oh I can understand that! I would also like to be outside; it looks like such a beautiful day! At least it is almost the weekend!

dialogs.situation: My daughters little dog passed away about 4 months ago.  She was only 6 years old, but had an autoimmune disease and it started attacking her red blood cells.

turns.text: My daughters little dog passed away about 4 months ago, it really shook all of us.
i am so sorry for you.  I know what a crushing experience the passing of a beloved pet can be.  You must be very sad.

dialogs.situation: I have my big pilot certification test coming up. I am so worried I forget all the answers to the test. I don't know what I would do if I don't pass!

turns.text: My pilot certification test is coming up next week. I am so nervous I won't remember all the answers. I will be devastated if I flunk the test.
Dang, there's a lot of strategies to fight that thought, I'm assuming. As they say an ounce of preparation is worth more than a pound of cure

dialogs.situation: I'm jealous of my neighbor's new pool, it looks like they are having a blast with it.

turns.text: I'm jealous of my neighbor's new pool, it looks like they are having a blast with it.
Hmmm. Have you asked to go over for a dip? He never said you couldn't come over and partake in the fun!

dialogs.situation: I felt disgusted when  was watching a TV program last night. The presenter was eating live squid.

turns.text: I was watching a show last night and the guy ate a live squid!
There is not enough money to get me to do that. My sister likes those kind of shows and I watch with her sometimes.

dialogs.situation: When I think of the future, I am very positive

turns.text: When I think of the future, I am very positive.
That's good! I think a lot of older people are pessimistic about the future, but I grew up on technology and am excited to see what new stuff comes out.

dialogs.situation: I was so scared of tornadoes growing up -- whenever tornado warnings happened, I was extremely frightened!

turns.text: As a kid, I was SO frightened any time there was a tornado warning. Not sure if it was the Wizard of Oz effect or what -- I just remember being frozen with fear.
Oh, wow! My son was terrified of tornadoes because of that darn movie, and we don't really even get tornadoes where we live! Did you ever live through a tornado?

dialogs.situation: Well, I've finally found my perfect restaurant/grocery store. I stopped by the other day and bought some food and couldn't have been more pleased with everything there!

turns.text: I just enjoyed grocery shopping for the first time in a very long time. I've found my perfect restaurant/store and spent a very happy 40 mins or so wandering around it.
That's great! Did you get anything you are especially excited about? It's a restaurant and a store?

dialogs.situation: I already have one cat and he's older. (14) I work long hours and I've thought about getting him another kitten to have and spend time with but I'm not sure.

turns.text: Do you have any animals? I have one but have been thinking about getting another.
yep i have a cat. he's really sweet, and totally worth it. but it all depends on what kind of animal you get

dialogs.situation: I really like summer time and going to the beach

turns.text: I really like summer time and going to the beach
I do too! Love going out and swimming in the ocean. Why do you like going?

dialogs.situation: I have a friend that is very helpful. When never I need him, he is here to help.

turns.text: I have a friend that is very helpful. When never I need him, he is here to help.
Awe, that is a very good friend to have. You are very lucky to have a friend like that. Hopefully you are there for him too. :)

dialogs.situation: My next door neighbor is so inconsiderate.  They let their dog go to the bathroom in my yard.

turns.text: Ugghhh!  My neighbor's dog has gone to the bathroom in my yard again!!
I have four dogs.  I am probably guilty of this crime.  I would just throw it back over.

dialogs.situation: Sometimes when I am out in public, my son throws a tantrum.  Every now and then he uses curse words and he is only 5!

turns.text: Sometimes when I am out in public, my son throws a tantrum.
Oh yeah I am right there with you, I just don't even go out anymore if I can help it! How old is yours? Mines 2 1/2

dialogs.situation: I farted in front of a pretty girl

turns.text: Hi I was on the train yesterday and accidentally farted in front of a pretty girl
That is terrible, is it someone you like? or did you not even know her?  I don't know which is worse.

dialogs.situation: When I stayed up all night taking care of my daughter because she was teething, and comforted her.

turns.text: My daughter was up all night teething, and I made sure to give her extra cuddles to comfort her.
Oh that is a tough period. Poor baby! But with mammas love everything is alright. You are such a great mother!

dialogs.situation: One my coworkers has been showing up late everyday for almost a month. It's making a lot more work for me.

turns.text: One of my coworker's has been over 30 minutes late everyday for almost a month now. It's driving me crazy, and giving me so much more work to do.
Aw dang, that must really be pain for you. Have you talked with anyone else about this? I'm sure other people are having problems with this coworker also .

dialogs.situation: When I went back to my home town and drove to the towns annual fair, it hasn't changed much so it felt like i went back to my childhood.

turns.text: I recently drove back to my hometown and went to the towns fair, it felt so nice reliving my childhood.
That's awesome, I went to visit my parents and my hometown last month, it is a great feeling.  How was the fair?

dialogs.situation: It's really stormy right now. I keep glancing outside my window, hoping it doesn't get worse. I sure wouldn't like to see a tornado.

turns.text: It's raining really loud! I keep looking outside hoping it doesn't get much worse. We're under a tornado watch right now.
Oh geez, stay safe!  Tornadoes are one of those weird things for me.  They sort of scare me but before they happen and its raining yet still outside I love going out to see whats happening.

dialogs.situation: I had a crazy week with 4 big events and I'm so happy to be at home relaxing in the air conditioning today.

turns.text: I had a crazy week with 4 big events and I'm so happy to be at home relaxing in the air conditioning today. My dogs are happy too!
Air conditioning is very nice. My dogs love the outdoors but they want AC after a good, long walk!

dialogs.situation: My mom came to visit in March for a couple of weeks. She helped out a lot around here and then she had to leave and go home miles away.

turns.text: I really liked having my mom here. She helped with the kids but then when she left I missed it.
I can imagine! That extra set of hands -- and a person you can *trust* -- that's the best!

dialogs.situation: I was in the grocery store and my 3 year old blurted out, "Mommy, why is that lady so round?" I was mortified.

turns.text: I was in the grocery store and my 3 year old blurted out, "Mommy, why is that lady so round?" I was mortified.
Oh man, kids can be terrible about things like that.  They just have no filter.  What did you do?

dialogs.situation: Going to my son's first pee-wee football game tomorrow!

turns.text: Going to my son's first pee-wee football game tomorrow!
That sounds like fun! My son does basketball. I bet he looks tough in his helmet and football gear.

dialogs.situation: I ordered a gift for a friend and it says it was delivered but I never received it. Now the company says it takes 14 days for a refund.

turns.text: I ordered a gift for a friend and it says it was delivered but I never received it. Now the company says it takes 14 days for a refund
Don't you hate how "customer service" has no service anymore?  Did you get the refund at least?

dialogs.situation: I had to write a essay for class. Luckily it was on a topic i love.

turns.text: I had to write a essay for class. Luckily it was on a topic i love.
Those are the most fun sorts of essays to write - and the easiest.  How do you think you did?

dialogs.situation: I totally forgot my brother's wife name the other night at dinner, I was pretty embarrassed.

turns.text: I totally forgot my brother's wife name the other night at dinner, I was pretty embarrassed.
Oh no! I'm really bad about that, too. Did you ask someone or try to play it off?

dialogs.situation: I worked all day and came home to the whole house a wreck.  My husband had the whole month off and he didn't clean one bit of the house or make dinner.

turns.text: I worked all day and came home to the whole house a wreck. My husband had the whole month off and he didn't clean one bit of the house or make dinner.
I would be disappointed in him if I were you.  He sounds like a real low life.  Maybe you should kick that bum to the curb.

dialogs.situation: A couple weeks ago I went and got a free smoothie at Tropical Smoothie. I love their smoothies.

turns.text: A couple weeks ago, I went and got a free smoothie at Tropical Smoothie. I love their smoothies.
OH! I do too! They are so healthy and you can get them without any sugar too!

dialogs.situation: I am so mad at my cable company!  My internet and TV keeps going out and their technicians are incompetant!

turns.text: I am so mad at my cable company!  My internet and TV keeps going out and their technicians are incompetent!
I am having a similar issue.  You shouldn’t have to pay for a service they aren’t providing.

dialogs.situation: I just won $300 dollars on a scratch off ticket. It feel really good. I can pay some bills with it.

turns.text: I just won $300 dollars on a scratch off ticket. It feel really good. I can pay some bills with it.
That is wonderful news. That is a lot of money to win. I am happy for you.

dialogs.situation: School is starting back and I get a break from the kids.

turns.text: I get a break from the kids soon.
Would you like me to take them? :) I like kids, sometimes! I totally understand needing a break

dialogs.situation: I got turned down for a job I really wanted.  I'd worked extremely hard to put myself in a position to have a decent chance of getting it, and I thought I interviewed really well.  But when I found out someone else got the job I was extremely disappointed and demoralized.

turns.text: I got turned down for a job I really wanted.
Ugh, sorry! You must be disappointed. But remember if the door doesn't open, it probably wasn't yours. There's something else in store for you!

dialogs.situation: I forgot about a glass of tea outside the other night and when I went to get it today it was full of bugs!

turns.text: The othern ight I was having tea outside and forgot my glass outside all night!
That kind of stinks. Sorry to hear that! Well, at least there are worst things to forget outside.. Maybe this is an easy learning lesson!

dialogs.situation: My girls had to take biology last year.  They dissected a frog and I could not stay in the room, that thing was gross.

turns.text: My girls had to take biology last year - they dissected a frog.
I remember that. A lot of people were grossed out and didn't want to do it. Were your girls one of them?

dialogs.situation: I gave my son my debit card to go get him and his friends some pizza. I know he won't abuse the priveledge.

turns.text: My son and his friends wanted to go get pizza tonight so I gave him my debit card.
You must really trust your son. That's wonderful that your son is responsible enough that you can trust him with your debit card.

dialogs.situation: when I was little and moved into a new home I saw lights moving around in my closet one night when I went to bed. I thought it was my brother messing with but no one was around.

turns.text: Have you ever think you've seen a ghost?
I have seen things I can't explain. I didn't stick around to ask, I ran. But afterwards I was thinking it was a ghost.

dialogs.situation: I'm neverious about going to work on Monday. I have a meeting with my boss but I don't know what it's about.

turns.text: I'm nervous about going to work on Monday. I have a meeting with my boss but I don't know what it's about Can you give me any advice?

I am bad with anxiety too but if you haven't done anything wrong then all you can do is try to have some self confidence and prepare for the worst and HOPE for the best. You never know- you could be getting a raise!

dialogs.situation: When my friend was having some financial issues, I loaned her some money.

turns.text: I loaned my friend some money when she was having financial troubles.
That's really kind of you. Not everyone can or will do that. I do hope she pays you back!

dialogs.situation: My little cousin was visiting last weekend and he kept screaming for Kraft Dinner for supper. I made a delicious chicken dinner but his mom apparently always give him what he wants.

turns.text: My younger 5 your old cousin was visiting last weekend for dinner and he kept crying to his mom to make him Kraft Dinner.
Kids are sweet. They will do everything to get what they want. So, did her mom made him Kraft Dinner eventually?

dialogs.situation: I lost my car keys. I'm furious with myself.

turns.text: I lost my car keys. I'm such a fool!

Happens to everybody. My girlfriend, who is the smartest person I know, has had to make 5 duplicates of her car keys because she's locked herself out so much. She's so forgetful because she's so efficient and on top of everything else important, that sometimes she misses the small things. Maybe that's true in your case, too!

dialogs.situation: Someone close to me passed away recently in a freak car accident. He was young and doing great academically. It hurts so much.

turns.text: A first cousin of mine who was on his way to obtaining his PHD was suddenly killed in a car accident caused by someone who was driving recklessly. It hurts my heart so deeply.
im sorry to hear that, my child hood friend died in a car crash , and it hurt me for a really long time, i still have dreams about him through out the years

dialogs.situation: I am scared about my upcoming job interview, I have not interviewed in years

turns.text: I am scared about my upcoming job interview, I have not interviewed in years
It's really easy if you think of it as a relative you don't really want to talk to, polite and to the point

dialogs.situation: Half of my family didn't show up for my kids 6th birthday, it was upsetting to say the least. She was looking forward to seeing them.

turns.text: My daughters 6th birthday was recently, unfortunately her mothers side of the family didn't show up, even though they all rsvp'd
Too bad for them! My sons 6th birthday was just last week, and we had a fun party. There so much easier to please when their little lol.

dialogs.situation: my baby is sleeping

turns.text: my baby is sleeping. it's so peaceful and quiet in this house
I guess it makes you appreciate things you used to take for granted, lol. But it doesn't last forever and is worth it.

dialogs.situation: I am afraid of the upcoming economic crisis in the USA

turns.text: I am afraid of the upcoming economic crisis in the USA.It will affect all of us.
I almost don't want to talk about it, you know? Are you doing anything to try to move from a place of fear to one of preparation or opportunity?

dialogs.situation: I ran across a snake it our backyard.  I shocked me.

turns.text: I stepped on a snake in our backyard. I screamed so loud!
What kind of snake was it? You know my mom is terrified of all snakes even the ones that aren't poisonous.

dialogs.situation: I was walking in an outdoor mall area last weekend and tripped in front of a bunch of people.  I didn't hurt anything, but I was definitely red in the face.

turns.text: I was walking in an outdoor mall area last weekend and tripped in front of a bunch of people. I didn't hurt anything, but I was definitely red in the face.
Oh, it happens to the best of us. I have done the same a gazillion times! It doesn't get any better or funnier, lol.

dialogs.situation: I love to travel, but I hate flying. Last time I took a flight, I was nervous and didn't want to go.

turns.text: I was super nervous about getting on my flight to Peru last week.
That is scary! I've never flown before, the only time I have ever been on a plane was when I went skydiving.

dialogs.situation: I recently applied for a job after being out of the workforce for 13 years.  I'm hoping I get it!

turns.text: I recently applied for a job after being out of the workforce for 13 years!
Congratulations!!! That can be both exciting and terrifying? Where are you on that spectrum? ;-)

dialogs.situation: My mom makes me babysit my nephew all the time. I am sick of it. He is a brat.

turns.text: My mom makes me babysit my nephew all the time.
I would not want to be in your position it's ok to help but all the time it can be dreadful.

dialogs.situation: TSA made me pull down my pants at the airport yesterday.

turns.text: TSA made me pull down my pants in front of everybody at the airport yesterday. They thought I was a bomb threat.
Oh dang, that really sucks. I can't believe TSA would go that far, it must've been super embarrassing.

dialogs.situation: I am ready to start renovating the rest of my house.

turns.text: I am ready to start renovating the rest of my house.
OOO I love doing that, but not so much the upheaval in the midst of it.  What room are you going to be working on?

dialogs.situation: When I'm in the grocery store and everyone is in a rush. They are rude and bump into you.

turns.text: It seems like today everyone in the grocery store was in such a rush. Hurrying around!
Yeah, that can be annoying especially in Walmart since so many people go there. It stresses you out when you don't need it to.

dialogs.situation: I scrapbook and am years behind.  I am a stay at home mom, my son just started all day school, so I plan to scrapbook.

turns.text: I scrapbook pictures of my son and I am a few years behind!
Oh, such fun!  Do you have all the Stamp It Up scrapbooking things I hear so much about? I bet it can be hard to keep it updated! They grow so fast!

dialogs.situation: I can't stop thinking about my dog that died a year ago this week.

turns.text: I can't stop thinking about my dog that died a year ago this week.
Aw I am so sorry to hear of your dogs passing. It's hard to lose a pet. We just lost our cat this year.

dialogs.situation: I miss the time when I was young and I can do a lot of sport.

turns.text: I miss the time when I was young and I can do a lot of sport.
I hear you! How old are you? As we get older, all kinds of stuff doesn't work the same

dialogs.situation: I hate parents that shelter their kids by censoring every TV show, movie, video game, or musician.  Of course it's one thing to let a 5-year-old watch "Silence of the Lambs"; but do you really expect to raise the next Einstein by blinding a kid to reality? By the time he's 13 he or she's gonna have some serious repression issues and grow up to be a psycho

turns.text: I hate parents that censor every TV show, movie, video game, or song on the radio. Of course it's one thing to let a 5-year-old watch "Silence of the Lambs"; but do you really expect to raise the next Einstein by blinding him to the real world? By the time he's 13 he or she's gonna have some serious repression issues and grow up to be a weirdo
I agree, such helicopter parents exercise far too much control on their kids, doing more harm than good in the long run.

dialogs.situation: School for my kids started this past Thursday. I actually had all of their supplies and plenty of new clothes in time.

turns.text: School for my kids started again this past Thursday.
How was that? Were you excited for some more quiet and for them to get back on a schedule? Or are you sad that it shows that they're getting older?

dialogs.situation: I ran out of gas while traveling across state and had no idea where I was.

turns.text: I once ran out of gas in my car while traveling across state. I had no idea where I was at the time. It was pretty scary.
I've done that before.. it gets super dark on the highways and you don't realize it till you don't have any lights shining.

dialogs.situation: My son finally passed his swim class.

turns.text: After having to retake the class twice, my son finally passed his swimming test and can move on to the next level!
Thats awesome! Im glad you persisted because that is so important these days, not being able to swim is a real danger!

dialogs.situation: Me and a few friends got offered to go to this party off campus. It seemed really sketchy but it turned out fine and it was a lot of fun.

turns.text: In freshman year of college, me and some friends got invited to this really sketchy party and we were really hesitant about going.
Interesting, sounds like a metal band concert I went to where people were a bit goth. Did you go?

dialogs.situation: He that finds  wife finds a good thing!

turns.text: Never regretted it one bit ,amidst the spate of marital problems these days
Good for you. Don't live with regrets. Learn from mistakes and move on.

dialogs.situation: My boyfriend is going out with a bunch of people I don't know tonight. But I trust him that he will be a good boy.

turns.text: My boyfriend is going out with a bunch of people I don't know tonight. But I trust him that he will be a good boy.
Well I'm sure he will be, most guys are. I'd never get to  do anything if my girlfriend didn't trust me.

dialogs.situation: I feel like my boss is a cool guy. I think he's actually looking out for my best interest.

turns.text: Do you think your friends are looking out for you?
I only have a couple really good friends who are always there for me. The rest of my friends don't really care about me that much.

dialogs.situation: when I was stuck on the side of the road

turns.text: I was stuck on the side of the road when I saw a police officer ride by he slowed down and came back to help me
Yikes, that's a scary situation to be in. I'm glad the officer was able to help you.

dialogs.situation: I have a big test next week. I plan on getting a really high grade. I know the material really well.

turns.text: I have a big test next week. I should be able score high. I know the material really well.
Thats great news.  Did you have to study or is this an area you are already familiar with?

dialogs.situation: I went to the optometrist, and my prescription got strong. She warned me about being at risk for losing my vision.

turns.text: I went to the optometrist, and my prescription got strong. She warned me about being at risk for losing my vision.
That's not good. I know my eyes hurt when staring at the bright white screen on computers . So I change them to a darker color when possible.

dialogs.situation: Sometimes I feel like I'm alone for no reason

turns.text: I've been processing what being lonely feels like, because I want to be able to have fun by myself sometimes
I think that's a good idea so you aren't always dependent on others to have fun and just enjoy time to yourself.

dialogs.situation: I was watching Olympic alpine skiing on TV. I was so amazed at the skill of the skiiers. They must have trained so hard.

turns.text: The other day I was watching alpine skiing on TV. I am amazed at their skills.
Yeah I love watching them ski during the Olympics. It takes a lot of hard work.  Have you ever skied?

dialogs.situation: I am trusting of my girlfriend, we have been dating almost 3 years not

turns.text: I am trusting of my girlfriend, we have been dating almost 3 years now
that's good that you trust her! It's hard to have a relationship if you don't have trust

dialogs.situation: i was shocked when i got the day off

turns.text: i was shocked when i got the day off
That's awesome!  Did you request it and just weren't expecting it or did you just get a random day off?

dialogs.situation: I have to go to court soon for a drunk driving incident and I am so scared. What if I have to go to jail?

turns.text: I have to go to court soon for a drunk driving incident and I am so scared. What if I have to go to jail?
You usually don't get that much jail time for drunk driving if it is your first incident. It shouldn't be so bad, but hopefully it will make you more cautious in the future.

dialogs.situation: Yesterday at work during lunch I noticed my shirt was inside out. Everyone must of seen and saw how rediculous I looked with it inside out.

turns.text: Yesterday at work during lunch I noticed my shirt was inside out.
Who hasn't that happened to before! If it took you that long to notice, I bet no one else noticed. Were you able to fix it later?

dialogs.situation: i was happy when i saw lebron james go to the lakers

turns.text: i was happy when i saw lebron james go to the lakers
That is awesome!  He is such an amazing athlete!  Any team that has him is lucky!

dialogs.situation: Got on the scale today. Lost 15 pounds

turns.text: Got on the scale this morning. Thanks to work stress I lost 15 pounds.
Oh man! I wish work stress would make me lose weight lol. I gain! Are you looking for a new job?

dialogs.situation: I forgot my brothers birthday. I tried to make it up by calling the next day but he knew I forgot.

turns.text: I forgot my brothers birthday and I tried to cover it up but he knew. I called him the next day but it wasn't the same.
Oh no! I hate when that happens. Happens to me all the time. Did he forgive you?

dialogs.situation: I watched a baseball game last night and it made me think of all the times my father and I would goto games growing up. He passed away over the winter so this is the first baseball season not watching games with him.

turns.text: My father passed away over the winter and we are huge baseball fans. This is the first season not watching games with him.
Oh my goodness that is so sad, I am sorry to hear about your father. Are you handling him being gone okay?

dialogs.situation: My turtle ran away yesterday. I am so sad.

turns.text: My turtle that I had for 30 years ran away yesterday.
Wow, that's unfortunate. People don't realize that can happen but it happened to my friend when we were little.

dialogs.situation: My little brother is about to enter high school in a week. Makes me remember the years I was in it. It wasn't all bad, but it definitely wasn't all good. I wouldn't mind re-living that period for a little bit though.

turns.text: My little brother is about to enter high school in a week. Makes me remember the years I was in it. It wasn't all bad, but it definitely wasn't all good. I wouldn't mind re-living that period for a little bit though
I get it, I think I'd like to go back and relive the big events. I miss those the most, football games and dances.

dialogs.situation: I felt bad I missed my grandfathers funeral a while ago

turns.text: I felt bad I missed my grandfathers funeral a while ago
Oh no, that is so sad. I am sure it would of meant a lot for you to be there.

dialogs.situation: Being a successful single mothr.

turns.text: Lately I've felt proud of my success as a newly single mother. It gets lonely sometimes, but I can honestly say I've been doing everything I can and more.
Keep up the good work! You will do good in life and be a good role model for your kids.

dialogs.situation: I opened an old box of my grandfathers possessions that I was given after he passed away and found his watch that he always wore.  I became really nostalgic and thought of all the good times I had with him.

turns.text: I opened an old box of my grandfathers possessions that I was given after he passed away and found his watch that he always wore. I became really nostalgic and thought of all the good times I had with him.
It is always good to take the time to reflect on happy memories.  I do that from time to time myself

dialogs.situation: Seeing a cat on the side of the road.

turns.text: I was walking and say a cat in front of me wagging its tail on the sidewalk and thought it was awesome
That would be pretty cool to see, but you should know that typically most cats swish their tail when they're annoyed or angry! It didn't attack you, did it?

dialogs.situation: last year Irma made me so sad it wrecked a lot of FL

turns.text: I was prepared for Irma last year but it caught my neighborhood by surprise
I can imagine it caught many people off guard.  I hope everyone came out ok in the end.

dialogs.situation: I wanted to make beef wellington but the gorcery store didn't have english mustard.

turns.text: I wanted to make beef wellington but the gorcery store didn't have english mustard.
Oh no, must be disappointing. Are you putting off making it now or will you go in search for the missing mustard?

dialogs.situation: when someone does not stop talking

turns.text: i hate when someone does not take the hint to stop talking
With those kind of people you just have to be blunt. If that doesn't work then it's time to excuse yourself from the conversation.

dialogs.situation: trust your friends

turns.text: good friends always helps you in every up and down situation without any expectation
You have to have a good friend though for any help. Without a friend there is not help.

dialogs.situation: This time of year reminds me of my childhood. We would go to the beach every summer.

turns.text: This time of year reminds me of when my dad would pile us all up in his Pinto and take us on vacation.
That sounds like a very fond memory that brings back a lot of nostalgia. Where would he take you?

dialogs.situation: My new semester starts in a week and I'm crossing my fingers it will be a good one.

turns.text: My new semester is starting up next week and I am crossing my fingers it will be a good one.
If you go into it with a good attitude, I'm sure at the very least it won't be bad. What kind of classes will you be taking?

dialogs.situation: I recently went on a road trip with some friends. We had a great time and posted up on the beach.

turns.text: I went on a road trip with some friends. We had a wonderful time hanging out on the beach and camping, too!

Getting out of town and way from all of everday life's struggles always sounds like a great time.  Did you leave you cell phone at home while you weer away to 'really' get away from everything for a minute?

dialogs.situation: I watched my friend do a really cool backflip!

turns.text: I was so happy to watch my friend do a backflip
I've always been too scared to do a backflip. I always worry I'm going to break my neck or something. Did it take him a long time to get it right?And did he get hurt?

dialogs.situation: I just completed my storm shelter. I am very excited!

turns.text: I just won the lotto and now I can finally finish my storm shelter! I will finally be safe from all these twisters!
Hey that's a good plan, hope you remember to include some fun stuff for those long house.

dialogs.situation: My friend's boyfriend had made sexual advances towards me, which I turned him away. But, I felt very bad for not telling my friend.

turns.text: I have a very good friend and her boyfriend made sexual advances towards me. I never did tell my friend, for various reasons, but I feel really guilty and bad about it@!
It can be hard in those situation I know you don't want to loose a friend in the end.

dialogs.situation: It took me 3 hours to mow the lawn. I'm glad it's done.

turns.text: It took me 3 hours to mow the lawn. I'm glad it's done.
damn did you do it all alone or you had help? are you lebron james living in a mansion?

dialogs.situation: Am very happy to have the best family in the world

turns.text: "Am very happy to have the best family in the world".
That's amazing, It's always nice to get on with your family! Have you always got on with them?

dialogs.situation: I felt really mad about a tech problem today. I can't figure out how to download a game to a certain drive.

turns.text: I felt pretty frustrated at some tech problems I had earlier. I couldn't find a way to download a game to a different drive.
I understand. I remember when we had to save games to 5 inch floppy disks. They made really strange shuffling sounds and a lot of times didn't even read.

dialogs.situation: I asked my dad to play basketball with me yesterday. I forgot that he used to play at a very high level and beat me badly!

turns.text: I asked my dad to play basketball with me yesterday. I forgot that he used to play at a very high level and beat me badly!
Wow, I sure beat he beat your butt, I bet you thought you had it in the bag, rigtht?

dialogs.situation: I was given a gift from my spouse, someone wanted to borrow it but I could not lend it out.

turns.text: My spouse gave me a gift, a watch. A friend of mine wanted to borrow my watch but I could not lend it to her. It values a lot to me
If it is a treasured gift, your friend should not be asking for it! how did you feel when she did ask you?

dialogs.situation: Last night my new dog finally played! She was so starved and abused but she is so young! I didn't think she knew how to play or was just very docile but she took of running with my boxer when he ran and even mouthed him in play!

turns.text: Last night my new dog finally played! She was so starved and abused but she is so young!
I also have a dog that was starved when she was young! She is so afraid of everything even to this day, but she's almost 8!

dialogs.situation: Earlyier this week my brother in law committed suicide. The was only 28 years old. I couldn't breathe when i heard the news.

turns.text: Have you ever had a friend or loved one commit suicide.
Yes, I have.  One that actually died and one that was miraculously saved.  It was a dark and tough time.  Did that happen to you recently?

dialogs.situation: I keep having these dreams that I am out in public and somehow my clothes disappear. It's awful.

turns.text: I keep having these dreams that I am out in public and somehow my clothes disappear. It's awful.
that could possibly indicate that you are a free creature! and you don't like to be caged! don't worry about it the dream, as they are only metaphorical

dialogs.situation: Last week I entered a contest to win an ipad at work and today I got the news that I won!

turns.text: Last week I entered a contest to win an ipad at work and today I got the news that I won!
Congratulations! That is awesome!  I don't really have much luck in winning things.  Have you won anything else before in your life?

dialogs.situation: There was a hurricane approaching my area.  I made sure to be ready for it.

turns.text: There once was a hurricane approaching my area.

Ah! That's always such a scary thing, because there's such a dreaded anticipation that goes along with it, a whole, "Will it? Won't it?" kind of game of seeing whether it will head in your direction. I live in the southeast, so I've dealt with worrying about plenty of them.

dialogs.situation: I was overcharged on my water bill by 200%, and I was on a really tight budget.  It turned out there was some problem in billing on their end.

turns.text: I was overcharged on my water bill by 200%, during a time I was on an especially tight budget.
Oh god..They do that to me TOO! And we have poison water! Are they going to fix it?

dialogs.situation: I've been trying to diet forever, but at first I was suffering. Now, I've finally gotten to where I can make healthy lunches that I still want to eat, and don't feel like I'm starving all the time.

turns.text: I've been trying to lose weight for a while but I think I've finally gotten to where I can make lunches that are healthy but I still want to eat, and I don't feel like I'm starving literally all the time.
Oh that is great! I have had great success doing keto and fasting for not feeling so hungry! Carbs and sugar do me in! What kind of lunches do you make?

dialogs.situation: My husband and I were really struggling to get pregnant with our second child. It had been over a year and I was feeling really down about it. I ended up having to go to the doctor to try and figure out what was going on.

turns.text: My husband and I were really struggling to get pregnant. I was very upset about it.
Oh, I'm sorry. I can image how you feel. My son and his wife are trying to get pregnant right now as well.

dialogs.situation: I was moving some furniture and all of a sudden it fell apart. I guess the furniture was made out of cheap wood. I was so ticked off when that happened.

turns.text: I was moving furniture in between rooms and one of the bookcases fell apart. I got so ticked off.
Oh, I bet that did irritate you! It's bad enough moving, but you don't need your furniture falling apart on you.

dialogs.situation: I recently decided to start blogging again and feel pretty good about it. I used to have a decent sized audience, so hopefully I can build it back up.

turns.text: I recently decided to start blogging again and feel pretty good about it. I used to have a decent sized audience, so hopefully I can build it back up.
I'm sure if you can let people know that you're back blogging, they'd come back to see what you're up to now!  What do you blog about?

dialogs.situation: I am blessed with a very good woman

turns.text: My wife is so caring I feel blessed to have her as a wife
That is amazing. It is so nice to have someone to share your life with. How long have y'all been together?

dialogs.situation: I've been waiting all day for this maintenance guy to come. They guaranteed me he would come within this 3-hour window, and that it would be today. Looks like it'll be neither. Love wasting time!

turns.text: I've been waiting all day for this maintenance guy to come. They guaranteed me he would come within this 3-hour window, and that it would be today. Looks like it'll be neither. Love wasting time!
gosh that is horrible! Did you try to call the company? next time chooe a company that guarantees they will come or the service is free

dialogs.situation: I just had a lump in my neck.  I had a biopsy and was worried it was cancerous.  Thankfully, after it was removed, it was determined to be a benign tumor.

turns.text: I have been fortunate to live a good life but I found a lump in my neck.  Most people would get it checked out immediately.  I waited.  I was scared to get the news.
I would absolutely be scared too. Good news or bad, I would be a worried wreck beforehand. Have you gotten it checked out yet?

dialogs.situation: After my two best friends moved away, I felt pretty depressed and miss them a lot.

turns.text: Two of my best friends moved away recently not far apart from one another. Left me feeling a bit empty.
Dang, that's rough. Like a double-dose of sadness. My girlfriend and I are long distance, so I know how that goes. Is there any way you can still keep in touch with them?

dialogs.situation: When I found out my son decided to drop out of college.

turns.text: Last month I found out my son decided to drop out of college without telling me.
Oh no that sounds terrible. Hopefully it's not as bad as some of those stories I have read about where they go so far that they fake having the degree.

dialogs.situation: I lost my swim bottoms at the water park.

turns.text: I lost my swim bottoms going down the slide at the water park.

Haha.. I feel like that's almost a rite of passage when going to water parks. I've had that happen, too. Hopefully it wasn't too traumatic for you. I almost lost my glasses once, too! Now that was really scary

dialogs.situation: I finally bought a back up drive to store my photos on. I spent a lot of time looking at old family photos and organizing them. It made me wish I could go back in time!

turns.text: I was storing all of my old photos on my new external hard drive yesterday. It made me wish I could go back and time and see some relatives again.
I usually love the trips down memory lane, but the sad side of it are the ones who are no longer around. I'm sorry.

dialogs.situation: I was supposed to go out with a bunch of people over the weekend but htey cancelled so i was stuck home alone

turns.text: I wish that when people made plans, they would stick to them.
Oh I hate people like that.    People that flake out like that just have no respect for anyone elses' time.

dialogs.situation: waiting for college acceptance letters

turns.text: I'm waiting to hear back from a few colleges about scholarships.
Oh, I hope you get some good news. I am sure it would help you getting aid for college.

dialogs.situation: i care about my wife and i always want the best for her

turns.text: i care about my wife and i always want the best for her
That's very nice of you. I feel the same way about my husband. Isn't it nice to care about someone?

dialogs.situation: I feel quite content with my life. I've seen everything and done everything. I just want to sit back and enjoy life in the countryside far away from cities.

turns.text: I feel quite satisfied with my life. I've seen everything and done everything what there is in life.
You must be really happy, I bet you have a beautiful wife and lots of money in the bank :)

dialogs.situation: I am starting a new phase in my life. Completed all debt , new start

turns.text: I am starting a new phase in my life. Completed all debt and off to a new start
I can hear the sigh of relief in your voice. I bet your anxious about what the next chapter will be.

dialogs.situation: A boy started being rude to my son in the bounce house. His parent wasn't watching at all!

turns.text: A boy was being agressive with my son in the bounce house He was twice as large! His parent wasn't supervising!
I hate when parents don't keep tabs on their kids, especially when they are misbehaving!  What did you do?
