dialogs.situation: I am so proud of my son.  He just graduated college last month!

turns.text: I am so proud of my son. He just graduated college last month!
That is outstanding news. You must be a great parent to raise a son who got through college.

dialogs.situation: My mother has been diagnosed with diabetes, so I have been taking care of her diet.

turns.text: My mother has been diagnosed with diabetes, so I have been taking care of her diet. I am worried about her health
I'm so sorry to hear that. I hope she'll be doing good, she is very lucky to have someone taking care of her.

dialogs.situation: I read this story about climate change. I'm really optomistic that we will solve this problem

turns.text: I'm really optomistic about climate change. I think wed really can solve this crucial issue.
I do, too.  We just need to take better care of the resources we have and plant more trees.  Do you do anything "green".

dialogs.situation: i was crushed when i didnt get the weekend off

turns.text: i was crushed when i didnt get the weekend off
Now that's just not right! Weekends are supposed to be for relaxing and hanging out with friends, not slaving away for the man! Hopefully you didn't have to cancel any plans...

dialogs.situation: I fell asleep at my friend's house and they shaved half my beard off of my face while I was sleeping. Now I look stupid and have to shave it all off! I've had one for the past 10 years. So stupid

turns.text: I fell asleep at my friend's house and they shaved half my beard off of my face while I was sleeping. Now I look stupid and have to shave it all off! I've had one for the past 10 years. So stupid
Well, that wasn't a very nice thing to do! Think of it as getting a new beard, rather than losing the old friend.

dialogs.situation: the braves are really good, i am hoping they dont blow it

turns.text: the braves are reallly good i hope they dont blow it
Do you live in Atlanta?  I haven't been to the new stadium yet and I really would like to - have you?

dialogs.situation: I saw a dog on the side of the road that had been hit by a car, it was so sad

turns.text: I saw a dog on the side of the road that had been hit by a car, it was so sad
Oh my goodness. That must have been traumatic to see. Do you know what happened to the dog?

dialogs.situation: I'm a bit unhappy with Summer being almost over.

turns.text: I'm a bit unhappy with Summer being almost over.
Its really hot where I live.  I'm ready for it to be over.  Its 100f out side right now and very humit.

dialogs.situation: My dog died about this time last year and I miss her

turns.text: My dog died of old age last year and I miss her
How sad to lose a dog you love! Ta least she/he died of old age, she must be in doggy heaven.

dialogs.situation: I had people stay at my house while I was  gone over the weekend, so they wouldn't have to pay for a hotel. When I came back, they had left a mess and didn't really put in much effort to put things back where they found them. They were supposed to be good friends, too.

turns.text: I had people stay at my house while I was gone over the weekend, so they wouldn't have to pay for a hotel. When I came back, they had left a mess and didn't really put in much effort to put things back where they found them. They were supposed to be good friends, too.
That is disappointing. Did you confront them about it? I am sorry you have to deal with that.

dialogs.situation: i was at the park with my son, when he pulled down his pants and started peeing on the grass

turns.text: I was at the park today, and my son pulled down his pants, and started peeing on the grass.
Hahaha, I dont mean to laugh but I'm assuming he is young and kids are pretty funny.  Did anyone else see it happen?

dialogs.situation: when i was going for an interview i had a crazy feeling

turns.text: i had some weak feeling on my interview day
I'm sorry, interviews can be rough. Was there a part of the interview day that you found especially difficult?

dialogs.situation: I have had one friend through thick and thin. She could pretty much do anything and I'd stand by her side because she is my best friend. We haven't been friends for too long, but I see it being an everlasting friendship.

turns.text: My best friend and I haven't been friends for super long, but I believe we will be in each other's lives forever. She's such a great person.
I have a friend like that. We lose touch but we will always be great friends.

dialogs.situation: I always thought that I would be happy to be an empty-nester.  However, as each child goes off into the adult world, I find myself wondering exactly what I will do with myself and my time.

turns.text: Hi, do you have children?
No i do not. But i wish someday after getting married i will have my own. Do you like kids?

dialogs.situation: I just got notice that my mortgage payment has gone up this year and i'm so mad about it.

turns.text: I just got notice that my mortgage payment has gone up this year and i'm so mad about it.
Oh no! That has so happened to me before! It was only by a couple dollars a month but I SO needed those couple of dollars at the time. I would be MAAADDD

dialogs.situation: My son wet his pants in public

turns.text: My son wet his pants at the park the other day.
Oh my! I hope that he did not feel badly about it. That sort of thing is normal for children

dialogs.situation: i loved taking care of my sisters pet

turns.text: i loved taking care of my sisters pet
I wish my sister felt that way about mine! lol. What kind of pets does she have?

dialogs.situation: When the SNES classic came out

turns.text: I for one was pretty excited when the SNES classic came out not too long ago. It's been ages since I've played those games. Since I was a kid
Same here! I haven't picked one up yet, but I loved all the choices they made on it. Some true gems on there.

dialogs.situation: family reunions

turns.text: i cant wait for thanksgiving all the food around me , and see all my family pigging out makes me so happy and thankful for everything in life
I think that you are absolutely right!  Thanksgiving is the best!  I love the food, and family.  Are your family coming to you, or are you going to the?

dialogs.situation: My friend just got a job paying 20k more than me. I've got more experience.

turns.text: My friend just got a job paying 20k more than me. I've got more experience
That sucks.  If it makes you feel even slightly better,  the dumbest, most imcompent coworker I have makes more than me... because you know.. nepotism.

dialogs.situation: I remember feeling so blissful after the births of my children. Such a sense of peace and relief and possiblity.

turns.text: I was so blissful after the births of both my girls. Such a sense of peace and relief on both a mental and physical level!

I wish I could relate. I'm a male, so I'll never know the pain and/or the reward that comes with growing a human being inside your body. It's such an impressive thing to go through, and no matter what, mothers will never get enough credit. You deserve serious props. What ages are they now?

dialogs.situation: My dog keeps going into my garbage and throwing the contents onto the floor. I don't know how to get him to stop and it's frustrating as all heck.

turns.text: My dog keeps going into my garbage and throwing it all onto the floor!
Gesh, that's frustrating. I had a dog that used to do that too. Had to get a trash can with a lid.

dialogs.situation: Last year my girlfriend asked me if I was ok with how life was turnig out for us. I stop and thought about how things use to be what we had hope for and how things are now, I looked at her smiled and replied I " I am ".

turns.text: My girlfriend is always worrying if I am as happy thought I would be after we decided to go from just good friends to be in a relationship with each other.  I always am honest and tell her the same thing.
Sounds like she has some underlying issues with trust. You may want to sort it all out before you get too involved.

dialogs.situation: I'm so ready for the weekend. I'm going camping.

turns.text: I've been working really hard this entire week. I'm ready for the weekend. I'm going on a camping trip!
That sounds exciting! The hard work will pay off. I've always wanted to camp. Have you done it before?

dialogs.situation: I spent ten minutes looking for my car keys while my friends were waiting for me and they were in my pocket the whole time.

turns.text: I spent 10 minutes looking for my car keys while my friends waited outside and they were in my pockets the whole time. My friends made sure i never forgot that moment haha
We all do stuff like that. At least you didn't lock them inside your car. Done that before!

dialogs.situation: I was at a wedding reception with a bunch of old friends. My buddies wife, who had quite a bit to drink, was hitting on me when he left to get a drink. I told her to sober up and let my friend know he should probably take his wife home.

turns.text: I went to a wedding recently, and something happened that put a damper on it. I felt bad for my buddy, but at least he knows he can trust me.
Oh no, it's awful something happens on that special day that should be full of joy and whatnot.

dialogs.situation: My dog is sick so i took him to the vet now we are waiting for the results of his bloodwork

turns.text: my dog is sick we took him into the vet and now we are playing the waiting game
I am sorry to hear that! My dog is a part of the family, so I understand. I hope everything is okay.

dialogs.situation: I am confident that I will win that spelling bee tomorrow

turns.text: I am confident that I will win that spelling bee tomorrow
A spelling bee - what fun! I'm sure you will win - I bet you've worked hard toward your goal.

dialogs.situation: If I'm going to be in a relationship I need girl I can depend on, not some effed up crazy damaged goods type of girl

turns.text: If I'm going to be in a relationship I need girl I can depend on, not some effed up crazy damaged goods type of girl I can't trust
Yes, it's important to find somebody who you will be able to trust and also somebody who will love you for being you

dialogs.situation: If there's one thing I learned it's to trust my own judgment and mine alone.  Forget what the haters say and just keep grinding toward my goals

turns.text: People can give me all the bullshit advice they want on how to live my life and how I need to know my place in society....but I'll just smile and nod because I only trust my instincts and am have ridiculously more freedom, money and happiness than I've ever had before
Good on you. You need to be comfortable in your own skin and its not other people's business to tell you how to live.

dialogs.situation: I'm so eager for my son to be born, I can not wait.

turns.text: I am so excited for my baby son to be born, I am so eager for it to happen!

Oh man, your life is about to get so much more hectic. I feel for you. When my first was born, I was just as pumped, full of naivety and positivity. I felt like I could take on anything coming my way. I was exhausted after two weeks. It's such a long ride until they're able to even remotely look after themselves.

dialogs.situation: i will be on vacation next month

turns.text: i am excited am goint on vacation next month to Paris. I have been waiting for this period and cant wait to be there
wow that is amazing I went there back in 2000. You are in for a big treat. Make sure to get french bread.

dialogs.situation: I think my daughter is going to shine this year. She spent the summer studying

turns.text: My daughter spent the sumer studying so that she will do well this year
thats good.its very important to instill good learning and study habbits. something i wish i had as kid

dialogs.situation: I wanted to go to the beach this summer, but I'm not going to get off work like I thought.

turns.text: Thought I was going to get a vacation this year, but not going to happen. Can't get off work.

Sorry to hear that. You sound like a hard worker, which is something to be proud of, even though it's kind of wearing you out maybe. Are you able to roll the days over to next year and save them, at least?

dialogs.situation: I recently found out that I have been diagnosed HIV positive, and I'm at a complete loss for words. I don't even know how to go on anymore.

turns.text: I got some pretty horrible news recently. I've been diagnosed HIV positive. I'm just...lost...

I'm so sorry!  Don't lose hope though. I know some science based nutrition that helps you overcome and kill it going high nutrition plant based vegan.  Look up Dr. Joel Furhman.  It'll save you from all the meds that hurt your body.

dialogs.situation: My mom said I had to get rid of our family dog because she was allergic. I cried for a week it was unbearable, I resented her.

turns.text: My mom said I had to get rid of our family dog because she was allergic. I cried for a week it was unbearable, I resented her.
Oh no that is so sad to hear! I have one dog and two cats, so I totally understand what you are going through...

dialogs.situation: My birthday was last month and I had a feeling my husband was planning a surprise birthday party. I was excited!!

turns.text: I was getting excited about my upcoming birthday, I didn't know if my husband had planned a secret party!
Has he given you any hints that he might be planning a party? That would be so much fun to be with all your family and friends in one place to celebrate you!!

dialogs.situation: My daughter started elementary school today I was nervous she would be scared but she loved it and I'm so glad how much she is a big girl.

turns.text: My oldest daughter started elementary school today I was so glad she had a great first day.
Oh wonderful!  I'm glad it went so well!  Did she already know some friends there or was it a new school for her?

dialogs.situation: I was looking through old photos and felt sentimental looking at my kids when they were little

turns.text: I was feeling so sentimental while looking through old photos of my kids today. They grow up too fast!
Aw, my mom had some she showed to us a few years back. It's weird to consider how you and everyone else have grown!

dialogs.situation: Just got into an argument with my long distance girlfriend because she felt I wasn't listening to her closely enough while we were on the phone. She hung up, mad. Truth is, I was trying to do some work while talking to her, but I was listening as best I could, too.

turns.text: Just got into an argument with my long distance girlfriend because she felt I wasn't listening to her closely enough while we were on the phone. She hung up, mad. Truth is, I was trying to do some work while talking to her, but I was listening as best I could, too.
Oh no!  Its always tough in relationships but when you can't go see her or make her talk to you afterwards, I'm sure its extra hard.  Did you call back and tell her that?

dialogs.situation: i was extremely disgusted when a close friend of mine threw up on my baby. he was really drunk at a party we were at

turns.text: i was extremely disgusted when a close friend of mine threw up on my baby. he was really drunk at a party we were at
I would have flipped and never talked to him again. I am so sorry my god what did you do?

dialogs.situation: I feel sad when I see people squandering their potential or underestimating themselves.

turns.text: One of the saddest things to me is when people underestimate what they can do and/or are capable of.
I know, that actually happens to me sometimes! Last year I didn't get accepted into this fellowship and for a couple of weeks I was underestimating myself a lot.

dialogs.situation: it was impressive seeing this guy eat a 3 lbs burger the other day

turns.text: it was impressive seeing this guy eat a 3lbs burger the other day
Holy cow, that IS impressive.  I can't believe people can eat that much.  Was he in a contest?

dialogs.situation: My little grandson just came home from the hospital. He was born several week premature and weighed under 2 pounds but now he is doing well and we are so thankful everything is ok.

turns.text: My little grandson just came home from the hospital. He was born premature and weighted under 2 pounds.
Oh my gosh, so tiny. I'm hoping since he was released from the hospital he is doing well now?

dialogs.situation: I have a medical exam soon and I am just praying that everything will check out okay.

turns.text: I have a medical check up coming soon and I am praying everything will be okay with it.
Oh, I hope so too! Those can be quite scary especially if you're like me and you go once every 10 years or so

dialogs.situation: I was looking to adopt a dog and found one that I loved. By the time I was ready to adopt and get to the rescue shelter, somehow else had adopted the dog.

turns.text: I was looking to adopt a dog and found one that I loved. By the time I was ready to adopt and get to the rescue shelter, somehow else had adopted the dog.
Awwww, well that;s too bad. Hopefully the owner is as loving towards it as you would have been. What kind of dog was it?

dialogs.situation: The next day was Christmas and I couldn't wait to open my presents. I couldn't sleep at all that night.

turns.text: One night I couldn't sleep at all.
Oh no! I hope you didn't have to go anywhere the next day? Did you try anything to help?

dialogs.situation: Yesterday, two gangs were fighting just in front of my home. It is a very scary situtation.

turns.text: Yesterday, two gangs were fighting just in front of my home. It is a very scary situtation.
Oh god that sounds terrible! Are you okay, is everyone in your house okay? Did anyone get hurt?

dialogs.situation: I can happily retire after putting in 20 years of work in this company

turns.text: I am proud to have helped the company grow to what it is today. It's time for me to retire after 20 years of decicated service
Wow, that's a long time! Kudos to you. It's hard for me to imagine being in one place for that long

dialogs.situation: Every  Thanksgiving i eat alone.

turns.text: Every single thanksgiving, I eat alone.
Really? That's one of the saddest things I've heard in a while. I'm sorry to hear that. What happened to your family, if you don't mind me asking?

dialogs.situation: I'm very socially awkward

turns.text: I'm very socially awkward and tomorrow i'm going to have a playdate with some local moms and i'm so anxious

I'm right there with you.. I still feel pretty introverted, but since coming to college, I've been forced to socialize more, and it's help me at least "fake it until I make it." I still prefer to be alone a lot of the time, but at least I can somewhat manage without making myself look dumb. Maybe you can just think of some topics/things to talk about to have in the back of your head for the times when things get quiet?

dialogs.situation: not sleeping enough

turns.text: i am feeling very guilty recently as i am putting a lot of stress on my body and not sleeping enough, it's making me feel very bad
I know how that feels and it can make you sick very fast. Do whatever you can to try and get enough sleep.

dialogs.situation: i get frustrated when i let someone out in traffic and dont get a wave

turns.text: i hate when i let someone out in traffic and dont get a wave
That has always bothered me as well.  I mean, how much effort does it take to just wave as a thank you?

dialogs.situation: My husband was in a car accident a couple of years ago. A woman pulled out in front of him on the highway. Unfortunately a woman we knew was in the vehicle and passed away. We were so upset.

turns.text: My husband was in an accident a couple of years ago. A van pulled out in front of him. A woman we knew was in it and she passed away.
Oh, well that's terrible! Hopefully, your husband was okay and nobody else was hurt. But, it's awful that anyone was.

dialogs.situation: My upstairs neighbor moved out recently and left all her trash and furniture in our parking lot next to the garbage cans. No one has a place to park! I'm so mad.

turns.text: I'm so irritated at my neighbor. She moved out recently and left ALL her garbage and old furniture in our parking lot by the garbage.
That's not very considerate of her. Was she a bad neighbor while she lived there too? Some people!

dialogs.situation: My wife and I are on a diet together for the last month. We have been doing great but today on my way home from work I stopped for Ice cream and did not tell her.

turns.text: My wife and I are on a diet together for the last month. We have been doing great but today on my way home from work I stopped for Ice cream and did not tell her.
Hey everyone trips up a little. What you need to remember is that you and your wife made a commitment and you should follow through on that.

dialogs.situation: I have a big test coming up for school. I have studied every day but am worried I will not do good.

turns.text: In school I have a big test coming up. I am worried I will not be prepared in time.
Oh no, that's always really stressful. Just do your best to prepare, and try not to worry about it. Whatever happens, happens, and if you're less stressed you'll probably do better.

dialogs.situation: I just went for a shopping spree and bought a $2000 bag

turns.text: I went shopping yesterday and bought a $2000 bag. My husband is going to kill me..
Haha my girlfriend does the same thing.  Check comes in and she is so happy to have money for the next two weeks, then goes and spends it all on clothing and accessories.

dialogs.situation: I took my wife surfing for the first time today. within an hour she was riding waves, Color me impressed!

turns.text: I took my wife surfing for the first time today. within an hour she was riding waves, Color me impressed!
Oh wow, I think it'd take me much longer to not bust my butt! That is impressive!

dialogs.situation: We're finally settled in one place after moving around a lot.  It's so nice to be able to put down roots.

turns.text: My family is finally settled down in one place after moving around a lot.
That's really good news. It must be frustrating to move from place to place constantly. Is your family happy with the place?

dialogs.situation: I can start to see my mother showing early signs of dementia. I feel really helpless about it, since it shows how vulnerable they are. I try to help with small things, but it's sad knowing I won't be able to slow down the effects of it.

turns.text: I can start to see my mother showing early signs of dementia. I feel really helpless about it, since it shows how vulnerable they are. I try to help with small things, but it's sad knowing I won't be able to slow down the effects of it.
That's very sad. My Grandma had that and it is devastating to experience it. I'm told that doing puzzles etc. keeps the brain active and maybe at least delays it.

dialogs.situation: A hurricane is on the way to my home. I have all the emergency supplies I need, so I'm ready for it.

turns.text: There is a hurricane on the way to my home. I have all my emergency supplies ready to go.
Oh wow, I'm glad you have gotten your self prepared for a big blow. I hope you stay safe.

dialogs.situation: The other day i was asked to bake a cake. I love baking cakes.

turns.text: The other day i was asked to bake a cake for a birthday party. I love baking cakes.
That's so fun! I've always wanted to get into baking. How did the cake turn out?

dialogs.situation: They arrested 9 people at a nearby farm for animal cruelty and they are already out on bond!

turns.text: They arrested 9 people at a nearby farm for animal cruelty and they are already out of jail on bond!
Oh, that's not right. I have a rescue dog, she had a litter of puppies at a puppy mill before she was a year.

dialogs.situation: I recently noticed how much weight I gained over the past year and I just feel like I really let myself down.

turns.text: Over the past year, I gained a ton of weight and never realized until it was too late. I feel like I really let myself down. I always said I'd never let myself go.
Hey, It's never too late. Unless you can't exercise at all there is always a way to start.

dialogs.situation: My cat just scratched up my brand new leather couch while I was at work!  I am so mad at him right now I could scream!

turns.text: My cat just scratched up my brand new leather couch while I was at work! I am so mad at him right now I could scream!
That's frustrating!  We have cat scratching posts EVERYWHERE to try to avoid that, but still had to put the sticky tape on the couch to prevent scratching

dialogs.situation: I stayed with my last partner through many trials and tribulations

turns.text: Man, my last partner put me through the ringer. There were so many trials and tribulations
I hear that, my friend. It ain't exactly easy living with mine, but ya gotta do it for love.

dialogs.situation: I feel guilty for smoking in the house today when it was raining outside.  It hurts my family.

turns.text: I feel guilty for smoking in the house today when it was raining outside.

Almost all my family members have smoked at one point in time. I feel bad for the people that get caught in the addiction, and I wish I could help them quit. Sorry to hear it's such a hassle enough that you had to do it inside.

dialogs.situation: I stole candy from the store yesterday. I feel bad about it.

turns.text: I stole some candy from the store yesterday and now I can't sleep at night.
Hmmm, maybe that's because you ate it and you've got a sugar rush. I wouldn't worry! That usually fades in a couple hours.

dialogs.situation: I was shocked when my aunt made my graduation. She lived out of state

turns.text: I was shocked in a good way when my aunt made my graduation. She lived out of state
That's awesome! What a nice surprise. And congratulations on graduating. That's a big accomplishment. What did you graduate in?

dialogs.situation: Just got backed into at the grocery store.  My new car now has damage!

turns.text: Lady backed into my car the other day and proceeds to tell me she doesn't have insurance.
Oh my. That would really tick me off. In my state they will lose their license for that.

dialogs.situation: I found my deceased grandfathers watch in an old box in my parents attic.  It is actually quite valuable, but I don't think I could bring myself to sell it.  It has way too much meaning to myself and my family.

turns.text: I found my deceased grandfathers watch in an old box in my parents attic. It is actually quite valuable, but I don't think I could bring myself to sell it. It has way too much meaning to myself and my family.

I believe there are things in life that are irreplaceable and priceless! There is no amount of money that can give you the true value of your grandfather's watch. I think you should pass it down to your grandchildren.

dialogs.situation: I am consistently paying off my credit cards over the last couple of months. I am very optimistic that my credit score would start going up again

turns.text: For the last couple of month, I had been consistently paying off my credit card debts. I hope that my credit score would start going up again
That's good to hear, friend! I've been trying to work off my debt as well. Once it's done, I'm going to chop those things up.

dialogs.situation: My girlfriend broke up with me yesterday. This place is so quiet without her.

turns.text: My girlfriend broke up with me yesterday. This place is so quiet without her
I'm sorry to hear that.  You should have some friends over.  Throw a party and catch up on old times.

dialogs.situation: We thought we were going to have to replace our heat pump, but the technicians were able to fix it!  It costs thousands less.

turns.text: We thought we were going to have to replace our heat pump, but the technicians were able to repair it.
That's good. I know it's very expensive to replace that part, so I'm sure you are relieved.

dialogs.situation: My first softball game, I was determined to hit the ball. I will never forget the satisfaction when I heard the crack of the bat.

turns.text: I have never been an athletic person, but my parents insisted that I participate in a sport, so I chose softball. I was so excited when I heard the crack of the bat as I hit the ball. It was such a satisfying moment.
Oh I know the feeling! I had the same affinity for swimming. My mom said I should give it a try. At first I didn't want to but as I got better I started to love it.

dialogs.situation: I babysat my nephew last weekend. He slept over and was scared so I let him sleep in bed with me, even though he kicks and rolls around

turns.text: I babysat my nephew overnight last weekend. He was scared so I let him sleep in bed with me, even though he kicks a lot.
That was thoughtful, sometimes i think kids fake being scared just to not be alone. hope you didn't get kicked too much!

dialogs.situation: the braves are really good. i just dont know if we have the pitching to make a run

turns.text: the braves are really good, i just dont know if we have the pitching to make a run
I'm a Reds fan myself........I know the Braves have a good chance of winning their division and I agree, probably not made for a deep playoff ren.

dialogs.situation: I just moved to this area quite recently and am quite pleased with the quality of stores, restaurants and variety of accommodations available. It most certainly was not expected.

turns.text: Wandering around my little area of the world I am quite pleased with the variety of stores and restaurants here. I didn't expect it.
That's good. I live in a small town but we have a big shopping center across the street and there are all the stores i love

dialogs.situation: When I talked to my schools therapist about how I'd been a bad kid.

turns.text: My therapist was so kind to me, I had to tell her a lot.
That's good you have someone that you can talk to about your problems and feelings. I'm sure it helps!

dialogs.situation: I'm thankful for the way my parents raised me.

turns.text: My parents raised me like a king and I'm thankful for that.  Because although I was introverted for most of my life I was pretty confident and successful in my abilities and always did well no matter what I did
That is so wonderful that you give your parents the credit and are so grateful for what they did for you!

dialogs.situation: I was disappointed in myself when I got into a pointless argument with my brother. It wasn't even anything important.

turns.text: I was walking around with my brother on a Sunday, and I got into a pointless argument with him. I am disappointed that I left myself get caught up in it.
I think we all do that with our siblings. I'm sure he knows you still enjoy spending time with him anyway.

dialogs.situation: Listening to old music on youtube. The early 2000s had the best music.

turns.text: It's nice listening to old music.
Yea, I enjoy stuff from my childhood. What kind of music are you listening to, country, rock, something else?

dialogs.situation: I just received a job offer. I should be happy but there were some red flags in the interview. Not sure if I should take it.

turns.text: Im nervous about accepting a job offer I just received. I noticed a couple red flags while I was interviewing.

That's always a weird situation. You're excited about the offer, and you're worried that if you turn it down that you might not be able to find anything else, or as good. But you also don't want to be tied down to a bad place. What were some of the red flags, if you don't mind me asking?

dialogs.situation: My sister lives in Utah. We had planned for her to come visit but her work would not allow her to take the time off.

turns.text: My sister lives in Utah. We had planned for her to come visit but her work would not allow her to take the time off.
Aw that's annoying. Work always gets in the way of things. Did you ever try to go to her?

dialogs.situation: i promised my wife that i will stop drinking but it seems hard to stop, i feel guilty

turns.text: i promised my wife that i will stop drinking but it seems hard to stop, i feel so bad
Maybe you could try AA meetings or suggest to your wife that she can go to Al Anon meetings. It's a good first start.

dialogs.situation: I have 2 working arms and legs. I am so thankful for not being handicapped in life.

turns.text: I have 2 working arms and legs. I am so thankful for not being handicapped in life.
I'm grateful for my limbs as well, this the reason I'm a hard worker. I appreciate what god gave me.

dialogs.situation: My youngest sister has started to drive so I've been accompanying her since she has her learners permit. Riding with her is a real test of nerves!

turns.text: My youngest sister has her learner's permit so I've been trying to teach her how to drive. You don't know true terror until you're in the passenger's seat of a 16 year old's car
I'm dealing with the same thing right now! I had to teach her how to parralel park yesterday! It is terrifying!

dialogs.situation: My wife is on a business trip for two weeks. I'm starting to miss her a lot.

turns.text: My wife went on a business trip for two weeks. At first I thought it'd be awesome to have the house to myself, but I'm starting to miss her now.

Aw, that's never fun.  My husband used to travel all the time for work and it was so lonely.  I'm glad she won't be gone too long.  I took advantage of the times he was gone to clean and organize and fix things to surprise him when he returned.

dialogs.situation: I am so disgust at Donald Trump.

turns.text: I am so disgust at Donald Trump and his immigration policies.
I stand behind him. Compared to the rest of the world we are to easy on illegal immigrants and this is coming from a Mexican American.

dialogs.situation: I feel a little weird about looking at this house for sale. It looks haunted and I think something bad happened there, but not use

turns.text: I feel a little weird about looking at this house for sale. It looks haunted and I think something bad happened there, but not sure.
I would ask the realtor on some background and even google the address to see if any abuse headlines come from that place.

dialogs.situation: I saw the grossest food at my friends house. It was molded beyond belief.

turns.text: I was at a friends house and he had the grossest kitchen i had ever seen!

I feel like this is me. I'm clean, but I'm stuck with a dirty roommate who doesn't do dishes. And I also live in a place that is old and looks terrible to begin with. Sorry you have to deal with that, because I know I hate living in it!

dialogs.situation: I visited my college campus today and memories came flooding back. I miss it.

turns.text: I visited my college campus today and memories came flooding back. I miss it.
I'd imagine so. What a great time of our lives college can be. The world just seems right, being surrounded by your peers, all sharing similar goals.

dialogs.situation: I am in awe when people turn their live's around for the better

turns.text: I am in awe when people turn their live's around for the better
Me too! I helped a guy with his immigration case and saved him from being deported. He ended up becoming a pastor.

dialogs.situation: when i moved to new york after getting a new job, i was looking forward to my new life.. i was feeling good about that change

turns.text: i felt really good about my change to new york after getting a job
No way! I just moved from NY to FL. You are going to love NY tho, its an awesome state. Congrats on the job!

dialogs.situation: I'm pretty satisfied with all the house work I got done today.  Yard is mowed and the house is clean!

turns.text: I'm pretty satisfied with all the house work I got done today. Yard is mowed and the house is clean!
That's great, I wish I had been that productive today. Maybe I still have time for a load of laundry. Good job, you.

dialogs.situation: I am so sad about the bridge collapsing.

turns.text: I am so sad about the bridge collapsing.
Where and when did this happen?  I haven't looked at the news lately to avoid hearing sad news.  The last incident of the duck boat accident was very saddening.

dialogs.situation: I miss being a kid. Adulting is terrible

turns.text: I miss being a kid.
I do too honestly, I used to play all these fun games with our neighbors late summer nights, it was amazing, but I took it for granted

dialogs.situation: i felt trusting when my dad and my mon care for me

turns.text: i felt trusting when my dad and my mon care for me
Well as a fellow human being, I agree that when parents care for their children, it creates a lifelasting bond between the two parties.

dialogs.situation: Me and my girlfriend have been dating for 3 years now. Im going to ask her to marry me and I have no doubts she will say no.

turns.text: Im going to ask my girlfriend to marry me this weekend! I have no doubt in my mind she will say no
That is so exciting! Best of luck to you man! I doubt she would reject such a great guy like you. :)

dialogs.situation: The mosquitos where I live seemed to be getting really bad! When sitting by the fire at night we get so eaten up even with bug spray and candles! So for this last time we did a fire I bought these two blue lantern things that attract the mosquitoes and zap them to death! Let me tell you, those mosquitoes didn't stand a chance, and no bug spray needed!

turns.text: The mosquitos where I live seemed to be getting really bad! When sitting by the fire at night we get so eaten up even with bug spray and candles! So for this last time we did a fire I bought these two blue lantern things that attract the mosquitoes and zap them to death! Let me tell you, those mosquitoes didn't stand a chance, and no bug spray needed!
Those sound super effective. I wish I had some of them here,  I have never seen mosquitoes as bad as they are this year.

dialogs.situation: I had just packed a roadside emergency kit in my car when a snowstorm hit and stranded me on a back road.

turns.text: I am so glad that I decided to pack a kit for my car in case of bad winter weather.
I bet you are, that's some pretty good foresight right there! Did you have to use it this past winter?

dialogs.situation: I'm not actually mad about it, but my sister, who is expecting her first baby, has the nicest, prettiest nursery I've ever seen!

turns.text: My sister is so lucky adn sso good at design, she has the prettiest nursery set up for her daughter!  My kids were lucky to have a matching crib bed set lol
That's cool! It's nice to have someone close that is talented like that and can help with those things.

dialogs.situation: I felt so much love and affection when my son was moving to college. It was hard, as I wasn't ready, but was so proud of him!

turns.text: When my son first started college, I felt so much love and affection, but it was definitely hard to see him go! I was very proud though.
where did he go study at? i can imagine how hard that could be. but it's good to see him following his dreams\

dialogs.situation: I rode a roller coaster.

turns.text: The other day I got on a roller coaster for the first time, and I almost pooped my pants because we were so high up.
Oh wow, now that's funny! I've only been on one roller coaster and it was rather small, but I loved it!

dialogs.situation: I used to get so scared by the movie "The Village" as a kid

turns.text: I used to get so scared by the movie "The Village" as a kid
Oh no! I've never seen that movie, but it sounds like it was very horrifying! Have you watched it as an adult?

dialogs.situation: My wife has been out of the country for 2 months.

turns.text: My wife has been in Germany for 2 months.  I can't wait till she gets home.
Wow, i bet you miss her so much. My wife is going overseas with our son and they will be gone for 1 month! I know i will be miserable without them

dialogs.situation: My neighbor had her home broken into last week and was scared to stay by herself after the robbery.  We let her stay with us for a couple of nights.

turns.text: My neighbor was robbed at home last week.  Since then, she has been too scared to stay by herself.  We let her stay with us for a couple of nights.
That sounds terrifying! I wouldn't want to stay alone either. That was nice you guys took her in.

dialogs.situation: I won an NCAA basketball bracket challenge back in 2013. $1,000 cash.....it was awesome to win something like that.

turns.text: Back in 2013 I won an NCAA bracket challenge online through a local restaurant. The payout was $1,000 cash. I was really excited...felt great.
Wow... That is exciting. Congratulations! I also won my fantasy football league this year and won $300 as well.

dialogs.situation: The store I am ordering from won't ship to Canada, even though I found the perfect present for my brothers birthday.

turns.text: I couldn't buy my brother his gift from an online retailer that starts with an A, because apparently they don't ship to Canada from their .com website. :(
Oh I think I can guess which retailer you're talking about. I've had so many problems with them over the years

dialogs.situation: I couldn't believe it when I walked outside and got pooped on by a bird. I went home and took a shower. Now I walk around with an umbrella.

turns.text: I was walking down the street the other day and I felt something hit my head. I realized a bird had pooped on me! I was so shocked.
Now that is one of the most unfortunate things I've heard all week. How did you get it out of your hair? Eeww

dialogs.situation: I just moved into my first one bedroom apartment alone. I miss having a roommate to have around.

turns.text: My roommate just moved away. Now I am in a one bedroom but I miss having someone around.
sorry to hear that , try and keep busy or find a hobby eventually you will get over it, its just gonna take a bit of time

dialogs.situation: I just had a pretty good meal at the Olive Garden.  I would say I am satisfied.

turns.text: I just had a pretty good meal at the Olive Garden.

Right on, that sounds cool. Did you go with family, or a date? Or maybe just hung out there alone? That's okay, too. I love Italian food, had always wanted to go to Olive Garden, but my dad hates Italian. So when we were growing up, we just never went. Now that I'm on my own, I've been... twice. Both times, they were just okay.

dialogs.situation: I've been letting a stranger stay with us this past couple of days.

turns.text: I've been letting a stranger stay with us this past couple of days
A complete stranger? How the heck did that happen? I'm sure you must be confident that it's safe, if they're staying with you.

dialogs.situation: I have felt some of the best moments of pure happiness seeing someone I love getting something they want. A job, and acceptance to college, any kind of goal.

turns.text: I have felt some of the best moments of pure happiness seeing someone I love getting something they've worked hard for -- like my daughter's acceptance into her college and major of choice!
That sounds exciting! Congratulations to her. I bet there was a lot of celebration to be had for such an achievement!

dialogs.situation: Taking care of my friends cat while they went on vacation.

turns.text: i felt so good when I babysat my friends cat.
I'm an animal lover myself. I have a cat who just had four kittens. They're adorable!

dialogs.situation: Today when I went into my roommate's office to fix the internet, I noticed the collar of his old cat that passed away. I miss her.

turns.text: Today when I went into my roommate's office to fix the internet, I noticed the collar of his old cat that passed away. I miss her.
I am so sorry to hear that. We need memories of our fur babies to help us in our grief.

dialogs.situation: I've been in my crappy apartment so long. I think just used to it now.

turns.text: my apartment is terrible.
Can you do any work to it. I know there are a lot ideas on pinterest to perk up a place.

dialogs.situation: I'm annoyed that many things are closed on Sundays.

turns.text: I'm annoyed that many things are still closed on Sundays...like the federal reserve banking system.
Oh yeah, I hate that too. It's so inconvenient to be closed when people have time to go there.

dialogs.situation: My upstairs neighbors make a ton of noise at all hours of the night. It makes it difficult for me to sleep.

turns.text: My upstairs neighbors make a ton of noise at all hours of the night. It makes it difficult for me to sleep.
That really sucks. Maybe you should try egging their door? Or just break in and pretend you're bigfoot while they're trying to sleep.

dialogs.situation: My daughter took my earbuds to the mall and lost them. They are not the cheap kind

turns.text: I really hate when my kids take my things without asking

I feel you!  My two kids know all the rules and yet, they just go out the window when they want to take something or use something that isn't theirs.  I always joke that you can't have nice things with kids.

dialogs.situation: When my cat passed away after being hit by a car. It was just after my hockey practice.

turns.text: I was so sad when my cat passed away.
I can understand that. I lost my dog a few years ago. What's worse is I wasn't around when it happened--I was out of the state. I hope you at least got to say goodbye.

dialogs.situation: The other day I found one of my old shirts from when I was a kid in my storage. I remember running around my neighborhood with my friends in that shirt. It had mickey mouse on it.

turns.text: I found an old childhood shirt of mine in storage the other day. It was white and red with mickey mouse on it. I remember riding my bikes through the neighborhood with my friends with that shirt on.
That sounds like a great memory! I always get nostalgic about pretty much everything. How long ago was it?

dialogs.situation: Today I was at a store and thought I saw my friend at the checkout, so I was yelling her name over and over and trying to get over to her.  It turned out not to be her and everyone was staring.  ha ha.  My face was so red.

turns.text: Today I was at a store and thought I saw my friend at the checkout, so I was yelling her name over and over and trying to get over to her. It turned out not to be her and everyone was staring. ha ha. My face was so red.
Haha!  That's hilarious from my perspective, but must have been embarrassing for you!  What did you do?

dialogs.situation: This is going to sound silly, but yesterday I realized when I went to change a diaper that I could not find a single baby wipe in the house. I didn't know what to do and did not have a car until my fiance gets home from work later that night. I was scared I wouldn't have a way to like.. change diapers!

turns.text: This is going to sound silly, but yesterday I realized when I went to change a diaper that I could not find a single baby wipe in the house. I didn't know what to do and did not have a car until my fiance gets home from work later that night. I was scared I wouldn't have a way to like.. change diapers!
Haha!  I am only laughing because I know exactly what you are talking about!  That has happened to me a couple times!.  I had to use a hand towel once!

dialogs.situation: I hated group projects but when I had to work with a partner for my senior thesis and he did nothing. I was so mad, I spent weeks on it and he took most of the credit for it.

turns.text: I had to work with a partner for my senior thesis and he did nothing! Do you like group work?
Oh I hate group work for that exact reason. I'd rather just have company while I did the work

dialogs.situation: I always enjoy ordering things on newegg because I'm confident it will arrive quick and on time.

turns.text: When I shop online for computer parts, I like to use newegg because I am confident their items will ship fast and on time.
I have never used newegg before, and I think that sounds like that are very good at what they do. I might have to check them out!

dialogs.situation: I work for a company and we just found out the the person who works in our accounting department has been stealing money from us for years. It is revolting.

turns.text: We just found out the person working in our accounting department has been stealing money from our company for years.
Yikes! That is terrible! What a awful thing to do! I am glad he finally got busted! Wow, for years, huh?

dialogs.situation: I know time are hard, but i'll make it

turns.text: I know time are hard, but i'll make it
Don't you worry, your tomorrow might be great. Just take it each day at a time.

dialogs.situation: My husband ended up with meningitis a few years back.  Our church really rallyed around us, brought food, and helped out with the kids - I'm so glad we have a church that is a family.

turns.text: Have you ever dealt with someone being really really sick?  A few years back, my husband was diagnosed with meningitis.  He had to be quarantined and we all had to take medication.
Oh wow. No I've never had to deal with that before. I hope your husband is ok!

dialogs.situation: With all the money I've been saving up, I should be able to purchase an Oculus Rift Virtual Reality system soon! I'm so stoked to try VR!

turns.text: With all the money I've been saving up, I should be able to purchase an Oculus Rift Virtual Reality system soon!
Awesome, congrats! I'm not too familiar with the Oculus Rift, is there a particular game you're eager to play?

dialogs.situation: A man in our community was hit by a drunk driver the other night and didn't make it.

turns.text: A man in our community was hit by a drunk driver the other night while walking his dog, he didn't survive. It's very heartbreaking.
That is so sad!  I would be so mad at the drunk driver!  How could he live with himself!

dialogs.situation: my neighbor just installed a fancy pool , must have cost him 40k

turns.text: my neighbor just installed a 40k pool, i think its a waste of money
Maybe, but maybe not. I bet it would be a lot of fun to have such a nice pool if you had the money for it.

dialogs.situation: I care about most poor people.  But I have more sympathy for those who are actually trying to improve their situation, than those who are just looking for a handout

turns.text: I've got more sympathy for poor people who are actually trying to improve their situation, than those who are just looking for a handout
Well of course..Like all the drunks and druggies begging for money who won't work on my corner? Most people are poor..and work hard!

dialogs.situation: lazy workets bug me

turns.text: The thing the bugs me the most at my job is really lazy workers , they only work when management is around and as soon as they leave back to being lazy
Well thats part of being in the workforce, work when everyone is looking, hang out when they are not. Most people arent paid enough to care

dialogs.situation: My friend learned to juggle several items. I have no idea how he does it, but it's amazing!

turns.text: My friend likes to learn new things sometimes, and he recently learne to juggle several items at once!
That's pretty amazing. I have tried juggling 3 small objects before and felt like it was impossible.

dialogs.situation: I was very ashamed when I found out I got cheated on. It really just took all the energy and hope out of me.

turns.text: Hi friend. I feel very ashamed because I got cheated on. I feel very negative and just depleted of emotion. I trusted them.
Well, that't not your fault at all. It's your scumbag significant other's fault. You shouldn't feel ashamed for the crummy thing he did - you did nothing wrong.

dialogs.situation: I expected a hike in my package. But I didn't get it. It makes me sad.

turns.text: I expected a hike in my package.
A hike in your package? I'm sorry, I don't follow. As in how long it would take to get there to you?

dialogs.situation: I am not happy with the way my kids behaved this summer. They were so lazy

turns.text: My kids were so lazy this summer
Hahahaha, that is the way sumer is supposed to be for kids.  Did they at least do the things you asked them to do?

dialogs.situation: Finally got to cut my grass last Sunday and the pull cord that starts the push mower fell off and got chewed up under the mower. Luckily it left enough cord to tie another cord to that so I can start it again,

turns.text: Started cutting my grass the other day and my pull cord fell off and got chewed up under the mower
Oof that sucks. Sorry about that. I dont like cutting my grass so my front door is covered in pink papers from city citations. oof

dialogs.situation: My son will have his 18 months shots soon

turns.text: my son will have his 18 months shots soon. i'm a little nervous about it. i hate seeing him getting shots
Don't blame you there i remember by kid getting his first shots.  He was so upset and wouldnt stop crying.

dialogs.situation: Last month, I show a pedestrian in front of me been hit by car. Since then, I am very afraid to cross the street.

turns.text: Last month, I saw a pedestrian in front of me been hit by car. Since then, I am very afraid to cross the street.

Oh yikes! That is a scary thing to witness. It is good to be safe these days with so many people using phones while driving and even walking. It is dangerous out there and you never know what can happen to you at any moment.

dialogs.situation: I get emotional thinking about my brothers, they re really important to me

turns.text: I get emotional thinking about my brothers, they re really important to me
That's sweet! Family is so important and relationships with siblings is a very significant one in our lives. I felt the same about my sister.

dialogs.situation: I forgot I was wearing makeup. I rubbed my face then walked around with eyeliner smeared all over.

turns.text: Yesterday, I walked around with makeup smeared all over my face. I wish someone had told me.
Oh my goodness! I did that after swimming one day. I was so busy getting the kids dressed that I forgot to clean my face. Black mascara all down my cheeks.

dialogs.situation: When my husband and I first decided we wanted to have a baby we were both really nervous. I still remember the day I found out I was pregnant. I was so excited to tell my husband. I went out and got a card and a gift for him to surprise him. It's one of the happiest moments of my life.

turns.text: I will always remember the day I found out I was pregnant with my first child. I was so happy and hurried out to get a card and gift for my husband to surprise him.
That's awesome. My wife and I will hopefully be in that same boat soon. Was he excited?

dialogs.situation: I'm so ready to go home. I can hardly wait!

turns.text: I haven't been home in so long. I am so ready to go home and see my family.
I bet, I get home sickness even if I'm gone a couple day.  I bet they are happy to see you as well!

dialogs.situation: I was happy when my brother moved home. I missed him

turns.text: I was happy when my brother moved home. I missed him
I bet! I am glad you have a good relationship with a sibling! That's rarer nowadays

dialogs.situation: It's back to school time. I am a teacher and I spent time getting my classroom ready today.

turns.text: It's back to school time. I am a teacher and I spent time getting my classroom ready today.
That's got to be exciting!  [And as a parent, I salute you!]  What grade do you teach?

dialogs.situation: I felt very unpleasant last week when i fell to the ground my first time skateboarding

turns.text: I felt very unpleasant last week when i fell to the ground skateboarding and lots of people saw it happen
Oh no! You have to have a tough mentality when you do that as it can be rough to have people see you fail

dialogs.situation: I hate it when my internet cuts off and starts slowing down. It bugs me out so much, maybe it's time to upgrade ISP.

turns.text: I hate it when my internet cuts off and starts slowing down. It bugs me out so much, maybe it's time to upgrade ISP.
Ugh, I am with you on that. Mine has been doing that all week. It's so annoying and it costs even more to switch to someone else

dialogs.situation: I was sad when my dog died

turns.text: I was sad when my dog died
I'm so sorry!  That can be a devastating time. I have been there before.  How long did you have your dog?

dialogs.situation: I was so mad when my cat got out. I should have been more careful

turns.text: I was mad when my cat got out. I should have been more careful
That's no fun. I had a cat that would escape all the time too. Did you get it back?

dialogs.situation: My girlfriend recently went on a white water rafting trip with her friends. Normally I might be concerned, but our relationship is going so well I remain committed and unworried.

turns.text: It's great to be in a committed relationship. Many people might be unnerved at their SO leaving for a week long kayaking trip, but not me.
I agree. I think it is important for couples to be secure enought to be happy that way.

dialogs.situation: I was visiting home in Illinois with my family, when all of a sudden there was a knock at the door. It was my best friend who lived 3 hours away from my parents! I was shocked and so happy!

turns.text: I loved getting to see my best friend unexpectedly, I never get enough time with her. I cherished every minute!
Its always a great time when that happens.  My best friend and I moved away so I hadly ever see them now

dialogs.situation: I was so scared to go into my apartment building at night. So many roaches!

turns.text: I was so scared to go into my apartment building the other night. I saw so many roaches the night before!
OMG...I know what you mean. I can't stand for anything to crawl on me or near me. Did you see any?

dialogs.situation: When my dog chewed up a hole in the carpet.

turns.text: My dog chewed a hole in my carpet 2 weeks ago.. I was very disgusted to say the least!
Haha I'm sorry! My dog is chill now but he ate a hole in the wall when he was a puppy lol

dialogs.situation: I have been with my car insurance company for 30 years.

turns.text: I have been with my car insurance company for 30 years.
They must be a very good insurance company to be able to keep your business for that lnog!

dialogs.situation: My 15 year old stole a familys member bank card number and overdrawn the account by 500, with buying mine craft stuff for his game that he had on his phone

turns.text: My 15 year old stole a family members bank card number and overdrawn the account by $500. I was so mad I asked him about it and he had the nerve to lie to me even with the proof that I needed
Ugh teenagers can be so troublesome some times! I hope you made him realize what he did was wrong.

dialogs.situation: i walked out of the house and heard a rustling in the brush and found a deer running up the hill

turns.text: i walked out of the house and heard a rustling in the brush and found a deer running up the hill

How beautiful! They are so much bigger when I see them than I think they are going to be.  My parents house has some land and when I bring my kids over there, we can see the young bucks eating the grass in their backyard.

dialogs.situation: My son drew all over my car with permanent marker!

turns.text: I can't believe my son decided to draw on the seats of my car with permanent marker!
Oh no. It's hard to get mad at them when there really isn't anything you can do about it now.

dialogs.situation: I recently had to put my cat to sleep. It was an emotional day.

turns.text: I recently had to put my cat, Blackjack, to sleep.
Thats unfortunate. It is a difficult decision to make. Sometimes we are put in those situations and they take a toll on us.

dialogs.situation: Sometimes at night I wake up and eat extremely unhealthy food. I put peanut butter and Nutella on chocolate chip cookies.

turns.text: Sometimes I wake up at night and eat junk food.
I've never done that but i know plenty of people who do that. Its normal every know and again but don't turn it into a daily habit!

dialogs.situation: I was hoping to go out with my friend's this weekend, but it was raining all weekend.

turns.text: I was hoping to go out with my friend's this weekend, but it was raining all weekend.
It's been raining a lot here, too, I know that feeling! Did you manage to find something interesting to do inside instead?

dialogs.situation: My birthday is coming up and i know my wife is getting me something cool

turns.text: Im excited my birthday is coming up and i know my wife is getting me something good
That sounds fun.  I'm sure she knows you well enough to get you something that will suit you well.

dialogs.situation: I invested pretty heavily into cryptocurrency. I'm anxiously awaiting to see how it pans out.

turns.text: I recently invested pretty heavily into cryptocurrency. I'm anxiously awaiting to see if it pays off!
That is very risky and volatile!  With no risk, there is no reward!  I am rooting for you!

dialogs.situation: Had a great day! My daughter is learning how to say so many new words.

turns.text: My daughter can say so many new words, love to see her thrive!
That is so exciting! Such a fun time in life to watch them discover new things and always be such a surprise with what you didn't know that they already knew! ha ha, that's a tongue twister.

dialogs.situation: Going to see my long distance girlfriend this weekend, and we're going to have a movie marathon. I only get to see her every so often because of the distance. I'm excited

turns.text: Going to see my long distance girlfriend this weekend, and we're going to have a movie marathon. I only get to see her every so often because of the distance. I'm excited
oh welcome to the long distance club! i am exactly in the same situation as you, we are going on a cable car, we are going to meet in 2 weeks and i also can't wait, i feel you, LET'S HAVE  A BLAST

dialogs.situation: Oh, I am so sad that my family could not come and visit me. I miss them all so much. Why is life so busy for everyone these days?

turns.text: Oh, I am so sad that my family could not come and visit me. I miss them all so much. Why is life so busy for everyone these days?
I sure wish it wasn't. I live far from my family and they can't even make time for me to go to them. So I feel for you, it is very sad.

dialogs.situation: I am content with life.

turns.text: I have nothing to complain about. Life is good.
That is awesome.  I'm with you on that.  Tough times might pop up now and then but life really is great.  I don't like to take it for granted.

dialogs.situation: It sucks seeing others make more money than me.

turns.text: It sucks seeing others make more money than me.
I totally understand that feeling. It's very frustrating. All you can do is try your best and try not to pay too much attention to that aspect.

dialogs.situation: Recently my son got very good news from his cardiologist. We can finally start planning for his future.

turns.text: My son's cardiologist gave us positive news. We have to start looking forward when it comes to him now. It's so exciting.
That is great! Has he overcome an illness or heart issue? That can be serious and very scary!

dialogs.situation: I have to put my dog down.

turns.text: I have to put my dog down, she's so sick. I don't know how I am going to cope with this.
I have had to do this too with my best friends (My beloved dogs). It is hard. I know how you feel because I have been there more times then I want to remember.

dialogs.situation: My wife is so cranky today

turns.text: my wife is so cranky today. she keeps complaining about every little thing! And it's my day off, so it's very annoying
I am so sorry that you have to go through that on your day off. Just try to be nice to her.

dialogs.situation: I wasn't able to pay rent recently. I had a messed up home.

turns.text: I recently did not pay my rent. My land lord has been terrible at providing services
Oh no. I rent also so I know your pain. My last landlord was awful.  How did your landlord react?

dialogs.situation: I miss being a kid and not having bills.

turns.text: I miss being a kid. Those were the good old days.
I feel you on that, man. I get nostalgic all the time. What do you miss the most?

dialogs.situation: I was hopeful i got the job after the interview

turns.text: I think I did very good at my interview. I hope they call me back!
Good luck. That's always nerve racking waiting for them to call. I'm sure you did well though.

dialogs.situation: When I was a kid I thought it was funny to spit off of the balcony. One time a lady was walking by and I spit off the balcony. I spit on her head by accident. I felt so bad about it.

turns.text: When I was young I loved to spit off of my 10th floor balcony. One day I spit and a lady happened to be walking by at the wrong time.
Hahahah, that is hilarious. I used to do that but with coins and stuff. I miss being a little ruthless, careless kid!

dialogs.situation: I really love the snow but it never snows here.  A few years ago, I got my wish, but it was also horrible.  Lots of people stranded all over, including my husband and daughter.

turns.text: I really really love the snow, but we never get it.  Well a few years ago, my wish was granted!
Where do you live? I live in Missouri and the snows can be brutal. We had a couple days at 0F this year. I hate it

dialogs.situation: well I started my new job this week... It is weird to be with people who don't know me

turns.text: well I started my new job this week... It is weird to be with people who don't know me
I'm sure. But it's a fresh start. Your the new person you can make people think any thing about you that you want.

dialogs.situation: I had an awesome childhood. I think about it consistently.

turns.text: My childhood was great. I have mainly positive memories of it.
You are very lucky my friend. There are so many children out there that cannot say the same, sadly. But so happy for you!

dialogs.situation: I found a giant spider in my car yesterday! It scared me!

turns.text: I saw a huge spider in my car yesterday. I scared me so!
That is frightening! especially if you didn't know whether it was a harmful spider or not! What did you do?

dialogs.situation: I really hope my dog feels better, she has been sick this past week.

turns.text: I really hope my dog feels better, she has been sick this past week.
Aw I hate to hear that. I also hope she feels better. I love my dog so much.

dialogs.situation: My downstairs neighbors always lets their dog poop in the middle of the street. It's so gross!

turns.text: Can you believe that my neighbors downstairs allow their dog to relieve itself in the street?
That is not very considerate or respectful, plus the dog could get hurt if a vehicle were traveling down the street.

dialogs.situation: I feel bad I didn't get as much accomplished in the past week as I should!

turns.text: I feel bad I didn't get as much accomplished in the past week as I should!
We all have weeks like that. Don't be too hard on yourself. Everything will get done eventually.

dialogs.situation: My daughter used the potty for her first time the other day, it was awesome.

turns.text: So the other day my daughter went potty for the first time on her own!
That is great. It is sweet to see them grow and learn. How old is she?

dialogs.situation: I was trying to take a nap and my neighbor had her loud tiny dog outside.  It kept me up and she wouldn't shut it up for anything.

turns.text: I was trying to take a nap the other day and my neighbor wouldn't shut her tiny barky dog up.
I totally feel you on that. I swear my neighbors have to be the loudest at night slamming their car doors and yelling outside right in front of my bedroom window.

dialogs.situation: I cheated to win the card game. I feel horrible.

turns.text: I cheated to win the card game. I feel horrible.
What kind of card game was it? I am not even good enough to cheat most of the time.

dialogs.situation: I am finding it hard to let go of my old car.

turns.text: I am finding it hard to let go of my grandfathers old Mercedes.
Yeah it can be tough to throw things out that remind us of special people. I still have some toys my grandma gave me when I was a baby.

dialogs.situation: just heard a thump upstairs in a house I'm house sitting all alone at. Really don't want to go check it out..

turns.text: just heard a thump upstairs in a house I'm house sitting all alone at. Really don't want to go check it out
Don't go check it out. That never turns out well in horror movies. Bring a gun then or another person.

dialogs.situation: I went on a job interview and I have been waiting all week for an answer about if I got the job or not.

turns.text: I have been looking for a job for months, going on interview after interview and I finally went on one that I am really interested in but I have been waiting all week to find out if I got it or not.
Ugh, I hate the waiting game. What's the job for? Have you tried calling back and checking in?

dialogs.situation: I feel uncertain of  the consequences, climate change will bring, it could make the pace I live underwater some day.

turns.text: I'm worried about what could happen in the future with all these climate changes.
Yes, I agree it's a big concern. Do you live in an area of the world directly affected?

dialogs.situation: My cat peed on my bath mat yesterday. I didn't realize it until I stepped out of the shower today and it was already wet.

turns.text: I discovered my cat peed on my bath mat when I got out of the shower today and the mat was wet.

Oh no! That stinks. I've never had a cat specifically because I've never been good with the idea of being able to train them. Plus it seems like you just get the one personality, and they never grow to like you. But I'm biased.

dialogs.situation: One day I was a bit short on cash so I didn't give a homeless man any money. I felt really bad, as I always try to give something to those that are in need.

turns.text: There was a day that I was a bit short on cash on hand and I didn't give money to a homeless man. I usually always do, as I feel it's my part to help those in need, as I am blessed. I felt very bad that I didn't that day.
I don't think you should feel too bad about missing one day!  It sounds like you're generous regularly.  I get it though.

dialogs.situation: I remember one time I didn't bring any cash to pay for a metro ride, and some girl just paid for me not asking anything in return.

turns.text: I once left all cash and didn't have any to pay for a metro ride, some random girl paid for me without saying a word.
Wow!  How kind is that!  Their really are kind people left in this world.  How did you respond?

dialogs.situation: my neighbours were so loud last night i didn't get enough sleep. uhhh

turns.text: my neighbors were so loud last night i didn't get enough sleep and now i feel so cranky!!
uhhh i know how you feel!! we have some young neighbors downstairs and sometimes they have late night parties in their apartment

dialogs.situation: I was in Walmart and my son pulled a few items off the shelf onto the floor, everyone was looking.

turns.text: I was in Walmart and my son pulled a few items off the shelf. Everyone was looking and whispering.
Kids like touching and looking at things, I'm sure no real harm was done. People like making a big deal out of everything.

dialogs.situation: A friend of mine entered a pie eating contest for the first time and I couldn't believe how good he was!

turns.text: A friend of mine entered a pie eating contest with no prior experience and won second place! I was so surprised he was able to do so good.
That is amazing.  Most of those guys have been training for years for that level of eating.  What kind of pies were they?

dialogs.situation: im just sitting here with my cat in my lap and thinking about all the money in my bank account. life is good

turns.text: im just sitting here with my cat in my lap and thinking about all the money in my bank account. life is good
That's fantastic! Have you been working extra hard to earn it all, or did it come to you some other way?

dialogs.situation: I was able to find some Blue Bell ice cream on sale the other day.

turns.text: I was able to find some Blue Bell ice cream on sale the other day.
Any ice cream on sale sounds like a good time to me. I've never heard of Blue Bell though, is it any good?

dialogs.situation: I wanna sell my phone but i'm scared to meet people from craigslist

turns.text: i wanna sell my phone so i posted ad on craigslist. i have 3 potential buyers but i'm so scared to meet them . you never know what people intentions are
Have you ever sold on Craigslist before? I always have the people meet me in the Walmart parking lot during the day. I have sold hundreds of things and have never had an issue like that.

dialogs.situation: I finally got a job

turns.text: I lost my job a couple of months ago and yesterday i finally got a full time job!! such a relive
That is a relief Ive been in a similiar situation.  I know its hard to bring yourself out of a hole, I can barely see the light at the end of the tunnell

dialogs.situation: My husband was in an accident 2 years ago and broke his back. I was trying to take care of him and 4 kids. The church brought us meals every night for 2 weeks after we came home. It was great.

turns.text: The church bought us meals after my husband broke his back in a car accident.
Oh no. I'm so sorry to hear that and glad people at your church are there for you.

dialogs.situation: I applied for a job one time where I was one of 4 people being considered for it and had to wait a week to find out if I got it.

turns.text: I applied for a job one time where I was one of 4 people being considered for it and had to wait a week to find out if I got it.
Oh boy!  That's always a nail biter waiting to hear back and it seems like they love to take the full amount of time before they let you know. Did you get it?!!

dialogs.situation: When i was a kid i threw a rock at a glass door and it broke but i blamed it on my brother.

turns.text: One time when i was little i threw a rock at a glass door and broke it and then blamed it on my brother.
I'm pretty sure I've done something similar to that about a hundred times in my life, so don't feel bad, lol. He would probably laugh about it now if you told him.

dialogs.situation: I play guitar as a hobby but I hardly ever play in front of other guitarists.  I only feel comfortable doing it if I know those around me can't play as well or at all.

turns.text: I play guitar as a hobby but rarely play in front of other guitarists.  I only feel comfortable doing it if the people around me play worse or not at all.
I think that's a kind of natural reaction, especially if it is just a hobby. I would have a fear of being judged.

dialogs.situation: Have to go to the doctor tomorrow to see if I have strep throat. I hate when they have to swab the back of your mouth to "make sure" that it's strep so they can treat you. Really hoping to avoid that this time around.

turns.text: Have to go to the doctor tomorrow to see if I have strep throat. I hate when they have to swab the back of your mouth to "make sure" that it's strep so they can treat you. Really hoping to avoid that this time around.
Sorry to hear that, the trouble of going to the doctor just to "confirm" its strep throat is the worst. It's like I know I have it, just help me!

dialogs.situation: I went fishing with my son a month ago, and didn't know how he'd do.  He caught 4 fish and was really excited!

turns.text: I went fishing with my 4 year-old about a month ago.
That sounds great, I can remeber going fishing with my dad at that age. Did your 4 year-old have a good time?

dialogs.situation: I found out that my friend's mole he was worried about most likely isn't cancerous.

turns.text: My friend had to have a mole biopsied and check for cancer, and they were quite worried about it. Luckily, we found out the other day that it is noncancerous and just needs to be remmoved.
That's awesome, what great news! I'm sure your friend was really frightened at the prospect of cancer.

dialogs.situation: The house is all cleaned and ready for my guests. Wow, I was cleaning all day!

turns.text: The house is all cleaned and ready for my guests. Wow, I was cleaning all day!
I was doing the same thing!  Hard work but so satisfying when you see the results!  Who is coming to stay?

dialogs.situation: I helped my son study almost every night and passed the third grade with all A's

turns.text: Last year my little boy almost failed the second grade. I have been helping him study and can you believe that he passed third grade with an A in every subject. I am beside myself.
I am a teacher so I understand.  You must be working well with him!  Do teachers know what accommodations to make or how to differentiate for him to be successful in the classroom?

dialogs.situation: When my dad got sick randomly, I went into care mode. I made sure he was going to get all the help he needed

turns.text: I really went into care mode when my dad got sick. I just made sure he was going to be okay
That takes a lot of strength to be able to do that. A lot of people would just break down instead of trying to help however they can.

dialogs.situation: it was suprising to see lebron leave the cavs a second time

turns.text: it was suprising to see lebron leave the cavs a second time
I actually don't know too much about basketball, so I really don't have a strong opinion on that. Is that a bad thing?

dialogs.situation: An ex of mine was in town, and we met up for a couple of drinks. She made a pass at me, but I told her she should get some rest. My girlfriend was understanding about it.

turns.text: Hanging out with old flames can be tricky when you are in a committed exclusive relationship.
Oh yeah that can be a mine field to walk across. Didn't have any issues?

dialogs.situation: The last time my mom came to visit, she brought along a few photo albums from my childhood.  Memories of her Very Big 80s hair flooded back, like it was yesterday.

turns.text: The last time my mom was in town, she brought some photo albums from my childhood and we spent a while paging through them.
That must've been nice. I bet that reminded you a lot of when you were a kid. Did you enjoy your time with your mom?

dialogs.situation: I used to be nervous getting in the pool when I was a little kid because it would remind me of when I almost drowned...but swimming lessons took care of that, I'm glad my parents pushed me and gave me confidence to be on the swim team

turns.text: When I was a kid I almost drowned so I would be nervous getting in the pool...but since my parents put me in swimming lessons I gained confidence and even joined the swim team
Wow, good for you finding the courage to overcome your fear! I can understand why you were nervous after what you went through.

dialogs.situation: I cheated on a lot on my homework in high school. I flunked out of college just because of that

turns.text: I was a cheater in highs school. I always got some nerd to help me, bet now I really regret it.
We all do stupid stuff as kids.  The important thing is you realize how bad that behavior is now.

dialogs.situation: I slacked off at the end of college semester and flunked the class I'm so much better then that I feel so regretful about not giving my all.
