turns.text: I know I have high potential so the fact I failed my college course had me down.
Well that's not good. I'm sorry to hear that. Do you think maybe you were just too nervous during the test?

dialogs.situation: I remember going to a theme park and wanting to ride a roller coaster. I'm afraid of heights and this was my first experience riding a roller coaster. I ended up enjoying the experience and now I love roller coasters.

turns.text: I'm afraid of heights, but love riding roller coasters.
Wow, yeah I can relate. Being really high up is terrifying, but at least on a roller coaster it is only for a really short and fast period of time!

dialogs.situation: I ate a whole pack of cookies.

turns.text: I just ate a whole pack of cookies
LOL, well, they must have been very good then. We all overindulge at times, so don't feel too bad.

dialogs.situation: I felt so much wonder and awe when I went to the beach. I was surrounded by such profound beauty, and I spent my entire day swimming, sunbathing, and laughing with my partner. It made me so happy.

turns.text: I went to the beach a few weeks ago, and it was great. The beach is so beautiful and serene
I live near the beach, too! It really is great. Although I've been out of town for a while, so I haven't been to it yet this summer. I'm glad you got to go there.

dialogs.situation: There's a new Korean restaurant that's opening up.

turns.text: There's a new Korean restaurant that's opening up.
i have never tried korean food , and i love trying different kinds of food i would be so excited

dialogs.situation: I went to a job interview felling very confident and cocky. But I got the job anyhow because I had the right skills.

turns.text: Unlike many of my friends I was confident when I went to job interviews and I always got the job. I guess I was lucky.
I think if you're confident in yourself, you can talk yourself into most jobs. You should give yourself more credit and not say you were lucky!

dialogs.situation: We dont have a fence but I know my dog will stay in the yard

turns.text: We dont have a fence but I know my dog will stay in the yard
I wouldn't be so sure of that. Even the best trained dogs can run when given a reason.

dialogs.situation: When I was a kid, I went on a few trips to the Mountain for some snowboarding lessons, come Christmas time you bet I was just praying for a snowboard of my own.

turns.text: When I was a kid, I went on a few trips to the Mountain for some snowboarding lessons, come Christmas time you bet I was just praying for a snowboard of my own
Did you ever get your own snowboard ? It looks like so much fun ! I see people on tv, where they are flying off mountain sides !

dialogs.situation: I once called my girlfriend's mother mom by accident. We were only dating for a few months and I felt so awkward but she just laughed it off.

turns.text: I once called my girlfriend's mother mom by accident.

Haha, I'm sorry but I had a little laugh at that. It reminded me of the time I did that to my teacher in school. I was embarrassed, but it made me feel better to find out that it seems like it's a common thing that happens, since they're female authority figures that you can easily mix up.

dialogs.situation: I got approved to adopt a dog!

turns.text: I got approved to adopt a dog!
Yay!  I love dogs!  Do you have any you want to get specifically or are you just going to look until you find one that clicks?

dialogs.situation: I just got cable again and I missed watching babytv with my son. It is definitely his favorite.

turns.text: I just got cable again. I was upset because I couldnt find anything to watch
Oh lol! I know, that is why I only watch stuff on the computer. More control over it

dialogs.situation: I went to my moms house last weekend and w=she gave me some picture of me when I was a child. it was nice looking through the old photos

turns.text: I went to visit my mm last weekend. We enjoyed talking and looking through old photos.
Do you guys live far away from each other? I love talking with my mom about her and my childhood.

dialogs.situation: I really enjoy working at dairy queen. The pay isn't great but it gets me out of the house. I feel like its meaningful.

turns.text: I have been working at Dairy queen for 5 months now, its fun!\
I just moved to a small town and we don't have a Dairy Queen here. I used to go to one where I lived before.

dialogs.situation: Turning 21 next week. I hope I hit it off with a girl.

turns.text: Turning 21 next week. I hope I hit it off with a girl
That's a good goal!  I recommend online dating if you are trying to meet many different women!

dialogs.situation: The last few weeks we have been buying clothes, shoes, and supplies so that my daughters would have everything they needed to go back to school. Yesterday was there first day and it went well. I'm glad that my planning and buying in advance paid off.

turns.text: The last few weeks have been spent buys school clothes, shoes, and supplies so my girls would be ready to go back to school. There first day was yesterday and it went well.
Great! Are you home all day or do you just get them off to school and then head to work yourself?

dialogs.situation: My 3 year old got into some oil that I had sitting down on the counter just for one minute.  He dumped it all over the couch and living room floor.  It took everything I had not to explode.

turns.text: My 3 year old got into some oil that I had sitting down on the counter just for one minute. He dumped it all over the couch and living room floor. It took everything I had not to explode.
I'm impressed you didn't explode!  My wife would've gone insane.  She hates that kind of stuff.  How long did it take to clean up?

dialogs.situation: Someone cut me off in traffic this morning. I was so mad!

turns.text: Someone cut me off in traffic this morning.
I hate other drivers.  It seems like they are getting worse every day.  Did you honk at them or anything?

dialogs.situation: I am scared of how work is going to go, it is the start of our busiest period of the year

turns.text: I am scared of how work is going to go, it is the start of our busiest period of the year

It's hard for me to empathize since I'm just in college right now. But my girlfriend is in a line of work that is the same way, and I hate to see her get so stressed out and all of her time eaten away because of work. I try to give her her space and to be understanding. Hopefully people do that with you, too.

dialogs.situation: I had to complete a project at work with my team. Unfortunatley I was the only one dedicated to actually doing it. The rest of my team just sat around and watched me scramble.

turns.text: I had a project at work assigned to my team at the last second. It was due in just a few hours! I was the only one on my team who actually cared to get it done. While I was scrambling around the rest of my team just watched me going crazy.
I'm sorry to hear that... it sucks being in a "team" where no one wants to do anything

dialogs.situation: One time a hurricane hit my city and it was so windy I couldn't sleep that night. I thought the wind would tear the roof off of the house

turns.text: A hurricane hit my city. The first night I thought the wind was going to tear the roof off the house
Oh no! Hurricanes are scary.  I've been through a few myself.  Was it your first one?

dialogs.situation: I feel I am strong at my work

turns.text: Do you feel that you are satisfied with your work
i can say that i am satisfied with where i am what i do and what its done for me. are you?

dialogs.situation: I am happy with my life.

turns.text: I am content with my life. I have nothing to complain about, luckily!
That is wonderful to hear, good for you. There's way too much craziness in the world making people unhappy. It's nice to hear someone is doing well and happy.

dialogs.situation: I spit in my coffee cup this morning and it had leftover coffee in it too. I totally forgot and drank it!

turns.text: I spit in my coffee cup this morning and it had leftover coffee in it too. I can't believe I forgot this and drank it in the afternoon...
Ugh, I did the same thing today! I'm going to have to start making fresh cups in the morning and afternoon.

dialogs.situation: You know that feeling when loneliness just hits you in the gut? I hate that. I have to remember the bad things that I lived with so I can make that feeling stop.

turns.text: You know that feeling when loneliness just hits you in the gut?
Yeah, I do. I'm in a long distance relationship. I get that everytime I have to fly back home. I hope you start to feel better, though. Loneliness can end up being a good motivator, however.

dialogs.situation: I used to be pretty buff a couple years back. That gives me inspiration that I can get back to that shape again.

turns.text: I used to be pretty buff a couple years back. That gives me inspiration that I can get back to that shape again.
I believe in you, man. I'm a bit rotund myself, but I started hitting the gym this past week.
my girlfriend annoys me sometimes, but I still love her anyway
A little bump in a relationship should not affect it, that is good. Always love and take care of her.

dialogs.situation: These people at work are so disrespectful and racist!!

turns.text: these people at work are so disrespectful and racist!! I can't wait till i quit! I'm an armed guard and they want me to help customers to find products and i'm not there for that!!
Hmmm sounds like an unpleasant job. Maybe they ask you for help because you're the only one around? It doesn't hurt to help those in need.

dialogs.situation: When I was ten I demanded that I have a surprise party for my birthday. My parents knew that doing a surprise party on the day of my birthday wouldn't produce much of a surprise, they told me that they invited everyone but no one could make it. The next day they planned the real surprise, and really got me.

turns.text: For some reason, when I turned ten I demanded a surprise birthday party from my parents. To trick me, they ended up planning the party for the day after my birthday. I was extremely disappointed on my birthday, but they sure got me the next day!
ha ha ha thats a good one tho! Your parents tho omg. Thats funny but I am sure it wasnt in the moment.

dialogs.situation: I lost a job I had for many years. I wasn't sure what I would do, but I felt things would work out

turns.text: I was very disappointed that I was let go of a job I had had for years
I'm sorry to hear that. Did they give you a severance package? Also, Do you have prospects for a future position?

dialogs.situation: I get very depressed seeing roadkill when driving. Such a sad way to go.

turns.text: I get very depressed seeing roadkill when driving. Such a sad way to go.
Have you seen any recently? It is really sad, what gets me the most is hearing about black bears being hit.

dialogs.situation: My father died about a year ago. I still have trouble when I remember seeing him dead in his bed.

turns.text: I'm having difficulties when I think about my father. He died one year ago and it's still hurting very much.
I'm so sorry to hear about that, it must be awful. Do you have friends and family that you can talk to about this?

dialogs.situation: I don't have a laundry washer or dryer in my apartment. So my mom comes by every week and picks up my smelly clothes. I am very thankful for her.

turns.text: I don't have a laundry washer or dryer in my apartment. So my mom comes by every week and picks up my smelly clothes. I am very thankful for her.
That's pretty sweet of her. Some people would find it annoying that their parents still want to baby them, but I say you shouldn't take it for granted. They just want to be in your life.

dialogs.situation: I am terrified of clows

turns.text: I am terrified of clowns
I'm not afraid of clown myself, but I can absolutely see how they can be terrifying to some people!

dialogs.situation: I did my homework ahead of time. I knew I would not have enough time on the weekends.

turns.text: I did my homework ahead of time. I knew I would not have any free time over the busy weekend.
Smart move - it's always a swell idea to get ahead of work so that we can do the things we want to do in life.

dialogs.situation: I feel so blessed to be born in an area of the world where there are no major natural disasters. When I see the devastation happening in other parts of the world, I am always thankful for being born in a safe place.

turns.text: I feel so blessed to be born in an area of the world without many major natural disasters.
Me too, I am very lucky to have moved. I used to live in a place with a lot of earthquakes and hurricanes

dialogs.situation: I accidentally bounced a check today.  I am so upset I did that.

turns.text: I accidentally bounced a check today.
What a bummer. Did you have any sort of coverage for it? And how did you do it accidentally?

dialogs.situation: I'm going to propose to my girlfriend soon. We have been together 4 years and I want to spend my life with her, I think she will say yes!

turns.text: I want to propose to my girlfriend soon. We have been together for a long time and I know she wants the same as me.
That's great news! I'm so happy for you. I've been with my wife for 15 years.

dialogs.situation: We paid 600$ for a cruise, but they canceled it with not refunds one week before. so mad

turns.text: We paid 600$ for a cruise, but they canceled it with not refunds one week before. so mad
No refunds for a cancel 1 week before? That sounds like a total scam! I would be furious. Did you ever find a way to get your money back? Because that does not sound legal!

dialogs.situation: When my husband asked me about how to build a chicken coop I was able to give him a reply that was backed up by blueprints and research from the internet.

turns.text: We recently got 9 chicks and we've been having to work on making them a coop! I had to do so much research but I think we finally have a place that they'll enjoy living when they aren't able to free range.
OHH! I Love chickens ! I have always wanted some. I have a duck! lol- What kind of chickens are they?

dialogs.situation: when my neighbors wouldnt stop their dog from barking and it bit me

turns.text: I told my neighbor multiple times to stop their dog from barking. They leave it outside the entire day and most of the night!
That is awful! I hate people who leave their dogs out all day. That's no life for a dog to live at all.

dialogs.situation: I hate it when my dog jumped on the table and started wolfing down my child's birthday cake. I had spent four hours preparing the cake only to see it disappear in 30 seconds!

turns.text: Last week I was so upset when my dog jumped up on the table and started eating my child's birthday cake! I really yelled at the mutt!
Oh no, I hope your kid wasn't too upset. Maybe need to lock the dog in another room when food is out.

dialogs.situation: once I realized I had packed everything I needed

turns.text: Once I went on a trip and realized I didnt forget a single thing.
That had to make you feel good. It is so easy to forget when your trying so hard to remember. LOL

dialogs.situation: I had a girl that I was seeing one time and she asked if I wanted to come with her to meet one of her friends. I went along and the way she talked to her was so much more passionate and energetic than with me and it made me wonder what he has that I don't.

turns.text: I had the worst time last week. I went with my girlfriend to see one of her friends and she talked to him with so much more energy and passion than she does with me.

I really wish I could NOT correlate to that.  But I can.  Me and my girlfriend are going through a weird time right now where she likes to tell me how hot other guys right to my face.  It is a terrible feeling, and I know exactly what you are talking about.  If it occurs a lot more I suggest you saying something about it, better to know the truth than dwell on it everytime.

dialogs.situation: My husband is such a great guy. I don't ever have to worry about him going out and cheating on me. That is great because I used to be a jealous person.

turns.text: My husband is so amazing. I can trust him totally.
That's so great to hear. Relationships can be hit or miss sometimes. Sounds like you got a good one.

dialogs.situation: I've been passively job hunting for a few months now, looking for a better job. I haven't had any luck yet and I'm starting to feel like I never will.

turns.text: I've been passively job hunting for a few months now, looking for a better job. I haven't had any luck yet and I'm starting to feel like I never will.
Please don't ever give up. I would definitely work harder to find a job by networking with friends that have jobs in different places.

dialogs.situation: I enjoy helping the wildlife in my area where I live. I give them a helping hand. I give them water, birdseed, my left over food. The animals love watermelon and cantaloupe.

turns.text: I enjoy helping the wildlife in my area where I live. I give them a helping hand. I give them water, birdseed, my left over food. The animals love watermelon and cantaloupe.
That is so cool, my mother in law has bears come into her yard! I'd be happy with the hummingbirds, so pretty.

dialogs.situation: I went around work all day today with a hole in my pants, right on my bottom. Nobody told me until I was leaving. I have no idea how many people noticed!

turns.text: I went around work all day today with a hole in my pants, right on my bottom.
Ahhhh! I've done that before, but I noticed it quick.  Did you not know til the end of the day?

dialogs.situation: My nephew just said his first words last week.

turns.text: My nephew just said his first words last week.
How exciting!  I remember when my girls said their first words!  What was his first word do you know?

dialogs.situation: A friend of mine died Thursday and I hadn't called her in a few weeks.

turns.text: A friend of mine died Thursday and I hadn't called her in about in a month
That's terrible! I'm really sorry to hear that, but even if you could have said something it doesn't just make it better.

dialogs.situation: After the first team meeting under new management I felt very sure that i can depend on my team

turns.text: After the first team meeting under new management I felt very sure that i can depend on my team
That's great. Sometimes co-workers can be hit or miss. When you get good ones, it's awesome.

dialogs.situation: i cant wait to see if i got a raise on my next paycheck

turns.text: i cant wait to see if i got a raise on my next paycheck
That would be great.  They don't tell you in advance, you just have to find out when you get the check?

dialogs.situation: I work at a an animal shelter. It's so nice taking care of the animals.

turns.text: I work at an animal shelter and it's such rewarding job. It feel so good to be taking care of the animals there.
My daughter is thinking about that career track.  Is it hard though when an animal doesn't make it?

dialogs.situation: Ate at a fancy place the other night with the wife and the food was just terrible it cost that much.

turns.text: I ate at a fancy restaurant the other night and the quality of the food was awful. So mad I paid that much for it.
That happens more often that you might think. Just because it's expensive doesn't mean it's any good.

dialogs.situation: I am upset with Nintendo recently, they have not had a direct in awhile

turns.text: I am upset with Nintendo recently, they have not had a direct in awhile
I use to love those I didn't know they stop selling can you buy something else like different game system?

dialogs.situation: I had a bad headache this morning. I had coffee delivery and I was so thankful because it helped the headache.

turns.text: I had a bad headache this morning. I had coffee delivered and was so thankful for it.
Yeah, I know what you mean. Coffee always cures my headache. But then again it is probably not having coffee that causes the headache too.

dialogs.situation: Not too long ago, I lost a watch one of my closest friends gave me for my birthday years ago. I was devastated!

turns.text: My childhood friend gave me a watch for by birthday a few years ago, I lost it in a move recently. I'm pretty upset by it.
Oh no!  It always seems like things get lost when you move doesn't it?  Is there anyway you can go back and see if its at your old place?

dialogs.situation: My roommate hasn't washed the dishes in weeks. I am so grossed out.

turns.text: My roommate hasn't washed his dishes in weeks. I am so horrified of the smell when I go into the dang kitchen.
You should definitely change roommates. I had been through such experience and know how more difficulty he can bring. Stay away from irresponsible people

dialogs.situation: I was really mad with my housemate last night. She got in really late and made loads of noise.

turns.text: I was really mad with my housemate last night. She got in really late and made loads of noise

Oh that can be annoying! I guess in her defence it was a Saturday night? But still, it doesn't take much effort to try to keep the noise down even if you do get in late! I hope you were able to sleep okay.

dialogs.situation: My landlords do not approve of dogs in my house so I had to leave my dog with my parents.

turns.text: My landlords do not approve of dogs in my house so I had to leave my dog with my parents.
That's too bad. I can't have dogs in my apartment either. Why won't they let you have one?

dialogs.situation: After many years of depression, it looks like I am beginning to get better.

turns.text: After many years of depression, it looks like I am beginning to get better.
That's wonderful news. I have also battled depression and am feeling better now. That  is a real big deal.

dialogs.situation: when someone dosnt stop talking

turns.text: i hate when someone dosnt take the hint to stop talking
Yes that is incredibly annoying! I'm a quiet person by nature so that can drive me carzy quite fast!

dialogs.situation: I went to someone's home who was going to buy a guitar from me after confirmation that he would be there.

turns.text: I went to meet up with someone who was going buy a guitar from me. He lived 30 minutes away. The guy never answered his door when I got there.
I hate it when that happens. I don't feel like it is necessary to flake,they should be sure before they lead people along.

dialogs.situation: I am not too happy that I didn't drive my mother to the airport

turns.text: I am sad that I didn't drive my mother to the airport
Why? Was it because you didn't take those last few moments to spend time with her? Sometimes we have so much going on, we don't have time to do it all!

dialogs.situation: I was anticipating the first day of school for a few days. It was going to be the first day in High school

turns.text: I was anticipating the first day of school for a few days
A new school year can be a pretty exciting thing.  Is it a new school year for you or your child?

dialogs.situation: My kids are the best. They get excited about everything. I think I had some good ones.

turns.text: I think I have some pretty decent kids. May be too soon to tell though.
Oh, all kids are a little iffy, I think. Are you a teacher or do you mean your own children?

dialogs.situation: There was a time a few years back where I was given a car. We only had one and needed a second and it was so helpful. I was blown away by someone's kindness.

turns.text: A few years ago, there was a time that I really needed a car. I had to go to school and my husband worked full time.
Did you not have a car? That's hard. I don't have one now and use Uber and Lyft all the time.

dialogs.situation: My brother got a new promotion at work. I was pretty surprised in a good way to see his paycheck

turns.text: My brother got a promotion at work. I was surprised in a good way at his paycheck
That's great, good for him! It's always makes you feel good when your hard work is appreciated.

dialogs.situation: My dog was ran over yesterday after sneaking outside.

turns.text: My dog managed to slip out the door yesterday and ended up going straight for the road and got ran over. I feel so horrible.

Holy cow, that's terrible. I really feel for you. My dad had that happen to him and his dog when he was young, and he's told me about it as a warning to make sure I'm safe with ours. I wouldn't wish it on anyone. I hope you get through the grieving process okay.

dialogs.situation: I can't wait for Fall. This summer heat is killing me.

turns.text: I can't wait for Fall. This summer heat is killing me.
Tell me about it. It's over 100 almost every day here and it's so humid it makes the air feel sticky!

dialogs.situation: I felt sad when my dog passed away. It was a pet that I had since I was 3 years old, and was one of the saddest days of my life.

turns.text: Have you ever had a pet that you had to put down? I was so heartbroken when my dog of 16 years had to be put down. this was years ago but it still makes me sad to this day.
That is heartbreaking, it's always helped me to remember that no matter what happens, you have your memories with them.

dialogs.situation: I saw a hurricane coming towards my house

turns.text: I saw a hurricane coming towards my house and there was nothing I could do than to evacuate
Oh wow I hope you are save did you have to evacuate to a shelter or to family house away?

dialogs.situation: I saw a loose dog today, I wanted to take it home so bad. It worried me that it would get hit. I couldn't catch it.

turns.text: I was on a run today, and saw a loose dog but couldn't catch it before it ran off!
That's so interesting because I saw someone post the same thing on a neighborhood app just today.  Is that you? ha ha.

dialogs.situation: My mom said she'd go to the doctor the next time she started feeling weird heart palpitations again. I'm about a thousand miles away from her, so I can't force her to go. But I'm worried about her, as she's always avoided the doctor, and always been in poor health. Hope she does the right thing.

turns.text: My mom said she'd go to the doctor the next time she started feeling weird heart palpitations again. I'm about a thousand miles away from her, so I can't force her to go. But I'm worried about her, as she's always avoided the doctor, and always been in poor health. Hope she does the right thing
I hope so, too. Heart conditions can be scary! Do you have anyone closer to her that could check in?

dialogs.situation: I found out my cat has terminal kidney failure. I really don't want to lose her.

turns.text: My cat has terminal kidney failure. There's no cure.
Oh, I am so sorry! I used to have a dog we loved so much who had diabetes...we gave him insulin shots twice a day but we lost him. I can relate to how you feel...

dialogs.situation: I feel guilty as a parent because I don't like to part in a lot of my children's school activities.

turns.text: I feel guilty as a parent because I don't like to part in a lot of my children's school activities
Sometimes it just gets a little overwhelming. There can just be too much going on at once, especially if you have more than one child.

dialogs.situation: I drank a lot of alcohol at a BBQ party and puked.

turns.text: I drank a lot of alcohol at my friend's BBQ party, and I ended up puking and passing out. Not my finest moment.
Haha, I can relate to that. I did that too, and my friends took a wonderful photo of it. They like to stick it on our yearly Christmas cards to each other

dialogs.situation: christmas is already back in my store , brings back memories

turns.text: we have been getting in a lot of christmas freight over the last couple of months at my store, it always brings back a lot of memories of the good old times
I know, Christmas was the best when we were children. Now that were adults it's not as exciting.

dialogs.situation: My girlfriend dumped me today. I am so sad right now.

turns.text: My girlfriend dumped me today.

That's awful news! I don't want to sound cruel but at least this could maybe be a period of your life where you can just focus on you and improve a lot of areas of your life. You could look at it like a second chance.

dialogs.situation: I'm pretty amazed at myself that I'm able to stand on my own two feet and it's already been 2 years since I officially  moved  out of my folks' house!

turns.text: I'm amazed at how far I've come in life...from being a loser living at my parents' house not contributing anything to society..to being a self-employed entrepreneur paying my own bills and rent in Texas
that is absolutely amazing! I'm so proud of you! You should be very proud of yourself as well

dialogs.situation: I got gas ahead of time.

turns.text: I got gas tonight because I didn't want to run out in the morning before work. I'm usually rushing around so it'll be nice not to have that worry tomorrow.

My girlfriend always likes to wait until the needle is past empty. I never let it get past half-way empty. I don't get how she deals with that stress in her life! And to me, it makes no sense. But I guess she hates spending the money on it, so she waits.

dialogs.situation: We went to our county fair last night and it was very old fashioned.

turns.text: We went to our county fair last night.
Oh how fun!!! I bet you had a great time!!! I LOVE county fairs!

dialogs.situation: I spent a 4 hour roadtrip with my wife playing on her phone the hole time.  It was aggravating to me because i needed someone to keep me occupied while driving

turns.text: I went on a 4 hour roadtrip the other day and i hate when people play on their phone when I am driving
A road trip sounds fun, but I agree with you. I feel like I am a cab driver when people are on devices and not talking to me at all.

dialogs.situation: Not being able to reach my goals

turns.text: I wasn't able to reach my goals in the gym a couple days ago, and it helped me realize where I'm slacking off in other areas
You sound a lot like my husband. He is really into going to the gym. Life isnt right if he doesnt get gym time.

dialogs.situation: back when I was playing a lot of mario kart and I was able to beat a lot of people it had me feeling good about my skills

turns.text: I love to play a lot of Mario kart and I am very confident in my skills
That sounds fun! What system do you play it on? I haven't played Mario Kart since the Wii.

dialogs.situation: Finishing all my work and wrapping-up the day gives me the feeling of being at peace with the world.

turns.text: When I've finished all my work for the day, and I reward myself with Youtube and a nice comfy sit-down, I feel at peace with the world. Know what I mean?
I know exactly what you mean. Achievement and productivity then rest and relaxation provide a certain level of contentment.

dialogs.situation: I ran into my neighbor's mailbox but didn't stop to leave a note. When I saw him replacing it, I felt so bad that I had to confess. He was angry that I did it, but glad that I came forward.

turns.text: I ran into my neighbor's mailbox with my car but didn't stop and leave a note.
Thats horrible! You should tell them as that is their property. What if someone did that to your stuff?

dialogs.situation: We really are lucky to live in the United States.

turns.text: Do you ever wake up and realize how lucky we are? I travel a lot and I just got back from Haiti. I'm convinced it's better to be poor in America then rich in Haiti.
That's a profound thought. We definitely take America for granted, especially when some people say it's in its "worst state in a long time." We're prisoners of the moment.

dialogs.situation: i saw a snake in my garden the other day, although not dangerous it spooked me

turns.text: saw a black snake in my garden the other day, it's not the poisonous type but it scared me
I completely understand! They scare me and I become like a little girl! The rat snakes are great though...I would never hurt them..but I don't want them near me or in eye vision! lol

dialogs.situation: Whenever you start a new job you must depend on your trainer to show you the ropes. Moving into the fast paced world of retail after being away for years I really relied on my trainer.

turns.text: After a few years in the service industry i decided to go back to retail. Over the years I was away things had changed so much that i have to rely heavily on my trainer.
Awww man, yeah the retail stores tend to change some stuff up, and sometimes it feels like you have to start all over again, but I'm sure you can push through!

dialogs.situation: Sometimes I have to remind my self that I am being level headed while raising my kids because there really are times that I am positive I am messing everything up

turns.text: Raising kids is hard at time, sometimes I am positive I am doing everything right to the best of my ability then other days I am sit wondering if I am being level headed about it all
I'm glad you're taking it seriously, parents have the ability to be the best thing that ever happened to their kids' lives, or the worst, but I'm sure you're doing your best

dialogs.situation: I dropped an antique tea cup and it smashed. It was my grandmother's so I was sad.

turns.text: Yesterday, when I was cleaning the cupboards, I dropped an antique tea cup and it shattered.
Oh no. Was it something that was in the family or was it something that you purchased. Either way I'm sorry to hear that.

dialogs.situation: We have a team building at woek in a few weeks our office is full of problems but I'm going to predict this team building turns out good.

turns.text: Professional settings is suppose to get along and be great but not my place of work staff fight like cats and dogs there.
That is awful.  I agree.  A professional setting is supposed to be ... well, professional.  What steps are being taken to correct that?

dialogs.situation: Peace and quiet while you are studying is nice but when you are done and no one is around it tough.  I need human interaction.

turns.text: Just finished studying.  The peace helped me concentrate but now no one is around to celebrate with.
That's too bad. It's nice to have friends to revel in our victories. Why don't you get yourself a beer and relax on the porch?

dialogs.situation: I have had bad luck in the past with cars but I know its about to turn around

turns.text: I have never had a decent car
That's too bad. In all fairness, no one really needs a good car. I have a beater, but it's get me from place to place. That's all that really matters.

dialogs.situation: I didn't wear a belt today and my pants fit pretty loose... They pretty much fell down while I was at work today.

turns.text: I didn't wear a belt today and my pants fit pretty loose... They pretty much fell down while I was at work today.
Oh well that would have been embarrassing, but if you were trying to shed a few pounds I would say your doing a great job!

dialogs.situation: i'm mad at my mother because she didn't call me

turns.text: i recently discovered that my father is sick , i tried to contact my mother to see what happened but she didn't answer. i'm so mad at her because she didn't even try to call me again.
Could she just be too distraught to pick up a phone? I agree that she owes that much to you but, maybe shes too broken atm

dialogs.situation: My wife got us a super comfortable recliner, and its so comfy I almost never want to get out of it.

turns.text: My wife bought us a super comfortable double recliner, and every since we got it, I never want to get out of it.
Oh nice! I need one of those! My couch is so uncomfortable. It would be hard to get out of a new recliner for me as well.

dialogs.situation: My daughter is going to be a senior in high school this year. She will graduate and go to college next year. I am so excited for her.

turns.text: My daughter is going to be a senior in high school this year. I am so excited for her.
That's fantastic! Senior year can be such a fun experience! I hope that she enjoys it. Is she going to take a senior trip?

dialogs.situation: when I was younger I was ashamed that I went into a comic book store with a good friend of mine and tried to steal a lot of comic books but luckily I was caught

turns.text: when i was younger I did something I was very embarrassed about
we all make mistakes , what's important is to learn from them! and you were young so it's okay you know?

dialogs.situation: I was always socially awkward, i feel so lonely

turns.text: I'm kind of socially awkward and I don't know how to start conversations in real life. I wish i had more friends
having a few good friends or even one is better then having a bunch of fake ones. It is hard to make friends as an adult that are true friends even if you are great at it! So don't feel bad

dialogs.situation: I saw a spider running across my desk and screamed

turns.text: Yesterday, I saw a spider run across my desk and I scream so loud.
Hahaha, that is hilarious! We have some mega spiders where I live. Imagine pulling some toilet paper and a huge spider the size of your hand comes jumping out. It happened to me!!

dialogs.situation: I won the national debate championship.

turns.text: The results came in and I won the national debate championship with my team!

Hey, congratulations. That must have been a lot of hard work. I wish I put more time into extracurricular stuff like that. It's a good look in the future. Especially the debate team--you develop so many good life skills with that!

dialogs.situation: I'm looking forward to the upcoming weekend.

turns.text: I'm looking forward to the upcoming weekend.
I hear you on that. I'm visiting my girlfriend, but she still has to work, so the weekend is really the only time we can hang out. Do you have any special plans?

dialogs.situation: I remember when me and my brother used to play video games together

turns.text: I remember when me and my brother used to play video games together. nintendo and stuff.. it was so much fun. i miss those times
awww, i used to play sega with my brother :) it was awesome. streets of rage was my favorite game

dialogs.situation: There was a bad accident this morning by my daughter's school because a careless driver wasn't going the speed limit in the school zone I was so mad because a child could have been hurt.

Oh I know how you feel! I wish there was some kind of hotline where you could report a license plate to law enforcement so they would get in trouble for being stupid with kids around

dialogs.situation: I saw a yearbook with my in from when I was a kid. It just made me feel weird to look at it

dialogs.situation: My son wants to join soccer, but I just don't want to have to take him to practices and I am a bit ashamed about that.

Haha! No! It's not wrong! My son played travel baseball for 6 years and we spent 6 days a week at the ballfields!

dialogs.situation: I could not wait to start school this past semester. I just wanted to learn

turns.text: I could not wait to start school last semester. I wanted to learn more
It is nice that you love learning so much.  What are you studying that you like that much?

dialogs.situation: i just got off a call with a kid in a university , he said he would pay me 5 bux i trusted him

That's good that you trusted him. Sometimes I miss out on good opportunities because it is hard to trust.

dialogs.situation: I am waiting intensely for a call back for a new job!  I figure I have it!

turns.text: I am waiting intensely for a call back for a new job! I figure I have it!
Oh that is awesome! Im sure you do! Waiting for that can really feel like forever when its only been a few minutes!

dialogs.situation: I couldn't pay for all my groceries and someone came up from the line behind me and paid for the rest.  I was so touched!

turns.text: I couldn't pay for all my groceries and someone came up from the line behind me and paid for the rest. I was so touched!
Wow, how amazing is that!? I wish someone would do that for me! I mean, I don't think I buy more than $30 of groceries at a time since it's just me, but still!

dialogs.situation: I wish I could have visited my family this weekend. But I have a big project to work on.

turns.text: I feel a bit sad about this weekend. I have to work on a big project for work instead of visiting my family.
I'm sorry to hear that. Hopefully after this project you can get some time off to spend with your family.

dialogs.situation: I can't wait until I have grandkids.

turns.text: I can't wait to have grandkids. IS that weird?
Not to me!  Some part of me is anxious to be holding a grandchild, and then when they poop or get fussy, to hand them riiiiiiight back to their parents!

dialogs.situation: I fell walking up the stair today. There was a large group around, and people laughed at me.

turns.text: I fell walking up the stair today. There was a large group around, and people laughed at me.
I think you should always focus on your strength then it won't matter who is there and what they say

dialogs.situation: I could not believe how well my friend's niece did at her dance recital

turns.text: I went to my friend's niece's dance recital this weekend. I could not believe how well she did.
Ive never been to one of those.  Is she really young or is she like a professional dancer?

dialogs.situation: I've been working hard as a waiter this summer. Kind of fun since it's helped me develop social skills.. One person even tipped me $25 when their order was only like $8. Caught me off-guard that someone wanted to be that nice to me

turns.text: I've been working hard as a waiter this summer. Kind of fun since it's helped me develop social skills.. One person even tipped me $25 when their order was only like $8. Caught me off-guard that someone wanted to be that nice to me
I had some one tip me a $25 chip at the casino after seeing a pic of my daughter in my locket. I cried lol

dialogs.situation: I got a scholarship for college.

turns.text: I got approved for a scholarship for college that I had been competing for for many months!

Nice! I wish I was more active in searching for scholarships like it sounds like you are. But this one sounds like it was a lot of hard work to earn. I haven't been the smartest about lightening the student loan debt burden while in school. Good on you for looking ahead.

dialogs.situation: I bought some cheap stocks hoping that they would go up in price. They didn't.

turns.text: I bought some cheap stocks hoping that they would go up in price. They didn't.
Oh no! I used to be a financial advisor so I'm sure that was frustrating. I hope you didn't lose too much money!

dialogs.situation: When I found out my job wasn't cracked up to what I thought it was

turns.text: I was pretty disillusioned when I found out door to door sales wasn't a fun time

Yeah... that seems like a hard gig, especially in today's day and age, where everyone's so wary, and especially since there's not often people at home during the day. You have to have good people skills to do that job, though. So, you at least probably have that going for you.

dialogs.situation: I was trying to sleep train my son but i failed

turns.text: i was trying to sleep train my son but i failed. i didn't it's gonna be that hard. I think we will be co sleeping till he goes to college
Ha ha, I'm sure he'll get the the hang of it eventually. It takes some children longer than others to get used to.

dialogs.situation: I am very irritated with people who want to make everyone else miserable when they are.

turns.text: I am very irritated with people who want to make everyone else miserable when they are.
i freakin  hate that, like dude be sad or mad on your own dont take it out on your family, friends , or co workers

dialogs.situation: How can I work so hard and not get a raise, while others are getting

turns.text: How can I work so hard and not get a raise meanwhile others colleagues are. I am so jealous what do I do?
I'm sorry you feel that way. If you feel that you do good, honest work, you should demand better pay!

dialogs.situation: A colleague at my job took credit for months of my work and claimed I was of no help to them. It all worked out as it should have in the end, but that's never an easy situation.

turns.text: I recently was in a situation at work where I had a colleague take credit for months of my work, and go out of their way to tell my boss and others in a committee that I actually held the team back.
Ugh I hate crap like that.  Why can't credit be shared?  Does it always have to be so cutthroat?

dialogs.situation: I had a fierce argument with my friend over Donald Trump policies. He is not responding to my calls now

turns.text: Me and my close friend had somewhat fierce argument about Donald Trump policies yesterday. And now he is not responding to my calls
Thats too bad. I hope everyone remained respectful. Seems like everyone is being kind of childish about politics lately and getting mean fast instead of keeping it decent.

dialogs.situation: I picked up my son from daycare today and they said another kid had pushed him over and taken his toy.

turns.text: I picked up my son from daycare today and they said another kid had pushed him over and taken his toy.

I'm sorry to hear that. Sometimes kids don't know how to interact well with each other. But it's an important part of the socializing part of life that they work their way through it. All you can do is tell them how to respectfully and appropriately respond and defend themselves.

dialogs.situation: I've been stealing internet from my neighbors since I moved in. Kinda feel bad about it.

turns.text: I've been stealing my neighbor's internet for awhile now. Feel kinda bad about it.
Haha, I wouldn't worry about it. There is much worse things you can do. Unless you're doing something you shouldn't be doing online!

dialogs.situation: so glad i can have food on the pot and groceries in the fridge

turns.text: there was a time i had no food to eat now i'm so glad i can afford food and my pantry is stocked to the brim
Oh man! I so understand that! Did you have to eat ramen and $1 meals? I did! It was awful! I am so glad you are in a better place now

dialogs.situation: I am working on getting into grad school. It is making me get all my paperwork together.

turns.text: I have been working on getting into grad school. I have to get all my paperwork together.
that is really such a pain, i remember when i had to do my paperwork for school it is not fum

dialogs.situation: i lied to my mother today

turns.text: i lied to my mother and i feel very uneasy
You should. No matter what you can't lie to your Mom. It will always come back on you.

dialogs.situation: Sometimes my friends brag about the nice things they have and I feel a little green. I know it's not good but I can't help it.

turns.text: Some of my friends brag too much about the things they have. It makes me a little green sometimes.
I totally get that. My sister does the same thing. It's hard not to feel envious even if you have a good life.

dialogs.situation: I was just diagnosed with breast cancer, just at its first stage, and I don't even know how to feel or what to do.  Its terrifying.

turns.text: I was just diagnosed with breast cancer, just at its first stage, and I don't even know how to feel or what to do. Its terrifying.
Oh love! I can only imagine the feelings you must be experiencing. Do you have a good support system in place?

dialogs.situation: I am eating at my favorite restaurant next week. i can not wait.

turns.text: I am eating at my favorite restaurant next week!
I love eating out at a restaurant with great food! Too bad it's too expensive to go every night!

dialogs.situation: When my dad told me he was getting married, I was over the moon

turns.text: When my dad told me he was getting married, I was over the moon
were you happy for him? or did you get sad because you didn't want that to happen?

dialogs.situation: I was heartbroken when my grandmother passed away, I still am not over it

turns.text: I was heartbroken when my grandmother passed away, I still am not over it
That is always tough to deal with.  Time can help, but it can't get you over the loss of a loved one.

dialogs.situation: I have a test at work tomorrow to see if I can get a promotion.

turns.text: I have a test at work tomorrow to see if I can get a promotion.
oh thats really nice , my friend in new york also has to do a test soon to get a promotion, i hope u get it - u can do it !!!

dialogs.situation: I was impressed on my first day of my senior year in high school. The new science teacher was talking about things I liked

turns.text: My first day of my senior year impressed me when I met the new science teacher. He was cool and made it easy for everyone
I love it when teachers are down to earth and easy to get along with. What did you like most about him?

dialogs.situation: I just bought a ticket to britney spears live show in vegas, It is in 3 months, I cannot wait!

turns.text: Nothing in life is certain, the only control you have is to decide what to do with the time that has been given to you.
I tend to believe that those who have Biblical faith do have a certainty, that God will bless them despite circumstances.

dialogs.situation: I've always been loyal to my wife and children. They're my whole world.

turns.text: I've always tried to be loyal and trustworthy to my wife and daughters.
Most people do not possess those qualities these days.  That is quite honorable of you.  Being faithful is quite important!

dialogs.situation: I just got back from a three month trip. I am really missing all the friends I made along the way.

turns.text: I just got back from a three month trip. I am really missing all the friends I made along the way.
But it's good that you made friends though, right? Will you still be able to keep in touch with them?

dialogs.situation: I really really would like to make a good grade on my midterm exam this week. It's my first graduate level course, so I need to be on point.

turns.text: I'm taking my midterm exam this week, and I really want to do well on it. I've studied a lot, and taken the practice test 5 times. I'm still pretty anxious though!
Nice, I guess the only times I was nervous to take a test was when I wasn't prepared, but there's only so much preparation you can do until you just have to trust your brain or whatever

dialogs.situation: On Saturday, I didn't have anything that I needed to do. So, I was content to go to the park and enjoy nature.

turns.text: On Saturday, I was able to go to the park and enjoy nature.
Was it really nice out? I love being able to go out and just listen to the sounds of the outdoors.

dialogs.situation: I've been trying to be extra supportive towards my husband. His mom is dying, and he is working long hours on top of it.

turns.text: I've been trying to be extra supportive towards my husband.
That's nice to hear.  It's always a good thing in a marriage to show each other support through thick and thin.

dialogs.situation: I'm so happy, My jalapeno plants are producing so many peppers.

turns.text: I'm so happy, My jalapeno plants are producing so many peppers.
That's great news! Congrats! My garden is not doing great this year. Do you grow anything else?

dialogs.situation: Yesterday at weekly meeting, my supervisor praised me for my good work on the project

turns.text: I worked very hard on my part on the assigned project and my supervisor praised me yesterday in front of others in the meeting
That's great to hear! I am sure you deserved it since you put so much effort in the project.

dialogs.situation: I felt so ready the first day at my new job.

turns.text: I woke up extra early just to make sure I made it to work on time for my new job.
Did you get there on time? I do the same thing, I like to be prepared for any traffic that could pop up.

dialogs.situation: I just drove in front of my old high school. It looks exactly same as when I went there.

turns.text: It was really cool to see that my old high school still looks the same. I had some great times there.
I wish i could go to my old high school. i moved far from it but if i come back i will visit

dialogs.situation: I don't eat carbs but I am still fat :( how come i am the only one that have to pass through this ?

turns.text: I don't eat carbs but I am still fat :( how come i am the only one that have to pass through this ?
I'm sorry to hear that. While diet is most of it, exercise can play a role too. How active is your lifestyle?

dialogs.situation: I couldn't believe it when a rock bounced off the car in front of me and cracked my windshield. I am so frustrated at the moment.

turns.text: I couldn't believe it when a rock bounced off the car in front of me and cracked my windshield. I am so frustrated at the moment.
That is horrible luck!  At least you weren't hurt.  Some insurance companies cover that as well, so you should check.

dialogs.situation: We are getting ready to go to the beach. I have loaded the car.

turns.text: We are going to the beach on Saturday. It takes a lot of planning to get ready!
Wow that sounds like fun! It does take a lot of planning but it is so worth it.

dialogs.situation: I really hate when people who work in customer service dont want to help the customer.

turns.text: I don't like it when people in customer service have attitudes.
Oh I know what you mean! It is even worse when you ask for their manager and the manager gives you a major tude!

dialogs.situation: I saw my girlfriend with another man.

turns.text: I saw my girlfriend with another man. I was going to propose to her that day...
Oh wow! I'm really sorry to hear that. That must have been shocking. Have you broken up now?

dialogs.situation: Its hard to deal with when your kids are getting older and have to handle their own problems. As a mom you can't just step in and fix everything like you want to.

You kinda want to hold their hand, but you know it's best they solve some problems on their own. You can't be with them all the time.

dialogs.situation: After feeling depressed for days, I took the time to sit outside in the sun and have a nice chit chat with my mom. The cool breeze felt comforting and completely changed my mood today, I feel good!

turns.text: After feeling depressed for days, I took the time to sit outside in the sun and have a nice chit chat with my mom.
That sounds like the perfect remedy for feeling down. Getting out in the sun and outside the house/bed is so good.  I'm sorry you're struggling with depression.  I understand.

dialogs.situation: going through my childrens old clothes

Oh I understand, mine is only 2 1/2 right now but I feel that way too when going through his preemie clothes. You probably feel it much more if they are grown though.

dialogs.situation: I sort of put all my eggs in one basket. I relied on a woman I know to rent her home to my family, but she started to ignore my calls and will not return them.

turns.text: So, just the other day I decided to believe a woman I know about her renting her home to my family. I really thought it would happen, but she will not call me back and it has been days.
Oh, wow. I hate it when people do things like that. They should just be honest and upfront to begin with instead of causing drama.

dialogs.situation: I was walking out of the store the other day and walked right into the glass pane!  It was so clean, I didn't realize the door wasn't open!  Talk about humiliating!

turns.text: I was walking out of the store the other day and walked right into the glass pane! It was so clean, I didn't realize the door wasn't open! Talk about humiliating!
Oh no!  I remember doing something similar when I was younger.  There was a pool outside of our screen door.  I went to run and jump into the pool from in the house and smashed right through it!

dialogs.situation: I want to participate in a bodybuilding contest

turns.text: i wan to participate in a bodybuilding contest! I'm sure i will win it!
Well, if you are willing to try steroids, then you might have a chance of winning. Without it, it is impossible to even participate

dialogs.situation: My parents surprised me with a trip up to see me for 4 days.  I was so shocked and am so happy they are here!

turns.text: My parents surprised me with a trip up to see me for 4 days. I was so shocked and am so happy they are here!
That's wonderful! I love those 'surprise visit' occassions. Sadly my parents would need to fly across the country to do that and it's just not feasible given my work schedule

dialogs.situation: I went to the bowling all alone yesterday. It was quite a bad time.

turns.text: Went to the bowling all by myself yesterday. It was quite lonely.
You cannot enjoy bowling all alone. It is a group game. Don't you have any friends to invite?

dialogs.situation: I was so surprized on the night of my graduation my parents bought me a new car!

turns.text: I think the best day of my life was when i got a car for graduation. The day started with my mom giving me hints and such. I was wondering but thought it wasnt possible so I just refocused.
That's so sweet and fortunate that she was able to do that for you. I wish I could do that.

dialogs.situation: I broke up with my boyfriend last week.

turns.text: I broke up with my boyfriend last week.
Oh no! That's awful.  Or maybe a good thing if he wasn't good for you.  How are you feeling?

dialogs.situation: All my cucumber plants died this week due to too much rain

turns.text: All my cucumber plants died this week due to too much rain
Oh man. What a bummer!  I love cucumbers and hummus!  Do you have anything else you're growing that survived?

dialogs.situation: I'm very faithful in my community and the people in it.  They are good people

turns.text: I have a lot of faith in the community I live in; everyone seems like a good person.
That's really nice, we don't get a lot of that these days. Makes me kind of miss the old days when people had a real sense of community.

dialogs.situation: I watched a documentary about puppy mills and and organization getting them rescued.  I was very moved

turns.text: The other night I was watching this documentary about a puppy mill getting busted and the dogs getting rescued.  I wanted to adopt everyone of them
Those poor dogs! I hate puppy mills so much and unfortunately I live in an area where they are very common.

dialogs.situation: my doggie recently passed away.

turns.text: my doggie recently passed away
I'm so sorry to hear that! Hopefully he or she wasn't in too much pain at the end.

dialogs.situation: I told a friend I'd go bungee jumping with them a long time ago, and recently they've decided they'd like to take me up on that offer. But I'm really scared of heights.

turns.text: A while back I said to my friend, "Yeah sure, I'd go bungee jumping with you one day". Well I forgot about it and now I'm supposed to go bungee jumping with them fairly soon, but I'm scared of heights reaally bad.
lol sorry for laughing , but that sounds like something i would agree to and forget, im afraid of heights too

dialogs.situation: I studied all week for this upcoming exam. I'm feeling pretty good about how I'm going to do on it.

turns.text: I have a huge exam coming up tomorrow.
Have you been studying? That is intimidating but I bet you'll do great! What's the subject?

dialogs.situation: My last job interview I really researched the company and what all they do.

turns.text: Before I applied at Inline I really did some background research on the company and what all they were involved in.
That's probably the best thing to do before you go to work for a place. Were you happy with your results?

dialogs.situation: I heard a buzzing in my apartment this morning. I swear to god, it was the biggest wasp I had ever seen in my life. I was so frightened!

turns.text: I heard a buzzing in my apartment this morning. I swear to god, it was the biggest wasp I had ever seen in my life. I was so frightened!
Oh jeez!! Noooo... I hate them. They are evil and so mean. They literally come right at you for no reason.

dialogs.situation: I was shy when going to a new school in high school. I did not know anyone

turns.text: I was shy when starting a new school. I did not know anyine
Oh I know what you mean! Its so weird because for that first month or so you like dont even fit in..

dialogs.situation: I found a family of rats living underneath my balcony. We tried to scare them away but they almost attacked me.

turns.text: I discovered a family of rats living under my balcony. They give me the creeps!
Oh gosh! That's terrible. I stayed in a house with a rat problem for a while, it was not fun. What're you going to do about them?

dialogs.situation: One time while I was working an employee came up to me and began to flirt with me. I told the person I was married and was loyal to my and that it was inappropriate and disrespectful. They laughed and still continued to flirt. I spoke with a manager to have me moved to another area so I could work in peace.

turns.text: I was at work the other day and this young lady started hitting on me for no reason. I told her I was married but she kept on trying to flirt with me.
It's terrible when people can't take no for an answer. Did you report her?

dialogs.situation: Was grocery shopping, and saw my old best fried in the dairy aisle. Haven't spoken to them in like ten years, even though we used to be really close. We caught up a little bit, and exchanged numbers to talk more later. Funny how small the world is sometimes.

turns.text: Was grocery shopping, and saw my old best fried in the dairy aisle. Haven't spoken to them in like ten years, even though we used to be really close. We caught up a little bit, and exchanged numbers to talk more later. Funny how small the world is sometimes.

yes dude the world is a trip, i made many friends over the years online and when i bump into them i make sure i go up to them and chit chat and shake hands, you never know when someone will pass away ,

dialogs.situation: I found some of my old baseball stuff. Those were the good ole days

turns.text: I found some of my old baseball gear, it brought back great memories
Nice, such relics of the past really hit you with a wave of nostalgia. Did the gear still fit you?

dialogs.situation: I'm really good at making people laugh. People say I should be a comdeian.

turns.text: I am so funny. People say I should go into comedy. They also say I might be the next Rodney Dangerfield!
i don't think i know who Rodney Dangerfield is but hey, good for you! it's awesome when people have a good sense of humor

dialogs.situation: a situation where I felt proud is when i was able to graduate from college

turns.text: hi
You should read the instructions before you start.. You need to work off the prompts.. But hello,

dialogs.situation: I've never had a lust for life like I do these days.  I literally wake up every day stoked that I'm living my dreams and can't wait to see how much money I can make

turns.text: I never thought I'd say it but these days I'm just stoked waking up and living the dream...I'm fully self-employed and answer to NOBODY and I have full autonomy of time, making more money than I did my previous crappy job...it's great
You must feel so content at this point. It must have taken a lot of hard work to get to this point!

dialogs.situation: I was a hard worker which got me many raises through the years. I a, pretty sure I can get another one soon.

turns.text: I worked very hard and got a lot of raises. I am sure I can get another one
That's awesome! It's great to work hard, especially when you people show they actually appreciate what you do.

dialogs.situation: I wish I didn't cheat on my girlfriend.

turns.text: I wish I did not cheat on my gf.
Man I feel you.  Today was her birthday..but I thought it would be awkward to go over since she blocked me on facebook

dialogs.situation: I've been out of work recently and my father has been helping me pay my bills. I have no way to ever repay him.

turns.text: I've been out of work, and my dads been helping me financially.
I am sorry that you are out of work.  Have you had any job interviews? It is good that your father is able to help you during this time.

dialogs.situation: Though I'm confident in my mental and physical resources I fear the worst for most people in my generation sometimes...especially in a hypothetical World War 3 scenario, or some type of global calamity occurring...every soft little punk wussy Millenial would just go to pieces

turns.text: I'm pretty self-assured in my capabilities.  But sometimes I fear the worst for the majority of my generation who would have no idea how to raise a family, profit from their own sweat and hard work, have an organic conversation, or let alone survive a World War 3.
Well you shouldn't fear things we have no control over anyway. I'm sorry you feel anxiety over this.

dialogs.situation: I felt bad when I saw a homeless man on the side of the road. I wanted to help

turns.text: I felt bad when I saw a homeless man on the street. I wanted to help
I understand, I feel the same way sometimes. It's hard because sometimes you can't help or know they have problems that made them homeless like drinking.

dialogs.situation: I saw a grown woman pick her nose and eat it earlier.  I was so grossed out.

turns.text: I saw a grown woman pick her nose and eat it earlier.
Okay, so I never understood why people ate it. What is it about it that makes them want to do that? I just flicked mine. And I thought it stopped at a child's age. Really interesting.

dialogs.situation: Recently I was at my mother-in-laws and she surprised me by buying me some organizational stuff for my house.  She knows how much I love to organize and she decided to surprise me by getting me some stuff I needed.

turns.text: Do you like to organize your house.  My mother-in-law recently surprised me recently with some organizing stuff b/c she knows how much I love it!
I'm trying to get into it. we have our first baby on the way and need to reorganize everything. Do you have tips?

dialogs.situation: I am so ready for my birthday party.

turns.text: I am so ready for my birthday party.

Happy Birthday to You!  I love birthdays so much.  Just recently celebrated by youngest daughter's 14th birthday on August 9th and my granddaughter's 4th birthday on August 10th.  When is/was your birthday?

dialogs.situation: When I saw my brother come home from college, it gave me a good feeling. It made me think I could do the same

turns.text: I got happy when my brother came home from college. It made me think I could go to college one day too
Well you should always think that. It's not hard once you get into the groove of it.

dialogs.situation: This girl just invited me out on a date. She seems sweet and I'm interested.. more interested in her than I am this other girl I've been seeing for a few weeks. But I feel bad just dropping this girl I've been seeing recently. Like, wouldn't that be rude?

turns.text: This girl just invited me out on a date. She seems sweet and I'm interested.. more interested in her than I am this other girl I've been seeing for a few weeks. But I feel bad just dropping this girl I've been seeing recently. Like, wouldn't that be rude?
I think if it's done without care then yes, care for what she would feel that is. Maybe you just have to tell the truth about what you're feeling, but it's up to you!

dialogs.situation: I rode tower of terror. I screamed my head off the entire time.

turns.text: When we went on vacation last year, I rode tower of terror. I screamed my head off the entire time.
That's at MGM right?  My daughter rode that with her daddy when she was 8, she was terrified!  Did you do it again, or was once enough?

dialogs.situation: I decided to buy a new vehicle and didn't choose to go electric. I feel a little bad about it.

turns.text: I recently had a chance to buy an electric vehicle but ended up opting for one that was conventional. I feel a little bad about the decision.
Why do you feel bad? It is a tough decision for sure, but you should never have to feel bad about it.

dialogs.situation: I have a 7 year old daughter that recently showed interest in playing piano. I found a great teacher but she is really intense. To my amazement my daughter is playing like a potential Mozart in just 7 months!

turns.text: I have a 7 year old daughter that asked to play piano. I found a piano teacher and she is very intense. I thought she would scare my 7 year old but she has excelled in just 7 months of playing. Maybe the teacher is not all that bad.
Wow!  That is amazing!  I guess a little tough instruction and training has paid off!  No need to worry then.

dialogs.situation: It makes me depressed seeing homeless people. I wish I could help them but I am going through tough times too.

turns.text: It makes me depressed seeing homeless people. I wish I could help them but I am going through tough times too.
You can always give them some money once you get yourself back on your feet. Just keep your head up - things will get better.

dialogs.situation: My mom is having weight loss surgery. Im worried the risks are too dangerous.

turns.text: My mom is having weight loss surgery next week, I'm nervous.
What kind of operation is it? I'm unfamiliar with weight loss surgery. But typically surgeries like that are very safe, but it is natural to feel nervous about someone you care about.

dialogs.situation: I get depressed when I run out of dr pepper. It is my coffee

turns.text: Dr Pepper is my coffee. Its the first thing I do when I get up
I love DR. Pepper. It's just so hard for me to keep the weight down if I continue to drink it.

dialogs.situation: My mom went back to school at 63 and recently got her bachelor's in computer science!

turns.text: My mom went back to school at 63 and recently got her bachelor's in computer science!
Wow That's amazing. You must be very proud of her.  I think coding, etc, seems very hard.

dialogs.situation: My son started screaming in a grocery store.

turns.text: While in a grocery store I told my son he couldn't have the snack he asked for, and he began screaming at the top of his lungs!
I can relate to that! It's so mortifying because everyone begins to look at you like you're a bad parent!

dialogs.situation: I was shocked when I realized I left my door open at night

turns.text: I was shocked when I realized I left my door open at night

Wide open? Or just unlocked? That's crazy! I guess you got lucky you didn't get robbed or have some animals become new roommates. Hard to believe decades ago people loved to go to bed with their doors unlocked.

dialogs.situation: I was driving at night in downtown and the GPS told me to make a right, which was a very dark and scary road.

turns.text: Last night my GPS asked me to make a right down a dark and scary road.
It's hard to trust a GPS. I have heard a lot of stories about people being steered the wrong way. Please tell me you didn't do it.

dialogs.situation: I ate a piece of cake my mom was saving for my dad and I felt like I betrayed him a bit.

turns.text: My mother was saving a piece of cake for my dad and I accidentally ate it.
Oh man, I accidentally eat cake all the time! It is too hard to resist. What did your mom do?

dialogs.situation: I was stuck in traffic the other day.  This guy thought he was more important and flew past us in the emergency lane.

turns.text: I'm not sure if you live in an area with much traffic, but here in Atlanta it's an every day thing.  I was just sitting on the interstate the other day due to a wreck in front of us and I'd been there already for around 30 minutes.
I take the bus so I don't have to deal with the traffic, but man that sounds like it would really stink

dialogs.situation: I used to be mad when girls wouldn't text me back....but now I'm more happy being unattached and busy making money and as a result they're the ones chasing me now

turns.text: I used to hate it when girls wouldn't text me back.  Now that I'm focused on my job and networking I put little to zero effort in meeting girls...and as a result they're the ones checkin up on me every night lmao
Absolutely! I've always noticed that phenomena. If you act too desperate it actually puts them off. On the contrary, acting a little disinterested gets THEM more interested.

dialogs.situation: I kept playing a card game with my brothers, and I kept losing. They were bragging over and over, and being disrespectful. I just wanted to spend quality time with them... It gets frustrating sometimes.

turns.text: I kept playing a card game with my brothers, and I kept losing. They were bragging over and over, and being disrespectful. I just wanted to spend quality time with them... It gets frustrating sometimes.
Sometimes sibling rivalry dies hard -- even when you've well outgrown it. Are y'all far apart in age?

dialogs.situation: Once my friends started to get married and have kids I feel like I have no one to go out with on the weekends.

turns.text: I feel like most of my friends are married with kids and as a single person I have no one to socialize with.
I dont have kids either, sometimes when i go out with my friends im mainly the 3rd wheel and it feels weird , i feel your pain

dialogs.situation: I'm spent all summer getting ready to write my thesis. I can't wait to get time to start.

turns.text: I spent all summer getting ready to write my thesis. I can't wait to get time to start.
That's pretty cool that you're motivated and excited to start it. Most people would be scared and procrastinating. You'll do great.

dialogs.situation: I am so happy to be alive now. I invested in bitcoin and made enough to support my family for a whole year.

turns.text: I made the luckiest choice investing in bitcoin.
How much money did you make with it? I assume most people would have sold before the peak out of fear of it crashing

dialogs.situation: A car nearly hit me yesterday just because they wanted to change lanes while turning

turns.text: A car nearly hit me yesterday just because they wanted to change lanes while turning
Oh man, that is terrifying. I'm glad you didn't get hit. What kind of crazy person tries to turn and change lanes at the same time?

dialogs.situation: i ate like 16 oysters

turns.text: i just got back from a buffet and ate 16 oysters , plus 4 different mixed plates , i feel a sense of accomplishment
That's a ton of oysters! I don't think I've even ever eaten one oyster. What's a mixed plate?

dialogs.situation: I had to do a talk and tried to tell an amusing story to break the ice.  It apparently wasn't amusing in the slightest and everyone just stared at me.

turns.text: I was doing a presentation for work, and tried to tell a story about something kind of related to break the ice.  No one laughed or even really cracked a smile, so it put me off for the rest of the presentation.
That is no fun, you always hope that first one hits so they are more receptive the rest of the time

dialogs.situation: I'm unemployed and struggling right now. I feel really bad when people talk to me about their new houses and clothes and stuff, even though they're not trying to be mean

turns.text: I'm unemployed and struggling right now. I feel really bad when people talk to me about their new stuff, even though they're not trying to be mean
I can understand the feeling, I went through a couple of spells like that in the past. I'm sure they mean well but you're at a point where you're hurting to get back out there.

dialogs.situation: I've been calling my coworker the wrong name for the past three months. They finally decided to say something about it today. The worst part is I wasn't even close with the name I had been calling them. They're so nice and I felt so bad

turns.text: I've been calling my coworker the wrong name for the past three months. They finally decided to say something about it today. The worst part is I wasn't even close with the name I had been calling them. They're so nice and I felt so bad
Haha I"m terrible with names too.  But for me there are only 2 types of people: ones that are memorable and ones that are boring and if you're boring I definitely won't remember who the hell you are

dialogs.situation: I have been eating a lot of sugar free candy recently and it made my bowels loose if you know what I mean.

turns.text: I have been eating a lot of sugar free candy recently and it made my bowels loose if you know what I mean.
Haha I know exactly what you mean! My uncle pranked his coworker once with a bag of sugar free candy. I feel for you, seriously.

dialogs.situation: My friend who trains with me has been training for the same amount of time but looks much better than I do.

turns.text: I have a friend who's been weight lifting with me for years now and he looks better than me. I wish I had his genetics!
Oh, I totally understand.  It's frustrating when you feel like you're putting in the same effort (or more!) and it works better for other people.

dialogs.situation: My child was sick and I had to make sure they got enough fluids and cuddles.

turns.text: My child was sick last week. I had to stay home with them.
Oh, sorry to hear that. There is something going around these days. I hope they are better now.

dialogs.situation: I'm scared a tornado will come in and destroy my city

turns.text: I'm scared a tornado will come in and destroy my city
Tornadoes can be so terrifying. My house was swept up by one when I was a little kid. But I guess it was okay, since I ended up meeting a talking scarecrow, a tin man, and a big ole lion.

dialogs.situation: My dog was chewing on dead frog. So gross!! I hope it was not poisonous.

turns.text: My dog was chewing on dead frog. So gross!! I hope it was not poisonous.
oh man dogs are crazy! My dog killed a cat recently, I hope it's not poison!! Is he okay?

dialogs.situation: We had to evacuate our home due to a hurricane. We knew it might happen so we got organized and packed what we would need and put it all in the car.

turns.text: We had to get out of the house because of Hurricane Matthew. It was a scary experience, but luckily we'd already packed what we needed into the car, so could just leave.
I had Hurricane Matthew come through where I live too! NE FL, I know how you feel, only I couldn't get gas for my car because there was no gas anywhere!

dialogs.situation: I got really drunk on my birthday and was horrible to one of my oldest friends, i felt awful

turns.text: I got really drunk on my birthday and was horrible to one of my oldest friends, i felt awful
did you apologise to him? maybe next time try to not drink a lot so you can control yourself?

dialogs.situation: I was coming home from work and there was a lizard by my door. It moved and that was all she wrote. I am scared to death of crawling creatures.

turns.text: I was coming home from work and there was a lizard by my door. It moved and that was all she wrote. I am scared to death of crawling creatures.
Oh my god! I have the heebiejeebies just thinking about it! Did it attack you?!?!

dialogs.situation: i was heartbroken when my dad passed away.. still not over it.

turns.text: i was heartbroken when my dad passed away.. still not over it.
Sorry to hear that... they say time heals everything but i disagree its been 9 years for me and it still feels like yesterday. How long for you?
