dialogs.situation: I can't believe my son failed his exams. He spent too much time playing football, and not enough time studying.

turns.text: My son failed his exams! Can you believe it! I don't know what to do!
don't panic, and don't be harsh on the kid. perhaps spend time going over the subject together? or maybe he's having other trouble that's affecting his studies

dialogs.situation: I haven't heard from my girlfriend in 2 weeks. Wonder what's going on?

turns.text: I haven't heard from my girlfriend in 2 weeks. Wonder what's going on?
I hate to say it but, I think that ship has sailed.  She's either dead or not your girlfriend anymore.

dialogs.situation: I was sitting on a plane next to an older man, who was telling me about how he had just visited his father, but that it was sad because he has dementia and didn't remember him anymore. I was trying to comfort him, mostly because I worry it will happen to my dad, too.

turns.text: I was sitting on a plane next to an older man, who was telling me about how he had just visited his father, but that it was sad because he has dementia and didn't remember him anymore. I was trying to comfort him, mostly because I worry it will happen to my dad, too.

It's nice that you tried to comfort him.  I'm worried about my parents, also.  It's hard to be worried about something like that in your family, knowing that you have no control over whether or not it will happen.  It's sad.

dialogs.situation: I feel this way everytime I see my brother's girlfriend. She's a racist disgusting human being and I feel sick everytime I see her.

turns.text: I really dislike people that don't have kindness and have hate in their hearts.
I SO agree. I would not want to live like that. And it's one thing if they're only affecting themselves -- but when it's aimed at others -- the worst.

dialogs.situation: I forgot to feed my dog this morning. She was acting very aggressive and I didn't know what was wrong at first then it hit me. I knew it was my fault on why she was so rowdy!

turns.text: I forgot to feed my dog this morning. She was acting very aggressive and I didn't know what was wrong at first then it hit me. I knew it was my fault on why she was so rowdy!
Haha. These dogs that I'm dog-sitting wouldn't let that happen. They wake me up at 6:30AM every morning to feed them. But hey, we make mistakes. Maybe you had a busy day today.

dialogs.situation: I was able to fix a light switch using what I know about electrical engineering.

turns.text: A light switch in my house stopped working and I was able to fix it without looking up how.
Wow, that is impressive. I probably couldn't have done it with a tutorial how. I would have walked around with a flashlight until someone felt sorry for me and fixed it

dialogs.situation: I have faith that I will get pregnant soon. Why is it so hard? Isn't that what a women's body is built to do?

turns.text: I have faith that I will get pregnant soon. Why is it so hard? Isn't that what a women's body is built to do?
Maybe it isnt your body, but also your partners! Something to check into to see which end its coming from, but none the less it will happen!

dialogs.situation: My new foster dog finally run around last night. She has been very abused and starved but is so young. I didn't know how long it would take her to get better or if she would recover quickly from her abuse. A week in- and loads of progress!

turns.text: My new foster dog finally run around last night. She has been very abused and starved but is so young.
Aww, that is so sad to hear. I'm glad that she has a good home now, though!

dialogs.situation: I love my kids so much. I want them to live with me forever

turns.text: MY kids are my favorite people in the world.
Oh yeah? That sounds awesome. That's how it should be! Can you tell me a little bit about them?

dialogs.situation: When my father died i thought me and my mom were alone. But there was a huge amount of support.

turns.text: When my father died, so many people helped us and lended us support.
I'm so sorry to hear about your father. That's so awesome to hear about the support you received, though!

dialogs.situation: I felt faithful when my cats were sick and needed palliative care.

turns.text: I was by all of my cats sides when a few passed away this past year giving palliative care when they were so sick. I didn't give up on them until they were ready to go
you did the right thing... do you foster them or are they yours since kittens?

dialogs.situation: My kids are driving me nuts! I can't wait for back to school time!

turns.text: My kids are driving me nuts! I can't wait for back to school time!
Mine went back to school today!  I watched the bus drive off and I kinda looked around and said to myself, "Well shoot, what now?"

dialogs.situation: I learned about Neurofeedback today. I feel somewhat happy about learning about it. Renewed.

turns.text: I learned about Neurofeedback today.
Neurofeedback? I don't even know what that is! Could you fill me in a little bit? And why did you need to learn about it?

dialogs.situation: A new skating rink is being built. Should be done in time for Winter skating!

turns.text: A new skating rink is being built. Should be done in time for Winter skating
That's pretty nice! I haven't been skating in a coon's age. Is the rink nice?

dialogs.situation: I went to a Cirqe d' Sole show recently and was quite amazed by the different acts!  I couldn't smiling while watching!  Their skills were unbelievable!

turns.text: I went to a Cirqe d' Sole show recently and was quite amazed by the different acts! I couldn't smiling while watching! Their skills were unbelievable!
That sounds like a lot of fun. I have always wanted to go to one of those shows.

dialogs.situation: My son had to have surgery to remove his tonsils last month. I know it's a routine procedure, but I could not sit down for the entire time and I was so relieved when they said everything went just fine.

turns.text: Last month my son had to have surgery to have his tonsils removed.
Surgery on my kids always scares me but I have heard that it is best to have them taken out while they are young

dialogs.situation: I have been watch thing new stephen king series on hulu. It is frighteneing.

turns.text: There is a new Stephen King series on hulu
Really? I tried to use hulu once but it wasnt for me. You going to watch it tonight?

dialogs.situation: I forgot I had planned to pick up my brother from work the other day. He had to wait for me to get there, I felt like such a jerk.

turns.text: Im embarrassed to admit I forgot to pick up my brother from worth the other day after agreeing to
Well hopefully he is understanding, if he is anything like my brother nothing a cold 6 pack won't fix.

dialogs.situation: I bought my truck and it's a standard truck.  But I enjoy it, and it makes me happy.  I don't need anything extra.

turns.text: I have been driving my little truck around for a while now, but I'm happy with it.
That's good. As long as at gets you where you need to go. That's what matters.

dialogs.situation: My manager have me new challenges to achieve. I am sure that I will succeed.

turns.text: My manager have me new challenges to achieve. I am sure that I will succeed.
Sounds like you will! You sound confident in yourself, and I'm sure your manager is, or he wouldn't have trusted you to do it.

dialogs.situation: There is a storm approaching my house. I am ready for it though.

turns.text: There is a storm approaching my house.

Hopefully it's not a big one that would cause serious damage, I assume? Otherwise, I kind of like storms. I like the sound of rain, and the visual aspect. It's the best when you get to fall asleep to them.

dialogs.situation: My girlfriend got me a new puppy today. I was so shocked and happy!

turns.text: My girlfriend got me a new puppy today!
That is amazing. What a lovely and caring partner you have. You must be a happy person. Was it for any special occasion or just a surprise gift?

dialogs.situation: I was cleaning my basement. I found lot of toys and books from my childhood

turns.text: i was cleaning my basement. I found lot of toys and books from my chidhood
Aww that's awesome!  Did you take a day off and go through them for the memories???

dialogs.situation: feeling full of emotons

turns.text: today is a weird day, i'm just feeling so emotional
I'm sorry to hear that. Do you mind if I ask what happened today to make it so weird?

dialogs.situation: My job can annoy me sometimes, people always have issues

turns.text: My job can annoy me sometimes, people always have issues
That's always a bad thing about having to work with others.  What kind of issues do they have?

dialogs.situation: when i was pregnant with my 1st child, the girls at work threw me a secret baby shower.

turns.text: The girls at work shocked me with a baby shower when I was pregnant with my first kid.

That must mean they think you're a pretty cool person! People usually don't go through that kind of effort unless they think you're worth it and deserve it. So, kudos to you for having that kind of effect on others!

dialogs.situation: I ate food outside of my diet today.

turns.text: I cheated on my diet today.
That's not so bad. Everyone cheats on their diet from time to time. I would just pick up where you left off.

dialogs.situation: Once I planned an entire trip, went to book the flight and it was sold out.  All of the other flights were double the price of what I was going to book so I was unable to go.

turns.text: I was trying to book a holiday to Europe, but the flight prices have doubled.
That is such a bummer. Summer is an expensive time to travel. I went to Ireland in July but I bought the tickets in March so they were pretty cheap.

dialogs.situation: School starts next week!  Hooray!  I can't wait to see my youngest start high school!

turns.text: Summer is almost over, school is starting again soon.
I feel your pain totally.  I take an online class and I am a teacher at a new school this year

dialogs.situation: My wife wants to have kids, but I'm not really sure I'm ready. I'd like kids one day, but maybe not right now.

turns.text: My wife told me she's ready for kids, but I'm not sure if I am. I'm not totally against the idea, I'm just a little nervous about making such a big decision right now.
Well take it from me, I have one and twins on the way.... Never wanted kids either but once theyre here it's an amazing feeling!

dialogs.situation: The new movie I just saw was not great. I expected so much more.

turns.text: The new movie I just saw was not great. I expected so much more.
I'm sorry you were dissappointed.  It is hard to spend so much money on a dud movie.  Was the popcorn good at least?

dialogs.situation: An actual ice cream man came through my neighborhood recently, I didn't know they still exist! Seeing the kids come running out to the truck made me miss being little and excited about the ice cream man.

turns.text: An actual ice cream man came through my neighborhood! I didn't think they still exist.
I don't think that I have seen/heard one of those since the 90s... Possibly the early 2000's at the earliest! Crazy, I didn't know that they still exist either!

dialogs.situation: I think I have a coyote or wolf running around my area. I think it killed a little beaver that lived near the creek  near my house.

turns.text: I saw a wolf or coyote in my yard a while back and I think it killed a little beaver that lived in the creek  for years behind my house.
That must have been amazing to see!  Did you try to scare it away or just watch it?  Be careful since it sounds like it may be dangerous.

dialogs.situation: I have to deal with an entitled person lately and I can't stand it. I can't bare to be around that attitude you know?

turns.text: I have to deal with an entitled person lately and I can't stand it.
Oh no.  I have experienced that before and its not pleasant.  Its hard to be kind and careful with your speech and actions when you're near a snob.

dialogs.situation: I had a meeting this morning, which is typically pointless. However, they actually followed the agenda and had some meaningful conversations.

turns.text: I really loathe meetings.  They're usually so pointless.
i completely agree. though, i'm remote so i am never sitting in the same room as others so i can distract myself ;)

dialogs.situation: I can't wait until all the trees change colors and the weather starts getting cold. I love Autumn!

turns.text: I can't wait until all the trees change colors and the weather starts getting cold. I love Autumn!
I know right! I noticed leaves on the ground the other day and got all excited! Is autumn your favorite season, too?

dialogs.situation: I cheated on my math test today. I felt really bad about it.

turns.text: I cheated on my math test today. I feel horrible about it.
Hmm..I think we've all been there one time or another.  Are you going to admit it?

dialogs.situation: I have many health problems that have prevented me from having children.  I use to be so upset everytime I saw people with children but now I have learned to be content in my situtation

turns.text: I have many health problems that have prevented me from having children
Oh my. I am so sorry. That must be so difficult. Are you exploring any other options like adoption?

dialogs.situation: When I was 15, my family adopted a little sister.  She's just about to start her last year of high school, and it's been really cool to see her grow up into a young woman.

turns.text: My youngest sister is about to start her senior year of high school.  I'm so proud of everything she has accomplished.
Oh that's awesome! I am an only child but I bet it's so cool to watch your siblings grow up like that.

dialogs.situation: I've been feeling nervous lately.

turns.text: I've been a little nervous lately and I don't know why exactly.
Nervous? That's interesting. Has anything changed recently? What are your thoughts on why it's happening?

dialogs.situation: i want to move to new york , buy its all new to me there

turns.text: I want to evertually move to new york and be closer to my brother and friend , im just a bit afraid as i really dont know much about anything there
Moving to a new place can make you uneasy, but once you make a couple of friends you'll get over it.

dialogs.situation: I have so much to do today, but it's raining. I'm OK with just staying at home and doing nothing.

turns.text: I have so much to do today, but it's raining. I'm OK with just staying at home and doing nothing.
I feel you there, I have a ton of stuff to do, but I can't get any of it done in this rain.

dialogs.situation: One night my children and I came home, and I saw a shadow inside the home when I came inside. My heart jumped into my throat and you could hear my scream in the next town for fear!

turns.text: One night when my children and I came home, I saw a shadow inside! I was so fearful and afraid!
Oh that can be scary. I don't watch horror movies because I know that I'll do just that!

dialogs.situation: I am pretty happy with my tattoo artist. He is not charging me a lot work great work

turns.text: I am really happy with my tattoo artist. He is not charging me a lot for great work
That's great.  I don't have any tattoos myself, but a lot of people I know do.  And it seems expensive.  So I'm glad he's not charging you much.

dialogs.situation: I accidentally ate a piece of cake that my mom made for my dad as a special gift, I felt pretty bad about it.

turns.text: So the other day I ate a piece of cake that my mom made for my dad as a gift, oops.
Oh no!  Well what he didn't know won't hurt him.  Hopefully you can get a replacement.

dialogs.situation: when a dog was running at me in the dark

turns.text: i thought i was going to be attacked by a huge dog running at me in the dark!
I hate that! Where they're probably friendly, but because they're so big, you have no idea what could or would happen, so you get so defensive..

dialogs.situation: I have a big presentation at work

turns.text: I have this huge presentation at work tomorrow and if the investors like my idea I can land 3 big accounts for my company.
That is very exciting, I bet you are nervous for your presentation. A lot is riding on it.

dialogs.situation: There was a traffic jam because people were slowing to look at a wreck on the other side of the highway.

turns.text: There was a traffic jam because people were slowing to look at a wreck on the other side of the highway
Oh no, I hate when that happens.  People always feel a need to look and it causes the other lanes to be at a standstill as well.  How long did you have to wait?

dialogs.situation: My mom is starting to develop dementia early. I feel like I'm losing such an important figure in my life much earlier than I should, even though she's still alive. Like, she struggles so much with daily activities and remembering who I am.

turns.text: My mom is starting to develop dementia early. I feel like I'm losing such an important figure in my life much earlier than I should, even though she's still alive. Like, she struggles so much with daily activities and remembering who I am
I am so sorry. I just recently lost my mother after years of her having alzheimer's. I wish there was some way I could help you, it is such a tough road.

dialogs.situation: I started learning free climbing without ropes from a professional!  I hope he really knows what he is doing!

turns.text: I started learning free climbing without ropes from a professional! I hope he really knows what he is doing!
Wow, what a thrilling sport. Yeah, I sure hope he knows what he's doing. You life depends on it!

dialogs.situation: When I was in high school there was a senior I had a crush on...I was a sophomore. I ended up asking her out and got rejected but later in college we actually became pretty good friends.

turns.text: When I was in high school there was a senior I had a crush on and I was a sophomore.  I ended up asking her out but got rejected. Later on in college we actually became pretty good friends.
Oh man heart breaker. Thats good yall are friends though. You never know maybe one day yall will be married

dialogs.situation: It was a surprise to me when I found that my grandmother had passed away

turns.text: My grandmother passed without any warning to us
I am sorry to hear that, I lost my grandmother to cancer, which did not make it anny better, knowing it was coming

dialogs.situation: I was SO excited the first time we were going to make an overseas move! I actually loved all the intense preparation, because of what I looked forward to as the payoff!

turns.text: I was SO excited the first time we were going to make an overseas move! I looked so forward to what I knew would be a life-changing adventure!
That is pretty awesome, I know if I ever got the chance it would change my life as well.

dialogs.situation: Just finished eating dinner.  We had red beans and rice with sausage.  I'm as full as a tick!

turns.text: I just finished eating dinner.  We had red beans and rice and with sausage.  I'm as full as a tick!
That sounds amazing! How long does it take to make the beans? Do you have to soak them?

dialogs.situation: My oldest child needed braces and her health insurance would not cover is. The cost was close to 4000 dollars. My aunt paid half of it for us and didn't ask for any of the money back, just because she knew we needed the help.

turns.text: My oldest child needed braces but her health insurance wouldn't cover the expense. It was close to 4000 dollars and we did not have that kind of money at the time.
I feel you. Last week, I spend 1000 dollars to fix my daughter's teeth. Dentists ask a lot of money now a days.

dialogs.situation: Someone in my family snuck $20 out of my wallet without asking me. It had to be one of them, because it's been here on the counter all day, and I know I definitely had two $20 bills in there. No one will own up to it...

turns.text: Someone in my family snuck $20 out of my wallet without asking me. It had to be one of them, because it's been here on the counter all day, and I know I definitely had two $20 bills in there. No one will own up to it...
That's sad. If you can't trust your family how can you trust. Are you going to say something?

dialogs.situation: I can finally say my son is sel sufficient

turns.text: I can finally say my son is sel sufficient
It is a great feeling when we can say that. My 37th child just became self-sufficient last year as well!

dialogs.situation: i know my wife

turns.text: my wife is always there for me, so i trust her more than anybody and i dont want to have any friends otehr than her, she is my faith
That's really nice, however, to keep the marriage fresh and strong, I think it's important for you to have outside friends.

dialogs.situation: It means a lot to me that my in-laws are helping us buy school clothes for our girls. That takes a burden off of us. They don't even realize how much they are helping us, they are just doing it because they love us and they love the girls.

turns.text: My in-laws are helping us pay for school clothes for our kids this year.
That is great! I know my sister has had help with that a lot too! It can get expensive. You know they have new clothes from target at goodwill a lot, that helps with spending

dialogs.situation: I really do not like water, I can't swim.

turns.text: I really do not like water, I can't swim.
thats no fun! i love to swim and be in the pool or beach. but i work too much to go

dialogs.situation: I was thinking about how life was different in my childhood. I didn't have any worries. I lived life blissfully unaware of any challenges.

turns.text: Life was so good during my childhood. I lived carefree and oblivious to challenges.
I hear you there.  I miss getting to just play without a care in the world.  Summer vacations were the best

dialogs.situation: When I was a kid, we used to make caramel apples. They were such a wonderful treat.

turns.text: When I was a kid, we used to make caramel apples every fall. They're such a wonderful treat.
Oh, I love caramel apples! They're one of my favorite treats in the fall. Did you guys make your own caramel?

dialogs.situation: I'm afraid to leave my current job (which I hate) because I might not be able to find work that I enjoy that pays well enough to live on.

turns.text: I really, really need to leave my job because it's making me miserable, but I'm afraid to make a big change.  I'm worried about financial stability for me and my kids, and nervous about leaving a known quantity for an unknown.

I feel for you. My girlfriend is in the same position. Luckily we don't have kids to complicate things, but her job wears her out and it doesn't seem like she can physically or mentally keep up with it. Kids just make it so that you feel you have to do it until you die, no matter what.

dialogs.situation: There i a drug dealer selling drugs in my building. I am very afraid when I have to get out or in.

turns.text: There is a drug dealer selling drugs in my building. I am very afraid when I have to get out or in.
That would make me SO angry. What kind of drugs is it? I would make sure the police took him out.

dialogs.situation: I saw a neighborhood report that someone is breaking into houses and watching people sleep.  Creepy!  I want to buy a million locks.

turns.text: I saw a neighborhood report that someone is breaking into houses and watching people sleep. Creepy! I want to buy a million locks.
Oh wow, that is so scary! I would be worried for my family safety, maybe get a guard dog? My dog always alerts me to sounds.

dialogs.situation: We were camping, and I thought everyone was outside.  I accidentally opened up the bathroom door on my step-daughter.

turns.text: We recently went camping.  Everyone definitely gets closer in such close quarters!
I've been camping a few times - the proximity to others makes me feel stuffy too. Where do you usually go?

dialogs.situation: I am very irritated at how my junior colleague never listens to instructions

turns.text: I am very irritated at how my junior colleague never listens to instructions
Some people think they know all the answers. It's sad as they usually don't grow as much as people

dialogs.situation: We had a puppy going through the chewing stage. I came home from the grocery store to find that he had taken the couch cushions off of the couch and chewed through the center!

turns.text: We had a new puppy. He loved to chew on everything. I went to the grocery store and when I got back home, the puppy had pulled the cushions off of the couch. He had chewed through the bottom!!
Oh god! I haven't had a puppy in a long time, but you forget all the things in your house that are not puppy-proof. They find ways to make messes in the most creative ways.

dialogs.situation: the neighbor's dog barked all night and kept me up, let's say I am not very happy right now

turns.text: the neighbor's dog barked all night and kept me up, let's say I am not very happy right now
I totally understand. The same thing happened to me last week. I thought I was going to lose it!

dialogs.situation: Finally got some yard work done , Love the smell of fresh cut grass.

turns.text: I like getting things done in the yard,but I feel so dirty afterwards.
I only like yard work with the kids. They do most of the work and we have fun in the dirt.

dialogs.situation: I've been living in a state of being self conscious about myself for years.

turns.text: I've been self conscious for a few years about myself.
Im sorry to hear that. I think everyone feels that way to a certain degree, even if it is more for some and less for others.

dialogs.situation: I'm going on a flight next week and I haven't been on a plane before. It makes me quite nervous and scared

turns.text: I'm going on a flight next week and I haven't been on a plane before
Well, I'm sure you are super nervous! Of course, I have no doubt all will be well and a new experience for you!

dialogs.situation: I was upset when my dog tore up my living room couch

turns.text: I was very upset when I came home to find that my dog had torn up my living room sofa.
that happened to me one. i had an american bulldog that had seperation anxiety and tore up my sofa cushions once. it was like a fluffy murder scene when i got home.

dialogs.situation: without the help of my friends I would still be depressed.

turns.text: If my friends hadnt picked me up, id still be at rock bottom!
True friends can be tested at such situations. Good for you to have such friends. It is very rare to have such ones

dialogs.situation: I hate it when I get ignored. It makes me feel less human and I get very mad!

turns.text: I hate it when I get ignored. It makes me feel less human and I get very mad!
Yeah, that bothers me to.  Don't sweat it too much though.  Just consider it their loss and move on.

dialogs.situation: I am provide for a family of 8. It's tiring but rewarding

turns.text: I  provide for a family of 8. It's tiring but rewarding
Wow! The struggle is real. I hope you're not too tired and stressed. I wish you luck for being so selfless!

dialogs.situation: I don't understand couples that cheat on each other. I literally have no desire to cheat.

turns.text: It is so crazy to me. My best friend and her husband have an open marriage and I just cannot fathom having another partner other than my husband.
I always wondered how you start something like that up with your partner without hurting their feelings.

dialogs.situation: I have problems with the city and their constant tax increase on my property.

turns.text: I have problems with the city and their constant tax increase on my property.
I know how you feel, it's terrible. I actually moved to a completely different state due to hi taxes.

dialogs.situation: My son is never here anymore.  He is growing up and going out with his own friends.  This is extremely healthy, but I certainly miss him and want him to spend more time here.

turns.text: You hope your teens make the right choices, but sometimes even the right choices feel wrong.  He is choosing to be away with friends and not at home much.  I believe this is healthy, but I can help but want something different.
I know it is hard to start letting go, but it gets easier with time.  Don't worry, you are not alone.

dialogs.situation: I often think back on my younger years. I do this more often now.

turns.text: I often think back about my younger years.
It's nice to be able to look back. It can really give you perspective on your life now.

dialogs.situation: I'm about to book a vacation to Barbados and I can't wait!

turns.text: I am about to book a vacation to Barbados! I cannot wait to go there. It's going to be gorgeous.
You are so lucky! I love the Caribbean but I have never been to Barbados. Have you been there before?

dialogs.situation: So, my mom was missing for a lot of years, but I searched and found her. It will be interesting to see if she still loves me when we meet in person again.

turns.text: I will be meeting my mom again after she went missing for 30 years. Meeting her soon, and I'm not sure if she still loves me or not.
That is amazing! A parent will always love their children regardless of past decisions. How did you find her?

dialogs.situation: I was walking home one night and I saw some guy standing next to a wall, luckily he didn't have any bad intentions. I was freaked out

turns.text: I was walking home one night and I saw some guy standing next to a wall, luckily he didn't have any bad intentions. I was freaked out
what time was it? please becareful with these kinds of things, you were lucky and i am glad nothing happend, but people don't realise how dangerous it is at night, why were you out so late?

dialogs.situation: When I got my new puppy I was so excited, the joy of adding a new member to the family was the best!

turns.text: I was so excited when I got my new puppy, it was awesome!
Man, I'm so jealous of you. I love that new puppy stage, as tumultuous as it can be. There's just so much emotion and "new feelings" going on as you watch it grow.

dialogs.situation: I was planning to go biking this weekend but it rained all day.....

turns.text: I hate when I make plans and the rain cancels them....
I agree with that! I just had the rain cancel my trip to the beach yesterday! Makes me so mad...

dialogs.situation: I recently had surgery for a kidney stone.  I am so thankful for my wife who took such good care of me after the surgery.  I was under her care for two weeks, but she was so considerate to all my needs.

turns.text: I hope you never have kidney stones, but I have had several.  A month ago, I had to have surgery because one was lodged and was too big to pass.
Ouch, that sounds so painful!  No I have never have them.  Do you know you can avoid them in the future?

dialogs.situation: I was so mad when my brother beat me in boxing on the WII I kept asking for another round haha

turns.text: Playing the WII with my little brother was so frustrating...he would beat me in boxing and tennis and I would be so mad I'd keep asking for another round haha
I know the feeling, my little nephew used to beat me at Mortal Kombat constantly just by button smashing. How did your little brother get so good at Wii?

dialogs.situation: Me and my husband have a great relationship. We are determined to be together forever. We love each other so much and would do anything to make the other one happy.

turns.text: I love my husband so much. He is an amazing guy that wouldn't do anything to hurt me.
That is so wonderful!  I have the same kind of husband.  Aren't we lucky?  It gives me hope for when my daughter grows up and finds someone.

dialogs.situation: I always get emotional when I think about my niece when she was born. It was one of the happiest moments in my life.

turns.text: One of the happiest moments in my life was when my niece was born. She is amazing in every single way.
These children hold a very special place in your heart. It's amazing that when this happens you never knew that you could love someone so much.

dialogs.situation: it was disappointing when i didnt get the job i applied for

turns.text: it was disappointing when i didnt get the job i applied for
Oh I am sorry to hear that, but I am sure there might be an even better one out there for you.

dialogs.situation: My wife is the greatest person in my life.  I am so thankful to have her.

turns.text: My wife is the greatest person in my life.
That's really great to hear. I love my wife too. What does she do that make you appreciate her every day?

dialogs.situation: I just finished a semester of college. I can't wait to get my grades. I know they'll be good.

turns.text: I just finished a semester of college. I can't wait to get my grades.
That must be such a relief to get another semester behind you. It's hard waiting to get your grades though I'm sure.

dialogs.situation: My husband took a 30 hour round trip road trip and will be home soon. He went to get our new puppy. I haven't slept well since he's been gone because I've been worried.

turns.text: I haven't been sleeping well for a few days now because my husband was on a 30 hour road trip to get our new puppy.
Oh wow. I know being away from our loved ones can make it hard to sleep. Have you tried to listen to nature sounds? I have an app on my phone and I play rain sounds to help me sleep.

dialogs.situation: Spur of the moment, my sister and I grilled outside. No special occasion, but we watched the sun set and ate grilled hotdogs and it was just nice.

turns.text: i never really had thought to do this, but the other day I just grilled spur of the moment and watched the sun set with my sister. It was really nice, honestly.
That sounds pretty awesome.  What did you guys grill?  Was she over for a special occasion at all?

dialogs.situation: I'm so mad at people around my apartment just throwing their used cigarettes all over the sidewalk.

turns.text: I'm super mad at people around my apartment complex. They keep tossing their used cigarettes all over the sidewalk.
Ugh they do that at my apartment too. You should put a can outside with a big sign that says "THROW YOUR NASTY BUTTS HERE"

dialogs.situation: playing silent hill one

turns.text: I remember when i was little and i played silent hill 1 for the first time , i was so scared lol , now i look back and the graphics look so cheap
Haha, that's funny. The same things used to happen to me except with the game Resident Evil. I love that game, and was scared to play it at the same time.

dialogs.situation: I have a co-worker who frequently asks for help. He is very incompetent and i do not understand how he was hired

turns.text: There is a co-worker who frequently asks me to help him with his tasks. He is very incompetent and i can't understand how he was hired
thats the same thing happening at my job , super lazy worker just walks around and hides in the restroom its annoying

dialogs.situation: I am expecting an express package tomorrow, but the tracking has not been updated correctly.

turns.text: I am feeling very stressed because I have a package being delivered express, but the tracking has been all wrong.
Such things are very rare if you use services from reputable delivering companies. What carrier did you use for your delivery?

dialogs.situation: Dog greeting me at the door whenever I get home

turns.text: It's always such a great feeling whenever I get home and my dog is there waiting for me at the door ready to greet me.
Dogs are wonderful pets. They are so loving and devoted. What kind of dog do you have?

dialogs.situation: My mother is so sweet and giving. She is always there for her family, dedicated to us. She loves us more than anything!

turns.text: My mom is so great! She is always there for me and her grandchildren. I can't think of anyone that loves us as much as she does!
That is wonderful! Moms are truly a gift! I miss my Mom at times. We are workcamping in the mountains of NM and my Mom lives in TX.

dialogs.situation: I'm having a difficult times even doing basic tasks for myself, due to anxiety. But I'm hopeful that something good will happen for me.

turns.text: I'm having a difficult time doing even basic tasks for myself due to anxiety. But i'm hopeful that something good will happen for me. I feel bad about complaining about anxiety after finding out your mother is ill.
Everyone in life has problems, do not feel bad for sharing yours I hope it gets better for you.

dialogs.situation: I feel anxious when I have to wait for people that are late. Why can't everyone just be on time?

turns.text: I feel anxious when I have to wait for people that are late. Why can't everyone just be on time?
I feel exactly the same way.  People should be more considerate and be on time for the sake of others.

dialogs.situation: I was upset when I had to pick up mu drunk friend last weekend. He was being a pain

turns.text: I was upset when I picked up my drunk friend. He was just being a pain
I am sorry to hear; drunk people can make a situation quite difficult to deal with. Have you been friends for long?

dialogs.situation: I always thought androids were trash phones. I kind of like the S9 though

turns.text: I always thought android phones were trash.
Really? I guess there a lot of people that think that as well. Do you still think that?

dialogs.situation: I recently accidentally sneezed on my coworker at work. Her face was absolutely horrified and now she avoids me completely.

turns.text: I sneezed on my coworker by accident yesterday! She was horrified and doesn't talk to me anymore.
Oh no! That is really embarrassing. Hopefully she can move on from it and you can laugh about it one day.

dialogs.situation: We are wanting to buy a newer and bigger vehicle. We aren't sure if we can afford it though. So, we haven't bought one yet.

turns.text: We are really wanting wanting to buy a newer and bigger vehicle, but we're not sure if we can afford it.
Oh no. Maybe you can find one that is used, or even rebuilt. I got my car for 75% less than what I would've paid from a car dealer!

dialogs.situation: My boss has cancer, so I'm trying very hard to work extra to make things easier for her.

turns.text: My boss was diagnosed with cancer earlier this summer. I've been trying very hard to work extra to make things easier for her.
That is really kind of you, many people would not bother. I hope that she wins her battle.

dialogs.situation: One night, my cats were playing and chasing a fly. All of a sudden one of them started acting weird. Then he died. He wasnt even a year old.

turns.text: One night my cats were chasing a fly in the house. All of a sudden, one of them started acting weird and then he died. He was only a kitten. I was so upset.
That is horrible, I am so sorry, It is hard losing a baby animal, you are not expecting them to pass, like when you have an older sickly one

dialogs.situation: i had my friend over and my family made me feel very uncomfortable

turns.text: i had my friend over and my family started saying stuff that made me so embarrassed
Have you ever knew some that got to do everything you wanted to but couldn't? Well have and its not fun.

dialogs.situation: I changed my shift to overnight and I get so scared walking to my car since we have a huge parking lot.

turns.text: I changed my shift to overnight and walking to my care gave me the creeps tonight. There was a man standing in the dark.
That sounds creepy! Is there any chance someone could start escorting you to your car? There is strength in numbers!

dialogs.situation: I invested a lot in shares. One day one of my important share went down. I was very worried at that time.

turns.text: I invested a lot in shares. One day one of my important share went down.
Neat! I invest a lot too! I have Century Link and it was up slightly today. Did any of your others go up?

dialogs.situation: My old boss put in a good word for me at a new organization and helped me land a new job.

turns.text: My boss at my old job was nice enough to put in a good word for me at a new organization and helped me land a higher paying job!
That's awesome! It really pays not to burn bridges, you never know when someone from your past can help you out like that.

dialogs.situation: These days I've been feeling a little isolated, especially since I broke up with my ex.  But then I see how much money I'm saving and I feel a lot better.

turns.text: I've been feeling isolated these days.  Still getting over a breakup and most of my friends are raging alcoholics.  But I look at how much money I'm saving by staying in and I feel a lot better!
yes and staying away from addicts is always good as well! Pick a different hobby for sure that's healthy is good!

dialogs.situation: i was crushed when i couldnt get the day off

turns.text: i was crushed when i couldnt get the day off
Oh no, that sucks man. I hope you didn't miss out on too much when you had to go into work.

dialogs.situation: I always buy the same brand of yogurt and don't even bother trying other kinds. It's just so delicious and such a good price that I'm a loyal customer for life.

turns.text: I always buy the same brand of yogurt and don't even bother trying other kinds. It's just so delicious and such a good price that I'm a loyal customer for life
There's very few brands I feel that strongly about. What kind of yogurt is it, I might want to try it?

dialogs.situation: This past spring some real bad storms went through our area. We spent over 5 hours in the basement due to tornadoes all around us.

turns.text: This has been the worst year ever for tornadoes in our area. This past spring we spent 5 hours in our basement due to all the tornadoes in our area.
That sounds terrifying! Im glad you have a basement though, it can be so dangerous if you have no underground place to shelter in!

dialogs.situation: I would never cheat on my wife

turns.text: When i go to work all my co workers always talk about other women even though they are all married. they always laugh at me when i say i don't care about other women because i love my wife
Im sorry to hear that! Are they trying to shame or embarrass you about something.

dialogs.situation: I ordered a product with express delivery, and it was delayed for a week!

turns.text: Ugh, it is so frustrating when you pay extra for express delivery and the shipping company messed up!
Oh yea, I've had it happen a few times. It's even worse when they "lose the package" for a while

dialogs.situation: When I was moving I put my stuff in storage. My unit got robbed of all my antiques and precious things.

turns.text: My storage unit got robbed while I was moving to a new home. They took all my family antiques and precious items.
That's terrible. I don't know what's up with this world anymore, it seems like things are always getting worse.

dialogs.situation: My grandmother passed away a long time ago. She left me her bible that helps me remind me of her.

turns.text: I was just thinking of my grandmother who passed away 10 years ago. She left me her bible as a reminder. I like reading from it sometimes.
It's nice that you have a meaningful item from her.  It's a pretty bittersweet feeling thinking about someone you loved who is gone.

dialogs.situation: My wife is returning from a trip abroad in a week.  I've got to get to work making the house look nice for her when she gets back.

turns.text: My wife is coming back into the country after being away for 2 months.  I've got to do some cleaning before she gets back :P
Ha, yeah gotta make sure the house is back up to wife code before she gets home... other wise there's going to be a price to pay.

dialogs.situation: When I was growing up I was always told that being emotional, is something that's reserved only for the girls.

turns.text: When growing up, I was repeatedly told that emotions are for the girls, but now I know that emotions are a big part of everybody's lives.
It is it's something we all have as humans it's not defined by gender show off your emotions proud.

dialogs.situation: My two-year-old niece is getting better and better with his manners. We had to pull him from his parents, and volunteered to take care of him, because they were failing as parents. But he's surprisingly picking up on how to have more appropriate, normalized behavior, and I'm happy about it.

turns.text: My two-year-old niece is getting better and better with his manners. We had to pull him from his parents, and volunteered to take care of him, because they were failing as parents. But he's surprisingly picking up on how to have more appropriate, normalized behavior, and I'm happy about it
Little kids are pretty amazing how they can pick things like that up in the right environment. So nice you are teaching him good manners, those are in short supply in adults these days!

dialogs.situation: We are temporarily moving soon. I'm so excited!

turns.text: Hi! I'm so excited! My husband and I decided to temporarily relocate to Arizona this winter!
sounds exciting. I always wanted to leave my were I was originally from so I could experience and see new things

dialogs.situation: I recently cheated on my girlfriend. I feel absolutely terrible.

turns.text: I cheated on my girlfriend recently. I feel horrible about myself right now.
Sorry to hear about that.  I wonder if there's any way to fix this situation.  What do you plan to do?

dialogs.situation: My son peed on me the other night.

turns.text: My son peed on me the other night.
Oh no! I'm sure it was awful at the time, but it'll be a good story when he grows up!

dialogs.situation: I felt bad for my friend. They were going through hard times so I payed for their dinner

turns.text: I felt bad for my friend. They were going through hard times so I bought them dinner
That's so nice of you to be supportive to your friend through struggles.  Is it a long time struggle or something sudden?

dialogs.situation: I am old enough to remember the times before internet and social media when people you spoke over the phone or in person and you could have much more meaningful contact with people

turns.text: I am old enough to remember the times before internet and social media when people you spoke over the phone or in person.
Same. When you had one phone in the middle of the house with the SUPER long phone cord so you could at least get around the corner to talk.

dialogs.situation: I feeling kind of anxious today because I have to run several errands for my father-in-law and he wants them done before my mother-in-law gets back into town which will be sometime today. We don't know what time, so that just complicates things.

turns.text: I have to run several errands for my father-in-law today and he wants them done before my mother-in-law get into town, which is at some unspecified time today.
It sounds like a stressful day. You have to just live in the present so, you will not be too stress out.

dialogs.situation: I really felt good when my dad helped me get a truck. I am glad he did that

turns.text: I felt good and hopeful when my dad helped me get a truck. I just knew he wanted to help
That's nice of your dad - it's sometimes hard to get a car on your own. What kind of truck is it?

dialogs.situation: My sister just lost her baby at 18 weeks along.  We are all grieving and I'm trying to support her in any way I can.  Being a mother myself, I feel so depressed and sad for her.

turns.text: My sister just lost her baby at 18 weeks along. We are all grieving and I'm trying to support her in any way I can. Being a mother myself, I feel so depressed and sad for her.
I'm so sorry to hear that! My sister went through something similar last year and I can tell you that it will help a lot to spend time with her as often as you can.

dialogs.situation: Going to a friend's wedding.

turns.text: My best friend is getting married next weekend. I'm in the wedding.
That's awesome. I hope it works out for your friend and their fiancee. Are you excited to be there?

dialogs.situation: My girlfriend is finally coming back to the states after being away for 4 years.

turns.text: My girlfriend is finally coming back to the states after being away for 4 years.
What a monumental event!  I bet you're so excited.  What took her away for so long?

dialogs.situation: It's amazing how much research goes in too helping others. I was researching neurofeedback today and it's nice to see how much some doctors care about helping.

turns.text: It's amazing how much research goes in too helping others.
Definitely. The world is an extremely complex thing, and I don't know if we'll ever fully understand it.

dialogs.situation: I never believed my grandpa was a rockstar until he jumped onto the stage and bit the head off of a bat. Then he belted the words to 'Crazy Train' and jumped out into the audience! Wow!

turns.text: My grandpa always said he was a rockstar back in his day, but I never believed him.
Why don't you believe him? He made have been quite the big name back in his day.

dialogs.situation: I worked hard on my yard sale. I was quite pleased with the sales and knew that there was nothing else I could have done to make it more successful.

turns.text: I worked hard on my yard sale. I was quite pleased with the sales and knew that there was nothing else I could have done to make it more successful.
That's great! It feels good when you can get a little back from the things you have invested so much in!

dialogs.situation: When I was offered another position with another company, but I stayed with my current company.

turns.text: I decided to stay with my current company even tho I was offered another job.
It's nice to be loyal to people who are loyal to you.  Is your job going to offer you any benefits for your loyalty?

dialogs.situation: My son has not always been a strong swimmer.  During this summer, he spent a lot more time in the pool developing his swimming skills.  I had not yet seen this change in him.  Tonight, he was diving off the side and off the diving board.  Talk about a bragging papa!  That's me!

turns.text: I just have to brag on my son.  He hasn't always been a strong swimmer, but tonight, after a summer of practice, I was able to see his amazing improvement!
That is amazing hard work pays off and I think it is great that our kids know how to swim.

dialogs.situation: My son goes to kindergarten in a week and I can't imagine him being gone through the day. It's hard to not be worried about how he'll be at school.

turns.text: My son goes to kindergarten in a week and I can't imagine him being gone through the day. It's hard to not be worried about how he'll be at school.
He'll have a great time, though.  He'll make tons of friends and his days will be full of joy!  You will need some hobbies though.

dialogs.situation: Going to try out this new restaurant tomorrow. Heard some great reviews.

turns.text: Going to try out this new restaurant tomorrow. Heard some great reviews.
Going to a new restaurant is always fun!  I am sure it will be great if there are a bunch of positive reviews!

dialogs.situation: I had no friends in high school, misery is being surrounded by an entire class and no one talking to you.

turns.text: I had no friends while in high school and was really miserable.
Yea I know that feel, outside of a few people I knew nearly know one and avoided lots of people cause no one cared

dialogs.situation: I once had to board a long haul international flight immediately after a major travel alert was issued.

turns.text: Flying typically doesn't bother me too much, because I love travel. However I was a bit concerned on a flight once right after a travel advisory had been issued.
I would have been terrified, like need a nice strong drink type of terrified! How did it end up going?

dialogs.situation: I really like a new perfume that I've tried but it's so expensive I don't know if I should get it

turns.text: I really like a new perfume that I've tried but it's so expensive I don't know if I should get it
Maybe if you search some more it will go on sale. But if you really like it you should get it.

dialogs.situation: My AC went out

turns.text: My AC went out yesterday.
Oh no, that's horrible.. July is not the time for that! Do you have someone ready to come out and fix it yet?

dialogs.situation: Once I achieved a new project at work that make a big difference of how difficult tasks are done. The result was that now co-workers can do many tasks faster and save a lot of time.

turns.text: I feel very proud to be able to make that importante change at work and I think that my boss will do something for me. Maybe it will be a raise in my salary.
It always feels exciting to do something big at work. It always feels good to feel like you are making progress in your career.

dialogs.situation: I am anticipating an express package, but the tracking has been wrong. It is getting frustrating!

turns.text: I am expecting a time sensitive package, but the tracking for the package has been all wrong!
Oh that is the worst.  It really puts you on edge.  What will happen if it doesn't come on time?

dialogs.situation: I recently visited a new restaurant in town. I didn't have high expections but it was great!

turns.text: I didn't have high expectations for this new restaurant in town but my friend and I had dinner there last week and it was better than I thought it would be!
That's always a positive in my book, what kind of food was it?  What were your reservations about the restaurant before going?

dialogs.situation: When I lived in California recently the farmer on whose land I lived encouraged me to get organized and have valuables etc. together in case a big earthquake hit. He also stockpiled batteries, water etc.

turns.text: When I lived in California my farmer friend and landlord had me get organized and have all my valuables together in case of a big earthquake. He stockpiled such things as batteries and water.
I can understand that as I live in Florida and we prepare for hurricanes each year with a plan and emergency rations and supplies.

dialogs.situation: I got heartbroken when my girlfriend left me and now I am so lonely

turns.text: Loneliness is very bad, I miss my partner
I understand. I have been lonely most of my life. But, it gives it back and it makes up the loneliness part.

dialogs.situation: when i lost my temper with my dad

turns.text: I lost my temper with my father and said some rude things I shouldnt have said when I was younger.
Don't beat yourself up about it. I did the same with my mother all the time when I was in my early teens. We've all been there.

dialogs.situation: I had an extremely grueling spring semester this year. All said and done, I pulled 4 As and 2 Bs.

turns.text: Last semester was probably the largest challenge of my life. I go to school for electrical engineering, and I took 6 courses.
that is a lot.. most i ever took at one time was 5 classes and i cried at least twice that semester.

dialogs.situation: I was planning on meeting up with my father for the first time in a few years since we had a falling out. We had a tentative meeting to see each other at the end of the week, but he's already canceled.

turns.text: I was planning on meeting up with my father for the first time in a few years since we had a falling out. We had a tentative meeting to see each other at the end of the week, but he's already canceled.
That is just sad of a Dad to be that way. Kids need a lot of unconditional love..but parents aren't always perfect and sometimes don't know how to love their kids like they should !

dialogs.situation: scared that my daughter will grow up and be bad

turns.text: I know its probably too soon to tell but I am afraid my daughter is going to be a difficult teenager!
Hah... I have a teenage sister. I can agree. But they can have their good moments. I hope for the best for you.

dialogs.situation: I left my son with a babysitter for the first time recently.  It's the first time someone who isn't family has watched him.

turns.text: I left my son with a baby sitter for the first time recently.
Awww. I remember the first time I left my son with the babysitter. So many emotions. How old is he?

dialogs.situation: I have solve many problems today at work. My manager was happy.

turns.text: I have solve many problems today at work. My manager was happy.
Oh wow, you must be proud! I hope he praised you for your work and gave you a reward?

dialogs.situation: I am going wakeboarding this weekend for the 5th time this summer!  I am really good at it and can do some flawless jumps!  I wonder if I should go pro!

turns.text: I am going wakeboarding this weekend for the 5th time this summer! I am really good at it and can do some flawless jumps! I wonder if I should go pro!
That sounds like a lot of fun! Have you been practicing for a long time? I'm too much of a klutz to be able to do that so I respect you for it.

dialogs.situation: I am afraid of death.

turns.text: I am afraid of death.
Who isn't? I am scared of death because I don't know what will happen afterwards. I fear the unknown.

dialogs.situation: My friend got evicted out of his apartment. I had to take in his 2 dogs who are just the cutest.

turns.text: So my friend got evicted from his apartment recently and he has 2 dogs.
that sucks, perhaps he should of be saving his money to pay for his apartment, instead of having two dogs.

dialogs.situation: My friend always has my back.

turns.text: My friend always has my back.
It is always good to have a friend who can take your hand in times of need. I wish I had more of that type of friends

dialogs.situation: I was looking through an old family album and I realized, I really had a good childhood. I miss my family.

turns.text: I was looking through my old family album and realized I had a really good childhood.
Sometimes when you are looking back at a situation you get a whole new perspective now that you're away from it. I'm happy that you have that realization.

dialogs.situation: I felt bad when I cheated on my diet. I found out I gained 2 pounds this past week!

turns.text: I had a super stressful week and ended up cheating on my diet last night by eating pizza and cake.
Uhoh. Hopefully you were able to stick to your diet throughout the week, though. One off day ain't so bad.

dialogs.situation: My cousin got accepted into Med school and I am very envious! I wish it was me...

turns.text: My cousin got accepted into Med school and I am very envious! I wish it was me...
That is so great! Are you in the process of applying now? I'm sure you will get in eventually.

dialogs.situation: Its a beautiful day outside today.  Problem is that I have no one to share it with.

turns.text: It is such a gorgeous day outside today.  The problem is that I have no one to share it with.
It is a gorgeous day where I live too! I'm sorry you don't have anyone to share it with!  Do you have plans later?

dialogs.situation: We just welcomed a new puppy into the family. I love him already he has been such a great addition, I love looking after him.

turns.text: We just got a new puppy! Our old dog passed away recently but this new one is such a pleasure to be around.
I am sorry to hear about your dog passing away. But, I'm happy you have a new friend in the new one.

dialogs.situation: My friend got some new Nike shoes. I have an old pair.

turns.text: So jealous of my buddy.
Why is that, might I ask? Maybe I can help you reframe it better to look at it more positively.

dialogs.situation: I remember applying for college and waiting for an acceptance letter. I didn't know if I would get accepted but I always was optimistic about getting in.  One day  I checked the mail and they letter was right there.  I was one happy camper.

turns.text: I checked the mail box one day and had a letter from a University I wanted to go to.
hey that's awesome! You won't have to steal money like me. Which University was it?

dialogs.situation: I'm going overseas in 2 weeks@

turns.text: I'm going overseas in 2 weeks! I will be on vacaion for 1 months and I just CAN NOT wait@
Oh I just did that recently. I just got back from 2 months. It will be a fantastic time.

dialogs.situation: I was at a dinner party at my friends house and I spilled red wine on a couch throw pillow! I flipped the pillow and quickly walked away without anyone seeing. Now, I feel really ashamed for not telling him.

turns.text: I was at a dinner party at my friends house and I spilled red wine on a couch throw pillow! I flipped the pillow and quickly walked away without anyone seeing. Now, I feel really ashamed for not telling him.
I would be so embarrassed. I would have probably done the same thing, but I would feel so guilty.

dialogs.situation: I just moved to a new city for a new job and I've been so busy I haven't really been able to go out and meet new people.

turns.text: I recently moved to a new city to start a new job. I've been so busy I haven't been able to make any new friends here and no one I know lives here either.

Ah, I know that feeling well. My family moved around a ton while I was in grade school, so I don't really have many long term friends. Don't worry though, you'll make friends at your new job so easily, you won't even remember you didn't have friends!

dialogs.situation: the amount of crime growing near me is scary to think about

turns.text: the crime rate where i live is increasing, its horrible to think about
Seriously.  I was looking it up the other day thinking about moving somewhere else and that state was even worse.  Then to read about everything that makes the crime rate is overwhelmingly scary.

dialogs.situation: I was hoping to go to this wonderful writing contest. I signed up and everything. Then circumstances changed and I had to cancel. I felt so bad that I wouldn't be able to go.

turns.text: I wanted to go to a writing conference. It is a huge and allows you to meet so many people. Unfortunately, something else came up and I had to cancel. I felt so bad that I wouldn't be able to go.
I am so sorry that you couldnt go as I can see this was so important to you.  Why did you have to cancel?  Must have been something important come up!

dialogs.situation: I got passed over for a promotion at work. The guy that got it was qualified, but I really wanted the job.

turns.text: Recently, I got passed over for a promotion at my job.
Aw man, that sucks. Promotions usually aren't given fairly in my experience. Was that the case for you too?

dialogs.situation: My handyman keeps telling me he's coming by to fix my sink, but then he doesn't show up. Ugh.

turns.text: My handyman keeps telling me he's coming by to fix my leaky sink, but he never shows up when he says he will, ugh.
That is seriously the worst... waiting around all day wondering whats going on! Have you tried calling him today?

dialogs.situation: I can't believe game of thrones is ending. I am not happy about it

turns.text: Game of thrones is about to end. I can't believe they are going to do this to me!
Right!? One of the best shows of all time in my opinion, what are we suppose to do with our time?

dialogs.situation: My brother received 2000 points on his latest SAT test. I was not expecting it from him at all

turns.text: My brother took SAT test lately and received 2000 as his final score. I was very surprised and was not expecting it from him at all
Oh nice.  Is he the type to tone himself down in social settings...but he's secretly a wiz kid

dialogs.situation: I went to the race track. We used to go there with my grandparents when we were kids. It made me think of them.

turns.text: I went to the race track. Since we used to go there with my grandparents, it brought back a lot of memories.
That's so funny, I was just looking at the racing schedule yesterday! I love races- if you are talking about horse races. And good memories are the best.

dialogs.situation: Tomorrow, I am doing a presentation to my CEO. I am sure that I will give a good impression.

turns.text: Tomorrow, I am doing a presentation to my CEO. I am sure that I will give a good impression.
Wow, good luck.  I hope it all goes well. It sounds like you're confident that it will. Have you done one before?

dialogs.situation: I am at peace with myself after taking a nice hot shower

turns.text: I am at peace with myself after taking a nice hot shower
Oh man, thats the best feeling in the world. Getting out of a shower especially if its into clean freshly laundered sheets.

dialogs.situation: My niece is getting old enough to read the books I read as a kid.

turns.text: My niece just turned two and it's weird reading her the books I read as a kid.
I know the feeling. Seeing my friends kid read the books I used to read brings back great memories.

dialogs.situation: Every time I see a small, skinny dog I remember my Aunt's dog Roxxie, a beautiful Italian Greyhound who died from a tumor and it makes me sad.

turns.text: When I see petite, skinny dogs I remember Roxxie, my auntie's beautiful Italian Greyhound who died from a tumor who was really smart and could do a bunch of tricks.
We will always have fond memories that come to our minds. I am sorry to hear that but also happy you can have the memoru.

dialogs.situation: I was so nervous starting my new job. I had no idea what to expect

turns.text: I was pretty nervous starting my new job. I was not sure what to expect
Wow, congratulations on getting a new job!  I think butterflies are good to have to make us do our best and it shows your job is important to you and you want to do a good job.  What do you do?

dialogs.situation: I was afraid when my dad used to scare me and  my brothers

turns.text: I was afraid when my dad used to scare me and my brothers
Was he just playing tricks on you, to get you to laugh? Or was he being malicious about it?

dialogs.situation: I got into a small fender bender and i was so surprised to see how expensive it is to fix a tiny scratch

turns.text: I got into a small fender bender. the car wasn't damaged, just a tiny scratch! I was shocked when collision center told me it would cost 526$ to fix that tiny scratch
Wow!  I hate when things like that happen.  I had a similar thing where they would have to replace the whole front body for a small scratch.

dialogs.situation: I accidently left my purse in the shopping cart and drove off, when I returned someone had returned it to the store's lost and found.

turns.text: I have to shop after work and I can be really spacy, one time I left my purse in the shopping cart with all my cards and phone in it.
Omg! I am the same way... i always end up putting my list down while shopping. Where are you going?

dialogs.situation: I'm grateful for my community.  It's very tight nit and friendly, always looking out for each other!

turns.text: I'm grateful for the community I live in.  Everyone is so friendly!
i live in a small town too. i grew up in a big city so the change is very welcome

dialogs.situation: So we're moving soon, but our chicken coop isn't gonna make it into the trailer. : (

turns.text: We're gonna be moving soon, and it doesn't look like we are going to be able to take our chickens.
Do you live on a farm? It will probably be nice to move to a city and get away from those chickens.

dialogs.situation: I didn't sleep well last night, and then my son was being extra demanding of attention.  I got upset with him, but realize he'd really done nothing wrong.

turns.text: I didn't sleep well last night, and then my son was being extra demanding of attention. I got upset with him, but realize he'd really done nothing wrong
Sometimes it can be hard to be patient, I can totally relate to that. Not sleeping well can make you really irritable sometimes.

dialogs.situation: I accidentally stepped in dog feces today.  I was really grossed out from the smell.

turns.text: I accidentally stepped in dog feces today.
did you do it bare foot ? that is nasty i dont own pets at all but i can imagine your situation

dialogs.situation: I am happy with where I am in my life at this very moment.

turns.text: Sometimes I reflect upon my life, and at this current moment I am happy with where I am.
That's great you are happy with where you are in life. I think the place we work and the area in which we live make a big difference.

dialogs.situation: I ran into my old school mate outside the country. I could not believe my eyes; we were in a different country

turns.text: How believable do you think this is when you run into your old school mate outside the country
i think that would be very unbelievable to run into someone out the country especially from school. Has that ever happened to you?

dialogs.situation: tomorrow is my first university day and i'm very nervous

turns.text: tomorrow is my first university day and i'm very nervous
its not so bad, it can be intimidating but you just need to figure out the campus layout and classes but its very smooth from there

dialogs.situation: My girlfriend is going through a tough process of finding a job after graduating. She's hearing a lot of "no's." She's going to an interview later today for a job she really wants, and I'm worried it will be another no. Trying to make sure the evening is nice and comfortable afterwards to ease the pain, if there is any.

turns.text: My girlfriend is going through a tough process of finding a job after graduating. She's hearing a lot of "no's." She's going to an interview later today for a job she really wants, and I'm worried it will be another no. Trying to make sure the evening is nice and comfortable afterwards to ease the pain, if there is any.
That is tough. I would just make sure everything is nice and clean around the house so she can just unwind. Maybe make a nice dinner and do the dishes after.

dialogs.situation: I keep hearing strange noises from underneath my bed at night. I am too scared to look. I am afraid it is the bogeyman.

turns.text: I hears some very strange noises coming from under my bed last night. I am too scared to look. Could be the bogeyman.
LoL....no sweetie, I'm sure it's your dog again. Didn't the same thing happen last month?

dialogs.situation: I was at a work dinner and I wanted to help open an expensive wine bottle. By mistake, it fell. I felt bad about it.

turns.text: I was at a work dinner and I wanted to help open an expensive wine bottle. By mistake, it fell. I felt bad about it.
Mistakes happen! I am sure people aren't too upset. I have numb hands so I drop things all the time

dialogs.situation: I just gave up smoking cigarettes. It was pretty hard but the worst part is how everything puts you on edge and it is hard to relax.

turns.text: I just gave up smoking cigarettes. It was pretty hard, but the worst part is how everything puts you on edge and it is hard to relax.
Oh wow, I wish I could find the courage to do that, it surely takes a lot of will power. how did you do it>

dialogs.situation: I did a walk-a-thon  last week was so happy I finished it before the walk I was un-assured I would finish but I did.

turns.text: I did a walk a thon last week for back to school drive and needy kids it was s long walk but I finished it I felt so happy.
That sounds awesome, i bet you feel proud! Its nice to do things for kids who are in need.

dialogs.situation: I slipped on a puddle and landed on my back in the middle of the mall once. All I could do is pretend that I was hurt to avoid embarrassment..

turns.text: I slipped on a puddle in the mall once. I was so embarrassed that I pretended I was hurt badly.
I know the feeling. Once I fell in high school from a puddle and laughed it off even though I was hurt,

dialogs.situation: I always complain and treat my husband like crap, I need to change.

turns.text: I always complain, nag, and treat my husband like crap. Which makes me feel like crap. I need to change/

Whoa, that is quite the confession. But you know, it's good that you recognize that you need to change a behavior. Very mature. Not everyone has that same ability to be honest with themselves, and you should feel proud about that!

dialogs.situation: My wife is coming back into the country next week after being gone for 2 months.  I'm super excited!

turns.text: My wife has been out of the country for two months, and is coming back in a week!
Oh wow, I bet you can't wait! I remember when I had to spend a summer overseas and it was awful to be away from my husband.

dialogs.situation: Finally figured out why I wasn't getting good sleep

turns.text: I started taping my mouth closed before bed, and now I'm no longer tired when I wake up, feels like I am born again
That is weird but amazing! Does it work?  If it does, I will get my husband to tape his mouth shut.  He snores like a freight train because his tongue slides back I guess.  Is that true for you?

dialogs.situation: I had to spank my two-year-old niece today. He wasn't listening and kept doing the same mistake over and over, defying me. I don't like to be physical, and I'm sure others would look down on it, but I didn't feel like I had a choice.

turns.text: I had to spank my two-year-old niece today. He wasn't listening and kept doing the same mistake over and over, defying me. I don't like to be physical, and I'm sure others would look down on it, but I didn't feel like I had a choice.
I think the right amount of spanking is OK.  I was spanked as a child and know I deserved it.  Hopefully you didn't take it to far though!

dialogs.situation: I am afraid of frogs. I know that is weird but they have always scared me.

turns.text: I am afraid of frogs. I know that is weird but they have always scared me.
Actually my aunt is afraid of them also. She said as a girl one cornered her and wanted to hurt her. Why are you scared of them?

dialogs.situation: My social anxiety acted up and I failed at doing basic math in my head when paying the cashier and looked like an idiot!

turns.text: My social anxiety kicked up the other day while paying for groceries and I failed at doing basic math in my hand due to my nerves. I ended up giving the wrong amount of money.
It's okay. People are very understanding. Did you underpay? I'm sure it happens all the time!

dialogs.situation: I am so mad at what Andrew Cuomo said.

turns.text: I am so mad at what Andrew Cuomo said.
These people are becoming so pathetic and out of touch with reality that logic and reasoning are becoming an aliens to them

dialogs.situation: When I was pregnant, I tried to figure out how I would feel once my son came. I thought about it alot!

turns.text: When I was pregnant, I thought so much about what my son would make me feel!
I wish I could feel that feeling, (unfortunately, I am a man). What did you end up naming your son?

dialogs.situation: There is a restaurant that has been around for a while. They're closing down after the wife passed away.

turns.text: There is a restaurant that has been around for a while. They're closing down after the wife passed away.
That's terrible. It's a shame that they were not able to keep the place going in her memory.

dialogs.situation: My best friend is coming to visit next week.  I am so excited to see her because it's been a long time.

turns.text: I have a friend flying in from the other side of the country next week.
wow, is it the first time you're gonna see him? is he going to stay at your place?

dialogs.situation: I remember the first time when I realized that people can lie.

turns.text: Do you remember your first time realizing hat people can actually lie?
I can't think of a certain moment that the idea clicked. It seems like I've always known they can.

dialogs.situation: I have been feeling very happy lately because my boyfriend and I have finally started to get serious in or relationship.

turns.text: I have been feeling very happy lately! :)
Awesome! Nothing like stringing together a long streak of feeling happy in the world. Anything in particular got you chipper?

dialogs.situation: Being a loyal Apple customer and seeing its recent $1 Trillion break in market cap in stock market, makes me feel great about this company

turns.text: I consider myself a loyal Apple customer and seeing its recent break in $1 Trillion in stock market cap, just makes me feel great and proud of feeling attached to this company
It sounds like you are a loyal customer! How did you feel about them taking your headphone jack from their cellphones?

dialogs.situation: I wet my pants because I had a dream that I was going to the restroom.

turns.text: I ca not believe what happened the other night at my friends house, I'll never show my face again.
Can you please give a little more detail about what happened at your friends house that made you not want to show your face??

dialogs.situation: My husband threw me a graduation party and I was so shocked!

turns.text: My husband put together a graduation party for me and I had no idea!

Hey... congratulations to you on both fronts! That sounds like double good news. It was probably fun having your hard work rewarded with seeing the faces of all your loved ones and having them personally congratulate you.

dialogs.situation: My apartment was robbed..

turns.text: My apartment was robbed. I was totaly devastated by seeing the damages and what was stolen.
Wow I am so sorry. That had to be so scary.  Were the cops able to find any evidence?

dialogs.situation: A homeless woman asked me for money and I said no.  I feel so ashamed not to give her anything.

turns.text: A homeless woman asked me for money and I said no.
I don't blame you.  I don't like giving out money like that - you just never know what they may do with it.

dialogs.situation: I cheated on my math test today. Felt so bad.

turns.text: I cheated on my math test today. Feels bad, man.
I can understand that - I think all of us, at one point or another, did something we were ashamed of.

dialogs.situation: with life in general right now

turns.text: I feel so at ease right now with life, finally after all the hecticness.
That's good you're getting a break! Life is much more rough as an adult than I thought it would be as a kid.

dialogs.situation: I will never forget when my daughter was born and they handed her to me for the first time.

turns.text: I will never forget when my daughter was born and they gave her to me for the first time!
That is an amazing feeling. I have three daughters. It doesn't matter how many you have, the first time you hold them, its amazing.

dialogs.situation: I'm going to be away from my girlfriend for a year, but she should know that she can trust me.

turns.text: I'm going to be away from my girlfriend for a year, but she should know that she can trust me.
Sometimes it is very hard and the jealousy can come out. I hope you have a really strong relationship though.

dialogs.situation: I'm glad to have the internet to teach me things I need

turns.text: The internet has been there through thick and thin for me
The internet is a great thing. I don't know what we'd do without it.

dialogs.situation: I think after I pay off the mortgage, I'll be pretty happy in life.

turns.text: I think after I pay off the mortgage, I'll be pretty happy in life.
That would be awesome!  You would be in such a great situation in life with that payment gone!  What prompted you to want to do it?
