dialogs.situation: A part for my computer that I've been putting off buying went up 10% right before I finally ordered it.

turns.text: I've been putting off buying a computer part that I needed and just noticed it went up 10%! I'm pretty mad at myself.
Oh no! I hate when that happens... hopefully your computers holds on a little longer for it to go back down

dialogs.situation: A co-worker has been flirting with me at work.  I've rejected her advances since I have a girlfriend

turns.text: A co-worker has been flirting with me at work.  I turned her down though since I have a girlfriend
She is a crappy person, flirting with someone who is in a relationship. Good on you- stand up guy

dialogs.situation: not living near family, being in a new place.

turns.text: I recently moved to my dream location, but it sucks not knowing anyone.
congratulations! I know, it probably feels lonely. Maybe you should do a party at your house and invite all the neighbours

dialogs.situation: When my boyfriend left me for another woman on Valentine's Day, that really sucked being left all alone.

turns.text: It was Valentine's Day, and the jerk I was dating at the time turns around and tells me he's leaving me for his ex.
Well, that was absolutely terrible! He certainly picked the worse time to do it. You're right, he was a jerk!

dialogs.situation: I have kids aged from 14-21. I am always worrying that something bad will happen to them. I couldn't live with myself if something did. I love them so much!

turns.text: I am always worrying about my kids and would hate to see something bad happen to them.
I am the same way. How old are they? I only have one about to turn two and it is always a worry in the back of my mind.

dialogs.situation: i forgot to pay my credit card bill, I'm so disappointed with myself.

turns.text: i forgot to pay my credit card bill, I'm so disappointed with myself.
I am sure it'll be ok. Usually if you stay in contact with them and don't blow them off for a long time it will be OK.

dialogs.situation: I have been with my husband 7 years and have always been faithful.

turns.text: My husband and I have been married for 7 years and I've been faithful the whole tie.
That great news.  I don't know how rare it is but in the 14 years I've been married we've seen a lot of other couples suffer with infidelity.

dialogs.situation: I decided to join to group to lose weight. I had so much respect and admired what all of these people were going through with there struggle. It really helped having their support too.

turns.text: I recently joined a group to help me lose weight. I have so much respect and admire everyone in that group so much.
Good luck! My sister-in-law has been with weight watchers for a while now. She loves the camaraderie and how everyone encourages each other.

dialogs.situation: I was really mean to my sister as a child, and I still feel bad about it. She's sensitive and I know it probably still bothers her.

turns.text: As a child, I was mean to my sister all the time and I still feel awful about it.
Aw, well when your younger you don't do those things on purpose. I think everyone is mean to their siblings every now and then.

dialogs.situation: I am thrilled!  I just found out that I'm pregnant!  Its my second child and I've been having trouble getting pregnant again.  It was such a surprise!

turns.text: I am thrilled! I just found out that I'm pregnant! Its my second child and I've been having trouble getting pregnant again. It was such a surprise!.
Congratulations. Yes it can be very hard to get pregnant and carry children for some. I know how that goes

dialogs.situation: I really hate going in front of crowds. Especially when I had to recite a poem in front of a whole crowd of people.

turns.text: I really hate public speaking, so it doesn't help that I had to recite a poem in public way back in like 6th grade.
I definitely understand that feeling.  It took me forever to sign up for my Speech Communications class because of speaking in public.

dialogs.situation: new apartment. family and friends i love. yeah, this is the good life.

turns.text: just moved into a new apartment last weekend. pretty happy with it. a little smaller but a 5 yo complex as opposed to a 45 year old complex. modern amenities are nice. also, i'm going to visit my family tomorrow. good week so far.
It feels good to be in a new place, but the moving process sucks. Is it a new part of town?

dialogs.situation: My dog started to get lumps along her stomach so I'm taking her o the vet tomorrow. I want her to be ok

turns.text: My dog started to get lumps along her stomach so I'm taking her o the vet tomorrow
Oh no, I hope she is OK! Glad you are taking her to the vet. Is she doing OK other than the lumps?

dialogs.situation: I don't know why some people waste their talents and life. They complain when they have things good and still aren't happy when it's bad?

turns.text: I don't know why some people waste their talents and life.
I agree. I used to be a deadbeat but now my life is dope.  Are you talking about a friend or family member

dialogs.situation: When I first started working out, I was very nervous and apprehensive while lifting weights.

turns.text: i was very nervous and apprehensive when I first started lifting weights again.
Good job, it's always good to hit the gym and to stay in shape.  I just started again as well.

dialogs.situation: I had a video job interview.

turns.text: I had a video job interview. That was a new experience.
I've done one of those before. They are pretty cool. Do you think you will get the job?

dialogs.situation: Our dog passed away after 8 years of having in the family.

turns.text: We've had our dog for over 8 years. He past away this spring.
I'm so so sorry!  We lost our chihuahua in February, so I completely understand that feeling.  Was he sick prior to passing away or was it sudden?

dialogs.situation: I went to close a bank account today, and when they got there they said it was overdrawn by an IRS tax lien.  I have never been so angry in my life!

turns.text: I went to close a bank account today, and when they got there they said it was overdrawn by an IRS tax lien. I have never been so angry in my life!
That is horrible!  I would've been too.  That actually happened to me but thankfully it was an old account that I didn't use.  Did they take money from you?

dialogs.situation: The other day I was watching a talk show and they started talking about how if you eat a big meal like dinner after 4 hours prior to going to bed, that it results in more rapid weight gain and hinders weight loss! I had never heard that before!

turns.text: The other day I was watching a talk show and they started talking about how if you eat a big meal like dinner after 4 hours prior to going to bed, that it results in more rapid weight gain and hinders weight loss! I had never heard that before!
I didn't know the exact timing like that, but it's believable and I know it's harder for the body to use the energy when you eat late.

dialogs.situation: My sister has been down in the dumps lately after a breakup. I made her come over to watch funny movies and eat popcorn and pizza to get her mind off of it.

turns.text: My sister had been feeling down after a breakup.

I'm really sorry to hear that. What's worse is the best thing for breakups, the only thing that really helps, is time passing by. But the people who are hurting, in the moment, they can't really understand or accept that. So, you feel like you have to help and do something, when in reality it's probably best you don't smother them and that they have space. I hope she feels better, though.

dialogs.situation: My nanny came late making me late for an important meeting.

turns.text: The day of one of the most important meetings of my life and my nanny decides to come in an hour late and was not even a tad remorseful!
Thats horrible. I mean if you have a job at least make the effort to get there on time.

dialogs.situation: In 2011 I put my beautiful daughter emerson up for adoption.  THis was the hardest decision I have ever had to make.

turns.text: I was in an extremely dangerous abusive relationship at the time and I knew he was intending to put her in the middle of it all.   He intended to use her for leverage over me .
It sounds like you're talking about two different people there instead of just one person.  I'm a little confused.

dialogs.situation: I came in the room on mother's day. I expected a couple of gifts not balloons, tons of gifts and flowers. The gifts were so heartfelt too.

turns.text: This mother's day was amazing! I got so much more than expected and it was all so heartfelt
That is great!!  Sometimes we mom's get a bit forgotten, so to have an entire day where we are just loved is such a great feeling.

dialogs.situation: I think the future will be brighter and conflicts between countries will be smoothed over.

turns.text: I'm hopefully that their will be peace in this world.
I am hopeful as well, but because we are human beings, I doubt that will ever happen. There will always be the same old squabbles that have occurred since the dawn of man.

dialogs.situation: My family is always bugging me to do things that I dont have time to do. Yesterday they wanted me to stop my work day, come home, and go to the old folks home to visit my grandma when i already go every weekend. Its like they think that my work doesn't matter and I can just up and leave whenever?

turns.text: My family is always bugging me to do things that I dont have time to do. Yesterday they wanted me to stop my work day, come home, and go to the old folks home to visit my grandma when i already go every weekend. Its like they think that my work doesn't matter and I can just up and leave whenever?
I could be wrong...but I feel like they just miss your company...and are using your grandma as a scapegoat.  Don't be so hard on them they're not always gonna be around ;)

dialogs.situation: I get to go home in 30 minutes!

turns.text: I get to go home in 30 minutes!
Yay!  I love the end of the work day!  What are you going to do when you get home?

dialogs.situation: I feel very satisfied with life right now. My friends and family are healthy, and I am doing good in my classes

turns.text: I feel very satisfied with life right now. My friends and family are healthy, and I am doing good in my classes
Being happy where your life is has got to be one of the best feelings. I'm happy for you!

dialogs.situation: My apartment complex is nickel and diming me and counting off so many things wrong with the apartment to detract from my security deposit as I get set to leave after this month. I know people said to expect to never see your security deposit again, but this is ridiculous! I feel like the apartment is pretty much exactly the same!

turns.text: My apartment complex is nickel and diming me and counting off so many things wrong with the apartment to detract from my security deposit as I get set to leave after this month. I know people said to expect to never see your security deposit again, but this is ridiculous! I feel like the apartment is pretty much exactly the same
I hate when that happens! The same thing happened to me when I moved out of my apartment. They kept my security deposit because they needed to replace carpet.

dialogs.situation: My brother was addicted to drugs for ten years . This year he went to rehab and has had 7 months sober send drug free. Everyone doubted he would clean his act up but I new he could do it.

turns.text: Have you ever had a family member everyone else doubted all the time.
Sometimes I'm worried that I'm that family member, but I'm not sure what to do to make them have confidence in me.

dialogs.situation: I've been waiting for a story to finish, but the author passed away.

turns.text: I've been waiting for a story to finish, but the author passed away
Oh no! Which author is it? That really stinks when you can't finish a story. An eternal cliff-hanger.

dialogs.situation: when i let my neighbor borrow my gate card after we had just moved in.

turns.text: I had just moved into my new apartment complex and my neighbor asked to borrow my gate card so I let her.
That was nice of you. I hope she gave it back to you when you needed to use it yourself.

dialogs.situation: I was turned down for the promotion I applied for today.

turns.text: Today, was the worst day ever!
No way. What happened? If honestly, almost all my days are like this. So, worst has become normal for me

dialogs.situation: I miss my childhood.

turns.text: I'm really said. I'm missing my youthful vigor.

Your youthful vigor? You think you're too old now? You're only too old if you allow yourself to be. My girlfriend's 90-year-old grandfather was a full-of-life WWII vet who lit up the room when he came in. Of course, you're not as physically active, but you have to learn to utilize your life in different ways.

dialogs.situation: Donald Trump was elected to the presidency. This makes me lose faith in humanity, to be quite honest.

turns.text: Donald Trump is now the president. It makes me feel bad about life.

Oh yeah, Donald Trump is such a charlatan. He has some really shady history too. I'm actually a Christian and a conservative but I'm appalled that everyone on the "right" have fallen for this guy. He's so against what the real conservative values are supposed to be.

dialogs.situation: My brother got hit with a DUI the other night. His wife said that was the last straw, as she was tired of his drinking. She kicked him out and now he's living with me. I feel so terrible for everyone involved, especially because they have two kids.

turns.text: My brother got hit with a DUI the other night. His wife said that was the last straw, as she was tired of his drinking. She kicked him out and now he's living with me. I feel so terrible for everyone involved, especially because they have two kids

sorry to hear that, my brother has a drinking problem too, and has kids, i love him but at this point we are more focused on the kids , i tell him if you get locked up who is gonna raise the girls , of course we are but still they need a father

dialogs.situation: In previous job, I was laid off. I felt like everything around me was failling apart. I felt terrible bad and cried.

turns.text: In previous job, I was laid off. I felt like everything around me was failling apart. I felt terrible bad and cried.
Oh that is awful. I have been fired before it is just the worst. Have things gotten better since then?

dialogs.situation: I hate going to the dentist. I have an appointment coming up and I don't want to go. I have a tooth that has been hurting me for awhile and I have already put it off.

turns.text: I have a dentist appointment next week. I hate going to the dentist. I don't want to go.
I went through that for like 5 years.  Ended up finally going and they've made a lot of advances in comfort since I last went before that.

dialogs.situation: I go to eat at a little place that makes me remember my childhood days.

turns.text: I go to eat at a little place that makes me remember my childhood days
Man, I love when you can enjoy some good food from your childhood. It brings back so many memories.

dialogs.situation: My friend moved to California last week.

turns.text: My friend got a promotion and moved to California last week. I always thought I would be the first one to get out of this dump.
I'm sorry your friend moved away. Sounds like me when I moved from Indiana to Florida. My friend was upset when I left too.

dialogs.situation: I really got close with a girl that I met from Tinder, to the point where we were "dating". Then randomly, after like 4 days, she says that she doesn't want to date anymore and then just stops talking to me.

turns.text: I'm still kinda bummed about this, but like a month or more back I was really into this girl from Tinder and we started dating too. Unfortunately, after like 4 or 5 days, she said she wanted to stop dating and hasn't spoken to me since.
Oh no, that really sucks. That's awful that she wanted to end things, especially since you were really into her. I am sorry.

dialogs.situation: I am scared of how I will die.

turns.text: I am scared of how I will die.
I worry about that too occasionally, but I just push it to the back of my mind like usual.

dialogs.situation: I felt bad that I lied to my friend and said I didn't care when I really did.

turns.text: I lied to my friend about something and told her something was okay when it really wasn't
Oh. I know lying is sometimes beneficial in some situations. Hopefully you did this to protect someone's feelings

dialogs.situation: My classmates at university are so gossip-y. They get so catty with one another, and spread rumors behind each other's backs. We're in a small major, so everyone knows everyone in this group of 50 students, and a lot of them dislike each other for no good reason.

turns.text: My classmates at university are so gossip-y. They get so catty with one another, and spread rumors behind each other's backs. We're in a small major, so everyone knows everyone in this group of 50 students, and a lot of them dislike each other for no good reason
I get that, I have had jobs like that, some people just thrive on drama, they do not enjoy anything more than that

dialogs.situation: I finally have enough money to quit my bad job. It has made me miserable for years.

turns.text: I finally have enough money to quit my bad job. It has made me miserable for years.
I'm sorry you had to go through all that stress. But yay for you being able to leave that situation!

dialogs.situation: I was at the gym on Monday and a man started having a seizure. I was frozen in fear but luckily someone else tended to him.

turns.text: I was frozen in fear at the gym Monday, when a guy started seizing. He got so violent and ran away from paramedics.
Wow, that must have been challenging for everyone! Was he okay ultimately? Was someone able to help him?

dialogs.situation: I once accidently ran down the battery on my car when I mid-judged how long I could run the radio for without the engine running. It was 5am and I was in the middle of nowhere. I called the first person I could think of who could help and they came with crocodile clips and recharged the battery. I felt so grateful to be on the receiving end of a kind act. I was also embarrassed that I had let that happen and I learned from it!

turns.text: I once accidently ran down the battery on my car when I mid-judged how long I could run the radio for without the engine running. It was 5am and I was in the middle of nowhere. I called the first person I could think of who could help and they came with crocodile clips and recharged the battery. I felt so grateful to be on the receiving end of a kind act. I was also embarrassed that I had let that happen and I learned from it!
That sounds like a really stressful situation. It's really good to know that there are still helpful people out there!

dialogs.situation: Today I had a patient who found out she could not have babies. She has been trying for 6 months now.

turns.text: Today I had to tell a patient about her lab results. Come to find out she could not have babies. She was very upset.
Oh, that must have been a hard thing to do. I'd hate to be the one to deliver such a bad news...

dialogs.situation: I have just watched the first ring movie. I keep having nightmares and can't sleep with the lights off.

turns.text: I just watched the ring movie for the first time.
Oh yeah.  I've never seen it, I can't watch horror films.  How did you like it?

dialogs.situation: I am so happy with my life.

turns.text: I am so happy with my life right now.
That must be a great feeling!  Good for you!  You should be proud that things are going well and not take it for granted.

dialogs.situation: I accidentally dropped my phone and the screen started glitching out and the phone didn't want to turn on anymore.

turns.text: I accidentally dropped my phone at the screen started to glitch out and didn't want to turn on anymore. I was scared because it was a brand new phone. Thankfully after a while of it just sitting there it turned back on normally.
That is a huge blessing, I don't know about you but my life is pretty much keyed into my phone.

dialogs.situation: I'm going to meet my long distance girlfriend next weekend!

turns.text: I'm going to meet my long distance girlfriend next weekend!
That's so cool!  DO you get to see her often?  Have you ever gotten to see her in person before or did you meet online?

dialogs.situation: I'm waiting to hear back from the nursing program I applied to for my degree

turns.text: I'm waiting to hear back from the nursing program I applied to for my degree
That's exciting and nerve wracking at the same time I bet. How do you feel about it?
My friends went to an event without me, but I'm sure they have a good reason to.
Hm... I don't know how I would feel about that. Do you have a good relationship with them?

dialogs.situation: I was in a work meeting the other day and one of my coworkers was was able to recite from memory a whole lot of legal policy and verbiage. I was floored by how much he had retained from studying!

turns.text: I was in a work meeting the other day and one of my coworkers was was able to recite from memory a whole lot of legal policy and verbiage. I was floored by how much he had retained from studying!
Oh wow yeah that is quite impressive! He should become a lawyer if he isn't one already!

dialogs.situation: Sometimes my partner leaves to work abroad for long periods of time. While some of my friends brag about cheating on their partners, I always am respectful and do not do anything to hurt our relationship.

turns.text: My partner leaves abroad for work for long periods of time. I am always respectful and never do anything that would hurt our relationship.
Thats a strong relationship , im happy to hear people like you still exist in this world

dialogs.situation: I didn't pay my rent this month because I have some financial problems. The landlord have put a paper on a wall of the building notifying my neighbors that I didn't pay my rent.

turns.text: I didn't pay my rent this month because I have some financial problems. The landlord have put a paper on a wall of the building notifying my neighbors that I didn't pay my rent.
Yikes, that's really cruel of him to do that. I'm sure you're trying the best you can

dialogs.situation: I saw a mom and baby bunny around 8 and they were letting me talk to them. It was a bit shocking as usually bunnies take off whenever they see or hear anything. They were so sweet!

turns.text: HUGS! I saw a mom and baby bunny around 8 and they were letting me talk to them. It was a bit shocking as usually bunnies take off whenever they see or hear anything.
Oh, how adorable! There are so many bunnies around right now.  My parents house has especially a lot of them and they don't really run off like normal either.

dialogs.situation: I have a friend who came out to me about their sexuality. I was the first person they had ever told other than the people that they dated.

turns.text: We rode in the cab, and my friend looks at me with the most serious face and tells me they are Bi-Sexual. Though they said they usually only date the same sex and they hadn't ever told anyone about it.
Your friend must trust and care for you a lot to confide in you like that. how did you react?

dialogs.situation: I went to work today and noticed that my coworkers would laugh every so often. I had no idea why until I returned home and noticed that I had a giant candy stuck in the back of my hair all day!

turns.text: All day at work my coworkers would laugh when I'd pass by. I had no idea what was going on until I got home and noticed I had a giant candy stuck in the back of my hair!
Oh no!  They are mean to not have told you.  I would've told you.  How did it even get there?

dialogs.situation: I was looking through some old photo albums and it was so cool. It brought back a lot of memories.

turns.text: I really like looking through old pictures. Its so nice to look back on the past.
I used to enjoy doing that with my grandmother, she'd tell me all about when my dad was little.  I love old stories like that.

dialogs.situation: I spend way too much money on food. Its getting bad.

turns.text: I spend way too much money on food.
That's a tough one. Do you eat out a lot? That's usually the culprit. I had to learn how to cook for myself so I could afford to live.

dialogs.situation: A possom was waiting outside my door.

turns.text: A possom was waiting outside my door.
Talk about an unwelcome guest! I would have immediately slammed my door shut! I never know how to respond in those situations, as in whether or not they're dangerous, etc. What did you do?

dialogs.situation: I had some tests done at the doctors yesterday, hopefully i hear good news

turns.text: I had some tests done at the doctors yesterday, hopefully i hear good news
i hope all goes well. was something the matter that made you decide to have the tests done?

dialogs.situation: Toys in McDonald's happy meals.

turns.text: When I was a kid, I remember telling my mom to take me to McDonald's, just so I could get the toy in my Happy Meal. I didn't even care about the food.
Ha, I used to do that too. But I was almost always disappointed by the toy once I actually got it.

dialogs.situation: I just moved into my new one bedroom apartment. I kind of miss my roommate already. Its so quite now.

turns.text: I just got a new one bedroom apartment but I kind of miss my roommate. Its really quite now.

I'm jealous of you. I've had a roommate the past few years since I'm in college. First one I had battle depression and mental illness, and even checked himself into a behavioral center because he was feeling suicidal. This recent roommate seems normal enough though.

dialogs.situation: I'm retiring soon.

turns.text: I'm retiring soon.
thats awesome , one day i want to make it to retirement im happy to hear people work this long, in my area young people refuse to work all they do is party and live off there familys money

dialogs.situation: I'm feeling a bit nervous about my next decisions in life.

turns.text: I've been feeling a bit nervous about my next decisions in life. How do I know what the right thing to do is?
I know exactly what you mean. It's really tough but when I make decisions I try to stand on them and be willing to pivot if necessary.

dialogs.situation: I'm glad that the seasons are about to change.

turns.text: I love when Fall starts coming in.
I hate it. I want it to be 100 and humid all the time. I thrive in the heat

dialogs.situation: I was annoyed when family missed my birthday

turns.text: I was annoyed when my family missed my birthday
I can understand that. I don't get nearly as many birthday wishes as I used to. I guess it happens as we get older.

dialogs.situation: My father in law was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer when our daughter was 9 months old.  He passed 9 months later when she was 18 months.

turns.text: My father in law was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer when our daughter was 9 months old.  She was his first granddaughter.
Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that! I know how hard that can be for the family as well. Is he able to get treatments?

dialogs.situation: I always buy the next Nintendo console no matter what people say about it.  They have always done well for me.

turns.text: No matter what other people say I always buy the newest Nintendo console.
I hear that.  I can't afford all of them, but I have several.  Nintendo forever!

dialogs.situation: I'm going skydiving in a few days. I've never been before so I'm quite nervous about it

turns.text: I'm going skydiving in a few days

Is this your first time?  I know that is something that I would even ever consider.  My fear of heights would render me completely lifeless.  So are you doing the real skydiving or in one of these indoor skydiving places?

dialogs.situation: My transmission went out in my car. My dad loaned me $500 to get it fixed.

turns.text: My transmission went out in my car at the worst possible time. No way could I afford to get it replaced or rebuilt. My dad was able to loan me $500 to get the new transmission, and my step dad was able to put it in.
So is it working now? I need atransmission for an old volvo. I'm saving for a new car instead.

dialogs.situation: I live in a town that has several major highways. The other day I passed an awful accident where a car was mutilated beyond recognition and it was do to the carelessness of someone speeding onto the on ramp of the highway and not watching the traffic coming as they entered it. It made me angry.

turns.text: I live in a town that has several major highways. The other day I passed an awful accident where a car was mutilated beyond recognition and it was do to the carelessness of someone speeding onto the on ramp of the highway and not watching the traffic coming as they entered it. It made me angry.
It is truly horrible. Such incidents mostly happen due to drivers being careless like texting while driving. I hope no deadly casualties had been involved in this event

dialogs.situation: I'm so glad it finally cooled down outside

turns.text: I'm so glad it finally cooled down outside! I hate heat and humidity, makes me feel so miserable
I hear you. It's been super hot and humid here for weeks. The only time i get out of the house is to go to the pool or get groceries lol

dialogs.situation: I rent with arnb to a young couple and I found my home totally destroyed. They even took a dump in the living room.

turns.text: rent my home with arnb to a young couple. When I came back, I found my home totally destroyed. They even took a dump in the living room.
That is a real bummer. I hope you got a security deposit. They won't be getting that back.

dialogs.situation: it is really depressing going to visit my grandmother to the hospital and see all the sick patients

turns.text: it is really hard going to the hospital to visit my grandmother
I bet it is! When my grandma was alive it was so heartbreaking to see her in pain. She broke her hip right before her death and she just couldn't recover

dialogs.situation: Last night I saw the performance of Shin Lim on America's Got Talent.

turns.text: Last night I saw Shin Lim's new performance on AGT!  Right before his performance he put out a video on YouTube and let everyone know it was about to happen.  It was great.
Whoa!  I saw his initial performance and was blown away!  That must have been amazing to see!

dialogs.situation: I was shopping at the grocery store when I noticed my fly was undone.

turns.text: Hey there, I had an embarrassing situation today..
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that! It can be tough when we feel that we have lost face in front of others.

dialogs.situation: Whenever it's late at night and I'm on the couch watching T.V., I feel alone and empty inside.

turns.text: I hate when it's late at night and it's just me up watching T.V..  So lonely.
i wish i could stay up late and just watch tv alone some times. i don't have any alone time.

dialogs.situation: I found a wallet and return it to the owner.  I am satisfied with myself.

turns.text: I found a wallet and returned it to the owner.
That's very good of you. I would be proud of myself If I can do such a thing especially if there is a huge chunk of money in it

dialogs.situation: A manager I do not like was working at the store I love today. It makes it a bit frustrating to shop there.

turns.text: A manager I do not like was working at the store I love today. \
Aw man. I am guessing you already went to the store. Did you have to interact with the manager?

dialogs.situation: When my sister passed away several years ago, I had such a hard time with the loss. I felt very much separate from others in dealing with my grief.

turns.text: My sister passed away several years ago. I really had a hard time with the grief and couldn't really relate to anyone that tried to help me with it.
i'm sorry to hear that. i know exactly what you are going through. My brother tragically passed away 2.5 years ago. He was only 32

dialogs.situation: I broke a vase at my mom's house and hid it. I still haven't told her about it.

turns.text: I broke a vase at my mom's house last year, and ended up hiding the evidence. I still haven't told her, and I feel bad about it.
Oh man that's a bad situation. Was this vase of any sentimental value, or was it really expensive or what?

dialogs.situation: A close friend said she was having problems with her knee.  I hope she goes to a doctor soon

turns.text: A close friend said she was having problems with her knee
Ouch!  Did she hurt it or is it a degenerative thing? I hope she can find help with physical therapy.

dialogs.situation: I recently got together with some old college buddies and we just spend a weekend sitting around talking about the good ole times.

turns.text: My and some old friends from college recently got together. It's always great to see those guys again.
I bet it is! I love getting together with friends, especially if it has been a while...which it seems to be the older I get.

dialogs.situation: I am sitting here waiting on something expensive I ordered online. It should be on my doorstep any second. Need it for this weekend.

turns.text: Literally anytime I order something online and I get the tracking I immediately start checking it. I am so impatient waiting on stuff to come.
Yes I know I am like that too, I can't wait for my new stuff to arrive, I feel like a child on Christmas waiting for Santa's gifts.

dialogs.situation: I feel so relaxed and at peace when I meditate.

turns.text: I feel so relaxed and at peace when I meditate
Who doesn't..  everyone should do it!  Have you ever had any mystic experiences while you did it?

dialogs.situation: My cubicle neighbor at work really bothers me.  He eats all day long and is always chewing loud foods with his mouth open!  I can barely think with him chomping like a cow!

turns.text: My cubicle neighbor at work really bothers me. He eats all day long and is always chewing loud foods with his mouth open! I can barely think with him chomping like a cow!

I hate that. That's one of my biggest pet peeves. That's such an awkward situation, because you don't want to come off as high maintenance and ask them to stop, but it'd be so easy for them to have better manners, too. I wish I had better advice. Maybe go to HR?

dialogs.situation: I couldn't believe it when my dog died a few weeks ago. I honestly thought I was going to stay lonely forever. When my girlfriend asked me if I wanted to go look at dogs to cheer me up, I said no.

turns.text: In some ways, losing a pet dog is even worse than losing a relative. They're so innocent, they're so helpless. They don't deserve to have to die or suffer ever.
Goodness, you're right about that. Plus a pet is the only thing to show unconditional and neverending love for you.

dialogs.situation: My kids are still on vacation with my parents for another wee. I really miss them.

turns.text: My kids have been gone for a week on vacation with my parents. They are going to be gone for another week.
Are you happy or sad about it? I mean on one hand you have all that time to yourself but at the same time I'm sure you miss them.

dialogs.situation: I dropped money on the ground in public.  A kind and honest stranger saw me drop it and returned the money to me.  I trusted that person after that.

turns.text: I was in the park the other day and dropped some money on the ground without knowing it. A kind stranger witnessed this happen and picked up the money. That person then returned it to me.
That's so awesome. Isn't it so nice when people do nice things for each other in their communities?

dialogs.situation: i dropped my groceries in the parking lot

turns.text: i dropped my groceries in the parking lot
Oh no, how awful for you! I hope people helped you to pick them up (and didn't help themselves!).

dialogs.situation: I was upset when I found out I didn't get the job I applied for. I thought I had done so good on the interview!

turns.text: I was mad I didn't get the job I had applied and interviewed for. I put so much work in crafting my resume to fit the description.
That is very unfortunate that you put all that work in and were let down. I hope something good came out of it like another good job afterwards.

dialogs.situation: knew things were going to be alright for me when I dropped out of college. My dad was there for me a lot

turns.text: My dad was there for me when I dropped out of college. I knew things would be okay because of him
That is an example of an awesome parent.  It is good to know he has got your back!

dialogs.situation: I am ready for my job interview in a couple days. I have everything I need from attire to answers to questions!

turns.text: I am ready for my job interview in a couple days. I have everything I need from attire to answers to questions!
That sounds like you should get the job for sure! Your competition doesn't stand a chance!! :)

dialogs.situation: I told my best friends about an incident in where I self-harmed recently. I was scared to share, but I'm glad I did; they were understanding and supportive.

turns.text: I told my best friends about an incident in where I self-harmed recently.
I am glad that you spoke out and shared your feelings. Its not healthy to self harm and pent up your feelings.

dialogs.situation: My dog died this past December and I've had a really hard time getting over it. She was our family pet.

turns.text: My dog died this past December and I've had a really hard time getting over it. She was our family pet.

I am so sorry to hear that. I have been devastated by the loss of pets in the past, so I can understand what you're going through. I'm sure she was very loved and had a great life with you and your family.

dialogs.situation: I'm really impressed with our city's new freeway, it makes getting to work so easy!

turns.text: I'm really impressed with our city's new freeway, it makes getting to work so easy!
That is always a good thing.  Is it free or a toll road?  Where I live most of em cost money.

dialogs.situation: I saw an ad for Disneyland and I remembered the first time I had ever been there. I was just a little kid, but I loved it

turns.text: I saw an ad for Disneyland and I remembered the first time I had ever been there
I LOVED Disneyland growing up! Did you go often? How old were you and what was your favorite ride?

dialogs.situation: my classmates took a video of me sleeping in class

turns.text: we were in class and i had not enough sleep the previous night because i had gone to a party. i slept on my desk and later found on my facebook wall a video of me sleeping while the students laughed at me.
Oh no! That's not very nice but I guess you can play it off by just acting cool and laughing it off.

dialogs.situation: A time I really felt I had made an achievement was when I was promoted to a Team Leader at work.

turns.text: When I was promoted to Team Leader at work, I really felt like all my hard work had paid off, to some extent, and I gave myself a little pat on the back.
You must have really proud of yourself. Its good to acknowledge your own achievements from time to time.

dialogs.situation: I get so down on humaity sometimes watching true crime shows

turns.text: Sometimes I get sad watching true crime shows
I agree.  That happened to me and I had to stop watching them.  I worry too much about it happening to me or, even worse, my kids.

dialogs.situation: My wife is due next month with our first kid!  I feel prepared in becoming a responsible father!

turns.text: My wife is due next month with our first kid! I feel prepared in becoming a responsible father!
Congratulation!  It is really smart to be as prepared as possible!  This baby will change your world!

dialogs.situation: My brother and his friends invited me to a party tonight. They celebrated my birthday and I felt very loved and happy.

turns.text: My brother and his friends invited me to a party tonight.
Sounds like that could be fun if you like your brother and if you like parties. Do you want to go?

dialogs.situation: I can't believe I am up so early, it's the weekend!

turns.text: I can't believe I am up so early, it's the weekend!
I know. It seems like I've been up early every weekend for a while now. Really wish I could sleep in!

dialogs.situation: I am expecting a call from someone today. They will tell me the gender of my baby!

turns.text: I am having a baby! I will learn the gender today!
Wow wow wow! That is wonderful and exciting! Congratulations!!!!! Do you have any vibes as to gender, one way or the other?

dialogs.situation: I'm so lucky that I have had a best friend for 20 years.

turns.text: My best friend and I have been friends for over 20 years. I feel really lucky to have such a great friend.
That's so great! You guys have been able to stay close after so long! You must be very compatible with each other

dialogs.situation: My boyfriend bought me an outfit by himself and I actually loved it. It fit me perfectly and everything!

turns.text: My boyfriend bought me an outfit by himself and I actually loved it.
Really, I can't believe you like it. Are you sure he bought it and not his mom lol?

dialogs.situation: I am taking a trip to Disney World next month! My wife is going for the first time!

turns.text: I am taking a trip to Disney World next month! My wife is going for the first time!
That's so awesome, I'm really jealous! I've never been either, and I'm actually saving up for a trip!

dialogs.situation: I've ran 5 miles every other day for 5 weeks in preparation for my half marathon.

turns.text: Hey, have you ever ran a half marathon before?
I did, but not officially, and it was a trail running marathon(16 miles), how about you?

dialogs.situation: My husband comes home tomorrow from a month long business trip!  I am so excited and cleaning the house and getting things all ready!

turns.text: My husband comes home tomorrow from a month long business trip! I am so excited and cleaning the house and getting things all ready!
Oh you are such a great wife! I think he will totally appreciate it! Are you doing anything nice for him?

dialogs.situation: I have two uncles and they both died within three months of each other

turns.text: I have two uncles and they both died within 3 months of each otehr
That's very sad, I'm sorry. I have had family members pass as well and it is never easy.

dialogs.situation: You have to be happy in order to live long

turns.text: You need to be happy for you to live longer
of course, like they say happiness is contagious, if you are happy everything around you stays happy and it will be hard to die young

dialogs.situation: I was fired from one of my jobs because of something a coworker did and I was blamed for.

turns.text: The situation was very unfair and I was treated as if I didn't matter after working there for over 5 years
Wow im sorry to hear that. It sucks when something goes wrong at a job you've been there long

dialogs.situation: grandermother passing

turns.text: my grandmother passed yestserday. she was the one who raised me
oh im so sorry! it hurts when our parents leave us.  my uncle, who was basically my father, died in april.

dialogs.situation: My husband used to be a drug addict. During that time he cheated on me many time. No matter what he did though I always stayed true to him.

turns.text: I was cheated on at one time, but I stayed true to him and myself . We worked through it and are good now.
I'm glad to hear that. If you can get through that, you can get through anything together.

dialogs.situation: Our son is in the Army and stationed in another state. He will be coming to visit us next month on his leave.

turns.text: Our son in the Army is taking a leave to visit us next month.
Oh, you must be so excited! I have a son in the Army as well and I love when he gets to visit!

dialogs.situation: I am looking forward to my next vacation

turns.text: I am trying to decide where I should go next on vacation, I love travelling.
I say think of all the places you always wanted to go and then choose a place you never even considered.

dialogs.situation: During an argument, my wife told that I am not the real father of my son. I am so angry.

turns.text: During an argument, my wife told that I am not the real father of my son. I am so angry.
That is horrible! Do you think it is really true, or she was trying to just make you angry?

dialogs.situation: I hate how much conflict there is our country. It makes me frustrated knowing how divided we have become.

turns.text: I hate how our country is so divided right now
It is, but I think it was all along and people are just standing up for what they believe in more now.

dialogs.situation: I used to work as a flooring specialist at a major chain home improvement store. It was a good place to work until I got a new supervisor who thought he could disrespect me without consequences.

turns.text: I used to work as a flooring specialist at a major chain home improvement store. It was a good place to work until I got a new supervisor who thought he could disrespect me without consequences.
Uh oh.  I'm sorry to hear that.  That is never a good thing to do as a supervisor.

dialogs.situation: I was so scared when my dad used to scare me as a kid

turns.text: I was so scared when my dad used to scare me as a kid
Dads can be strange like that sometimes. Was he trying to be malicious about it, or just having fun?

dialogs.situation: When I listen to smashmouth I remember the 90s and Shrek

turns.text: When I listen to smashmouth I remember the 90s and Shrek
Hey now, you're an all star! Did you know they wrote that song with the hopes of giving their fans more confidence?

dialogs.situation: I just had to bury my Golden retriever today.  I had him for 10 years.

turns.text: I just had to bury my Golden retriever today. I had him for 10 years.
Oh no. I'm so sorry.  I feel you.  I lost my sweet springer spaniel, Pepper, not long ago. Are you coping okay?

dialogs.situation: One night my children and I came home and came in through the back door. As I opened it, I saw a tall shadow in the hallway! It scared me so much, as I feared an intruder was in my home.

turns.text: One night when my kids and I came home, I saw a shadow in my hallway as I came in the back door. I was so scared and was afraid someone had broken in my home.
In some ways that is a bit funny but it certainly can be a scary time to come home alone to an empty dark house.

dialogs.situation: This Friday a video game comes out that i get EVERY year.

turns.text: Madden comes out friday and im so ready
I'm sure it's hard waiting for the new releases when it's a game your hyped up for! I enjoy playing games too!

dialogs.situation: I am starting a new job soon. It is quite a step up from my current position, so I'm a little scared that I won't perform well.

turns.text: I recently got a promotion. It's quite a big step up from my current role, so I'm very nervous that I won't do well in it.
That is great news. I think you just might be nervous. They wouldn't have promoted you if you couldn't do it.

dialogs.situation: 'm preparing for marathon

turns.text: i'm preparing to run a marathon. i'm not a runner and never participated in any race but i think i can do it!
Oof, are you sure you don't want to try a half marathon first? You'll need to train quite a bit before doing a full marathon

dialogs.situation: My fiance took a new job about a year ago, and he would eventually get his own work vehicle after the 6 months of training. After that long time of him having the car all day I am happy that his training is over and he gets his work truck and I get the car back!

turns.text: My fiance took a new job about a year ago, and he would eventually get his own work vehicle after the 6 months of training. After that long time of him having the car all day I am happy that his training is over and he gets his work truck and I get the car back!
Nice!  Six months is a long time to be car-less.  I'm sure you have a new sense of freedom to do what you want and need to do while he's at work now.

dialogs.situation: I loaned some money to my friend at work. Turns out he quit a couple days ago and I won't be getting my money back as I have no way of contacting him..

turns.text: I loaned some money to my friend at work. Turns out he quit a couple days ago and I won't be getting my money back as I have no way of contacting him..
Wow! What a jerk for him to up and leave with no way to contact him. Was it a lot of money?

dialogs.situation: I'm so glad that summer is almost over.

turns.text: I'm very happy that summer is almost over and fall is around the corner.

I used to be that way, because I love holidays and the mood it puts everyone in. But I'm starting to hate how short the fall and winter days are, and how quickly it gets dark. Now that I've been exercising outside more lately, I hate losing that time in the sun

dialogs.situation: I am so grateful to my friend who took me home when I got drunk at the bar.

turns.text: I am so grateful that I have great friends :)
Friends really are the best part of life, I'd say. I can't imagine what I'd do without some of those folks in my life.

dialogs.situation: I get mad at overtly superficial people.  They're nice to you in person but talk crap behind your back

turns.text: Overtly superficial people tick me off.  They're nice to you in person but talk crap behind your back that's what you call a two-faced friend
I call them hypocrites. They take advantage of people whenever it suites their needs. Can't stand the presence of such people

dialogs.situation: I lost my temper with my daughter the other day and was a bit ill with her. I felt so bad that I had raised my voice and hurt her feelings.

turns.text: My daughter caught me in a bad mood the other day and was being a bit argumentative. I lost my temper, yelled and really hurt her feelings. I felt bad that it happened.
Oh that sucks.  Those are the types of situations where you can't help it, but you know you did wrong the second after it's over.

dialogs.situation: I'm anxious to meet my wife's ex-husband.  Hopefully it will be civil and not awkward!

turns.text: I'm anxious to meet my wife's ex-husband. Hopefully it will be civil and not awkward!
I can definitely understand how you would be worried about that.  I think I'd have to decline - LOL!  You are a good person for being willing to meet with him.

dialogs.situation: My friend worked really hard this semester. I'm sure he'll do great.

turns.text: My friend worked really hard this semester. I'm sure he'll do great.

That's nice of you to say about someone else. It's nice when someone can recognize someone else's hard work and dedication without feeling jealous or annoyed. I'm sure he knows how proud of him you are.

dialogs.situation: I have a huge fear of heights, so when I went on a plane for the first time, I was the most scared I had ever been

turns.text: I have a huge fear of heights, so when I went on a plane for the first time, I was the most scared I had ever been
Thats pretty brave of you facing a fear like that.  How did you feel when the flight was over?

dialogs.situation: I cant believe its my last year of college. I am so ready

turns.text: Seinor year. I am graduating a 35 year old single mom
Congratulations on that. You truly did it. Age is just a number. I hope you have your whole life ahead of you yet

dialogs.situation: Anytime I see people just throwing garbage on the street I feel anger.

turns.text: I get angry when people don't use trash cans.
I once volunteered to pick up trash on the side of the road. It's amazing how much people litter

dialogs.situation: Recently heard that my father was laid off from his job. He's retirement age anyway, but I felt bad for him, as that must have been, at the very least, slightly humiliating. He's been a hard worker for 40 years, and has done well to support the family. But I do worry for him in the short-term.

turns.text: Recently heard that my father was laid off from his job. He's retirement age anyway, but I felt bad for him, as that must have been, at the very least, slightly humiliating. He's been a hard worker for 40 years, and has done well to support the family. But I do worry for him in the short-term.
Oh that's awful!  I hope he is going to be okay.  Did they lay him off with severence or anything?

dialogs.situation: My current employer is having big financials problem. I am afraid that the company will go into bankruptcy.

turns.text: My current employer is having big financials problem. I am afraid that the company will go into bankruptcy.
That sounds really frustrating to deal with. You sound like you're self-aware and anticipating the problem, though. Perhaps you've already started preparing to look elsewhere?

dialogs.situation: My husband has been studying for over a year for this exam.  And today he was notified that he passed everything needed for the CPA license.

turns.text: My husband has been studying for over a year for this exam he needed to take.  It's taken a lot of time away from our family.
That must be very hard for you all, but I'm sure it will be worth it in the end. What's the exam for?

dialogs.situation: I love Pirate peanut butter cookies. I'm really stressed today so I bought a box of those cookies and ate an entire sleeve of them. I feel pretty bad because I wrecked my dieting for at least two days.

turns.text: I'm really stressed today so I bought a box of Pirate peanut butter cookies and ate an entire sleeve of them. I feel pretty bad because I wrecked my dieting for at least two days
Aww, I am sorry, but I must say Pirate peanut butte cookies do sound good, did they help you feel any better?

dialogs.situation: I do not have any friends.

turns.text: Hi, I do not have any friends in my new city.
hi, that's sad. have you tried looking for facebook events? like local events. i bet you can meet people there

dialogs.situation: For the good things and those that are not so good, I must give thanks ... the good ones make me feel good, the others make me grow

turns.text: Hello ... I give thanks for the good things and the things that do not, the good things make me feel good and the satisfaction and the bad things are internal growth
that is a very optimistic way to look at life . i should actually look at life that way too instead of getting overwhelmed when things do not go my way

dialogs.situation: loving my wife

turns.text: i have never had another female companion other than my wife. today we celebrate 40 year anniversary
awww, that's so sweet i aspire to be like you with my fiance, i will sooon get married! what re you guys planning to do? and what's your guys secret for holding a relationship for so long?

dialogs.situation: Many of my friends go to medical school, they will be very successful in the future

turns.text: Many of my friends go to medical school, they will be very successful in the future
Well, they deserve it. Medical school is not easy and they spent unimaginable effort and hard work to finish it

dialogs.situation: I do not like the dark.

turns.text: I do not like the dark.,
There are a bunch of people who really don't! I don't get really why people are afraid of it, though.

dialogs.situation: I found out my friend won a weekend stay in St. Louis.  It is all inclusive and I also entered the same contest and won nothing

turns.text: My friend won a work contest that we were competing for.  He gets an all expenses trip to St. Louis for a weekend.  I love that town and I wish I was him
Thats really awesome.  I never win anything cool.  Does he get to bring anyone? Maybe he can take you?

dialogs.situation: s at the grocery store and I saw some guy carrying like 40 bags, he must've been very strong

turns.text: I was at the grocery store and I saw some guy carrying like 40 bags, he must've been very strong
That's crazy! I wonder if he's stocking up or is cooking for a lot of people.

dialogs.situation: I sat in my kitchen the other night and just listened to the rain hit the window for an hour. I felt so happy and whole.

turns.text: I was so calm and happy the other night just listening to rain hitting the kitchen windows
I use to live in an older house that had a tin roof, and I'd always love hearing the rain beat on it! Helped me sleep like a baby,.

dialogs.situation: It might sound strange, but I am looking forward to returning to work after my vacation ends soon.

turns.text: This might sound odd, but I am looking forward to getting back to work after my current vacation ends.
That is so funny, but I know exactly how you feel.  Sometimes vacations can get too long.  Did you leave town?

dialogs.situation: I remeber the time a buddy did a backflip in school

turns.text: In front of everyone my friend jumped off the lunch table and did a backflip.
That's an interesting way to get attention. What spurred that on? Was it a dare, or was he just feeling wild?

dialogs.situation: When my kids are in school all day I get lonely sometimes.

turns.text: Last year, when  my kids were both at school, I would get lonely at home sometimes.
I can understand that. It's usually either parents are happy they are out of the house, or sad that they're gone. I'm sorry you feel lonely.

dialogs.situation: My younger sister is getting married before I am.

turns.text: My younger sister is getting married before I am, I can't believe it.

Do you feel negative about it, or positive? It's hard to tell from your sentence. Maybe you feel both ways. If I were in your shoes, I could see how you would start to feel some more pressure in that situation. I was always the youngest child, so I never had pressure on me to accomplish anything by a certain time. If you're not happy about it, hopefully you can turn it into a positive so that your sister doesn't get any undue negativity.

dialogs.situation: My neighbors dog dug a hole under my fence and chased me back into my house!

turns.text: I was out working in my garden when I noticed my neighbor's dog had dug a hole under my fence and was running right at me barking!
Did it scare you or did you make a new friend? It happened to me a few years ago and it turns out the dog just needed a friend.

dialogs.situation: I had to go to a wedding far out of the city I live in, and needed someone to watch my dogs.  A friend took over last minute and agreed to watch them for the weekend.

turns.text: I was going to a wedding outside of my city, and had arranged to have my dogs watched while I was gone, but the person backed out really soon before I had to leave.
Oh no! That's awful!  I watch animals for a few different people and I would never do that.  That's very unprofessional. Did they have an emergency?

dialogs.situation: My husband is an over the road truck driver and we have to spend a lot of time apart. Despite this, we always make the best effort to comfort each other and sow how much we love one another.

turns.text: My husband is an over the road truck driver and I dont get to see him a lot.
I'm sorry to hear that.  It must be difficult to be away from the one you love.

dialogs.situation: I was furious when a lady left her child in the car. Yesterday at the gas station.

turns.text: A lady left her young kid in the car yesterday alone in front of the gas station. I would have video taped it but my mom told me after she left. Anything could've happened..and too boot- we are in the ghetto.
Some people are just so careless... I am sure your mom was keeping a good eye on the child. shame on the parent tho.

dialogs.situation: I'm pretty upset I got a flat on the way to work today.  I was late and I'm down 200 dollars.

turns.text: I'm pretty upset I got a flat on the way to work today.
oh no! that is horrible and those things always seem to happen when on your way to work or somewhere important

dialogs.situation: I was disgusted when my dog tried to attack another dog.

turns.text: I was disgusted when my dog tried to attack another dog
Did the other dog provoke him? I wouldn't stress it too much, its just natural behavior for them, take him to training school.

dialogs.situation: My friend's eyes keep hurting at night. She's been to the doctor, but they can't find anything wrong with her.

turns.text: My friend's eyes keep hurting at night. She's been to the doctor, but they can't find anything wrong with her
The weirdest thing... it sucks when you dont know whats causing it. Has she been to an eye doctor or just a general dr?

dialogs.situation: Long car drive coming up

turns.text: Going to Florida in a couple weeks
That sounds awesome! I've only ever been to Florida in order to get to Disney World. Are you there to visit family? Business? To sight-see?

dialogs.situation: My co-worker got the promotion they wanted at work last week. I was so proud of them.

turns.text: A co-worker of mine just got the promotion they wanted so badly. I feel really proud.
It's really nice that you feel that way, even though you wanted it. Think you'll get it next time?

dialogs.situation: I had never eaten at an authentic Italian restaurant until today. It was awesome.

turns.text: I had my first real Italian restaurant experience today.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I mean I haven't even really gone anywhere higher than Olive Garden myself, so I'm jealous. Did you go with anyone special?

dialogs.situation: I'm prepared to buy another car soon, mine is on it's last leg.

turns.text: I'm prepared to buy another car soon, mine is on it's last leg.
Ah, that's too bad. But exciting at the same time! Do you have a particular car in mind?

dialogs.situation: I have to say that at my wedding I felt the most confident I have ever felt.  I felt beautiful and ready to conquer the world!

turns.text: I have a hard time having confidence in myself but when I got married and I had my hair and makeup done I felt like I was beautiful!  I had so much confidence in myself that day and it was great!
I bet you were beautiful on that day. :) I hope that confidence has carried on since then!

dialogs.situation: lifes going good right now

turns.text: Lifes good right now got a good paying job , all bills getting payed, not late on anything plus money on the side to go out , i am just overall happy in life right now

Man, I'm jealous! I'm still a college student, barely paying rent! And nothing but student loans to look forward to. I probably should have taken your path in life. Not to say you haven't worked very hard for it, because I'm sure you have.

dialogs.situation: I was disappointed with the score i got on my final exam. I really expected more.

turns.text: I was disappointed with the score of my final exam. I studied real hard but got a 64% on it.
I'm sorry. It sucks when you put time and effort into studying but the grade is bad. Could you get help from your teacher or a study buddy?

dialogs.situation: My ex girlfriend was flirting with these guys right in front of me. She loves the attention.

turns.text: My ex girlfriend was flirting with these guys right in front of me. She loves the attention.
That's kind of disgusting. I'm glad she's your ex. That says much more about you than her. How did you respond to it?

dialogs.situation: The more problems I have to more I faith, and faithful I become. I am stronger in my faith when bad things happen in my life and around me.

turns.text: The more problems I have to deal with, the more faith, and faithful I become. I am stronger in my faith when bad things happen in my life and around me.
I'm glad to hear you have something you can lean on in hard times. I'm personally an Atheist but I can respect someone with faith.

dialogs.situation: I was horrified when my dog died a few weeks ago. He was one of my best companions!

turns.text: Recently, my dog died. It was so heartbreaking. We had him since 2010.
Oh no that would make him quite young. I'm so sorry! Do you have plans for another one when you're ready?

dialogs.situation: I couldn't be more happy my daughter made straight A's all year.

turns.text: My daughter made straight A's all year. I am so happy.
That is wonderful!  She must be so proud of herself and I know you are proud of her.  Its great that she likes learning so much.

dialogs.situation: We used some of the money we'd set aside for my son's college to fix our hot water heater.  We're trying to repay it monthly til it's replenished.

turns.text: We used some of the money we'd set aside for our son's college fund to fix our hot water heater.
Oh, that's a terrible problem!  That's the only time I don't envy homeowners!  I could not afford that at all.

dialogs.situation: It might sound stupid but when i took my drivers test at the end i was really hopeful that  passed

turns.text: when i took my drivers test at the end of it i wasw hopeful to pass it
I bet you were anxious to know how you did! Did you study up with friends or family leading up to the driver's test?

dialogs.situation: I am horrible at cooking, but I recently tried out a new recipe. It came out really good!

turns.text: I am horrible at cooking, but I recently tried out a new recipe.
I have found that using alot of online recipes with good instructions helps. Cannabis also induces hunger and reduced adhd thus it helps me pay better attention, even more so when I'm hungry af!

dialogs.situation: I was so scared of my uncle. He is so mad at me for not graduating.

turns.text: My uncle is going to come after me. I didn't graduate.
Why would your uncle be upset? And how do you feel about the situation? It sounds like there's a lot to unpack there.

dialogs.situation: My girlfriend's close friend died recently. She could barely function for a week. I stayed with her the whole week and took care of her.

turns.text: My girlfriend's friend died in a car crash a few months ago. She took it really hard. It was terrible seeing her go through that. I stayed with her that whole week.
Your an outstanding mate and great friend, she must have had a hard time my child hood friend died in a car crash and i felt dead inside for a long time

dialogs.situation: I felt a bit terrified when i was hit by a drunk driver last year but i am very grateful to be alive to today

turns.text: Hello

Hi, a few months ago, my mother found some stray dogs that were starving, so she told us about them. Of course, we brought the poor babies to our house, a mother dog and her two puppies. My heart went out to them, as their ribs were showing, but they were still so loving and sweet.

dialogs.situation: I remember a time where I was asked to help out with a kids camp as a volunteer and it was about 2 months ahead of time, so I completely forgot about it and ended up not going.

turns.text: I remember a time where I was asked to help out with a kids camp as a volunteer and it was about 2 months ahead of time, so I completely forgot about it and ended up not going
Did you hear anything about what happened at that camp in your absence? I hope there were no hard feelings!

dialogs.situation: I get so annoyed and angry when I hear of people being mean to animals. These helpless animals have no clue why people are so mean either.

turns.text: I get so tired of hearing about people being mean to animals.
I'm with you on this one.  What is up with people these days, I just don't understand how they could do that.

dialogs.situation: I was watching a horror movie with my friends and I got really scared. I'm just not cut out for them honestly. I can't take them

turns.text: I was watching a horror movie with my friends and I got really scared
Eeeek! I can't watch those anymore like I used to when I was a teenager. I bet you got scared!  Those replay in my mind over and over.

dialogs.situation: I'm having a party this weekend, I went out and got the food ahead of time.

turns.text: I'm having a party this weekend and I already got my grocery shopping done for it! I refuse to be last minute like last time.
I have a friend who plans ahead like that.  I'm a last minute gal.  I think you will be less stressed by planning ahead.

dialogs.situation: I hope I win the lottery.  I really could use the money.  It would be awesome.

turns.text: Well I bought a bunch of scratch offs today.  I really wanna win the lottery.
Fun!  Those can be addictive for me.  I only get them around Christmas time...not sure why but its a fun stocking stuffer.  Did you win?

dialogs.situation: Last week I was walking to the convenience store with my wife. We ended up not going inside because there were cop cars all around. When we asked a police officer what was happening, he said there was a shooting.

turns.text: Last week my wife and I almost walked into a store where a shooting had taken place.
what?? that is so scary! I'm glad you are safe. that's why i always have my gun with me

dialogs.situation: Yesterday I went into a job interview after preparing for several days. I gave my pitch to the interviewer and felt great about everything. I am confident I will hear back soon to get the job!

turns.text: I applied for a job that really interested me. I found out what kind of candidate they wanted and made sure to prepare very well for the interview.
After the interview was over I though it went very well. I am so confident I will get the job any day now!

dialogs.situation: I applied for a loan to buy a house from the bank but didn't get it. This is so disappointing.

turns.text: I was really disappointed when the bank told us our loan wasn;t approved. Now I can't buy our dream house.
Oh that's so sad, i'm really sorry about that. Is it possible to apply for a loan again in the future for the same house?

dialogs.situation: I injured my hip a while back and am having to learn to walk again. I love to play golf and am keeping my fingers crossed I'll be able to play again.

turns.text: I love to play golf, but injured my hip a while back. I really want to play again.

My nephew is getting into golf! It seems like a cool enough sport, albeit a little expensive. I hope you're able to get back to playing again. I've taken up running and swimming, and it's interesting how much those physical activities relieve stress in our day.

dialogs.situation: I miss being in a relationship sometimes.

turns.text: I miss having a man at home.
Yeah? I'm sorry to hear that. Are you looking for someone else? (Does that sound sleazy, lol?)

dialogs.situation: I'm going on a long train ride tomorrow! From South Carolina to New York! I'm just going to see an old college friend for a couple of days, but I'm just as pumped about the train ride, because I've never been on one before! They seem so peaceful and charmingg.

turns.text: I'm going on a long train ride tomorrow! From South Carolina to New York! I'm just going to see an old college friend for a couple of days, but I'm just as pumped about the train ride, because I've never been on one before! They seem so peaceful and charming.
That seems like a short train ride compared to say, going across country or something! Are you going to be sleeping on it overnight?

dialogs.situation: My friend didn't like the price of wedding cakes, so she just made her own.

turns.text: My friend didn't like the price of wedding cakes, so she just made her own
That's pretty awesome! I feel my skin jump a bit when I see how much people spend on one day

dialogs.situation: A project of mine was mentioned in a national news story. I wasn't expecting it, and it made me feel really good to see my work referenced in a publication I respect so much.

turns.text: I recently had a project of mine recognized in a national publication!
Wow!  That must feel great!  You should be proud of this accomplishment.  People can go their whole lives without ever being published!

dialogs.situation: I lost my credit card and someone charged 500 dollars on it.  I am so upset it happened.

turns.text: I lost my credit card and someone charged 500 dollars on it.
Oh boy.  That's no good.  Did the credit card company alert you or did they miss it too?

dialogs.situation: Once, I had the chance to betray a friend that has always been truthful and honest to me. I didn't take the chance and stayed faithful to that friendship.

turns.text: I recently had the chance to betray a friend of mine, but instead I stayed faithful.
It's so good you stayed loyal, I think anyone would've appreciated a friend like you.

dialogs.situation: I met my wife online 7 years ago and can't see myself with anyone else, ever.

turns.text: I met my wife online 7 years ago and can't see myself with anyone else, ever.
You are so lucky to find someone special online. That can turn out so badly sometimes for some people.

dialogs.situation: I sometimes like my kids better when they take a nap. They arent loud then.

turns.text: I love when my kids are asleep
Oh really? Why is that? Because you don't have to deal with their antics while they're knocked out?

dialogs.situation: I came across a post on Facebook showing all of the old toys, trends, and food from the 90s.

turns.text: The other day I came across a Facebook post showing all the old stuff from the 90's.. it took me way back to my childhood.
Good lord you must have had Facebook for a LONG time! I started mine in college so there isn't anything from my younger years.

dialogs.situation: I spent $60 on a new hyped up video game that I ended up hating.

turns.text: I spent $60 on a game that was really hyped up of being amazing and I just really couldn't get into it!
That is disappointing.  I wonder if you can see if anyone you know is doing it and they can hype you up for it.

dialogs.situation: Besides my cats being with me I am always alone at home all the kids are grown and moved out.

turns.text: Ever since my kids left and went to college I am such a loner.
I can understand you. But this is the cycle of life, right? Kids grow and they have to find their own way of life in this world

dialogs.situation: My neighbors cat keeps pissing in my grill

turns.text: my neighbor has an ugly cat that keeps pissing in my bbq grill

Aw poor kitty! Well that is their fault for sure. Have you spoke to them about it? Also you can get these spray things that keep cast out of your yard- They spray them with water when they cross a barrier-

dialogs.situation: I am feeling warm and fuzzy today. My girlfriend called and told me she would be on the visit.

turns.text: I haven't seen my girlfriend in awhile. She told me today she was coming to visit me!
Long distance relationships aren't easy. That's great news to hear. Do you have anything special planned?

dialogs.situation: I made a girl pregnant without marrying her, I feel so terrible because I am a very religious person

turns.text: I made a girl pregnant without marrying her, I feel so terrible because I am a very religious person
Well, if you provided for your child's care then you shouldn't feel bad. I mean, this isn't the dark ages.

dialogs.situation: How can one stay married for 10 years without cheating?

turns.text: How can one stay married for 10 years without cheating?
By being a decent person...I'm not a cheater and could never..I am very monogomous..Why would you get married if you wanted that?

dialogs.situation: I can't wait for the releash of the new Super Smash Brothers game.

turns.text: I can't wait for the releash of the new Super Smash Brothers game.
I havent played video games in years I really need to buy a system but I dont even know where to begin now adays lol

dialogs.situation: I have to go to Mexico for business in two weeks.  I have never been and I am nervous

turns.text: So I am headed to Mexico for work in about 2 weeks and I am a bit nervous.  I have never been and I am not sure what to expect.
I think that it's completely normal to feel that way for such a long distance trip. I assume you're going from America. I bet you would feel better by doing a bit of research!

dialogs.situation: I'm a pretty level-headed driver.  But my one pet peeve that really irks me--to the point of wanting to throw something at the other driver--is a driver on the right side merging at full speed into the furthest lane possible...with NO SIGNAL

turns.text: I'm generally a calm driver.  But what really agitates me--to the point of wanting to throw something at the other driver--is someone on the right side merging at full speed onto the main road I'm driving on, towards the furthest lane possible...with NO SIGNAL
I feel your pain. It's crazy how reckless some drivers can be. I was always taught the importance of using my signals.

dialogs.situation: a picture i just recently came across had me remembering my first trip overseas.

turns.text: my first trip overseas was to Rome as a college freshman. that was many years ago. hope to go back soon.
That's awesome. I've been to a lot of countries but would love to go to Italy. I am envious.

dialogs.situation: I found my wallet

turns.text: I lost my wallet the other day. i was very upset. I didn't even expect to find it but i got a call this morning and some old man told me he found it and he wants to return it to me! My faith in humanity is restored
That's great news! I find most people are good, honest folk. It's the few rotten ones that make us forget that.

dialogs.situation: I'm so happy I have my dogs in my life, they are so loyal and happy.

turns.text: I'm so happy I have my dogs in my life, they are so loyal and happy.

That's very sweet. I was just dog-sitting my neighbor's dogs last week. They were a little annoying at first, but I had to watch and stay with them the whole week, and I really grew to like them. They felt like my little sisters I had to take care of and play with

dialogs.situation: After ;long time played soccer, i could neither run nor kick the ball as i used to be

turns.text: After long time i played soccer.  Am so bad at it now, i used to be good
Sometimes that happens when you take a break from something for too long, but with some practice you might be able to pick it back up again

dialogs.situation: I was disgusted the way the cavs owner treated Lebron during his two stints with the team

turns.text: I was disgusted the way the cavs owner treated Lebron during his two stints with the team
Oh, very interesting. I'm not a fan of the owner either. Why do you feel that way, though?

dialogs.situation: I have a big interview tomorrow. I have been studying interview questions and have my resume printed out.

turns.text: I have a big interview tomorrow. I feel ready. I have my resumes printed out and everything.
Wonderful!  It always feels so good to be prepared and ready to crush an interview.  I bet you'll get the job because of that preparation and confidence.

dialogs.situation: I went tandem parachuting with my brother and he kept me very safe. I was really scared but I knew that he would protect me.

turns.text: Skydiving is an exillirating and scary experience!
I've never been skydiving myself. I hear that it's a great experience, but I'm not sure if I have the bravery for it.

dialogs.situation: I just hired a new hotel inspector, he has very little experience but wants to learn. Scares me.

turns.text: I just hired a new hotel inspector, he has very little experience but wants to learn. Scares me.
