you took a risk huh? i hope he will be a great worker! That's good you gave him a chance

dialogs.situation: We had a very old dog. He wasn't in any pain, and he was enjoying food and human company just as much as always. When it came time for him to pass away, we laid with him on a blanket on the floor until he was gone.

turns.text: I was really missing my dog Freddy today. He passed away recently at age 16. He was my constant companion.
Oh, I"m sorry to hear that! I know how hard that can be to lose a loved pet.

dialogs.situation: My mom told me at Christmas that we would be going on a cruise vacation. I couldn't believe it!

turns.text: My parents told me that we would be going on a cruise vacation at Christmas. I couldn't believe it!
That sounds like an awesome Christmas present!  I've actually thought about doing that with my girls now that they are older and not much they really need.  Where are you going?

dialogs.situation: One of my friends recently bought a house. I really wish I could afford a house.

turns.text: One of my friends recently bought a house. I really wish I could afford a house.
Wow that is great for your friend! and don't stress it, we are still young and have plenty of time to save up for a house!

dialogs.situation: My wife is off to her mom's, stuck alone at my home!!

turns.text: My wife went to her Mom's place. so bored without her
I can understand that. My husband went to a friends to work on his car. I'm home with 5 kids!

dialogs.situation: I have many health problems but I am so lucky to have a great support system from my family.  It is wonderful to know how much they love me!

turns.text: I have many health problems but I feel so lucky to have a great support system in my family
It is very important to have a good support system with health issues, especially if there are many. It helps to know that you have people that are there if you need them.

dialogs.situation: I'm not really sure what I'm supposed to be doing with my life right now, but I'm trying to at least get back home.

turns.text: I don't really have much direction in my life right now, I'm just trying to keep my head above water because I don't really have any other option.
Oh no that is terrible. Is there anyone near you that could be of help? Maybe a family member or someone that can lend a hand or ear? I'm so sorry to hear this.

dialogs.situation: i did not have enough money for grocery so i went to the foodbank and they gave me some good meat and can food

turns.text: so i was broke and did not have money, went to the foodbank to get free food
i know how you feel. I'm sorry to hear you're going through this. I just got food stamps so i can buy food for me and my son

dialogs.situation: I met a friend online once and we met up in person.

turns.text: A few years ago, I became friends with someone through an online video game. Eventually we trusted each other, so we met up in person!
I know a lot of people in real life through that kind of stuff. Has been pretty great for me after 11 years. How is it for you so far.

dialogs.situation: After I bought my house I felt happy about my life.

turns.text: After I bought my house I felt happy about my life.
It's a big step for anyone, and can really make you feel like you have something tangible you worked for.

dialogs.situation: I went to Disney with my family is was great!

turns.text: we went to disney with the kids it was amazing
Nice! I want to take my daughter when she is older. Did you go to Disneyland or world?

dialogs.situation: I have to go to jury duty later this week. I am pretty nervous about it

turns.text: I have to go to jury duty later this week. I am real nervous about it
I bet you'll do great.  I would be nervous too.  Hopefully it won't be anything too serious and more cut and dry decision.  Have you gone before?

dialogs.situation: I've decided to ask the girl of my dreams to marry me.  I'm sure she will say yes.

turns.text: I've decided to ask the girl of my dreams to marry me.  I'm sure she will say yes.
That's great! Congratulations! That's exciting, and I'm sure if you're confident she will, then she will!

dialogs.situation: getting the job

turns.text: i had a job interview today and i feel really good about it

you know something worker_1, everytime you feel good about something, it always means that you did good! take for example myself, when i had my job interview i also felt really good about it and guess what? I GOT THE JOB!

dialogs.situation: going to visit my brother

turns.text: my brother moved to another state for work 6 months ago and hes been home sick. im going to make a suprise visit  with a massive care package with things from home that he misses
Aw that sounds sweet. You're wonderful for doing that and I'm sure you can't wait to get there!

dialogs.situation: I am so impressed by how a very unknown country in soccer like Croatia got to world cup final.

turns.text: I am so impressed by how a very unknown country in soccer like Croatia got to world cup final.
They have done well - do you think they are unknown though? The were semi-finalists in 1998 and have had lots of good players over the years (Prosinecki, Suker, Boksic, Savicevic, Boban)

dialogs.situation: Sometimes my boyfriend cooks, and the food tastes pretty gross

turns.text: Sometimes my boyfriend cooks, and the food tastes pretty gross
Hahahahaha.  I'm sorry for laughing, but that struck me as funny.  Is he trying his best, or is he trying to get the point across that he shouldn't be cooking?

dialogs.situation: It was sports day in my daughters school. I had no idea she was in the swimming team but she insisted i should attend. I did and was happy to learn that she was leading in her team

turns.text: My daughter is very good at swimming and I had no idea she can swim leave alone compete
Swimming is really fun and besides it, it is very healthy as it involves all muscles of the body to be engaged in movement

dialogs.situation: I have been collecting supplies for this hurricane season.  I am as ready as I'll ever be for whatever comes my way!

turns.text: I have been collecting supplies for this hurricane season. I am as ready as I'll ever be for whatever comes my way!
That's a good idea. It's best to be prepared for a dangerous weather situation, as you never know when it can happen.

dialogs.situation: I was joyful when my son was born.

turns.text: I was so happy when my son was born.
awww. don't tell anyone but my son is my favorite child. I have two girls also.

dialogs.situation: I've been living alone for the last 5 years.

turns.text: I've been living alone for the last 5 years.
I would hate to live by myself. I have been married 21 years and have 6 kids and 7 grandkids. I don't know what it's like to be alone.

dialogs.situation: My brother just got a brand new car.He got an infinity. I'm totally in love with that car.

turns.text: My brother called me to tell me he just bought a brand new car.
oh wow that is cool, i don't think ill ever purchase a new car. a good used one will be my best option!

dialogs.situation: I went through all of my fb photos today. I was only looking at my kids photos. I miss them being babies.

turns.text: I went through allof m FB photo albums today
That's always so fun to see everything that's gone on in your life.  Do you have a favorite moment that was captured in a picture?

dialogs.situation: I wore a bathing suit yesterday and felt confident because I've lost a little weight.

turns.text: Yesterday I wore a bathing suit and felt more confident then I have in a long time.
That's really good! Did you lose weight, or have you just not felt comfortable with yourself before?

dialogs.situation: I wasn't happy today when someone ran in to the back of my moms car.

turns.text: I wasn't happy today when someone ran in to the back of my moms car.
That makes a lot of sense. I wouldn't be happy either! I hope that they have good insurance

dialogs.situation: My brother is supposed to be paying me back for the food I bought for him last week. I've been waiting for a while.

turns.text: My brother is supposed to be paying me back for the food I bought for him last week...
It was nice of you to buy him food, but I'm thinking he didn't pay you back.

dialogs.situation: I was helping my girlfriend pack up her sons toys and he had a lite-brite.  I loved playing with a lite-brite when I was younger.

turns.text: I was helping my girlfriend pack up her sons toys and he had a lite-brite.  I used to have a lite-brite and loved playing with it when I was younger.  It brought back some good memories.
I bought a lite brite from goodwill about a year ago. It was one of the remakes from recent years but we had fun with it.

dialogs.situation: This morning I found a garden snake in my yard! It wasn't very big but I don't like snakes.

turns.text: This morning I found a garden snake in my yard! It wasn't very big but I don't like snakes.
Oh, my dad use to play with those all the time when we were young and he'd let us touch them!

dialogs.situation: I recently was worried about a job interview even though I think it went well. I hope I get it.

turns.text: I recently was worried about a job interview even though I think it went well. I hope I get it.
Good for you. I had couple of interviews couple of years ago. Was very nervous, but thankfully they all went well. My advice, just try to hide your nervousness and show confidence

dialogs.situation: My friend just moved into a new home. Its a nice place that makes me a little envious

turns.text: My friend just moved into a new home. Its a nice place that makes me a little envious of him
It can be tough when friends have things that might be considered better than what you have.  Maybe it can be used as motivation

dialogs.situation: I felt alone last weekend. All of my friends were out of town

turns.text: I felt alone last week. All of my friends were out of town
That sounds horribly boring. You can always take this time to do some house work that you put off, so that it will be ready when your friends get back in town.

dialogs.situation: I absolutely could not wait to go on my cruise this summer! I had so many fun activities planned that I just wanted to jump out into the ocean and swim to my destinations, just to get started!

turns.text: A week before my cruise this summer, I was counting down the days with bated breath. I thought I would actually DIE before I got to go on it.
It's the worst waiting for vacations! You want the time before to go fast but then it to go slow during. Never works out that way, unfortunately.

dialogs.situation: I was looking at some of the old photos I have of my grandpa. He passed away, so I've been reminiscing over him.

turns.text: My grandfather passed away over a year ago, and I was looking at some of the older photos I have of him and I as a kid.
I'm so sorry. I know that must be very difficult for you. It's nice that you have pictures to look at and remember old times together.

dialogs.situation: Walking to a restaurant i didn't hold the door for an old lady coming in. I felt so bad afterwards, I hope she forgave me.

turns.text: Walking to a restaurant the other day and I forgot to hold the door open for an old lady, felt so bad about it because she was right next to the door too.
It was nice of you to at least think of it. I'm sure she wasn't that upset.

dialogs.situation: When i was browsing the internet i suddenly remembered a old game i played when i was a kid. I found the game on the internet and then played it. I had such a crazy time remembering all of it.

turns.text: So i forget some stuff i did as a kid. But when they come back to me i love what i remember. Found out a old game i used to play when i was like 7
What was the game? That happens to me all the time too, it's a treat to remember such great times.

dialogs.situation: I am looking forward to the next season on Game Of Thrones.  I can't wait to watch it.

turns.text: I am looking forward to the next season of Game Of Thrones.
I've never actually watched that show myself. But I've heard so many good things about it!

dialogs.situation: I was going to a vacation house that is far from the city and when I arrived there were cars blocking the driveway to pull in. I could not get in and they were no where to be found.

turns.text: I booked a vacation house on the coast and we drove to the place. Upon arriving the driveway was blocked with other people's cars, to which none of the owners were anywhere to be found.
That must have been so frustrating!!! Were you able to find them fairly quickly? And how?!

dialogs.situation: My cat has been battling cancer for a couple months. She already had two surgeries. Next week she will have to be put down.

turns.text: My cat has been battling cancer for a couple months and has had 2 surgeries.
I'm so sorry to hear that, my girlfriend's cat is going through the same thing right now. It can't be easy.

dialogs.situation: When i started my business. I was sure I could out do anyone.

turns.text: About 10 years ago my boss fired me out of nowhere. I was sick of making money for other people so I started my own business.
Wow, I'm sorry about getting fired, but it sounds like you've got guts! How do you like the business?

dialogs.situation: Once I was running late for my flight, and was in a really long line to check my bag. It was almost my turn and this lady cut right in front of me!

turns.text: So one time I was running late for a flight, and to make things worse I was stuck in a long line to check my suitcase. It was finally my turn when this woman cut right in front of me.
Yikes! I hate when that happens. I had a similar situation happen over Christmas. Did you make your flight?

dialogs.situation: We had planned on a beach vacation this year, but it was not to be.  Unfortunately the condo we rented had a fire and burned to the ground and we didn't have time to find another place.

turns.text: We had planned a beach vacation this year, but it was not meant to be I guess.
Oh no, I know that is so disappointing first hand.  The same thing has happened to me for the last three years.  Is everything going well, though?

dialogs.situation: I wanted a friend to help me to move to my new apartment but he didn't help.

turns.text: I wanted a friend to help me to move to my new apartment but he didn't help me as he said.
Oh no! He doesn't seem like such a good friend then. I hate it when friends pull stuff like that!

dialogs.situation: I have this one co worker who is so lazy and it just makes me so irritate because I have to do extra work.

turns.text: I don't understand why people come to work to just not do their jobs I have a coworker like this.

Oh man..I have had those too..and where I am the one getting crap even though I do my job and everyone elses..I HATE sitting around at work...I either want to work or go home. I hope your boss knows your co-worker is lazy?

dialogs.situation: My friend is pregnant with her 6th kid.

turns.text: My friend is pregnant with her 6th kid
Wow! That is pretty amazing IMO..unless she isn't good with kids..My first almost killed me..and I am terrified to do it again..

dialogs.situation: I'm not sure if my boyfriend is the right one for me.

turns.text: Im not sure my boyfriend is the one
Oh no! That is a hard thing to think about. You might want to take some time apart and find it out to be fair to him

dialogs.situation: I've lost my job and am behind on my mortgage. It scares me that I could lose my home.

turns.text: I've lost my job and am behind on my mortgage. It scares me that I could lose my home.
That's awful, I'm sorry to hear that. I lost my job once as well and times got really hard. What kind of stuff are you doing to try and avoid that outcome?

dialogs.situation: My roommate moved out and soon my girlfriend will move in but right now it is just me in the house.  I dont remember the last time I lived without any roommates.

turns.text: My roommate moved out and soon my girlfriend will move in but right now it is just me in the house. I dont remember the last time I lived without any roommates.
Nice! Enjoy it! I like living alone. It is so peaceful! I get lonely somtimes but for the most part it is great!

dialogs.situation: I'm loving life right now. Both of my kids are married and moved out, my house is paid off and I'm retired.

turns.text: I haven't felt this happy and relaxed in a long time. Loving life! My kids are both married and live on their own, I recently paid off my house and I'm retired!
Yea. After all that, I think it's definitely time for you to relax and have fun!

dialogs.situation: My brother is having it all while i am here on a spot. i want to move forward and i am angry about everything

turns.text: I am become so angry and bitter. My brother is having it all while i am at a spot without making any progress

That's really tough. I can imagine how frustrated you are. Just know that going through trials and struggling is always good for your character and you will end up that much better of a person for getting through it. You can't be too concerned with other's lives, you just have to try not to compare.

dialogs.situation: I have a crush on this person, and I dont know if they like me, and I dont want to ask and be rejected.

turns.text: I have a crush on this person, and I dont know if they like me, and I don't want to ask and be rejected.
Yeah it's probably for the best. You don't want to risk rejection. Maybe they will approach you.

dialogs.situation: I had simpler tastes as a younger kid.  I was enthusiastic and content with the littlest things, like trips to McDonald's after Sunday Mass followed by walks on the beach and window shopping at the mall.  I guess that comes with growing up poor but I'm thankful for it because these days I'm a minimalist and can still appreciate the beauty in the small things.

turns.text: Growing up poor helped me appreciate the simpler things in life.  I was enthusiastic and content with the littlest things, like trips to McDonald's after Sunday Mass followed by walks on the beach and window shopping at the mall.  Some people may cherish an affluent childhood but I feel like I'm at an advantage fiscally, psychologically, and spiritually because I can never take any small thing for granted
I can absolutely see where you're coming from! Growing up my parents were neither wealthy nor very poor, but I feel like I had a great childhood.

dialogs.situation: I laughed at someone who fell over in the grocery store today.

turns.text: I laughed at this lady who fell over in the grocery store today. I'm so disappointed in myself for doing that.
Oh poor lady. I know how it is though. Sometimes our initial reaction is to laugh even when not appropriate.

dialogs.situation: I have a wonderful family and my health that has been horrible, is finally turning around with my hard work.  I am happy with life.

turns.text: I have a wonderful family and my health that has been horrible, is finally turning around with my hard work. I am happy with life.
I am so glad to hear everything is going well for you!. It is good to hear your health is improving.

dialogs.situation: I was pretty sad when my grand dad died. It was not expected

turns.text: I was sad when my grand dad died. It was random
Oh, I'm so very sorry! I know it's very hard to lose a loved one, I lost my sister, father, and both sets of grandparents.

dialogs.situation: Some people can be very annoying,  I was so ashamed the other day

turns.text: I was in a meeting when someone accused me of stealing his money,  it was so tough on me
That's the thing with accusations, anybody can say anything. But if they don't have any proof then it's meaningless.

dialogs.situation: I just finished two college classes that I have been taking this summer! I am glad to be done.

turns.text: I just finished two college classes that I have been taking this summer! I am glad to be done.
Going to college is a good thing, but taking classes in the summer can really stink. At least you'll get to graduate sooner.

dialogs.situation: Rollercoasters next weekend

turns.text: I'm not looking forward to rollercoaster riding next weeked :(
Why? Are you scared to ride it? I can relate, so if that's the case, just skip it.

dialogs.situation: My neighbor just had a baby and thinking about a friend that recently passed away I had to go grab bagels to take to the hospital. She always did that when someone had a baby.

turns.text: I just took visited my friend in the hospital that had a baby. I love being around new borns.
Ah, that's awesome, it's always a joy to see a new born baby experiencing it's first view of the world!

dialogs.situation: Our marketing manager at work recently added a ton of new tasks to my workload that weren't part of my job when I was brought on. I'm a little irritated, like she's passing her work off on me.

turns.text: The head of marketing at my job recently dumped a bunch of new tasks on me and my coworker. I feel like she's just lazy and making us do her job.
or maybe she just knows you're a great worker and very responsible? I hope you will get a raise after completing those tasks

dialogs.situation: I bought a watch on eBay that claimed to be a "9/10 cosmetic condition", but when I got it I noticed a huge crack in the watch face!

turns.text: I bought a watch from eBay that said "9/10 cosmetic" condition, yet when I took it out of the box, there was a huge crack on the watch face! Does that really count as 9/10?!
hell no it does not , these people out here stealing that is exactly why im afraid of buying from e bay , a lot of bad reviews

dialogs.situation: The company i work for, is currently undergoing down-sizing and there are multiple potential candidates that might leave

turns.text: There is currently down-sizing going on in the company i work for. I am very anxious as to be the candidate that they will let go
Oh no. It happened to me recently. But, I take the4 view that things like that happen for a good reason and you'll end up in a better position down the line.

dialogs.situation: at my cat for pooping

turns.text: my cat really got on my nerves today! she pooped in the kitchen floor and that was the first thing i saw when i woke up
Oh, that stinks...literally! I have pets too so I know how you feel. My cat will eat too much sometimes and throw up!

dialogs.situation: My oldest son got the A honor roll last year and I was super proud.

turns.text: I was so proud of my oldest son. He finished 6th grade on the A honor roll.
Congratulations! That's getting to the point where you look at their homework and realize you forgot how difficult it was, ha.

dialogs.situation: Last month I came home from work and noticed my cat wasn't feeling well, so I rushed her to the vet. I had to put her down.

turns.text: Last month I came home from work and noticed my cat wasn't feeling well, so I rushed her to the vet. I had to put her down.
I'm so sorry, that is the worst feelings. I had to put my dog down as well. I know you did the right thing.

dialogs.situation: I am going on a trip to Peru to visit Machu Picchu! I can't sleep because of the anticipation!

turns.text: Hello!
I am going on a trip to Peru to visit Machu Picchu! I can't sleep because of the anticipation!

dialogs.situation: My supervisor praised my work on the project in front of others in our weekly meeting

turns.text: I felt very special and appreciated when my supervisor praised my work in front of other team members during our weekly meeting
I bet that was a nice surprise! That's pretty cool. What was it for, if you don't mind me asking?

dialogs.situation: I was dating a girl one time and she trusted that I would be trustworthy and show up to the date that day. I was busy with work but I assured her I would go. I was running late, but I decided to end my work then, and work on it later after the date, so I went to the date and she was happy to see me. I kept my promise to her.

turns.text: I actually was able to keep my promise to this girl I was seeing?
Well its always a good thing to keep a promise. Can I ask what the promise was?

dialogs.situation: While at a service station I watched the atttendent leave his inside station to go out and pump gas for a lady. She offered him a tip and he declined it.

turns.text: I witness a great sight. I saw a gas station attendant leave his post to pump gas for a lady who has a hard time getting around.
That's really sweet. We don't have gas station attendants here. But that's nice that they're that helpful.

dialogs.situation: i just spend 470$ to fix my car and it's broken again

turns.text: I just spent so much money on my car and now a week later something else broke.

That's terrible.. There's nothing more frustrating and deflating in life than unexpected expenses. I hope you're able to cover all of it. I know if I had one right now, I might not be able to manage it.

dialogs.situation: i have lost a few pounds, i can walk around with that shirt that fits me now

turns.text: I have tried long and hard to lose a few pounds and i finally did, now i can wear that shirt that i use to wear and it fits me now. yayy

Losing weight is the best feeling. I did that a couple of summers ago.. It's one of those few things where you can visibly see yourself getting better, and there's not much that gives you as much pride as that. Congratulations!

dialogs.situation: I felt so bad when I had to board my dog while I was on vacation.

turns.text: I felt so bad when I had to board my dog while I was on vacation. It made me feel like a bad dog mom!
Aww, I know that can be hard, but you can't be too hard on yourself.  Sometimes you don't have a choice.

dialogs.situation: I think things will get better in the future. Thats all im hanging on to at the moment.

turns.text: I think things will get better in the future. Thats all im hanging on to at the moment.
I'm in that boat right now too. I feel it's going to be a long time coming.

dialogs.situation: It has been raining a lot lately, I am really trusting the seal on our doors to keep the water out.

turns.text: It has been raining a lot lately, I am really trusting the seal on our doors to keep the water out.
Yeah flooding is a real problems these days. The weather is crazy! Hopefully you and your house will stay nice and dry.

dialogs.situation: I ate an entire pizza the other day. It was not a personal pan pizza

turns.text: The other day I ate an entire pizza. I felt so bad
What size pizza was it? If it was a large, I am not sure how you didn't get sick.

dialogs.situation: I didn't told a friend we were going to hike in the mountain because last time she was so slow and we had to wait for her I feel bat about it now.

turns.text: Yesterday we went hiking to the mountain and I didn't tell a friend we were going even when I knew she likes to come with us.
Oh wow. Did your friend do something to upset you or something like that? Or were you just wanting some alone time?

dialogs.situation: I thought my company was going to have a lay off. it was a tough few weeks.

turns.text: So we had a meeting at work this week. Turns out we may have to shut down in the next few months.
Omg... thats terrible! Im so sorry - Ive been through similar. Are they going to give you some sort of money upon lay off?

dialogs.situation: My kid lied to me yesterday.

turns.text: My kid lied to me yesterday.
I've had that happen before.  Its like they are trying to become professionals at it. Was it a whopper?

dialogs.situation: I was going through old pictures the other day of when my daughter was little.  She's 18 now and will graduate this year, time sure flies.

turns.text: I was going through old pictures the other day of when my daughter was little, it was pretty neat reliving some of those days.
Thats awesome, i dont have kids yet but i was also looking through some old school photos of me and my friends. Such innocent times.

dialogs.situation: I couldn't get into my car in the parking lot the other day and something was wrong with the lock, so I called a locksmith out to open the door and then realized, it wasn't my car. I wanted to crawl into a hole.

turns.text: I couldn't get into my car in the parking lot the other day and something was wrong with the lock, so I called a locksmith out to open the door and then realized, it wasn't my car. I wanted to crawl into a hole.

Hahaha. I'm so sorry, but that made me laugh. I really don't mean to make you feel like I'm thinking you're dumb, because I don't. Everyone makes that mistake. I have an old Honda Civic, and I run into that problem, too. You probably gave the locksmith a good story to tell, and made his day. Hopefully you can smile at it tomorrow.

dialogs.situation: Anytime I am laying in bed watching TV and playing on my phone I am perfectly happy with life especially if my fiance is home.

turns.text: I don't know if its weird but I am most comfortable laying in bed watching TV and hanging out from there.

I'm right there with you. I've always been a home-body. I don't like going out as much. Sometimes people say millennials and technology have disconnected people too much.. that could be true. But at least we're comfortable doin it.

dialogs.situation: Last week I saw this big pizza in the breakroom and I chose to stick to my diet.

turns.text: Hello, last week I walked into a breakroom and I saw a big pizza laying there for anyone to grab up, however I chose not to take a slice and remain faithful to my diet.
Oh man, good for you! I would have caved for sure. Pizza is my life

dialogs.situation: I used to be very trusting but my friends and family used it to hurt me all the time. Now I don't trust anyone anymore. I am more careful with people.

turns.text: I was so naive and trusting in the past and people took advantage of me a lot. I'm a lot more careful now.
you'll need to be careful around me then. I'm the type of person who takes advantage of people

dialogs.situation: My friend is literally changing his moving day, so that I can help.  I had to work on the first day, so he changed it...

turns.text: My friend asked me to help him move one day, but I was working that day.
as a matter of fact my friend asked me help him move recently , but i was busy at work too he understood

dialogs.situation: I spent months preparing my wedding, it was almost completley DIY. The night before we set up the reception space, made bouquets and set up flowers, and made all of the food. I felt very prepared.

turns.text: After months of DIY projects I spent the two days before my wedding getting everything ready. We made all of the bouquets and flower arrangements, my mother an I made all of the food, and we got the reception space ready the day before the wedding. It was a lot but I felt really prepared.
That is wonderful to have a personal touch for your wedding. It makes it all the more special.

dialogs.situation: Sometime I feel very happy that I am a US resident. When I travel to other countries everyone is so amazed that I am from the US. They treat you very differently because they think that the US is so great, rich and free.

turns.text: Sometimes I feel very happy that I am a US resident. When I travel to other countries everyone is so amazed that I am from the US. They treat you very differently because they think that the US is so great, rich and free.
Yeah, we have a lot to be thankful for.  We take for granted many of the perks of being a US resident!

dialogs.situation: I'm cooking a big dinner tonight for a lot of people on short notice. I went to the store, got everything I need, and I think I'm ready for them.

turns.text: I got told on short notice that I've got a bunch of people coming over to eat dinner. I just got back from the store and I'm ready to do this!
Oh boy. I know just how you feel. Could you persuade them to go to a restaurant?

dialogs.situation: yesterday i ate a whole big bag of M&Ms, i don't feel proud of myself

turns.text: yesterday i ate a whole big bag of M&Ms, i don't feel proud of myself
Oh my gosh that's insane. Well, I'm sure you'll be able to control your impulses in the future.

dialogs.situation: I forgot my lunch and my wallet at home this morning.

turns.text: I forgot my lunch and my wallet at home this morning.
Dang, heartbreaking. If I were your co-worker and you told me that, I'd lend you at least a couple bucks for the vending machines or something. Hopefully you can go home and have a nice dinner.

dialogs.situation: I am hopeful that I would be rich someday

turns.text: I am always suffering due to lack of money and I wish I could be rich someday
I am in the same boat, but I think that I can still be very happy and very content with the little bit of money or lack of I have.

dialogs.situation: My little boy is starting Kindergarten and I'm sad he's growing up so fast.

turns.text: I'm a little sad my youngest son is starting Kindergarten in a few days.
Awww I completely understand. I remember that feeling. And mine is now a senior. Time flies! Cherish every moment with him!

dialogs.situation: My doctor told me to give up caffeine to help with my anxiety.  I really, really miss my morning coffee.

turns.text: My doctor told me to give up caffeine to help calm down my anxiety.
That's really hard to do. I should do the same thing, but I still start my day with a big glass of iced coffee every day. It could help though.

dialogs.situation: I was nervous for my first day of college.

turns.text: I was nervous for my first day of college.
oh yeah? was it because you didn't know if you could do the work, or because of all the hot college girls

dialogs.situation: My ipad is locked. My son kept putting in the wrong passcode.

turns.text: MY son always tries to unlock my ipad while I'm sleep. Now it has to be reset
That's annoying. Kids these days are really attached to electronics, just how it goes. I know it's hard to cut them off, but have you tried managing his electronics time more closely?

dialogs.situation: I am waiting on my grad school interview.

turns.text: I am trying to prepare for my grad school interview.
Oh wow! That must be quite nerve-wracking, although I am sure that you will do great! What are you planning to study?

dialogs.situation: I was so scared by the movie the Grudge, even to this day it still scares me  today

turns.text: I was so scared by the movie the Grudge, even to this day it still scares me today
I have never even heard of that movie, but I'm sure it would scare me.  I have never watched a horror movie in my life, and I won't

dialogs.situation: I have to go to a company presentation and make a speech. I'm so nervous that I might mess it up

turns.text: In a few days I need to go to a company presentation and make a big speech!
Wow, I bet that's exciting, but also makes you a bit nervous. Congratulations though, I'm sure you are proud to do it!

dialogs.situation: I remember when my kids were young we used to make up our own games. Now they are grown up and I miss that time so much.

turns.text: When my kids were young we used to make up our own games and have a lot of fun. They are all grown up now.
That sounds like a nice memory, but we all grow old. Do you still spend time with them sometimes?

dialogs.situation: I ran a red light yesterday and got stopped by the cops. It was very traumatizing.

turns.text: I ran a red light yesterday because I didn't think anyone was out on the road at 2AM. But a cop managed to nail me.
oh man, i'm glad you didn't get into an accident though. please be careful next time. did he give you a ticket?

dialogs.situation: I'm waiting for my financial aid so I can get a new car. My current car is having transmission problems.

turns.text: I'm waiting for my financial aid to be disbursed. It seems like it's taking forever. I really need to replace my car.
Yea I hate the wait for aid and all the paperwork. Hopefully it is resolved soon so you can ride comfortably.

dialogs.situation: when i see vomit i almost want to vomit

turns.text: when i see vomit i almost want to vomit , and in my job there are no janitors so the males on duty need to clean up the mess , and kids vomit in there at least once a week
Oh gross, you should bail quick if you see a kid getting sick, so that you won't be around to help clean it up.

dialogs.situation: I get my new vacuum tomorrow! It's been a long time since I bought one brand new. I am super excited!

turns.text: I get my new vacuum tomorrow! It's been a long time since I bought one brand new.
That's great. You have to buy a new one every so often as the motors get weak in them.

dialogs.situation: My friend always seems to get great jobs and then just phones in her work. It is annoying because I got laid off a while ago and it was so hard for me to find another job, but she just hops from job to job with seemingly no effort.

turns.text: This friend of mine is constantly job hopping, I don't even know what she does technically but she seems to get good jobs so easily, whereas when I left my last job I could barely get interviews.
Sometimes that depends on the industry. If she works in ones that have high turnover it's not a big of a deal as, say, an administrative job

dialogs.situation: My neighbor returned my lawn gnome today. I was so thankful.

turns.text: My neighbor returned my lawn gnome today.
How nice of you to loan it out! Have to admit, never heard of someone "borrowing" a lawn ornament though.

dialogs.situation: I cost my team the game last night.

turns.text: I made a big error in the last inning and cost my team the game.
oh man, i'm sorry to hear that! We all make mistakes though, so it's okay. don't be hard on yourslef

dialogs.situation: We just hired an exterminator for silverfish, and they are back worse than before.

turns.text: We just hired an exterminator last week for silverfish.  Now we have them worse than ever!
I have never heard of silverfish, but if you have to hire an exterminator that sounds serious. I hope you are ok!

dialogs.situation: I really nervous right now. I am waiting on a phone call to see if I got a job I interviewed for.

turns.text: I really nervous right now. I am waiting on a phone call to see if I got a job I interviewed for.
That is very tense to be waiting on that kind of call you got this positive thoughts only. What position is it for?

dialogs.situation: When my daughter was born, I didnt want to sleep. I wanted to sit and watch her sleep.

turns.text: My husband used to tell me to go to sleep at night when my daughter was born. I didn't want to go to sleep because I didn't want to miss a moment with her.
Aww that is so sweet.  I completely understand why!  Oh and thank you for your apology but I am truly content and have accepted it.

dialogs.situation: I can't wait for the new evil Spiderman movie called Venom. It's going to be sick!!!

turns.text: I can't wait for the new evil Spiderman movie called Venom. It's going to be sick!!!
Hey, I just saw that trailer! I'm kind of excited for it too since I loved him as a kid. But I felt like the trailer had a few dumb lines it, even though I love Tom Hardy.

dialogs.situation: I stayed up all night studying and im sure i passed my ffinal

turns.text: I stayed up all night studying and im sure i passed my final
Congrats! It's great to pass your test. Though staying up all night to study may not be the best studying technique.

dialogs.situation: I forgot to make my student loan payment this month.  I'm scared it will affect my credit score.

turns.text: I forgot to make my student loan payment this month.
Ah, that's unfortunate. That can be really tough to remember sometimes. I know because I've forgotten that too. But you'll make it up as soon as you can, I'm sure!

dialogs.situation: I went to Europe last year, to watch a cricket match. But, I went there all by myself. I felt isolated.

turns.text: I went to Europe last year, to watch a cricket match.
That's exciting! I have no idea how that sport is even played, but I'm glad you go to go see it! Did the team you were rooting for win?

dialogs.situation: My best friend has won those Taco Bell Playstation 4 giveaways twice so far.  I wish I could have his luck sometimes.

turns.text: My best friend has won those Taco Bell Playstation 4 giveaways twice so far.  I wish I could be that lucky sometimes.
Dang, and here I thought I was lucky winning a free soft drink in that contest. Maybe we have to pool our efforts together and try to win us something big?

dialogs.situation: Ok.. I was driving across S. Dakota last summer at night.  Its super dark and you can see all the stars.  Then my car broke down.

turns.text: Ok.. I was driving across S. Dakota last summer at night. Its super dark and you can see all the stars. Then my car broke down.
Oh my gosh, what a place to break down!  I was born in ND and I know the dark you are talking about.  Were you stuck for long?

dialogs.situation: i was so angry when i found out that my girlfriend cheated on me.. dont know how i can forgive her

turns.text: i was so angry when i found out that my girlfriend cheated on me.. dont know how i can forgive her
I am so sorry! I would have a hard time forgiving that betrayal of trust. How long have you been together?

dialogs.situation: I had eggs for breakfast this morning. I don't think I cooked the eggs enough and the yolk was raw, I felt like vomiting.

turns.text: I had eggs for breakfast this morning. I don't think I cooked the eggs enough and the yolk was raw, I felt like vomiting.
Oh no, that's the worst to spend time cooking something and then taking a bite and it's awful.

dialogs.situation: I almost got hit by a semi truck today on the highway. It scared me half to death.

turns.text: I almost got hit by a semi truck today on the highway. It scared me half to death.
Woah! I'm soooo glad you're okay!  Those big rigs are so dangerous and make me so nervous.  I stay as far away from them as I can.

dialogs.situation: The chargers are finally getting some national love

turns.text: Being a chargers fan is tough, finally some national recognition
Ha, you'll have to enlighten me as I don't know much about the Chargers. Are they usually not a good team or what?

dialogs.situation: I got to spend the day relaxing at home with my girlfriend.

turns.text: I got to spend the day relaxing at home with my girlfriend.
That sounds awesome.  Did you guys do anything with the day off or just hang out watching TV?

dialogs.situation: i loved taking care of my sisters bearded dragon the other day

turns.text: i loved taking care of my sisters bearded dragon the other day
That sounds like fun but I would be scared. I heard they are friendly tho. First time taking care of it?

dialogs.situation: I'm ashamed to be 28 and still really into gaming and watching other people play games.

turns.text: I'm ashamed to be 28 and still really into gaming.
Nothing to be ashamed about.  There are lots of people much older that are still into gaming.  If you're really good you could actually make money on it!

dialogs.situation: I spent 5 hours baking a cake yesterday. When I was finished my wife dropped it!

turns.text: I spent 5 hours baking a cake yesterday.
That's a lot of dedication. Was it for a special occasion? And have you been baking for very long, or do you do it professionally at all?

dialogs.situation: I get to visit my family next week. I am so stoked. I have not seen them in forever!

turns.text: I am so stoked because I get to visit my family next week. I have not seen them in a long time.
That is really exciting! I bet you all will have a great time. Do you have any big plans with them?

dialogs.situation: I was on an airplane last week, and someone's baby would not stop crying. I know it isn't right to be upset about such things, but it really bothered me.

turns.text: I was on an airplane last week, and someone's baby would not stop crying. I know it isn't right to be upset about such things, but it really bothered me.
Dont worry, anyone would have felt the same way. If it makes you feel better remember that we were all babies once.

dialogs.situation: I was getting ready to fly to Dallas for a meeting with a client when I heard there were bad storms on the flight path.  I ended up renting  a car because I hate flying so much.

turns.text: I had a client meeting in Dallas, and as I was driving to the airport I heard there was going to be a lot of storms we'd be flying through. I ended up renting a car because I hate flying so much in just calm weather.
That is a lot of extra money to spen, but it is completely understandable it you are that nervous about it.  Have you ever looked into calming medications, or meditation to help your nerves?

dialogs.situation: I knew my birthday was coming up but was shocked to find all my friends in the bar at the same time!

turns.text: I am very lucky, my friends are so great. What's the best birthday you have had?
Probably one where I got a limo with all my friends and went to this restaurant, it was great. What about yours, what makes your friends so great too?

dialogs.situation: I can't wait for the new call of duty game. The beta starts today

turns.text: The new call of duty game doesnt come out until october
I see. I used to play this game along with Battlefield in the past when in college. Now, I only FIFA only, others do not interest me much

dialogs.situation: I just ordered a really cool tablet yesterday! i cant wait for it to arrive

turns.text: I ordered a surface pro yesterday! its gonna be so cool to play around with when it arrives
That's cool. I've always been a Mac kind of girl, but I would look into a Surface is I was in the market for a new computer.

dialogs.situation: My friend learned to speak another language (quite fluently) in 3 months. I don't think I could ever do that!

turns.text: My friend learned to speak another language (quite fluently) in 3 months
That's honestly really amazing, most people take forever to learn even a tiny bit of a foreign language.

dialogs.situation: nostalgic: I love playing old school video games. The music is amazing

turns.text: I love playing old school video games. The music is amazing
Old school video games are full nostalgic memories for me. That is why i try to avoid them as they evoke many emotions in me

dialogs.situation: everytime i see my nephew i am really in shock of how fast he grows now

turns.text: i am really impressed everytime i see my nephew on how fast he is growing
It is pretty crazy how fast grow up when you get older, it seems like a couple of weeks and they are in high school

dialogs.situation: Yesterday I went to the garage to look for some tools and I found a dead rat.

turns.text: Yesterday I went to the garage to look for some tools and found a dead rat instead!
Yikes. I live in the south and we don't get those. Just palmetto bugs (flying roaches). I think I'd rather have those than rats, personally.

dialogs.situation: Tomorow, I am starting a trip of six months to visit different country. I am so happy and I cannot sleep.

turns.text: Tomorow, I am starting a trip of six months to visit different country. I am so happy and I cannot sleep.
I recently got back from a trip abroad as well! Traveling is a blast. Where are you going?

dialogs.situation: My wife is out of the country for school.  She was having a really bad day the other day and I couldn't really do anything to help.

turns.text: My wife is out of the country for school, and the other day she was having a really bad day.  I couldn't really do anything to help, and it made me feel bad.
I'm so sorry.  I know you must've felt helpless but coming from a wife's perspective; I would know my husband couldn't be right next to me but his words and love make all the difference.

dialogs.situation: I planned a picnic with a friend and it rained. I was upset that it ruined our plans.

turns.text: I planned a picnic with a friend and it rained.
Oh, that's too bad. Perhaps have the picnic indoors? It wouldn't be the same, but at least you could share food and have a laugh!

dialogs.situation: We were supposed to go out of town for labor day.  But we had to cancel, our daughter needs surgery on her ankle.  She fell off her horse.

turns.text: We were supposed to go out of town for labor day but we had to cancel.
That really sucks. Is it because your mom was in the hospital? I am a psychic, so I tend to know these things.

dialogs.situation: I went to the store but couldn't afford the food that I wanted. I decided to go ahead and steal some things.

turns.text: Hi, I couldn't get the food to feed my family, so I just stole some of the more expensive things from the store.
Oh no! I'm sorry to hear that you don't have enough money for food, but stealing isn't the answer! Maybe there's a local food bank you can contact.

dialogs.situation: I don't want to throw away my son's old trophies.

turns.text: My son just left for college and I don't want to throw away his old comic books and trophies.
Aww that's really sweet. I understand being sentimental about that sort of stuff. Do you feel like you have to?

dialogs.situation: i had to clean up an overflow toilet.

turns.text: the toilet got clogged and there was poop everywhere, and I had to clean it up.
That's pretty gross. Were there other people around? I'm always more nervous about that when people are around.

dialogs.situation: It's amazing how much money I saved this month when I really put my mind to it.

turns.text: It's amazing how much money I saved this month once I really put my mind to it.
Yes all it takes is cutting back on some things you maybe dont need. I know it can be  hard to do though!

dialogs.situation: i was excited when i got to leave work early

turns.text: i was excited when i got to leave work early
I'm glad to hear something positive happened to you. Were you able to do something fun or productive with the time off? And what was the occasion?

dialogs.situation: I was offered a new job last week but I dont know if I will take it.

turns.text: Last week I was offered a new job but I dont know if I will take it. I am scared to leave my current job.
why are you scared of leaving your current job? if you have been offered a better job then just leave you know?

dialogs.situation: mcdonalds forgot my food

turns.text: A few weeks ago i went to mcdonalds for lunch i waited 20 minutes no food, i went up and asked for my food since i only get 20 minutes , they said an error occurred and gave me my food within 20 seconds i was so mad
It has been really dry here, as well.  We are in a severe drought for the third time in four years.

dialogs.situation: I found a wallet in the subway. Instead of bringing it to an agent, I took it with me. I feel bad about it.

turns.text: I found a wallet in the subway. Instead of bringing it to an agent, I took it with me. I feel bad about it.
You can still turn it in! Just drop it off to the police or the people in charge at the subway.

dialogs.situation: I found a photo of my grandfather who past away 10 years ago recently and I a feeling very nostalgic thinking back on the days we spend together

turns.text: I found a photo of my grandfather who past away 10 years ago recently and I a feeling very nostalgic thinking back on the days we spend together
I'm sorry to hear that he passed away, but I'm glad that you have good memories of him.

dialogs.situation: I gotta go to this serious interview tomorrow

turns.text: I have this very serious interview tomorrow and I'm so nervous. I know what to say but i'm scared i will forget everything

Well, it's okay to be a bit nervous. Interviewers will understand that. You only have to halfway reign in it in and you'll hit that happy medium that's good for a workplace interview. Where are you applying to?

dialogs.situation: My partner's mom passed away. I was very sad for her loss

turns.text: Last week, my partner's mom passed away. It was truly hard for her to comprehend all the mixed feelings at that moment
I am so sorry to hear that.  Losing a loved one is definitely one of the hardest things in life.

dialogs.situation: These days nothing gives me more unexpected joy than find free money or new financial opportunities

turns.text: I used to get excited over getting girls' numbers...nowadays I get excited over free cash and paying off credit card bills
yea tell me about it... im still paying off cc's from when my wife and i were dating :p

dialogs.situation: My 6 year old daughter couldn't understand how to use a gaming controller. after a few days she had figured it out on her own.

turns.text: My 6 year old tried to play a video game but couldn't understand how the controller worked. A few days later she was playing no problem!
Kids pick those things up quickly.  And it'll help with her hand-eye coordination, reading - all sorts of things!

dialogs.situation: when my girl friend left me i felt so alone

turns.text: when my long time girl friend left me , i felt so alone even tho i have family and friends around me i just was not there i lost a lot of weight too
I'm sorry to hear that. That's a pretty common response to break ups. A lot of people go through it, so you're not alone! I hope you pull through soon.

dialogs.situation: I am very pleased with the work Trump has done.

turns.text: I am very pleased with the work Trump has done.
Yeah, I really liked those hunting trophies he got. We should be allowed to kill any animals we see!

dialogs.situation: My friend recently went on a beach vacation and I really was ready to go on vacation myself. She had already been several times that year so I begrudged her vacation a bit.

turns.text: A little while ago, my friend went on another beach vacation. It was her 3rd one for the year. My family and I hadn't been on vacation for several years, due to issues beyond our control, so I begrudged her trip a bit.
Being jealous of another person is a perfectly fine response. Despite this, you never know what is going on behind the scenes, she may have taken out huge loans just to fund her trips.

dialogs.situation: I went out today and was astonished by how beautiful and sunny it is, even though it was supposed to rain.

turns.text: So it was supposed to rain, but when I got out it was beautifully sunny.

Almost sounds like the erratic weather that we have here in Georgia.  I don't mind the rain as long as I'm inside.  The sun is beautiful but sometimes it can be brutal when it starts to heat up.  Do you prefer sunny days?

dialogs.situation: I've been training for about 6 years now and I have a better physique now that I'm 30 years old than I did when I was 20!

turns.text: I've been weight lifting for 6 years now and I can finally say I'm very proud of my physique! I'm 30 years old and look better now than I did at 20!
Congrats! I am also working hard at getting super fit too at 35! It is harder the older you are but totally doable if you're committed!

dialogs.situation: My friend recently renovated her house and I was envious because I've been dreaming about doing mine.

turns.text: My friend recently renovated her kitchen and I was so envious because I've been dreaming about remodeling my own for years.
I'm sure you'll be able to do yours soon.  And maybe you can get some good ideas from hers!

dialogs.situation: I once had to have teeth pulled, and I was given some crazy pill to take before coming to the appoinment because I hate dentists, and it made me act all funny. My mom video taped it and it is so funny but like stinks people saw me acting like a hooligan!

turns.text: I once had to have teeth pulled, and I was given some crazy pill to take before coming to the appoinment because I hate dentists, and it made me act all funny. My mom video taped it and it is so funny but like stinks people saw me acting like a hooligan!
oh wow, i hate when people record those type of videos. It's really not funny to me and very inconsiderate of that person! How embrassing!

dialogs.situation: My significant other woke up last night with... a roach inside of her ear! She was complaining about pain in her ear, and a head ache that was incredibly severe. So, we took her to the doctor and he saw it with a light... and put water in her ear to get it out. Disgusting!

turns.text: My significant other woke up last night with... a roach inside of her ear! She was complaining about pain in her ear, and a head ache that was incredibly severe. So, we took her to the doctor and he saw it with a light... and put water in her ear to get it out. Disgusting!
Oh gross!  I've heard of flies or ants being in an ear, but a roach?  That gives me chills because I hate roaches sooooo much.  Now I might have nightmares tonight!

dialogs.situation: Starting to work out again! Getting back in shape has raised my Self Esteem!

turns.text: I've got back in to running this week, I missed it! It's a great stress reliever!
Wow, I don't know how you runners do it. I can't stand running. How many miles do you run per day on average?

dialogs.situation: My son pooped his pants but lucky i had baby wipes with me to clean it up

turns.text: my son pooped his pants but lucky i carry baby wipes to wipe it up quick before it leaks
Oh geez. That is common with kids. Not the funnest times. Do you carry extra clothes too?

dialogs.situation: I was out of town on a business trip recently and felt that I had no one to hang out with.  I did not know anyone where I was

turns.text: I was out of town on a business trip and felt very isolated.  I did not know anyone and had no one to hang out with.
Oh, I'm sorry you had that experience. When I was traveling cross-country, I used to FaceTime or Skype friends and family. Would that work for you?

dialogs.situation: I'm really psyched because my brother just asked me to be his best man. I can't wait for the bachelor party!

turns.text: My brother just asked me to be his best man. I'm so psyched!
Dang, that's a nice honor. Shows you what he thinks of you. I would like someone to ask me to be their best man one day! Congratulations to the both of you

dialogs.situation: I told something to someone that I had promised to keep a secret.

turns.text: I told something to someone that I had promised to keep a secret.
That is not nice! People do that all the time as long as the person they tell is closer to them

dialogs.situation: i went all the way to that whole foods store and they didn't have ground bison

turns.text: I really wanted to try bison meet and I went all the way to that whole foods store like 57 miles away and they didn't have it, what a waste of time
That sucks, after going all that way too and you didn't even get to try it. I'm sorry.

dialogs.situation: I went to a restaurant's bathroom today for lunch and it was absolutely disgusting.  Looked like it hadn't been cleaned in months.

turns.text: I went to a restaurant's bathroom today for lunch and it was absolutely disgusting. Looked like it hadn't been cleaned in months.
Thats sick. Did you report them? They are supposed to have them cleaned several times per day or they can be shut down

dialogs.situation: I was transferred to a new city. I did not know what to do on the weekends. I didn't have any friends or family. All my co-workers were married and lived in the suburbs.

turns.text: I'm in a new city and don't know what to do.
That could be kind of scary. Have you tried to meet anyone that might could show you around and then maybe you would not be so lonely?

dialogs.situation: I wasn't able to make rent this month. My dad helped me cover it.

turns.text: I wasn't able to make rent this month.
Ohh man, I am so sorry.  I have had that happen to me many times over the last five years.  Did you contact your landlord?

dialogs.situation: Just moved and there is a pier near where I live.

turns.text: Just moved and there is a pier near where I live

Oh, that's kind of nice. It's nice to have those natural landmarks near where you live, so you can visit them and get a sense of relaxation and peace. I've lived near the ocean all my life, and while I do take it for granted from time to time, I try to remember how useful and beautiful it is.

dialogs.situation: I happened to have all the ingredients in my fridge to make my favorite sandwich.

turns.text: I was really hungry yesterday and opened the fridge and happened to have all the ingredients to my favorite sandwich.
I bet you were thrilled. There's nothing like a hearty sandwich to conquer one's hunger!

dialogs.situation: I didnt go to the gym this morning. I felt bad about it

turns.text: I did not go to the gym this morning. I felt bad about it
Well, I guess if you're a pretty regular gym-goer, you shouldn't feel bad about missing a day every once in a while.

dialogs.situation: i was scared walking home the other night

turns.text: i was scared walking home the other night
Uh oh, were you alone? Hopefully you didn't have to go very far! That can be super scary for sure.

dialogs.situation: i was mad when i returned to my car and noticed someone put a dent in my door

turns.text: i was mad when i returned to my car and noticed someone put a dent in my car
That would really anger me as well.  What did you do?  Did you find the person who did it?

dialogs.situation: I just witnessed someone steal from an old woman walking across the street. Boils my blood!

turns.text: I witnessed a man rob an old woman walking across the street. Boils my friggin' blood!
Oh my God that's terrible!  So sad.  I'd be mad too.  What did you do?

dialogs.situation: It seems like every weekend I cannot wait until it gets here. I'm always counting down the hours on that Friday.

turns.text: Happy Friday! Isn't it the worst just waiting for the work day to go by so you can get to your weekend?
Happy Friday indeed! yes I can't wait to finish work for today even when i am just beginning.

dialogs.situation: The other day I wasn't too sure about letting my dog off his leash but he seemed to be doing really well recently so I let him off and he was quite obedient and never strayed too far away from me!

turns.text: The other day I wasn't too sure about letting my dog off his leash but he seemed to be doing really well recently so I let him off and he was quite obedient and never strayed too far away from me!
You are so lucky ! I still keep my 9 month old fur baby on a leash. What breed is your dog ?

dialogs.situation: I'm making guacamole for the first time.

turns.text: I'm making guacamole for the first time.
Did someone give you a recipe or did you google it? Keep tasting it until you get what you want!

dialogs.situation: I am always anxious. One example at stores sometimes. or maybe about making enough money.

turns.text: I often feel a lot of anxiety about making enough money and saving up enough money in case anything happens. And many things usually do happen. i almost panic at times with worry
Life can be tough sometimes. It almost seems like you spend more time preparing for the unexpected than living life in the present. It's cruel sometimes

dialogs.situation: Roller coasters are my favorite things in the world. Every winter, I miss them so much. By the time February rolls around, all I can think about is going back to the parks and riding all of them!

turns.text: I love roller coasters, but I hate that my favorite amusement parks close during the winter.
I hate that most parks close during the winter too. Do you have any indoor type amusement parks near you?

dialogs.situation: My dog pooped on the rug last night. I was so mad!

turns.text: My dog pooped on the rug last night. I was so mad at that little imp!

awww sorry bout your rug...there's a facebook group called doggo you should follow...owners post pics of their dogs with signs around their necks like "I like jumping out of moving cars just to poop in front of strangers" you might be less mad looking at them haha

dialogs.situation: When my mom joined college. She had been out of school for 15 years.

turns.text: Just got back from my moms graduating, so proud.
I would be too!  My mom got her degree recently as well, so I know the feeling.

dialogs.situation: I went to a job meeting and everybody was late

turns.text: i went to a job meeting and a couple of people were late so we had to sit and wait for them! i was so mad
That must have been really annoying. Sucks to be a person who's on time dealing with people who don't care about being on time themselves.

dialogs.situation: My girlfriend has been so busy with work lately, it's left me feeling neglected. But she's working hard to pay off her student loans and to build her savings, so I have to respect that. But at the same time, we're long distance, so the time I have with her when she actually isn't working isn't that fulfilling, either.

turns.text: My girlfriend has been so busy with work lately, it's left me feeling neglected. But she's working hard to pay off her student loans and to build her savings, so I have to respect that. But at the same time, we're long distance, so the time I have with her when she actually isn't working isn't that fulfilling, either.
That's really too bad. I know how that feels. Have you tried telling her how you feel about it?

dialogs.situation: Just got my new coffee pot from a brand I have never tried. I love it so much I will never go with another coffee pot brand again.

turns.text: I just got to use my new coffee pot from a brand I've never tried. wow, that's good coffee!
Nice that it worked out so well for you! What brand did you end up going with?

dialogs.situation: I hate scary movies, they scare me so much, especially jumpscares

turns.text: I hate scary movies, they scare me so much, especially jumpscares
Oh yeah, I can't take scary movies of any kind.  I used to watch some of them when I was in my 20's.  What kind of movies do you like?

dialogs.situation: My grandma was diagnosed with stage 4 cancer. I didn't know what to do..

turns.text: My grandmother was diagnosed with stage four cancer. I feel helpless.
Oh no, I am so sorry to hear that. That is awful and makes me sad. Have you talked to anyone about it?

dialogs.situation: My sister in law is a horrible parent.  Her kids can run fevers of like 104 and she will not take them to the doctor.

turns.text: I feel like my sister in law is a horrible parent - some people should just not have kids.
i can relate my brothers ex wife , uses all the child support money on her self and her crack head boyfriend , my brother buys my nieces close and toys because she wont

dialogs.situation: I am stressed. My wife is expecting a baby. I am happy but at the same time I feel littlle stress by the responsabillities.

turns.text: I am stressed. My wife is expecting a baby. I am happy but at the same time I feel littlle stresse by the responsibilities.
Yeah, I know how you feel. Not exactly the same situation, though. I was going through with an adoption, but same amount of responsibilities nonetheless.

dialogs.situation: I went to the dog pound and i loved every animal. I couldn't believe how horrible life can be for animals.

turns.text: I went to the pound today and i felt like taking every animal home.
I have been there, done that.  I used to be a dog groomer and I love dogs.   Its so sad to go the pound and see all the homeless dogs.

dialogs.situation: i am so scared i want to finish all the book today and i may not be able to finish it

turns.text: i wanted to finish the book today, and i'm afraid that i can't finish it today.
Can you tell me the name of the book? I find myself being engaged by a lot of novels these days.

dialogs.situation: I am planning to go to a movie themed costume part this coming weekend. I bought all my gear weeks in advance. I'll be dressed up as Darth Vader.

turns.text: I am attending a movie themed costume part this weekend. I bought my Darth Vader costume weekend in advance!
Good for you. Socializing through such ways is a great way to enjoy your time. And besides, I am not Star Wars fan and have not watched any of the movie series

dialogs.situation: I get so frustrated when I see people littering. Some people do not respect the environment at all. I want to scold them for being so inconsiderate.

turns.text: My biggest pet peeve is litterbugs. I want to go up to them and scold them for not respecting the environment.
I completely agree!  I am all about keeping the earth clean, recycling, and low waste living.  They should get bigger fines!

dialogs.situation: I asked my friend to get some stuff for a party, I knew I could count on him though.

turns.text: I asked my friend to get some stuff for a party, I knew I could count on him though.
I'm jealous of you. I'm a little introverted and antisocial, and never got good at developing friendships where I could make them long-lasting and trustworthy. Good for you

dialogs.situation: I lost out on a job promotion

turns.text: I can't believe I didn't get that promotion at work :(

Ah dang... Sorry that happened to you. It stinks too because a lot of the time that stuff is just decided by who is liked more, or who has better connections, and not actual merit. If you're good, I'm sure you will get recognized at some point.

dialogs.situation: We were in a small fender bender the other day.  Now when I'm driving, I am scared that I will be in an even worse wreck.

turns.text: I was in a small fender bender earlier this week. Now I am scared that I will be in an even worse wreck.
Oh i hate it when i get those kind of thoughts but eventually you recover and don't think about it.

dialogs.situation: Living out of a car

turns.text: I used to live out of my car and it made me feel pretty down on myself back then
I no how you feeI I have had to live in worse places than that , but it looks like you found a way out of that situation.

dialogs.situation: My sister fell ill a few weeks ago. I went to her house and made sure she had everything she needed.

turns.text: My sister fell ill a few weeks ago. I went to her house to take care of her.
Oh no! I'm so sorry!  Is she okay? That is so great that she has you.

dialogs.situation: My son is in the National Guard. He has made it all the way to Sargent.

turns.text: My son is amazing! He's been in the National Guard for 9 years and is a Sargent now.
Wow!! That is amazing! Good for him. You must be really proud and you have every right to be! :)

dialogs.situation: So I took a picture of myself at a battlefield and there was a ghostly smudge over me that wasn't in the image before or after it.

turns.text: So I took a picture of myself at a battlefield and there was a ghostly smudge over me that wasn't in the image before or after it.
That's extremely unsettling. How did you feel when you saw the photo with that in it for the first time?

dialogs.situation: I have put in so many hours at work hoping to get a promotion. Fingers crossed it works!

turns.text: I have put in so many hours at work hoping to get a promotion. Fingers crossed it works
Yeah I hope you get it! I'm sure they will recognize the extra time you've been doing.

dialogs.situation: My husband told me last year that he wants a divorce.  Not real reason IMO, just said that he's unhappy.

turns.text: My husband told me last year that he wanted a divorce.
Sorry to hear that how did things turn out did you two make it work or going through the process now?

dialogs.situation: I was proud when my little brother graduated from college.  He had to work hard but he got through it.

turns.text: My little brother graduated not too long ago.  He had to work hard but he made it through college
That's great, it's good to see people finish what they start. You must be very proud.

dialogs.situation: I had food, water, and a place to sleep today. I am so thankful.

turns.text: I had food, water, and a place to sleep today. I am so thankful.
I get that so many people in the world are so much worse off then us. I think it's easy to forget that.

dialogs.situation: In high school it felt like everyone had their first kiss before me. I wanted to kiss a girl so bad

turns.text: In high school it felt like everyone had their first kiss before me.
At least you finally got one! Sometimes it helps not to focus too much on what everyone has has or has done.

dialogs.situation: I recently stopped at Sonic and got a car hop classic. t

turns.text: I recently stopped at Sonic and got a carhop classic. It reminded me of when my Grandfather used to take me there as a kid.
I love Sonic! I used to go as a kid a lot as well. They have the best shakes.

dialogs.situation: My husbands open heart surgery for Monday was postponed. We have to deal with Kidney related issues now.

turns.text: My husbands open heart surgery for Monday was postponed. We have to deal with Kidney related issues now
Sorry to hear that. My parents used to struggle with health issues too, and I'd worry just as much as they would. Do you know when it may be rescheduled for?

dialogs.situation: My friend has had the flu, and I have been making sure they get better and that they eat.

turns.text: My friend has had the flu, and I have been making sure they get better and that they eat.
That's sweet of you, the flu is a pretty gnarly sickness to go through. You sound like a good friend!

dialogs.situation: when i ever i work with the fastest co workers im happy

turns.text: everytime before clocking in i look at the schedule , when i see a bunch of fast workers on the list im so happy , like we are getting out early today
That's good to have a bunch of people working with you that are fast and good at their job. I bet it makes everyone's job a lot easier.

dialogs.situation: I am ready for my work meeting tomorrow. I have been working on it all night

turns.text: I am ready for work tomorrow and my team meeting. I have been working on it all night
That's really great to hear. It's always good to prepare for big events like that. What's the meeting about?

dialogs.situation: My son won first place in a spelling bee!

turns.text: My son is dyslexic and has ADD, with a little work he ended up winning his spelling bee! I'm proud of him!
That is amazing! I'm happy to hear that. I can relate, I feel like I have undiagnosed ADD.

dialogs.situation: Whenever I see a newborn baby I always think about how I wish their life will be happy and long.

turns.text: Whenever I see a newborn baby I always think about how I wish their life will be happy and long.
That is really sweet, I saw someone tweet about a baby laughing on the beach for 15 minutes today. Happy babies are fun

dialogs.situation: I am about to invest in cryptocurrencies after having saved enough. So thrilled for its potential to grow

turns.text: After having saved enough, i am about to invest in cryptocurrencies. So thrilled for its potential to grow in the future
That's quite interesting.  I need to learn more about cryptocurrency.  I thought that I had missed the opportunity.

dialogs.situation: I just celebrated my 35th wedding anniversary and I have never been happier in my marriage!

turns.text: I just celebrated my 35th wedding anniversary and I have never been happier in my marriage!
That is amazing!  So many people do not stay married these days, you should be proud of that accomplishment!

dialogs.situation: Recently I've been driving my friend's mom to and from the hospital for her chemo treatments. My friend is in the military and she can't drive so it's about the only way for her to get there.

turns.text: Recently I've been driving my friend's mom to and from the hospital for her chemo treatments. My friend is in the military and she can't drive so it's about the only way for her to get there.
Aww, that is very sweet, kind and thoughtful of you! Has it been troubling for you because I am sure you also have a busy schedule

dialogs.situation: I was able to make an A in every subject last semester. I really surprised my self with that.

turns.text: I am so happy with myself. I made an A in every class last semester.
Impressive! It is all going to be well worth it in the long run, keep going ghost rider!

dialogs.situation: My biggest pet peeve is poor people who complain about their situation and do nothing to fix it.

turns.text: One big pet peeve of mine is a poor person complaining about his/her situation and doing absolutely nothing to fix it
i get that. i am in pain every morning and get up and go to work everyday. so it's hard to find sympathy from me

dialogs.situation: One time I got so drunk I stripped down and got into the pool, we just so happen to have alot of people around. The worse is not remembering and having people tell you the story

turns.text: There was this one time years ago that we threw a party and I got so drunk, I do not remember anything! You know it is bad when you have people telling you what all you did and you can not remember any of it
Yeah, when I was younger I did some of that stuff as well. It's a really embarrassing thing to hear stories about things you did that you don't remember doing.

dialogs.situation: I let my coworker handle a project.

turns.text: I let my coworker handle my project when I was on sick leave.
That was nice of them to chip in. It must have felt good that you had someone to help.

dialogs.situation: I had to borrow money from my parents to pay the mortgage. I am having trouble making ends meet.

turns.text: I had to borrow money from my parents to pay the mortgage. I am having trouble making ends meet.
I am sorry to hear that,  I hope it is only a temporarily situation and you will be on your feet in no time.

dialogs.situation: I know I should go to bed. I am too excited for tomorrow. I feel bad

turns.text: I should be asleep
me too , but i had a long day at work and right now im just relaxing in the cold air for a little bit longer

dialogs.situation: I canceled on my friend tonight and felt bad. I was just tired

turns.text: I had to cancel on my friend tonight. I felt bad when I did too

That happens sometimes. Sometimes life just gets in the way. Heck, sometimes you just decide you can't physically do a night out, and that's okay, too. I'm sure they'd understand no matter what. Maybe you can make it up to them somehow.

dialogs.situation: i had to assist a mom with two daughters who all had lice

turns.text: i had to assist a mom with two daughters who all had lice
Oh no! That sounds awful! What a kind thing to do though! Im sure they were very grateful for your help!

dialogs.situation: it was impressive to see Lebron sign with the lakers and leave the cavs a second time

turns.text: it was impressive to see lebron sign with the lakers and leave the cavs a second time
i don't really follow players when they get so big that they seem like they are getting too big for their britches

dialogs.situation: My friends are in the process of adopting a child through DFACS.  It has been a long time coming and all of us are eager for this to go through, it's been pretty nerve wracking

turns.text: My friends are in the process of adopting a child through DFACS.  It's been going on for so long though!

That's so awesome!  Are they adopting domestically or abroad?  My husband and I tried to adopt from Japan but our paperwork expired before we could and then I got pregnant. I hope it goes well for them!

dialogs.situation: I was confident that I had aced my chemistry test in college

turns.text: In college I studied very hard for an upcoming exam that I was very interested in getting a very high score. I was confident that I did so.
I'm sure you studied hard and should be proud of that! I'm positive you nailed it.
